JOH 8:33 Boomó «Noo Abraham naar noone, b́ jamon konshor guuts wot danaknone, eshe nee ‹Nas'o keshetute› noosh nietir aawuk'oneya?» bo et.
JOH 8:34 Iyesuswere hank'o ett boosh bíaaniy, «Arikon arikoniye itsh tietiri, morr finiru jamo morri guutse,
JOH 8:35 Guutso jam aawosh mootse beerake, na'onmó jam aawosh mootse b́befoni.
JOH 8:36 Mansh naayo nas'o iti b́ kishyal arikon nas'o wotitute.
JOH 8:37 Abraham naar it wottsok'o taa danfee, ernmó t keewo it de'awotse taan úd'osh it geyiri.
JOH 8:38 Taa t nihoke t bek'tsoniye tkeewiri, itmó it nihoke it shishtsoniye it k'aliri.»
JOH 8:39 Bowere «Nonih Abrahamiye» ett boaaniy. Iyesuswere boosh hank'o bíeti, «Abraham nana'uwotsi it wotink'ere Abraham finoniye it finyank'oni,
JOH 8:40 Taaamó Ik'oke t shishts arikoniye itsh tkeewi, itmó taan úd'oshe it geyiri, Abraham mank'o k'alratse.
JOH 8:41 Eshe it itfiniriye it nih finoniye.» Bowere «Widon shuwets dik'al noanaliye, ik nihe nodetsi bíwere Ik'oniye» bo et.
JOH 8:42 Iyesuswere hank'o boosh bíeti, «Ik'o it nihi b́wotink'ermó taan shunank'te b́ teshi, taa hanok t weyiye Ik'okne, taan woshtso bína bako taa ttookon waratse.
JOH 8:43 Eegoshe t keewo itsh gaalo bk'azi? T aap' shisho it maawutsoshe.
JOH 8:44 It itnih Diyablos nana'uwots itne, it it shuniye it nih teuniruwo k'aloshe, bi shintson dek't b́tuutso kash úd'ke, arikeewo bíyoke bíaaltsotse arikeewonton b́ jamon gonkeyo deshatse, bí kootetskonat koot jami nih b́wottsotse koto b́keewor b́ tookotse kishdek'tni b́keewiri.
JOH 8:45 Taayere ariko tkeewirwosh taan amaneratste,
JOH 8:46 Aab ititse ‹Morretsk neene› etetuwo kone? Arika t keewiri wotiyal bere, eegoshe taan amano it k'azi?
JOH 8:47 Ik'okik wottso Ik'i aap'e b́ shishfoni, eshe it Ik'i aap'o shisho it k'azir Ik'okik woto it k'aztsoshe.»
JOH 8:48 Ayhudiwots, «Neehe Samrawinene, Fo'erawoniye niatse fa'ee no ettso ar woteratsáá?» boeti.
JOH 8:49 Iyesuswere hank'o et boosh bianiy, «Taa fo'erawo tiatse aaliye, ernmó t nihiye tmangiyiri, itmó taana it ketiyri.
JOH 8:50 Wotowa bako taa t took mango geeratse, t mangi jangosh moshetwonat taash angishitwo k'osho fa'ee.
JOH 8:51 Arikon arikone itsh tietiriye, ti aap'o kor dek'etwoniye b́ jamon k'irratse.»
JOH 8:52 Ayhudiwots hank'owa bísh boet, «Fo'erawo niatse b́beyiruwok'o and danrone, dab́ Abrahmwor k'irre, nebiyiwotswere k'irrne, nemon ‹T aap'o kordek'etwo b́jamon k'irratse› etfne,
JOH 8:53 Eshe nee no nih k'irtso Abrahamiyere bogfiya? nebiyiwots k'irrno, eshe nee n tooko koni woshishe?»
JOH 8:54 Iyesus hank'o ett bíaaniy, «Taa t tooko t mangiyal t mango k'auntso deshatse taan mangiyituwo t nihiye, bíwere ‹No Ik'oniye› it etirwoni.
JOH 8:55 B́ wotiyalor it bín danatste, taamo bín danfee, taa bín danatse tietalmó itkok'o kootetsoniye twoti, taamo bín danfee, b́ aap'onowere kordek'etuwe.
JOH 8:56 It nih Abraham ti aawo b́ bek'etwosh gene'owere, bek'tnwere gene'uwere.»
JOH 8:57 Manoor ayhudiwots, «Nee dab balk'ats nato woterafa'ane, eshe aawk'oneya Abrahami bek're nietiri?» bo eti.
JOH 8:58 Iyesuswere, «Arikon ariko itsh tietiriye, Abrahamiyere shin fa'e.» bíet.
JOH 8:59 Mansh ayhudiwots bin togosh shútso k'aa'u bodek'i, Iyesusmó bo aawatse ashwutsat Ik' mootse kesht biam.
JOH 9:1 Iyesus werindon b́beshefere ááw dog wotat shuwetso b́ bek'i.
JOH 9:2 B́danifwots Iyesussh, «Danifono! ashaan dog wotat b́shuwe kon morroneya? B́ took morroneyamo bín shuutswots morroneya?»
JOH 9:3 Iyesuswere hank'o ett bíaaniy, «Ashaan ááwu dogo wotat b́ shuuwe b́ morron wee bínshutswots morratse tuutsonaliye, ernmó Ik'o fino bíatse b́ be'eyishee.
JOH 9:4 Taan woshtso fino aawon fino taash geyife, asho konwor fin b́ falraw t'úwo weetwe.
JOH 9:5 Datsuatse t beyor taa datsush bsháán taane.»
JOH 9:6 Man b́ keewiyakon datsats tuf ett s'údt b́ s'údon shaawo b́ baad'i, tok'mannowere dogo aawats futt,
JOH 9:7 «Amr Selihom aats kakots mashowe» bí et. (Selihom «wosheka» eta.) Mann ashman amt mashdek't s'iilfere aanat b́weyi.
JOH 9:8 B́ giyuwotsnat bali b́ k'onfere bín bek't teshts ashuwots, «Ashaan andi bede'e k'onfoniyosha?» boeti.
JOH 9:9 Ik ikwots, «Ee, ún bííne!» bo et, «K'oshwotswere bína bíari bako bínaliye!» boet. Bímó «Taane únni!» bí et.
JOH 9:10 Ash ashuwotswere «Beree, aak'altniya ni'aawwots bok'esheyi?» boeti.
JOH 9:11 Bíwere «Iyesusi eteef asho took'o bad'idek't tiááwats futt ‹Selihom maants amr mashowe› bíet, taawere amaat mashdek'at bek'o tfali» ett bíaaniy.
JOH 9:12 Bowere, «Ash man and aawoke b́ fa'oni?» boet. Bíwere, «Aawoke b́ beyirwok'o danatse» bí et.
JOH 9:13 Maniyehak ash ashuwots doogteshts asho ferisawino etef wotsok dek't boami.
JOH 9:14 Iyesus took'o bad'idek't ashman ááwwots bok'eshetwok'o b́ k'altso sanbati aawotsa b́tesh.
JOH 9:15 Ferisawino etfwots, «Aawuk'oneya bek'o nfali!» ett ashman aani boaati. Bíwere «Tiááwwotsats t'ok'o b́ geere mashtdek', maniyere hako bek'o tfali» bí et.
JOH 9:16 Manoor ferisawino etefuwotsitse ik ikuwots, «Ashaan sanbato b́ mangirawotse Ik'okikaliye» bo et. K'atswotswere Beree, «Morretsk wotts asho adits keewanotsi awuk'o k'alrniya fino b́faliti?» bo et. Manatse tuutson bodagotse bo keewo k'osha k'oshewo b́woti.
JOH 9:17 Mann ááw dog wotat teshts ashmansh, «Ni ááwo taash shanire nietiru ashman jango eege nieteti?» ett aaniy gitlo boaati. Bíwere «Nebiyiye!» bíet.
JOH 9:18 Ashaan dog wotat b́ teshtsok'onat ilomo bí ááwo aawk'on b́ k'eshetsok'o b́indnat nihon s'eegdek't boatfetso ayhudi naashuwots amaneratsno b́ tesh.
JOH 9:19 Mann b́ nihonat indunsh, «Dog wotat shuwere it etts it na'o hanneya? Eshe and awuk'o k'altniya bek'o b́fali?» ett bonboaati.
JOH 9:20 B́ nihnat indún hank'o ett boaaniy, «Ashaan no naayi b́wotonat dog wotat b́shuwewo danfone,
JOH 9:21 Ernmó and awuk'on b́ bek'iruwok'onat bíááwwotsi kon bísh b́k'eshtsok'o danatsone, bín aatwere, bí ash een b́wottsotse bí b́ jangosh keewo falitwe.»
JOH 9:22 B́ nihnat indn han boetuwere Iyesussh «Krstosiye» eteet asho b́beyal ayhudi naashuwots Ik' mootse kishosh ik wotdek't boteshtsotse boon boshattsosha b́ tesh.
JOH 9:23 Mansh bínshutswots, «Bihe ash eene, bín aatwere» boet.
JOH 9:24 Maantse tuutson ááw dog teshts ashman aaniy s'eegdek't, «Nee ariko keewr Ik'o mangiwe, ashaan morretsk b́woto no danfone» boet.
JOH 9:25 Aawu dog teshts ashmanwere, «Bi morretsk b́woto taa danatse, s'uz ik keewo danfee, manwere taa dogo tteshtsok'onat and bek'o tfaltsok'one» ett bíaaniy.
JOH 9:26 Bowere, «Neesh ege b́ k'ali? Ni ááwonowere awuk'o k'altniya b́ kashiyi?» bo eti.
JOH 9:27 Biwere, «Shinowere keewere itmó k'ebo geratste, eshe eegoshe aani ando k'ebo it geyiri? It b́ danifwotsi woto geefteya?» bíet.
JOH 9:28 Bowere hank'o ett bín boc'ashi, «Iyesus danifo neena, nohe Muse danifwots noone,
JOH 9:29 Musenton Ik'o b́keewetsok'o danfone, ashaahanmo ewukik b́wottsok'o danatsone.»
JOH 9:30 Ashmanmo hank'o et boosh bíaaniy, «Ashaan awokik b́ woto it daro adike! ernmó tiaawwotsi shanitso bíne.
JOH 9:31 Morretswots keewo Ik'o b́ k'ewawok'o daneke, ernmó Ik'o mangifonat bshunts fino k'aliru asho b beyalr bín Ik'o shishfe.
JOH 9:32 Aawu dog wotat shuwets asho ááwo k'eshetso fa'ee etefere datsan bíazeron shish danerake.
JOH 9:33 Ashaan Ik'okik woto b́k'zink'e eegor k'alosh falrawunk'e b́teshi.»
JOH 9:34 Bowere, «N keew jamo morron s'enat shuwetsono! Nee noon daniysheya?» ett ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse kishbok'ri.
JOH 9:35 Ashman ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse kish bok'rtsok'o Iyesus shish b́k'r, bin b́datstsok'onowere, «Ash na'on amanituwiya?» bíet.
JOH 9:36 Bíwere, «Doonzono! bín ti amanish kone bi?» bíet.
JOH 9:37 Iyesus, «Bín bek'rne, and neenton keeweyirwonwere bíne» bíet.
JOH 9:38 Bíwere, «Doonzono! amanitwe» ett bísh b́sagadi.
JOH 9:39 Iyesuswere, «Be'aawwots bobek'etwok'o, bek'irwotswere bodogetwok'o taa datsanats angshosh waaree» bíet.
JOH 9:40 Manoor Iyesus ganoke fa'a ferisawino eteefwots «Eshe noowere ááw dognona eteya?» boeti.
JOH 9:41 Iyesuswere, «Aaw dog it wotink'e morro it ats woterawnk'e, andmo bek'irwone it etirwotse morretswotsi wotarr ooritute» bí eti.
JOH 10:1 Manatse tuut Iyesus hank'o bíeti, «Ariko arikone etirwe itsha, mererwots kúrots fengeshon kindraawo k'osh weeron kinditwo ump'etsonat wombedewotsne.
JOH 10:2 Fengeshon kinditwonmó mererwotsi jintsoniye.
JOH 10:3 Bíshe fengesh kotirwo k'eshitwe, mererwotswere b́ k'aaro shishetune, bi were b́ took mererwotsi boshutson s'eegetwe, jishde'ernwere ametuwee.
JOH 10:4 B́took mereer jamwotsi b́ kishihakon bo shin shinatse sha'itwe, b́ mererwotswere b́ k'aaro bo dantsotse b́ shuutso shoydeniye bo sha'iti.
JOH 10:5 K'osho k'aaronmó bodanawotse bíyatse oka bowos'eti bako b́jámon b́ shuutso amatsne.»
JOH 10:6 Iyesuswere jewraan boosh b́keewi, bomo boosh b́keewetso t'iwintsratsno.
JOH 10:7 Mansh Iyesus ando aani hank'o boosh bíet, «Arikon arikoniye itsh ti etiriye taa mererwots fengesh taane,
JOH 10:8 Taayere shin waats jametswots úmp'etswotsnat bik'knee, mererwotsu bon shiyatsne.
JOH 10:9 Fengesho taane, tweeron kinditwo kashitwe, kinditwe, keshetwe, jinokono daatsitwe.
JOH 10:10 Úmp'etsonmo b́ weyiŕ úmp'isha, shukonat t'afiyon s'uzsha, taamo t waa boowere kasho daatsr s'eent s'eenk kasho bodetsetwok'owe.
JOH 10:11 «Jints sheengo taane, jints sheengo b́ kasho b́ mererwotssha err beshide imetwe.
JOH 10:12 Btokk woteraw mereer jintso b́ jinish keeweka bako ari jints woterawonu lawuwo b́ waare b́bek'or mereruwotsi k'ak'rarni b́wos'eti, lawuwonwere mererwotsi bi'ide bad'ib́k'riti.
JOH 10:13 Jintsman k'az b́wos'irwe keewek b́wottsonat mererwotssh kis'odeshawo b́wottsone.
JOH 10:14 Jints sheengo taane, taa t mererwotsi danfee, t mererwotswere taan danfnee.
JOH 10:15 Taa boon t daniru niho taan b́dantsok'o dani naaronat taawere niho t dantsi naaronee, taa t mererwotssh t kasho beshide imetwe.
JOH 10:16 Mereer s'eenanitse woterawo k'oshuwotsitse wotts mererwotsi detsfe, bonowere jisho taash geyife, boowere t k'ááro shishetune, ikoki mereer s'eene bowotiti, jinirwonwere ike b́ wotiti.
JOH 10:17 «Aani tdek'et kashú ti ímetwotse t nih taan shunfee.
JOH 10:18 Taa t kashu tshunon imetuwe bako tiatse konwor bin dek'etwo aaliye, t kashu imr aninuwe dek'osh alo detsfe, tzaziman tdek'were t nihoknee.»
JOH 10:19 B́ keewtsmanatse tuutson ayhudiwots dagotse k'osh k'oshewo wotbwtsi.
JOH 10:20 Boyitsnowere ayuwots, «Bí bíatse fo'erawoniye fa'oni, geewtsere, eegishe bín itk'ebiri?» boeti.
JOH 10:21 K'oshuwotsuwere, «B́keew keewan fo'erawo detsts ash nonotse keshetkaliye, fo'erawo bo ááwu dogwots aawo k'eshosh falituwa?» bo eti.
JOH 10:22 Iyerusalemitse Ik' maa nato bíhandrtsi worwoti bali aawo b́bodi, manoronwe joosha b́tesh.
JOH 10:23 Iyesus Ik' mootse Solomon bí anaanef werindatsna bí ananefer b́tesh.
JOH 10:24 Manoor ayhudiwots b́ ganok ko'edek't, «Awurish b́ borfetsone git nibon noon nja'iti? Nee Krsttosi n wotok'o danide noosh keewwe» boeti.
JOH 10:25 Iyesusu hank'o ett boosh bíaaniy, «Taa itsh keewre, itmó amaneratste, t nih shútson tfiniru fino t jangosh gawitwe.
JOH 10:26 Itmó t mererwotsitse woto itk'aztsosh amaneratste.
JOH 10:27 T mererwots t k'aaro shishetune, taawere boon danfee, boowere t shuutso sha'itúne.
JOH 10:28 Taa dúre dúri kashone boosh imetwe, manshe b́jamon t'afratsne, t kishotse konwor boon kishdeatse.
JOH 10:29 Boon taash imtso t nih jamoniyere bogfe. Tnih kishotse boon bi'dek'o falitwo konwor aaliye.
JOH 10:30 Taana ett Aabn ik noone.»
JOH 10:31 Ayhudiwotś manoor ando aani bín togosh shútso k'a'ubodek'i.
JOH 10:32 Iyesuswere, «T nihoke sheeng fin ayuwotsi itsh kitsre, eshe it taan it togir t fints hanotsitse aawsha etatniya?» bí eti.
JOH 10:33 Bowere, «Noo neen notogir Ik'o nc'ashirwosha bako n fints sheeng finoshaliye, manwere nee ash wotefetsat́ n tooko Ik' n woshtsoshee» ett bísh boaaniyi.
JOH 10:34 Iyesuswere hank'o boosh bíet, «It nemotse ‹Itiye ik'wots it nee, eteere› ett guut'etso aalneya?
JOH 10:35 Eshe S'ayin mas'aafo sharosh faleratse, boosh waats Ik'i aap'o S'ayin mas'afo Izar Izewerotsi ett s'eegere.
JOH 10:36 Eshe, Niho S'ayntst datso maantsan b́ doyitso ‹Ik' na'o taane› bí ettsosh eegoshe ‹Ik'o c'ashre› it etiri?
JOH 10:37 Taa t nih fino fineratse wotiyal taan amank'ayere.
JOH 10:38 T nih finirwoni t finiri wotiyalmo taan dab́ amano it k'azalor t finiru finon amanore, hank'on niho taanton b́ wottsok'onat taawe nihonton twottsok'o shengshde danetute.»
JOH 10:39 Bowere ando aani bín detsosh bogeyi, bímó bo kishotse kesht k'az bí'ami.
JOH 10:40 Iyesus ando aani Yordanos fokoniye kimt Yohanis bali b́ gupfok bíami, manoknowere b́ teshi.
JOH 10:41 Ay ashuwots bíyok wáát́, «Yohanis adits fino egoŕ fineratse, ernmó Yohanis ashaan jango b́ keewts jamo aree b́ teshi» bo et.
JOH 10:42 Manoknowere ay ashuwots bín bo amani.
JOH 11:1 Betanitse beyirwo Alazari eteets ash iko shoodtni b́ tesh, Bitaniya eteyru man Mariyamnat bmish Martan bo beyru galuni b tesh.
JOH 11:2 Mariyami etetsmanwere doonzo tufats shitwo futat b took s'iron firtsuni, shodirúwonu bi eshu Alazari b́ tesh.
JOH 11:3 Mish gitwotswre, «Doonzono! n shunfo shoodwtsere» ett Iyesusok woshbok'ri.
JOH 11:4 Iyesusu man b́ shishtsok'on, «Shodan k'irosh betsitkaliye, s'uznmó Ik'osh mango b́ wotitwok'onat Ik' na'o bín b́ mangishe» bíet.
JOH 11:5 Iyesus Martanat bmish Mariyamna bo eshu Alazarnowere, shuna b́ shunfo.
JOH 11:6 Mansh Alazar shodo b́ shishiyakon b́beyrmanok git aawo k'az b́ jin.
JOH 11:7 Maniyakon b́ danifwotssh, «Woore Yhud datsats ando aanar amone» boeti.
JOH 11:8 B́ danifwotsu, «Danifono! ayhudiwots karn aawotse shútson neen jot'oshe bogeyri bo teshi, eshe nee ando manmaantsan amooshe ngeyiri?» boet.
JOH 11:9 Iyesus hanek'o ett boosh bí aani, «Ik aawotse tatse git sa'atosha? Aawon shairwo datsan shááno b́ bek'irwosh t'ugo bín dikratse.
JOH 11:10 Ernmó t'úwon sha'irwo shááno b́gitsotse b́deshawosh t'ugo bíne b́dikiti.»
JOH 11:11 Iyesus man boosh b́keewiyakon, «No mash Alazar tokrwtsere, taamo bín tokrotse tuzosh ametuwe» bíet.
JOH 11:12 B́danifwotstswere, «Doonzono! tokratni b́fa'oni wotiyal bére shamp'itwe etee» boeti.
JOH 11:13 Iyesus man b́keewirwe Alazar K'iri jangosha b́ tesh, ernmó b́ tokeri jango b́keewirwok'owa boosh bíari,
JOH 11:14 Mansh Iyesus kitsdek't́ sháánon hank'o ett boosh b́ keewi, «Alazar k'irre,
JOH 11:15 It it amanitwok'o taa manoke ti aalo itsh taan geneúshre, andmó b́ maants amone.»
JOH 11:16 Manoor Didimosi eteetso Tomas b́ danif k'oshwotswere, «Bínton no k'iritwok'o nowoor amone» boet.
JOH 11:17 Iyesus manok b́ bodtsok'on Alazari duketsi awd aawo b́ jiniyakon amt b́daatsi.
JOH 11:18 Betaniya Iyerusalematse keez kilo metrok'oyi bwoki.
JOH 11:19 Ayhudiyotsitse aywots Martanat Mariyamn boeshu b́ k'irtsosh boon kup'iyosh bowok waatni bo tesh.
JOH 11:20 Marta Iyesus woo b shishtsok'on bín dek'osh bweyi, Mariyammó mootsa btesh.
JOH 11:21 Marta Iyesussh, «Doonzono! nee hanoka nfa'oni wotink'e ti eshu k'irrawnk'e b́teshi,
JOH 11:22 Ernmó andoru nk'onitu jamo Ik'o neesh b́imetwok'o danefe» bí et.
JOH 11:23 Iyesuswere «Ni eshu k'irotse aaniy tuwitwe» bíet.
JOH 11:24 Martawere, «Dúr s'úwatse k'irtswots k'iro da'ar bo tuwor bíwere k'irotse b́ tuwitwok'o danfee» bí et.
JOH 11:25 Iyesuswere, «K'ir tuwonat kashon taane, taan amantso b́k'iriyaloru kashone b́beeti,
JOH 11:26 Kashon befetst taan amants jamo k'irratse, han amanitwiya?» bíet.
JOH 11:27 Bíwere, «Ee doonzono! nee datsats waatso Krstosi Ik' na'o nwottsok'o amanitwe» bíet.
JOH 11:28 Marta han bkeewiyakon b mishsh amaat «Danifo waat neene b́ s'eegiri» etaat shashkon b s'eegi.
JOH 11:29 Mariyam man b shishtsok'on kááron tuwat bíyok bíami.
JOH 11:30 Manoor Iyesus Marta bín bbek'ori b́beyirwoka bako galots kindrafa'e b́tesh.
JOH 11:31 Mariyami kup'iyosh waat́ mootse binton towat beyiru ayhudiwots Mariyam kaaron tuwat bkesho bek't Alazar doowo maants amr biepetwok'o boosh bíarere b shuutso bo tuwi.
JOH 11:32 Mariyam Iyesus beyirwok waat bín bbek'tsok'on b́ gubrats dihat, «Doonzono, nee hanoke fa'ane wotink'e ti eshu k'irrawk'ee b́ teshi» bi'eti.
JOH 11:33 Iyesuswere bínton waatswotswere boepfere b́bek'tsok'on b́ shayiri fayon shiyanat,
JOH 11:34 «Aawoke bín it duuki?» bíet. Bowere, «Doonzono! waa s'iile» boet.
JOH 11:35 Iyesuswere bí áác'uwo b́kuut'i.
JOH 11:36 Mansh Ayhudiwots, «Aawk'o bín b́shunfok'o s'iilere» boet.
JOH 11:37 Boyitsi ik ikwotsmo, «Ááwdogo ááwo kashitsan, ashaan b́k'irrawok'o woshomawiyank'a b́teshi?» bo eti.
JOH 11:38 Iyesus ayidek't shiyanefere doowo maants bíami, dowonwere shútson ipeek shúts gop'a b́tesh.
JOH 11:39 Iyesus, «Shútsman k'aa'úbayere» bí eti. K'irtso mish Martaá, «Doonzono b́ k'irihakon awd aawo wotere, and b́ sháák'o shok'etwe» biet.
JOH 11:40 Iyesuswere, «Niamaniyalee Ik'o mangone bek'etune eratstáá neesha?» bíet.
JOH 11:41 Ashuwotswere shútso k'aaú bobazi, maniyere hakon Iyesus dambaan s'iilt, «Nihono! taan n shishtsosh mango neesh boree,
JOH 11:42 Jam aawonor taan nshishetwok'o danfee, ernmó han ti et, hanoke need'iru ashuwots taan nee nwoshtsok'o bo amanisha etaatniye» bíet.
JOH 11:43 Iyesus man b́keeswihakon «Alazaroo! waa kee!» ett k'áári eenon b́keewi.
JOH 11:44 K'irtso Alazarwere b́ kishwotsnat b́ tufwotsn duuni tahon bo t'at'etsok'on dowootse b́ keshi, b́shitsonwere tahon b́t'at'etsok'ona botesh, Iyesuswere, «Bín bish k'rore, amee!» bí eti.
JOH 11:45 Mariyami ang kup'iyosh wáát teshts ayhudi wotsitse ayuwots b́k'altso bek't Iyesusn boamani.
JOH 11:46 Ik ikwotsmo ferisawino eteefwotsok amt́ Iyesus b́ k'altso boosh bo keewi.
JOH 11:47 Mansh kahni naashwotsnat ferisawino eteefwots moosh mooshirwotsi kakudek't hank'o boet, «Ashaan ay adits keewwotsi b́ finirwotse awuk'o nok'alink'e k'úna b́k'aniti?
JOH 11:48 S'ker hank'on bín k'aynok'riyalo ashjamo bín amanitwe, Rom dats ashuwots wáár no beyokonat no ash jamo ishbazetune.»
JOH 11:49 Ernmó boyitsi iko mandúr kahni naashwotsatsi k'aabo K'eyaf hank'owa bíet, «It eegor danatste,
JOH 11:50 Ashjamo b́t'afoniyere ik asho ashjami shegro b́k'iro itsh b́k'anitwok'o b́jamon t'iwintsratsteya?»
JOH 11:51 Bí man b́ keew b́ took danonali b́tesh, mandúr bí kahni naash abaatsi k'aabo b́teshtsotsena, Iyesus ayhudi ashuwots shegro b́k'irtwok'o kitsosha bek'han b́keewi.
JOH 11:52 B́k'iritwere ayhudiwots mec'rosh b́woterawo, bad'ts Ik'inana'úwotsnowere ikok kakwosha b́tesh.
JOH 11:53 Mansh manots aawotstson Iyesusi bo'úd'itwok'o shiyebowts.
JOH 11:54 Maniyakon Iyesus ayhudiwots dagotse be'at anaaneratse b́tesh, ernmó manoke kesht worwi ganoke fa'a Efremi eteef kitu maants bíami, manokno b́danifwotsnton k'az b́ oori.
JOH 11:55 Ayhudi Fazig baaliyo t'intnib́teshi, boyitsi ayuwotswere fazigi baliyiman b́bodfetso botoko s'ayintsosh gat'ariyon Iyerusalem maants bowáá.
JOH 11:56 Bowere Ik' mootse need'dek't Iyesus b́wááfetso bokotfotse, «Eebi it asaabiri? Baliyoke areratsa itsha?» Ett boatsatsewo bo aatefrera botesh.
JOH 11:57 Ando kahni naashwotsnat ferisawiwotsn Iyesusi detso bofalitwok'o b́beyoko dants asho b́ beyal boosh b́kitsitwok'o ashjamosh azazatni botesh.
JOH 12:1 Ayhudi fazigi worwoti baaliy aawo bodosh shirt aawo b́ oortsok'on, Iyesus Bitaniy maants bíami, Bitaniyo Iyesus k'irotse b́tuuztso Alazar b́beef galuni bteshi.
JOH 12:2 Manoknowere kooc'misho bísh k'aniibok'ri, manoknowere finiru Martayi btesh, Alazarwe mishimarats t'intswotsitsi ikoni b́teshi.
JOH 12:3 Manoor Mariyam b́ gizo ayidek't shaaw wottso Nardosiya eteets mitatse dozets shituwo ik t'armusi bado wotitwo ik b́lk'at'iyo dek'amaat bín Iyesus tufo fuutbk'ri, b toks'ironowere firbbazi, maa manwere shitú sháák'on s'een b́gutsi.
JOH 12:4 B́ danifwotsitsi iko Iyesusi beshide imetwo Keriyot datstso Yhud,
JOH 12:5 «Shituwan keez bal dinriyosh kemde b́ gizman t'owwotssh imok'aze eegishe?» bíet.
JOH 12:6 Bí man b́ keewwere, t'owwotssh maac'o k'ewatni woterawo, bí úmp'ets b́wottsosha b́tesh, gizi k'arc'ito detsfo bí b́teshtsotse k'arc'itots gedets gizo dek'o danb́dek'tsosha b́tesh.
JOH 12:7 Iyesus hank'owa bíet, «T duuket aawosh b k'anitsotse bine k'ayere.
JOH 12:8 T'owwotsiye jam aawo itntoniye bofa'oni, taamó úni aawo itntoniyaliye t beeti.»
JOH 12:9 Manoor ayhudiwotsitse ayuwots Iyesus Bitanin b́ fa'ok'o dank'rat boweyi, bowaatsonwere Iyesus mec'rosh b́woterawon Iyesus k'irotse b́tuuztso Alazarnowere bek'osha b́tesh.
JOH 12:10 Kahni naashwotsmó Alazarnor úd'osh bo shiyeyi.
JOH 12:11 Bíyatse tuutson ayhudiwotsitse aywots amt Iyesusi bo amantsotsna.
JOH 12:12 Yatsok'on fazig baaliyosh waats ay ashuwots Iyesus Iyerusalem maants b́weetwok'o shishbok'ri.
JOH 12:13 Mansh woli maaro detsdek't bín mangon dek'osh bokeshi, «Hosa'ana! doonzo shúútson wetwo Isra'el naasho deereke!» etfetst bokuhefere botesh.
JOH 12:14 Iyesus daaz na'o daatsdek't bíats beeb́dek'i, man b́ wotwere,
JOH 12:15 «Nee S'iyon ni'e, Iyerusaleme shatk'aye! Hambe! n naashoniye daaz na'ú ats keede'er weetwe» ett bek'on guut'etso b́ s'eenetwok'owe.
JOH 12:16 B́ danifwotssh keewan bal boosh galeratse b́tesh, ernmó Iyesus b́mangiyakon keewan b́jangosh b́guut'etsok'onat bísho k'aletsok'o gawbodek'i.
JOH 12:17 Iyesus Alazari dowootse s'eegt k'irotse b́tuuzor bínton teshts jamwots Iyesus jango bogefera botesh.
JOH 12:18 Ay ashuwots bínton gonkewosh bowowwere adits keewan b́finetsok'o shisht boteshtsosha.
JOH 12:19 Manoor Ferisawino eteetswots, «Eshe! dats jamatsi ash jamo b́shuutso tuure! noo eegor k'alo no maawtsok'o bek'irutosha?» Bo ats atsewosh boet.
JOH 12:20 Baalyi aawor Ik' k'onosh Iyerusalem maants amts ashuwotsitse, Grik datson watswots bítse fa'ano botesh.
JOH 12:21 Bowere Gelil datsatse Betesayid galits ash wottso Flip'osok t'iindek't, «T doonzo! Iyesusi bek'o geefone» boeti.
JOH 12:22 Filip'oswere amt́ Indriyassh keew b́k'ri, Indriyasnat Filip'osn towat amt Iyesussh keew bok'ri.
JOH 12:23 Iyesuswere hank'o ett boosh b́keewi, «Hamb ashna'o b́mangit sa'ato bodre,
JOH 12:24 Arikon aroniye itsh tietiri, Sndeyi ááwu datsats fed'ar b k'iriyalabako biaaliye b ooriti, bk'iriyalmó ayo shuwitwane.
JOH 12:25 B́kashu shuntso bin t'afitwe, datsanatse b́kashú shit'etwonmó dúre dúri beyosh gerdek'etwe.
JOH 12:26 Taash finosh geyirwo t shuutso wowe, taash fiintwonwere taa tbeyrwok beetwe, taash fiinitwonowere t nihi bímangitwee.»
JOH 12:27 Maniyak Iyesus hank'o bí et, «And eshe! t kashu kic'wtseraniyee, awk'oye ti'eteti eshna? Nihono! sa'atanatse taan fariwe erta? Man tierawok'o taa twaa kic'its gond bek'i sa'atanshee.
JOH 12:28 Nihono! n shútso mangiwe.» Maniye il «Tshútso mangire, aaninwere mangitwe!» etts k'iro darotse b́weyi.
JOH 12:29 Manoke need'iru ashuwots man boshishtsok'on, «Guumee!» boet. K'atsetswotswere, «Melakiye kewtsoni!» bo eti.
JOH 12:30 Iyesusmó hank'o ett bíaaniy, «K'aaran b́weyiye itsha ettni bako taasha ettniyaliye,
JOH 12:31 Datsanats angshet andee, datsani keewts Shed'ano úromaants b́juwet andee,
JOH 12:32 Taawere datswatse dambaan dambaan taan k'aúwewor ashjamo t maants geetsitwe.»
JOH 12:33 Iyesus han b́keewtsonwere ááw naari k'iron bk'iritwok'o kitsosha.
JOH 12:34 Ashuwotswere «Nemotse guut'ere nodatstsok'osh ‹Krstos dúre dúeosh beetwe› etke, ‹eshe nee, ash na'o dambaan dambaan tuwitwe› nietiri aawk'oneya? Ash na'amanmo kone?» boeti.
JOH 12:35 Iyesus hank'o boosh bíet, «And muk'na'a gizeyosh shááno itnton fa'ee, t'aluwo itats b́borawok'o shááno itsh b́befere ananore, t'aluwots sha'efo aawok bíamirwok'owo danatse.
JOH 12:36 Shááno nana'uwotsi it wotitwok'o shááno itsh b́befere sháánman amanore,» Iyesus man b́keewiyakon amt boatse áásh b́wtsi.
JOH 12:37 Iyesus ay adits keewwotsi boshinatse b́ fiiniyaloru ayhudiwots bín amaneratsno.
JOH 12:38 Man b́wotirwere Nebiyiyo Isayasn, «Doonzono! no keewtso kone amani? Doonzo angonmó konshe b́be'eyi?» Ett b́keewtso b́s'eenishe.
JOH 12:39 Hanatse tuutso Isayas bíettsok'on amano maawrne.
JOH 12:40 «Bo ááwoń be'efetsr Bonibotse t'iwintsr Boaanere boon b́kashirawok'o Ik'o bo ááwo deekb́k'rere, Bonibonowere dungik'rere.»
JOH 12:41 Isasayas han bíetiye Iyesus mango b́bek'etsoshe, manshe han Iyesus jangoshe b́keewiri.
JOH 12:42 B́wotefere Ayhudi naashwotsitse dab ayuwots Iyesusn amanerno, ernmó Ferisawino eteefwots Ik' k'oni mootse boon bokishrawok'o shatt b́ jango sháánon kish keewratsno.
JOH 12:43 Man bok'alwere Ik'oke daatset mangoniyere ashoke daatset mango boshuntsotsne.
JOH 12:44 Iyesuswere b́k'aáro eenshdek't hank'o etre, «Taan amantso t s'uzi b́ woterawo, taan woshtsonowere amanirwe,
JOH 12:45 Taan bek'irwonwere taan woshtso bek'irwe,
JOH 12:46 Taan amanit jamo t'aluwotse b́berawok'o taa sháán wotat datsats waare.
JOH 12:47 Ti aap'tso k'ewde finats jitsrawats angshitwo taanaliye, taa t weyiye datsu kashiyisha bako datsats angshoshashaliye.
JOH 12:48 Taan geerawonat t aap'ono de'aw ashaats angshitwo fa'ee, taa t keewts aap'o dúri s'uwatse bíats angshitwe.
JOH 12:49 Taa t took alon keewratse, taa tietirwonat tkeewts tzaziyono taash imtso taan woshtso Aabiye.
JOH 12:50 Bí alonwere dúre dúri kasho b́wottsok'o danfee. Mansh taa tkeewirwo niho aab taash b́ keewtsoniye.»
JOH 13:1 Manoronú fazigi baaliyoniyre shina b́ tesh, Iyesus datsani k'ayr nihok bíamet aawo b́bodtsok'o danb́k'ri. Datsanatse fa'a b́jirwotsi shunk'ratni b́tesh, b́jamoonowere shunb́k'ri.
JOH 13:2 Iyesusnat b́danfwots kooc'misho bomefera boteshi, Simon naay Kiriyot dats asho Yihudmó Iyesusi beshide b́'imetwok'o Diyablos b́nibots gond keewo gedb́k'ri.
JOH 13:3 Niho al jamo bísh bí imtsok'onat Ik'oke kesht b́waatsok'o, Ik'o maantso aanar bíametwok'o Iyesus danfee b́teshi,
JOH 13:4 Mansh mishimaratse k'aztuut b́shemo dats gedb́k'ri, bín firet taho k'aaúdek't b́gebats edb́dek'i.
JOH 13:5 Maniyere il tufmashi k'ac'ots aatso geddek't b́danifwots tufo masho dek'b́tu, b́ ed'ts tahmannowere botufo b́fir.
JOH 13:6 Iyesuswere Simon P'et'rosok b́waatsok'on Simon P'et'ros, «Doonzono! neene t tufo masheti?» bí et.
JOH 13:7 Iyesuswere «Taa t k'alirwo nee and danatsne, aytsmo t'iwintsitune» bíet
JOH 13:8 P'etroswere «Nee t tufo b́jamon mayatsne!» bí et. Iyesuswere «Taa n tufo masho tk'azal nee tiyoke bano deshatsne» ett bí aaniyi.
JOH 13:9 Simon P'et'roswere «Doonzono! mank'oyi wotiyal bére ttufmec'ro b́woterawo tkishonowere, ttookonowere maye!» bí eti.
JOH 13:10 Iyesuswere «Bí aats mashtso b́ jamon s'ayin b́wottsotse b́ tuf mashoniye okoon k'osho geyiratse, itwere s'ayinwots itne, ernmó it únetsiyaliye» bí eti.
JOH 13:11 Iyesus «It únets s'ayin itnaliye» bíet bín beshide imetwo koni b́wottsok'o b́ dantsosha b́ tesh.
JOH 13:12 Botufo b́ mashiyakon b́ taho tahdek't b́ beyok aanat beebdek'i, hank'owo boosh bíet, «Itsh eeg t k'altsok'o t'iwints dek'rteya?
JOH 13:13 It ‹Danifonat doonoza› etfte taasha, taa danifonat doonzo twottsotse it ettso aree.
JOH 13:14 Eshe taa itsh doonznat iti danifo wotefetsat it tufo t mashihakon it it atsatsewosh it tufo masheyo geyitwe.
JOH 13:15 Taa itsh tk'altsok'o itwere it k'alitwok'o ariyosh wotitwo itsh beezree.
JOH 13:16 Aron arikone itsh keewirwe, guutso b́ doonzoniyere bowakee, wooshetsonwere bín woshtsoniyere bowakee.
JOH 13:17 Keewan dande finats it jitsink'ere derek itne.
JOH 13:18 Han tkeewir it únetsishaliye, taa t galdek'tswotsi danfee, ernmó ‹T mish máátso gondon tiatsats tuure› etiru S'ayin mas'aafotse beyiru aap'o b́s'eeno geyife.
JOH 13:19 Man b́wotoniyere shino itsh t keewiri, b́ s'eeniyakon taa Bín twottsok'o it amanishee.
JOH 13:20 Arikon aronee itsh t keewiri, taa t woshtso dek'etwoniye taan de'k'etwe, taano dek'etwo taan woshtsonowere dek'etwe.»
JOH 13:21 Iyesus man bí etiyakon b́ shayiron kic'at «Aron, arikoniye itsh t etiri, ititsi iko taan beshide imetwe» et kishdek't b́keewi.
JOH 13:22 B́ danifwots b́ keewirwan kon jango b́wottsok'o bodartsotse bo atsatsewo bos'ile.
JOH 13:23 Iyesus b́danifwotsitsi b́shnf iko Iyesus ganokt bedek'tni b́tesh.
JOH 13:24 Simon P'et'ros kolat, «Konjango b́keewtsok'o aab aatwe» bí eti.
JOH 13:25 Mann bí Iyesusok t'intsdek't «Doonzono! neen beshide imetwo kone?» ett bíaati.
JOH 13:26 Iyesuswere «Bíye mishan iton itde bísh ti'imetwoniye» bí eti. Man bí'ettsok'on misho iton itdek't Kiriyot ash wottso Simon naay Yihudsh b́ imi.
JOH 13:27 Yihud imetsman b́dek'iyakon manoor Shed'no bíatsots s'een b́utsi, Iyesuswere Yihudsh, «K'alosh ngeyirwo káári k'alwe!» bí et.
JOH 13:28 Iyesus eegosh mank'o bíettsok'o mishimaratse beyirwotsitse konwor dantso aali b́tesh.
JOH 13:29 Yihud giz detsfo b́teshtsotse b́ danifwotsitsi ik ikwots Iyesus «Baliyosh noosh geyitwo keewowe wee t'owwotssh ime» bíettsok'owa boosh bíari.
JOH 13:30 Yihdwere tiits imetsman b́dek'tsok'on manoor kesht k'az bíami. Manoronwere t'úwa b́tesh.
JOH 13:31 Yihud kesht bí amiyakon Iyesus hank'o bíeti, «And ash Na'o mangree, b́ yatse tuutsonowere Ik'o mangree,
JOH 13:32 Ik'o b́jangatse tuutson b́mangtsotse Ik'onwere bín mangitwe, muk'i b́teyawoniye bín b́mangitye.
JOH 13:33 T nanaúwotso! itnton tteshet ay gizeyoshaliye, itwere taan geyitute, Ayhudi naashwotssh ‹Taa tiametwok it woo falratste› ti ettsok'o, andoor itsh mank'o eteetwe.
JOH 13:34 It atsatsewo it shuneetwok'o handr tzaziwo itsh imirwe, taa itn tshuntsok'o itwere it atsatsewo shunewere.
JOH 13:35 It atsatsewo it shunetka wotiyal t danifwotsi it wottsok'o ash jamo danetwe.»
JOH 13:36 Maniyere il S'mon P'et'ros Iyesussh, «Doonzono! aawke niameti?» ett bíaati. Iyesuswere «taa tiametwok and taanton woo falratsne ilmó tshuutso woo falitune» ett bíaniyi
JOH 13:37 P'et'roswere «Doonzono! eegoshe and nshuutso woo tmawiti? Taa t kasho dab neesha err beshide ímetwe» bí et.
JOH 13:38 Iyesuwere «Nee nkasho taasha err beshide imetwiya? Aron arikoniye neesh ti etiri, hambets baako b́ k'ad́ftsere shino keezoto taan haalitune» ett bíaaniy.
JOH 14:1 Manats dabt Iyesus hank'owa bíet, «Kic'k'ayere, Ik'on amanore, taanowere amanore,
JOH 14:2 Tnih mootse ay beewoke fa'oni, mank'o wotob́k'azink'eremó it beetwoko k'aniyosh ametuwe erawnk'e b́teshi.
JOH 14:3 Amr beyoko itsh t k'aniyakon taa t beyirwoke itwere it beetwok'o aanar waar itn dek'etwe.
JOH 14:4 Taa ti amiru werindonoewere danfte.»
JOH 14:5 Tomaswere «Doonzono! aawok niamirwok'o danatsone, eshe, weerindo awuk'o k'alrniya dano nofaliti?» bíet.
JOH 14:6 Iyesuswere hank'o et bísh bíaaniy, «Weronu aronu kashonu taane, t weerona bako konwor nihok bodetwo aaliye.
JOH 14:7 Taan danrte wotink'e tnihnowere danank'te b́teshi, hanyakomó bín danetute, bínowere bek'rte.»
JOH 14:8 Filip'oswere «Doonzono! niho noosh nkitsitka wotiyal noosh bodfe» bíet.
JOH 14:9 Iyesuswere hank'o et bísh bíaaniy, «Filip'osoo! hank'o dúro itnton tbeyiru jamanitsneya taan itdari? taan bek'tsoniye nihono bek're, eshe, nee ‹niho noosh kitsuwe› nietir awuk'neya?
JOH 14:10 Taa nihots t beyirwok'o, nihonwere tiyits b́bewok'o amaneratsiya? itsh tkeewiru keewo ttookonaliye, ernmó fin jamo finirwo tgiyitse fa'o nihoniye,
JOH 14:11 Taa nihotse t beyirwok'o, nihonwere tiyitse b́fa'ok'owo amanore, mank'o woto b́ k'azalor tfinatse tuutson taan amanore.
JOH 14:12 Arikon aroniye itsh ti etiri, taan amanitwo taa tfiniru fino finitwe, dab haniyere bogo finitwe, taa nihok ametuwe.
JOH 14:13 Niho Nayoatse tuutson b́mangitwok'o t shútson itk'onitu jamo itsh k'alitwe.
JOH 14:14 Konnor wotowa t shútson it k'onit keewo taa k'alitwe.
JOH 14:15 «Taan shunfte wotiyal t tzaziyo kotetuute,
JOH 14:16 Taa niho k'onitwe, bíwere dúre dúrosh itnton beetwo k'osho kup'shitwo itsh imetwe.
JOH 14:17 Hanwere S'ayin Shayir arikoniye, datsan bín b́dawonat b́be'awotse bín dek'o falratse, itmó bí itnton b́wottsotsnat it gitsotsnowere b́beyirwotse bín danfte.
JOH 14:18 «Indonat nih deshaw nana'uwotskok'o it aali k'ayk'reratse, aanar itmand weetwe.
JOH 14:19 Muk' gizewoniyakon datsu taan be'atsaa, itmó taan bek'etute, taa beyarr beetk twottsotse itwere beyar beetute beetute.
JOH 14:20 Taa nihots tbeyirwok'o itwere tiyitse it fa'ok'o, taawere ititse t fa'ok'owo manots aawots danetute.
JOH 14:21 «Taan shuntsoniye t tzaziyo dek'etwonat finats jitsitwoniyee, taan shuntsoneye t nihi shunfee, taawere bín shunfee, t tokonowere bísh kitsitwe.»
JOH 14:22 Kiriyot dats ash woterawo k'osho Yhud, «T doonzo! n tooko datsjamosh nkitsrawo noosh nkitsit aawk'oneya?» bí eti.
JOH 14:23 Iyesuswere bísh hank'o ett bíaaniy, «Taan shuntso ti aap'tso kordek'etwee, tnihwere bín shunfee, noo bíyok wáár bínton towaar beetwone.
JOH 14:24 Taan shunawo t aap'o kóratse, and it k'ebiru aap'an taan woshtso nihoka bako tikaliye.
JOH 14:25 «And itnton befetsat keewan itsh keewre,
JOH 14:26 Niho t shútson b́woshitwo kup'shitwo S'ayin shayironmó jamkeewo itsh danitwe, taa itsh t keewts jamonowere t'iwints itdek'etwok'o woshitwe.
JOH 14:27 «Jeeno itok k'ayk'ritwe, t jeenonowere itsh imetwe, taa itsh t imet jenoniye datsan bimetwok'owiyaliye, kic' k'ayere, ando shatk'ayere.
JOH 14:28 ‹Taa ametuwe, anarnwe itok weetwe› ti ettsok'o shishrte, t nih taayere b́bogtsotse taan it shunink'e nihok ti amor geneúwiyank'te b́teshi.
JOH 14:29 Han b́wotor it amanitwok'o, shino b́ woteftsere itsh keewre,
JOH 14:30 Datsani keewtso Shed'ano b́weyirwotse haniyere okoon itnton ay keeweratse. Bíye tiatse eegor alo deshatse,
JOH 14:31 Ernmó taa niho t shuntsok'o datso b́danetwok'o taan bíazazts jamo s'eentsitwe, tuuwere hanoke amone.
JOH 15:1 «Ariko weyini k'ombo taane, mitwotsi goshtso tnihiye,
JOH 15:2 Ti atse fa'o shuu shuraw jabjamwotsi tnih k'ut'de juuk'ritwe, shuu shuwitu jaabo ayide b́shuwitwok'o k'anzde'er s'ayintsitwe.
JOH 15:3 Itwere itsh tiaap'ts aap'atse tuutson and s'ayinwots itne.
JOH 15:4 Taan beewere,, taawere itn beetwe, jaabo weyini k'ombats kup'ar beeratse wotiyal biyal shuu shuwo b́falrawok'owa itwoor taan beyo itk'azal shuu shuwo falratste.
JOH 15:5 «Taa weyini k'ombo taane, itwere jaabwots itne, ti ats deshar beetwonat taawere bín t beetwoniye ay shuwo shuwitwee, eshe ti'aalo eegor k'alo falratste.
JOH 15:6 Tiats deshar beerawo jaabwots uromaants juwere b́shuk'eti. Mank'o wottso jabwotsi kakude'er taawots juwere bomis'eti.
JOH 15:7 Taan itbeyink'e ti aap'tswotswere ititse bobeyink'ere itgeyiru jamo itk'onor daatsitute.
JOH 15:8 Ay shuwo it shuwink'ere manatse tuutson t nih mangiyank'ee, itwere t danifwotsi it wottsok'o kitsiyank'te.
JOH 15:9 Niho taan b́shuntsok'o taawere itn shunre, manshe tshunon beewere,.
JOH 15:10 Taa t nih tzaziyo t kottsok'onat b́ shunon t beyirwok'o itwere ti tzaziyo it kotal t shunon beetute.
JOH 15:11 Jaman itsh tkeewiye tgeneeú'wo ititse wotar it geneúwo s'een b́wotishe.
JOH 15:12 T tzaziyoniye taa iti t shuntsok'o itiwere it atsatseyo it shunetwok'owe.
JOH 15:13 Asho b́ kasho b́ mashots shegro beshide imoniyere bogts shuno deshatse.
JOH 15:14 Itwere ti imts tzaziyo it s'eentsiyal t mashots itne.
JOH 15:15 Guutso doonzo b́finirwo b́danawotse, haniyere hakon guutswotso eraatse, s'uznmó tnihoke tshishts jamo itsh tkitstsotse t mashotsi etreitsha,
JOH 15:16 Taana iti marat'dek'i bako it taan marat'de'atste, amr ay shuwo itshuwitwok'o, itshuwonwere beetk b́wotitwok'o itn tnaashiy. Manshe niho t shútson it k'onts jamo itsh imetwe.
JOH 15:17 Eshe taa itin tiazazir it atsatsewo it shunetwok'owe.
JOH 15:18 «Datsan itn b́ shit'al itiyere shino taan b́shit'tsok'o dande'ere.
JOH 15:19 Datsank it wotink'ere datsan b́tokk wottswotsi shunak'e b́teshi. Ernmó datsank woto it k'aztsotsnat taa datsanatse iti marat' t dek'tsosh datsan itn shit'etwee.
JOH 15:20 Guutso doonzoniyre bowatse etaat itsh t keewtso gawwre, taan bogiishitka wotiyal itnowere gishitune, ti aap'o bokotink'e it aap'ono kotetune.
JOH 15:21 Taan woshtso bodanawotse t jangosh jaman itats k'alitunee.
JOH 15:22 Taa waat boosh keewratse wotink'e morro boats woteratse b́teshi, ernmó and bo morrosh weebo deshatsne.
JOH 15:23 Taan shit'irwo t nihnowere b́ shit'iri,
JOH 15:24 K'osh ash fineraw fino bo dagotse fino tk'azink'ere morro boosh woteratse b́ teshi, andmó jaman bobek'iyakon taano t nihno shit'rne.
JOH 15:25 Hanwere b́ wottso ‹Ik jagalo taan shit'rne› ett nemotse guut'etso b́ s'eenetwok'owe.
JOH 15:26 «Ernmó nihoke keshetwonat taawere nihoke itsh twoshitwo itn kup'itwo ari S'ayn shayiro b́ woor bí t jango gawitwe.
JOH 15:27 Itwere baltson tuwat taanton it teshtsotse gawitute.
JOH 16:1 «Hambe, jaman itsh t keew it imnetiyatse it giwawok'owa etaatniye.
JOH 16:2 Ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni mootse kishder iti gishitno, mank'o itn ud'itu jamwots dab́ Ik'osh bofinirwok'o boosh bí arit aawo weetwe.
JOH 16:3 Hanowere bok'alir nihono taano bodanawotsene.
JOH 16:4 Han itsh tkeewiriye bíaawo b́bodor itsh eeg tkeewtsok'o gaw itdekishe.» Jaman haniyere shin itsh keewo tk'aziye itnton t teshtsotsne.
JOH 16:5 «Andmó taan woshtsok amishee, b́wotiyalor ititse ‹Eewke niameti› err taan aatitwo aaliye.
JOH 16:6 Jaman itsh t keewtsotse it nibo shiyanon s'eenwtsere.
JOH 16:7 Taamó arikon aroniye itsh tietiriye, ti amo itsh k'anefe, taa amo t k'azal kup'shitwo itook waratse, taa tiamalmó bín itsh deyitwe.
JOH 16:8 Bí b́woor morri jangosh, kááw woti jango, angshi jangosho datsatsi ashuwotsi wok'asitwe.
JOH 16:9 Morri jango b́ kitsitiye taan amano bok'azirwoshe.
JOH 16:10 Kááw woti jango kish b́ kitsitiye niho maants tiametwonat haniye haniyak taan bek'o it k'azetwoshe,
JOH 16:11 Angshi jango kish b́kitsit datsan keewtsoats angshetsoshe.
JOH 16:12 «Itsh t keewitwo andoor ay keewo detsfe, ernmó and itatse b́mangiti,
JOH 16:13 Arik wotts Shayiro b́ woor ar jamo maants itn jishitwe. Bí b́ keewitwo b́ shishtsoni bako b́tokk woto b́ k'aztsotse bí shinomaants wotit keewo itsh keewitwe.
JOH 16:14 Tik wottsotse de'er itsh b́keitwotse taan mangitwe.
JOH 16:15 Nihok wotts jamo tikee, ‹Tik wottso de'er itsh keewitwe› ti et manshe.
JOH 16:16 «Muk'i it teshiyakon taan be'atste, ando muk'i it teshiyakon taan bek'etute.»
JOH 16:17 B́ danifwotsitse ik ikwots, «Han, ‹Muk'i b́ teshihakon taan be'atste, ando muk'i it teshihakon taan bek'etute, ando aani nihomaants ametuwe› b́ etiru keewo eebi?» ett boatsatseyo bo aateyi.
JOH 16:18 «Eshe han ‹Muk'i b́teshihakon› bí etiru keewo eebi? B́ keewiru keewo danatsone» ett anansh dek't́ boaateyi.
JOH 16:19 Iyesuswere bín aatosh bogeyirwok'o dank'rat hank'o boosh bíet, «It atsatseyo it aateyirwo, ‹Muk'i b́ teshiyakon taan be'atste, ando aani múk'ibteshiyakon taan bek'etute,› ti ettsosheya?
JOH 16:20 Ariko aron itsh etirwe, it eepetutee, kuhitutee, datsanmó genee'uwitwee, it shiyanitute, ernmó it shiyano gene'o maants woneetwe.
JOH 16:21 Máátsu bshuwor b shambi aawo b́bodtsotse shiyanitwaniye, bshuwihakonmó datsats na'i marmat'o bshuwetsotse bgene'utsatse tuutson bali b kic'o gawratsaniye.
JOH 16:22 Mank'o and it shiyanitute, ernmó taa aani iti bek'etwe, it mac'onwere gene'uitwe, it gene'uwere itatse dek'etwo aaliye.
JOH 16:23 «Manots aawots tiyoke eegor k'onratste, ariko arikon itsh etirwe niho tshútson it k'oniyal jam keewo itsh ímetwe.
JOH 16:24 Han b́ borfetsosh t shútson eegor ik keewo k'onrafa'atee, it k'oniyal itsh imetwe, mannowere it gene'uo s'een wotitwe.
JOH 16:25 «Andish b́borfetso jewron itsh keewre, haniyako jewron itsh t keeweraw aawo weetwe, ernmó niho jangosh jam keewo kishde itsh keewitwe.
JOH 16:26 Manots aawots tshútson k'onitute, taawere ‹Niho it jangosh k'onitwe› eraatse.
JOH 16:27 Man eegoshe niho b́tookon iti b́shuntsoshe, nihonwere iti b́shunir taan it shuntsonat Ik'oke twatsok'o it amantsotsne.
JOH 16:28 Nihoke keshat datsats waare, ando aaniy datsani k'ayr nihok ametuwe.»
JOH 16:29 B́danifwotswere hank'owa boet, «Hamb! andee jewron b́woterawon shanone n keewi,
JOH 16:30 Nee jamo n dantsok'onat nee konnwor neesh aato t'intso b́geyirawok'o and t'iwintsdek'roone, mansh Ik'oke keshat n waatsok'o amanirwone.»
JOH 16:31 Iyesuswere boosh hank'o ett bíaaniy, «Andmó amanertya?
JOH 16:32 It ik ikets it kaat kaaton bad'arr tiyali k'ayitk'rit sa'ato weetwe, b́ sa'atonwere andbodre, ernomó niho taanton b́wottsotse tiyaltanaliye.
JOH 16:33 Han itsh tkeewir tiats deshar jeeno it datsitwok'owa etaatniye, datsanatse it befetsosh gondbek'o itaatse'faee, ernmó shatk'ayere, taa datsani da'adek're.»
JOH 17:1 Iyesus han b́ keewiyakon daromaants b́ tooko tuzdek't s'iilfetst hank'owa bíet, «Nihono! hamb, sa'ato bodre, n naay neen b́ mangiytwok'o n na'o mangiwe,
JOH 17:2 Ni imts jamwotssh dúre dúri kasho b́ imetwok'o ash jamwotsatse alo n imtsoshe.
JOH 17:3 Dúre dúri kashonwere n s'uzi ari Ik'o Izar Izewernat n woshtso Iyesus Krstosi danoniye.
JOH 17:4 Taa taash n'imts fino s'eentsat datsanatse neen mangire.
JOH 17:5 Nihono! datsan bíazeftsere niyoke t detsts mangon taan andoor niyoke mangiwe.
JOH 17:6 «Datsanatse gaaldek'at taash n imts ashuwotssh koni nwotok'o kitsre, booye niknee boteshi, neehe boon taash imrne, boowere ni aap'o kotdek'rne,
JOH 17:7 Taash nímts jamo niyokik b́ wottsok'o bo and danrnee.
JOH 17:8 Taash nimts aap'wotsi boosh imre, boowere t keewre k'ebdek'rne, niyoke keshat twaatsok'onowere arikon danrnee, nee taan n woshtsok'onowere amanernee.
JOH 17:9 «Taa tk'onir bo jangoshe, taash nimtsanots nik bowottsotse bo jangosh k'onirwe, datsush k'onratse.
JOH 17:10 Tik wotts jamo nike, nik wottsonwere tikee, taawere boatse tuutson mangree.
JOH 17:11 Taa haniyakon datsanatse beeratse, bomó datsanatsikne. Taaye nmaants twooniyee, S'ayin nihono taash n'imtsanots nokok'o ik bowotishe taash n'imts nshúútson boon kore.
JOH 17:12 Taa bonton t teshor taash nimts n shúútson boon kotre, taahe boon kotre, mansh mas'aaf S'aynotsitsi aap'etso b́ s'eenetwok'o t'afi na'oniye oko konwor boyitse t'aftso aaliye.
JOH 17:13 And taa n maants t wooniye, datsatse befetsat han boosh t keewir t gene'o boon s'een b́wotitwok'owe.
JOH 17:14 Taa ni aap'o boosh imre, taa datsanatsik wottk'ztsok'o boworu datsatsiknaliye, manshe datsan boon b́ shit'i.
JOH 17:15 Gondatse boon n k'otetwok'owa bako datsatse boon n dek'etwok'o neen k'onratse.
JOH 17:16 Taa datsatsik t woterawok'o boowere datsatsiknaliy.
JOH 17:17 Aron boon S'ayntswe, ni aap'onu aree.
JOH 17:18 Nee taan datsan maants n woshtsok'o taa boon datsan maants woshere.
JOH 17:19 Bo arikon S'ayn bowotitwok'o taa bo jangosh t tooko S'ayin woshitwe.
JOH 17:20 «Bo aap'o k'ebdek't taan amaniru jamwotssha tk'oniri bako, bos'uzsh k'onratse.
JOH 17:21 Taawere t k'onir jametswots ik bowotitwok'we, andoor nihono! nee tiitse nbeyok'o taawere niatse t fa'ok'o, boowere noon bobetwok'o, nee taan nwoshtsok'o datsan b́ amanitwok'owe.
JOH 17:22 Noo ik nowottsok'o boowere ik bowotitwok'o, taash n imts mango boosh imre.
JOH 17:23 Taa t k'onirwo taa boon neewere taan n wottsok'o boowere b́ jamon ik bowotitwok'owe. Mank'owere taan nwoshtsok'onat taan nshuntsok'on bonowere nshuntsok'o datso b́danishe.
JOH 17:24 «Nihono! Datsan bíazeftsere taan nshuntsotse taash n'imts mango bobek'etwok'o taash n ímtsanotswere taa t beyoke taanton bo beyo shunfee.
JOH 17:25 S'ayin nihono! datso neen danatse, taamó neen danfee, hanotswere taan nee n woshtsok'o danrnee.
JOH 17:26 Taan nshunts shuno booke b́betwok'o taawere boats twotitwok'o, boowere neen bodanetwok'o woshre, ando aani bodanetwok'o woshitwe.»
JOH 18:1 Iyesus hank'o b́ etiyakon b́ danifwotsnton K'edron foki túroniye bak'ets bíami, manoke teshts miti bos'wots beyok b́ danifwotsnton bokind.
JOH 18:2 Iyesusnat b́ danifwotsn jam aawo manoke boko'efotse bín beshide imetwo Yhud manokman danfee b́ tesh.
JOH 18:3 Mansh Yihud, wotadrwotsitsi ik kaywotsi, mank'owere kahni naashwotsitsnat ferisawino eteefwotsitse wosheets kot kotfwotsitse k'atswotsi jishdek't manok b́weyi, boowere fanosiyonat c'eshon, gini k'ac'uwotsi detsdek'tni botesh.
JOH 18:4 Iyesuswere bíats bodetu jamo dank'rat bomaand kesh waat, «Kone it geyirwoni?» bí eti.
JOH 18:5 Bowere «Nazrettso Iyesusiye nogeyiri» boet. Bíwere «Bíye Taane» bí eti. Bín beshide imetwo Yhudwere bonton need'dek'tni b́tesh.
JOH 18:6 Iyesuswere «Bíye taane» bí eree shuutso madand ginaat datsats dih bowts.
JOH 18:7 Iyesuswere, «Kone it geyiri» ett aani boon bíaati. Bowere «Nazrettso Iyesusiye nogeyiri» boet.
JOH 18:8 Bíwere «Taane itsh etre, eshe it geyrwo taana wotiyal hanotsi k'ayk'rowere, amnee» bíet.
JOH 18:9 Hanwere b́wot, «Nihono, taash ni'imts ashuwotsitse ikonor dab t'afiratsee» bí eteets aap'o b́ s'eenisha.
JOH 18:10 Smon P'et'rosu shiki gorado b́ detstsotse b́ shiko kaas' dekt kahanai naashwots guutso k'ani wazo k'ut'b́k'ri, guuts man shúútsonwere «Malkosi» b́ tesh.
JOH 18:11 Iyesusmó P'et'rossh, «N shiki gorado b́ batots anik'rowe, Niho taash bímts gondbek'i wanc'o úshalktaaneya?» bíet.
JOH 18:12 Maniyere il wotaderwotsnat boon alefon, Ayhdiwots koti kotfwots Iyesusi detsdek't tip bok'r.
JOH 18:13 Shinnwere Hana maants dek't bo am, Hanwere mandúri kahaniwots abaatsi naasho teshtso K'eyafsh bí abi b́ tesh.
JOH 18:14 K'eyafwere «Ik asho ash jamwots jangosh b́ k'iro k'anef» ett Ayhudi naashwotssh iztsoni b́ tesh.
JOH 18:15 Smon P'et'rosnat b́ daniru k'oshnton Iyesus shuutso botuu, k'osh b́ daniru man kahniwotsatsi naashoke daneeka b́ tesh, b́ danif manwere Iyesusnton kahaniwots naasho múúlots b́ kindi,
JOH 18:16 P'et'rosmó uratsere fengesh ganok need'dek'tni b́ tesh, kahaniwots naashoke daneets b́ danfman úromaants kesh waat fengesh kotiru baar na'ush keewt P'et'rosn kindsh b́k'r,
JOH 18:17 Fengsh kotiru baar naunu P'et'rossh, «Neewere ashaan danirwotsitsi iko neenosha?» biet. Bíwere taanaliye b́ eti.
JOH 18:18 Manoor datso ak' b́ wottsotse guutswotsnat zebi kotirwotsn itsintsiron tawo aat'idek't bokashiri. P'et'roswere bonton need'dek'tni tawa b́kashiri.
JOH 18:19 Kahni naashi naasho Iyesusi b́ danifwotsnat b́daniyiru daniy jango bíaati.
JOH 18:20 Iyesuswere hank'o ett bísh bíaaniy, «Taaye ash jamosh sháánone t keewi, ayhudi jamwots Ik' k'onosh bokakwets mootse wotowa Ik' mootse aaw aawone tdaniyi, ááshon t keewtso ik keewo aaliye,
JOH 18:21 Eshe, eegoshe taan ni aatiri? Bosh t keewor shishtswotsi aatwe, taa t keewtso bo danfnee.»
JOH 18:22 Iyesus han b́ keewor manoke need'dek't teshtswotsitsi kotirwotsatse iko, «Kahniwots naashosh hank'oweya ni'aaniti?» ett bín b́ jabi.
JOH 18:23 Iyesuswere «Gondo aap're wotiyal gond keewo t keewtsk'o gawowe, t keewtso arika wotiyalmó taan eegoshe ntogiri?» bíet.
JOH 18:24 Maniyere il Hana, Iyesusi b́ tipetsok'on kahniwots naasho K'eyaf maants damib́k'r.
JOH 18:25 Manoor Simon P'et'ros need'dek't tawo b́kashfere b́ tesh, k'osh ashuwotswere «Nee ashman danifwotsitsi iko neenosha?» bo eti. Bíwere, «Taanaliye» jamere bíet.
JOH 18:26 P'et'ros b́ waaz b́k'ut'ts ashosh jag wottso kahni naasho guutsuwotsitse iko, «Mit bos'wots beyoke bínton neen be'atsta?» bíet.
JOH 18:27 P'et'rosu dab́t jamere bí eti, manoor baako b́k'adi.
JOH 18:28 Maniyere il Iyesusi K'eyaf mookere Romn waats dats k'eezirwo múúlok dek't boami, manoronu guura b́ tesh. ayhudiwots fazigi baaliwosh shukeet mereero bometwotse bo kimawok'o ett datsu k'eeziru múúlots kindatsno.
JOH 18:29 Mansh P'ilat'os bo maantsan kesh waat, «Ashaanats it t'intsiru s'aamiyo eebi?» ett bíaati.
JOH 18:30 Bowere «Ashaan gondo fineraka wotink'e neesh beshide imawk'one b́ teshi» ett bo aani.
JOH 18:31 P'ilat'oswere «It it tookon de'amr it nemok'on angshwere» bíet. Ayhudiwotswere «No nemotse ash úd'o noosh baziyeke» boet
JOH 18:32 Manwere b́ wot Iyesus aawk'on b́ k'iritwok'o aap'ets aap'o b́ s'eenetwok'owe.
JOH 18:33 P'ilat'oswere aanat b́ múúlots b́ kindi Iyesusno s'eegt «Nee Ayhudi naasho neeneya?» ett bí aati.
JOH 18:34 Iyesus «Nee hań nietiŕ n tokoneyamó? t jango k'osh ashuwots neesh bokeewrneya?» bí et.
JOH 18:35 P'ilat'oswere, «Taa ayhudi taaneya? Neen taash beshidek't imtswots n jirwotsnat kahni naashwotsnee, nee eebi nk'altsoni?» bí et.
JOH 18:36 Iyesus «T mengstu datsanatskiyaliye, t mengstu datsanatsiki wotink'ere Ayhudi naashwots kishots t kindrawok'o ti ashuwots taash kes'ank'ne b́ teshi, t mengstunmó datsanatsikiyaliye» ett bíaaniy.
JOH 18:37 P'ilat'oswere «Beree nee nugús neenere?» bí eti. Iyesuswere «Taa nugus t wottsok'o neenere etiri, taa t shuwewokonat datsanats twaa ari jango gawoshee, arik wotts jamo ti aap'o k'ebetwe» ett bíaaniy.
JOH 18:38 P'ilat'oswere «Aro eebi?» ett bíaati. Maniyere il P'ilat'os ayhudiwots maants kesh waat hank'o bíet, «Taa bíatse ik naandunor daatsratse,
JOH 18:39 Ernmó it doyok'on fazigi bali aawor tipetswotsitse iko worwot worwoton itsh biitsfe, mansh Ayhudi nugúso itsh t bitsish geefteya?» bí eti.
JOH 18:40 Boomó «Berebani noosh biishe bako haniyali!» ett bokúhi. Berbanmó wombedeya b́tesh.
JOH 19:1 Maniyere il P'ilat'os Iyesusi dek'amt b́garfii.
JOH 19:2 Kes'kes'fwotswere angitson k'odets akliliyo doozdek't Iyesus tookats gedbok'r, tahi bironowere takbokr.
JOH 19:3 B́iyo waat bíats kashon, «Ayhudi nugusono! jeeno neesh wotowe!» bo etferab botesh, etonwere bín bojabi.
JOH 19:4 P'ilat'os aaniy uromaants kishdek't, «Hamb bíatse eegor t'afiyo t daatsrawok'o it danetwok'owa, bíne ur itsh kish k'rona» bíet.
JOH 19:5 Mann Iyesusi angitsi akliliyo b́ tookats gúúpdek't tahi bironowere b́ tahtsok'on ur kesht b́waa, P'ilat'oswere «Hambe ashoni!» bí eti.
JOH 19:6 Kahniy naashwotsnat kot kotfwotsn Iyesusi bobek'tsok'on, «Bín jirk'rowe! bín jirk'rowe!» ett bokuhi. P'ilat'osmó «T weron eegoru naando bíyatse daatsratse, it geyiyal it de'amr jirde'ere» bí eti.
JOH 19:7 Ayhudiwotswere «Noo nemo detsfone, ashaan b́ tooko Ik'o naayi b́ woshtsotse no nemok'on k'ira b́k'iritiye» bo et.
JOH 19:8 Jam keewan b́ shishtsok'on P'ilat'os iki shat b́gutsi,
JOH 19:9 Múúlots kindt Iyesussh «Nee eewkneya nweyi?» ett bíaati. Iyesusmó eegor bísh aaniratse.
JOH 19:10 Manatse tuutson P'ilat'os «Taash keewratsneya? taa neen bitsosho wee jitosho alo t detstsok'o danatsiya?» bíet.
JOH 19:11 Iyesuswere «Ik'oke alo neesh imeraratse wotink'e tiatse eegor alo deshatsne b́tesh, mansh eshe taan neesh beshidek' imtso iki bog morro bíats wotitwe» bíet.
JOH 19:12 P'ilat's Iyesus keew keewan b́ shishtsok'on biishde fakshk'ro geyatni b́teshi, ayhudiwotsmó «Nee ashaan nfakshitka wotiyal Rom nugús jir neenaliye, b́ tookon nugús woshitu jamo nugúsosh b́ balangare!» etfets bokuhi.
JOH 19:13 P'ilat'os man b́ shishtsok'on Iyesusi uromaants kishdek't «Shúts sháána» eteets beyoke angshi jorats be b́dek'i, beyokan Ibrayist'i noon keew keewon, «Gabata» eta eteefo.
JOH 19:14 Fazigi baaliyosh k'an dek'i aawa b́tesh, manoronwere shirt sa'atok'oyi, manoor P'ilat'os ayhudiwotssh «Hambe it nugúsoni!» bíet.
JOH 19:15 Boomó, «Bín t'afiwe! Bín t'afiwe! jirk'rowe!» ett bokuhi. P'ilat'oswere, «It nugúso jiirk'rotaa?» bíet. Kahni naashwotswere, «Rom dats nugúsoniyere okoon k'osh nugúso deshatsone!» ett bísh boaaniyi.
JOH 19:16 Manoor Iyesus b́ jitetwok'o P'ilat'os beshidek't b́ ími, boowere detsdek't boami.
JOH 19:17 Maniyere okoon Iyesus b́ mask'aliyo kurdek't «Took k'ola» eteef beyok kesht bíami, beyokan Ibrayist'i nonkeew keewon, «Golgota» eteefo,
JOH 19:18 Manoknowere bín jitbok'ri, Iyesusi dagots geddek't bínton k'osh git ashuwotsi gironat k'anomaants jitbok'ri.
JOH 19:19 P'ilat'os, «Nazrettso Iyesus, Ayhudi nugúsa» etirwo guut'etso guut'dek't bí mask'aliy k'oyomand gedb́k'ri.
JOH 19:20 Iyesus b́ jitewoko kitok karn b́ teshtsotse, ayhudiwotsitse ayuwots guut'etsman bo nabab, guut'etsonwere b́ guut'e Ibrayist'iyon, Latiniyonat Grikiy noon keew keewok'ona b́ tesh.
JOH 19:21 Ayhudi kahni naashwots p'ilat'ossh, «Nee ‹Ayhudi nugúsa› err guut'k'aye, ernmó, ‹Ashaan taaye ayhudiwots nugúso taane› etfe err guud'e» boeti.
JOH 19:22 P'ilat'osmó, «T guut'tso guut're» ett bíaani.
JOH 19:23 Kes'kes'fwots Iyesusi bojiti hakon b́ taho dek't, kes'f ikosh ik ik kayo b́ bodetwok'o awdoko kayibok'r. Ernmó b́ kito hank'owa bok'al, b́ kito shiperawo dambe dek't dash b́borfetso ikon wozeka b́ tesh.
JOH 19:24 Mansh kes'fwots, «It'o no sha'e bísh b́bodtso noyitse b́dek'o k'anefe bako gaat'k'ayone» bo eti. Man b́ wotwere, «T tahonee kaybodek'i, T kitatsowere it'o boshp'i» Etirwo S'ayin mas'afitstso b́ s'eenetwok'owa, kes' kes'fwotswere mank'o bok'al.
JOH 19:25 Iyesus mask'aliy ganoke b́ índnat b́ índmishn, K'elyop' máátsu Mariyamnat Megdelitsu mariyamwere need'dek'tni botesh,
JOH 19:26 Iyesus bí indnat b́ shunf b́danifo ikoke boned'efere b́ bek'tsok'on bí índsh, «Máátsune! mambe nnaayi!» bí et.
JOH 19:27 Maniyere il b́ danifmansh, «Mambiye ni indi» bí et. manoori sa'aton tuzt b́ danifman b́ galomand bin dek't bíami.
JOH 19:28 Maniyere il Iyesus and jam keewo s'een b́s'uutsok'owo dandek't S'ayn mas'fotse guut'ets Ik'i aap'o b́ s'eenetwok'o, «Shashuwere!» bíet.
JOH 19:29 Manoke biri k'ac'otse s'eent beyiru weyini shasho fa'ebtesh, mansh manoke fa'a ashuwots weyini bir shashman sponjiwok'ots gupt s'eentsdek't hisop'i mitats joddk't b́ nonats bot'intsi,
JOH 19:30 Iyesuswere biri shashman b́ nonots b́gedihakon «S'uuwtsere!» bí eti. B́tookonowere jilk' aydek't k'iri b́wtsi.
JOH 19:31 Maniyere il Ayhudi naashwots, jitets ashuwots shókó tishde'er, boduuno maskaliyatse bo orshitwok'o P'ilat'osi bok'oni, man bok'aluere eegoshe sanbati aawosh k'andek'o boosh b́geyitsotse, sanbatmanwere baaliyi een b́wottsosh, sanbati aawon boduuno mask'aliyats b́ beerawok'owa ettni.
JOH 19:32 Mansh kes'kes'fwots amt, Iyesusnton jiitsets ashuwotsi, shin iko shóko tiitst ando aani gitlo shóko botiitsi,
JOH 19:33 Iyesusok boamtsok'onmó, bí shino k'irt b́teshtsok'o bek't b́shóko tishatsno.
JOH 19:34 Ernmó kes'kes'fwotsitse iko, b́ lalk'ats ginon kosh b́k'ri, manoor b́ lalk'otse s'atsonat aatson b́kesh.
JOH 19:35 Man bek'tso it it amanituk'owo b́ gawi, b́ gawonwere arika, b́ keewirwonwere arik b́wottsok'o bí danfee.
JOH 19:36 Han b́wotwere, «B́ mak'tsotse dab ikonwor tisheratsee» etiru S'ayin mas'afitsi aap'o b́s'eenetwok'owe.
JOH 19:37 Ando k'osh S'ayin mas'aafi kayotse, «Bo koshtsmanee bek'etúnee» etfe.
JOH 19:38 Ayhudi naashwotsi shatt ááshon Iyesus danifwotsitse teshtso Armatiyas datstso Yosef Iyesus duuno dek'osh P'ilat'osi b́k'on. P'ilat'oswere de'e bíet. Mansh Yosef amt duuno k'aa'úb́dek'.
JOH 19:39 Maniyere shin t'úwon Iyesusok waat teshtso Nik'odimoswere kerbewonat ekoos'on eekdek't s'aletso shaash kilok'o wotitwo dek't b́wyi.
JOH 19:40 Ash gitetsmanots Iyesus duuno k'aaúdek't ayhudiwots duun naap'efok'on naap't shituwonton shemi shishon t'at'bok'ri.
JOH 19:41 Iyesus jiteyat b́ teshtsoke mit bos'wots bobeyoko fa'e b́tesh, miti beyiru manitse konnor bits duk danawu doowi handro fa'e b́ tesh.
JOH 19:42 Sanbati jangosh k'andek'osh ett ando dowonuwere karn b́teshtsotse Iyesus duuno manok gedbok'ri.
JOH 20:1 Torbanitsi shintso aawots, sanbata gudots, maar goyo b́ maat'fetse, Megdeli datstsu Mariyam Iyesus doowomants biami, manok b bodtsok'on doowo bin ipets shútso doowman fengeshatse k'aztuut b́ befere bek'b́k'ri.
JOH 20:2 Mansh bi Simon P'et'rosnat Iyesus b́ shunf b́ danifok wos'fere amaat, «Doonzo dowootse kishdek'wutsernee, aawok bogedtsok'o danatsone» bieti.
JOH 20:3 Manorowere P'et'rosnat b́ danif ikmann kesht dowomand boami.
JOH 20:4 Gitetswotswere towatni bowos'iri, ernmó b́ danif k'oshman P'et'rosiyere bogo káárt wos'fere amt shino dowok b́bodi.
JOH 20:5 Dashan tuumt doowots b́s'iltsok'on duuni taho manoke b́befere b́bek'i, ernmó gitsomaand kindratse.
JOH 20:6 Simon P'et'roswere b́shuutso waat́ doowots b́ kindi, bíwere duuno bín t'at'ets taho manoke b́ befere b́ bek'i.
JOH 20:7 Iyesus tooko bín s'as'ets taho b́ duuni tahonton b́ woterawo bíaali k'oshoke k'odeyat b́ beyirwok'o bek'b́k'ri.
JOH 20:8 Maniyere il, shin shino waabodts b́ danifman doowi gitsots kindt bek't bíamani.
JOH 20:9 «K'irtswotsitse tuwo geyife bísha» etts aap'o S'ayin mas'afotstso t'iwintsde'afa'no botesh.
JOH 20:10 Maniyere il b́ danif gitetsmanots aanat bogalomand boami.
JOH 20:11 Megdel dats ashu Mariyam eepfetsat, dowoniyere úratse ned'dek'atni b́tesh, eepfetsatnwere tuumdek'at doowots b́ s'iili.
JOH 20:12 Iyesus duuno b́ teshts beyoke nas' tah tahtdek'ts melaki gitetsuwotsi iko s'olotse iko k'oyoke bobefere bbek'i.
JOH 20:13 Bowere Mariyamsh, «Nee máátsune! eegishe niepiri?» boeti. Biwere, «T doonzi dek'wutserne, eewk bogedtsok'onowere danatse» bíet.
JOH 20:14 Manowere etaat b shutsomand wongr biettsok'on Iyesus b́ need'efere bek'bk'ri, Iyesusi b́wottsok'onowere danatsane.
JOH 20:15 Iyesus, «Máátsune neena eegoshe niepiri, kone ngeyirwoni?» bí eti. Bíwere manoki mitwotsitse finirwo bish bíartsotse, «Doonzono! nee bín dek'ri wotiyal, eewk ngedtsok'owo oona neesha taash keewwe, taa were k'aaúdek'etuwe» bieti.
JOH 20:16 Iyesuswere, «Mariyame!» bí eti. Biwere b́maants wongr etaat Ibrayist'i noon keewu keewon, «Rebuni!» bí eti. Man etonwere, «Danifono!» etee.
JOH 20:17 Iyesus, «Tiyats borr taan detsk'aye taahe andoor tnihok damb keyafa'e, ernmó tieshwotsok amr ‹Taahe ti nihnat it nihok, ti Ik'onat it Ik'ok damb bíyok keshetwe etfe› err boosh keewwe» bíet.
JOH 20:18 Mann Megdel datstsu Mariyam b́ danifwotsok amaat «Doonzo bek're!» etaat bish eeg bíettsok'onowere boosh b keewi.
JOH 20:19 Manoori ik gawiymanitsi shints aaw sanbata gudots kooc' b́ danifwots ayhudi naashwotsi bo shattsotse, bo maa fengesho is'dek't́ moots kakwedek'tni botesh, maa fengesho is'etsok'on b́ befere Iyesus b́ danifwots kakwed'ek't bobeyiru moots b́ kindi, bo dagots need'dek't, «Jeeno itsh wotowe!» bíet.
JOH 20:20 Man ett b́ kishonat b́ lalk'on boosh b́ kits, b́ danifuwotswere doonzo bobek'tsok'on geneúbowutsi.
JOH 20:21 Maniyere il Iyesus aaniy, «Jeeno itsh wotowe! taan niho b́ woshtsok'o taawere iti woshitwe» bíet.
JOH 20:22 Man eton bo aats úff ett, «S'ayin shayiro de'ere,
JOH 20:23 ashuwots morrosh orowe it etal boosh bo morro orowa etetuwe, it ashuwots morro orowa eto it k'azal boosh orowa eteeratse» bíet.
JOH 20:24 Iyesus b́ danifwotsok b́ woor tatse gitetsuwotsitse iko, Didimosi eteefo Tomas bowoke aali b́tesh.
JOH 20:25 Mansh b́ danif k'oshuwots Tomassh «Doonzone bek'rone» boet. Bímó «Mismaron koshets b́ kishuwotsi be'er tjabuwotsi msmaron koshets manotsits tgerawo, t kishonowere b́ lalk'i gaawots t gedala bako b́jamon amaneratse» bí eti.
JOH 20:26 Shimt aawoniyere hakon b́danfuwots aaniy mootsna botesh, Tomasuwere bontini b́tesh, maa fengesho is'etsok'on b́befere Iyesus waa bo dagotse need'dek't́, «Jeeno itsh wotowe!» bíet.
JOH 20:27 Maniyere il Tomassh, «N jaabo hakan doyir tkishwotsi s'iile, nkishonowere dewar t lalk'ots geere, amantso wotowe bako, amanerawo wotk'aye» bí et.
JOH 20:28 Tomaswere, «T doonzo! tiko Izar Izewero!» ett bísh bíaani.
JOH 20:29 Iyesuswere Tomassh, «Neyere taan nbek'tsosha taan niamaniye, taan bo be aawon taan amanituwots údeknee» bíet.
JOH 20:30 Iyesus mas'afanitse guut't gederawo k'osh ay aditso b́ danifúwots shinatse finere,
JOH 20:31 Ernmó Iyesus Krstos Ik'o naayi b́wottsok'owo it amanituwok'o, amanar b́shutson dúre dúri kasho it datsitwok'owa han b́ guut'iyi.
JOH 21:1 Haniyere okoon Iyesus T'bryados aats k'ari ganoke, b́ danifwotssh aaniy b́be'eyi, b́ be'ewwere hank'owa,
JOH 21:2 Sim'on P'et'rosi, Didimosi eteefo Tomasi, K'aan Galil datstso Natnaeli, Zebdiwos nana'wotsnat b́ danif gitetswots towatni botesh.
JOH 21:3 Sim'on P'et'ros, «Mus' detso amna» bíet. Bowere, «Nentoniye no ameti» boet. Kesh amt jelbots bokind, ernmó manots t'ú mus' iku dab deshatsno.
JOH 21:4 B́gatstsok'on Iyesus aats k'ari gúúrats ned'b́wts, b́ danifwotsimó Iyesusi b́wottsok'o danatsno.
JOH 21:5 Iyesuswere, «Nana'otso! mus' iku detsfte?» bí eti. Bowere, «Ik biidu dab deshatsone» boeti.
JOH 21:6 Bíwere, «Mus'i kambo jelbu k'anomaants shau'ere daatsitute» bíet. Mansh kambo aats k'arots shap' bok'ri, mus'o ayo bodetstsatse tuutson kambo geetso maawbowtsi.
JOH 21:7 Manoor Iyesus b́shunf b́danfo P'et'rossh, «Bíye doonzoniye!» bíet. Sim'on P'et'ros, «Doonzoniyosha» eto b́shishtsok'on finosha ett b́ kito kisht b́teshtsotse manoor tahdek't aats k'arots t'oolat b́kindi.
JOH 21:8 B́ danifwotsmó datsatse git bal indoniyere bowokerawotse mus'o bíns'ents mus'i kambo geetsfere jelbon boweyi.
JOH 21:9 Jelbotse bo oot'tsok'on bí abaatse mus'o detstso itsintsiri tawik'ak'onat misho bek'bok'ri.
JOH 21:10 Iyesuswere, «And it detsts mus'otse dewere» bíet.
JOH 21:11 Mansh Simon P'et'ros jelbots t'oolat kindon balebalk'atse keez mus'i een eenwots bítse bos'eents mus'i kambo datsomand b́getsi, mank'o mus'i ay b́ detsalor mus'i kambman gaad'eratse.
JOH 21:12 Iyesus maniyere il, «Waa moore» bíet. Boúnets doonzo Iyesusi b́ wottsok'o dant boteshtsotse b́ danifwotsitse dab́ ikonwor, «Kone nee?» ett aatosh aawo shuuk'tso aali.
JOH 21:13 Mann Iyesus waat, mishonat mus'on k'aaúdek't b́ími.
JOH 21:14 Iyesus k'irotse b́ tuwihakon b́ danifuwots bín bobek'irwan keezla b́tesh.
JOH 21:15 Guur misho bomeyihakon Iyesus Sim'on P'et'rossh, «Yona naay Sim'ono! hanots taan bo shunirwoniyere bogo taan shunfiy?» bíet. Bíwere «Ee, t doonzo! taa neen tshuntsok'o neewor danfnee» ett bísh bíaaniy. Iyesuswere «T mereer buk'ulwotsi maanzwe» bíet.
JOH 21:16 Aaniy gitlo «Yona naay Sim'ono! taan shunfiya» bíet. Bíwere «Ee t doonzo! neen tshutsok'o nee danfnee» bíet. Iyesuswere «T mereer nana'úwotsi kore» bíet.
JOH 21:17 Keezlonowere «Yona naay Sim'ono! taan shunfiya?» bíet. Keezlo «Taan shunfiya» bíetsosh P'et'ros shiyanwtsat «Doonozono! Nee úno danfnee, taa neen tshunok'onowere danfnee» bíet. Iyesuswere hank'o bísh bíet, «T mererwotsi jinee
JOH 21:18 Arikon, arikoniye, neesh ti etiry nee jawetson nbeyor ni edo n kishon edde'er nshuntsok niamfoni nteshi, ni enashormó nee n kishuwotsi njargre k'osh asho neesh bíediti, nshunawokowere neen debíameti.»
JOH 21:19 Han bíetuwere P'et'ros aawk'o k'iron Ik'o mangiyo bísh b́geyitwok'o kitsosha b́tesh, Maniyere il P'et'rossh «T shuutso shoydewowe!» bíet.
JOH 21:20 P'et'ros wongr ett Iyesus b́ shunf danifo b́ shuutso b́ wafere b́ bek'i, b́ danif han kooc'mishor Iyesusok t'iindek't, «Doonzono, neen beshide imetwo kone?» ett aattsoni b́ tesh.
JOH 21:21 P'et'ros bín bek't, «Doonzono! ashaanmó aawk'owe b́ wotiti?» ett Iyesusi bíaati.
JOH 21:22 Iyesuswere «T wafetsosh s'ker beewe tietal neen eege gedi? Neehe t shuutso shoydewowe!» bíet.
JOH 21:23 Manatse tuutson eshwots dagotse «B́ danifman k'irratse» etts keewo shisheb́wts. Ernmó Iyesus «T wafetsosh beewe tietal neen bíts eege gedi» eta bíetibako «K'irratse» eraatse.
JOH 21:24 Keewanots jangosh jamon gawtsonat keewanotsnowere guut'tso b́ danifo, b́ gawts gawonwere ar b́wottsok'o danfone.
JOH 21:25 Iyesus b́ k'altswots k'osh ay keewwots fa'ano botesh. Taash bíartsok'owosh bí b́ fints keew jamwots ik ikon boguut'eyink'ere guut'ets mas'aafwotsi datso b́tookon kuro falrawnk'e b́tesh.
ACT 1:1 Shiimetso Tewofloso! T mas'aaf shintsotse Iyesus b́ fintsonat b́danits jamo guut're. T guut'uwe Iyesus b́ fino dek'b́tuwortsoon tuut
ACT 1:2 Daro maantsan b́ tuuts aawo b́ borfetso b́ fintsoniyee, daro maantsan b́ tuwwere gal b́ dek'ts woshetswotssh b́ tzaziyo shayiri S'ayini weeron b́ imihakoniye,
ACT 1:3 Ay gond bek'o dek't bí etiyak beyar beetk b́ wottsok'o kitsit weeron ayoto boosh b́ be'eyi, hab aawosh boats be'eyat Ik'i mengst jango boosh b́daniyi.
ACT 1:4 Bonton beyat b́móór hank'o ett boon b́ azazi, «Taa itsh t keewtsok'o nihokere itsh imosh jangiyetso korde'ere bako Iyerusalemitse keshk'ayere,
ACT 1:5 Yohanis aatsone b́gupi, itmo muk' aawoniye okoon shayiri S'ayinon gupetute.»
ACT 1:6 Bowere ikoke ko'edek't bo befere, «Doonzono! n mengsto Isra'elsh aani n imet aawo andeya?» ett boaati.
ACT 1:7 Iyesusu hank'o ett boosh bí aaniyi, «Niho b́ took alon bí etts aawonat dúron it danosh falatste.
ACT 1:8 Ernmó shayiri S'ayino itats b́ oot'or ango daatsitute, manoor Iyerusalemn, Yhud dats jamatse, Semariyon, dats daar jamats b́ borfetso taash gawo wotitute.»
ACT 1:9 Hank'owere bí etiyakon bo bek'fere daro maantsan k'az b́ tuwi, dawunonuwere bín dek't bo awatsere ááts b́k'ri.
ACT 1:10 Bíwere daro maantsan b́ tuufere, boowere t'iwints dek't daromandan bo s'iilfere nas' taho tah dek'ts git ashuwots bo ganokere need' dek't,
ACT 1:11 «It Galil ashuwotso, eegishe need'dek'at daromatsan it s'iliri? Daro maantsan b́ dek'efere it bek'ts Iyesus haniye, daro maantsan b́ tuufere it bek'tsank'on aanar weetuwe» bo eti.
ACT 1:12 Maniyere hakon Debrezeyit gurats Iyerusalem maants k'azboaani, Debrezeyit guro Iyerusalematse sanbati aaw sha'ok'oyiye (ik kilometrok'oyiye).
ACT 1:13 Iyerusalemits waat bobeef mootse dambani k'aat'ots k'az bokeshi, boowere P'et'rosi, Yohansi, Yak'obi, Indriyasi, Filip'osi, Tomasi, Bert'elemiyosi, Matiwosi, Ilfyos naay Yak'obi, okooretso Simoonnat Yak'ob naay Yhudne.
ACT 1:14 Jametsanots úniaawo Ik' k'onosh ik nibona bokakuweefo, bontonuwere mááts ik ikuwotsnat Iyesus ind Mariyamn, mank'owere Iyesus eshuwots fa'ano botesh.
ACT 1:15 Manoor P'et'ros bale hiyo wotitu amants ashuwots taalotse need'dek't hank'o bíeti,
ACT 1:16 «Ti eshuwotso, Iyesusi detsts ashuwotsi jishtso Yhud jangosh, shin shin shayiri S'ayino Dawit noonon b́ keewtso S'ayin mas'aafi aap' s'eeno geyituwe.
ACT 1:17 Yhud noyitsi iko wotat finan noonton finosh taaweytniye b́teshi.
ACT 1:18 Ernmó ashaan b́ gond finon b́ daatsts gizmann datso keew b́dek'i, b́ baron diht gúp'unat b́ taalon kap'eyat bí anzro k'az b́keshi.
ACT 1:19 Keewanuwere Iyerusalemitse fa'a jamwotssh b́ daneyi, mansh datsmanúwere bo nooni keewon ‹Akeldama› et s'egeyi, b́ bitsonuwere ‹S'ats datsa› etee.
ACT 1:20 «Man b́ wottsonuwere dub mas'aafotse, ‹B́beyoko dats baash wotowe, Konuwor bíyats beek'aye, Aaninuwere b́ naashts naasho k'osh asho bíyatse de'ewutsowe› Ett guut't teshetsotsnee.
ACT 1:21 «Eshe Doonzo Iyesus nodagotse bí ananori noonton towat teshtswotsitse,
ACT 1:22 Mank'o Yohans guproon tuut doonzo Iyesus daromaants b́ tuufetsi aawosh noonton teshtswotsitse ash iko noonton k'irotse tuwi jango gawo b́ woto geyituwe.»
ACT 1:23 Maniyere hakon git ashuwotsi bo t'intsi, boowere Bersabasi wee Iyost'osi eteefo Yosefnat Matiyasna botesh.
ACT 1:24 Hank'o ettnuwere Ik'o bok'oni, «Ash jami nibo dants doonzono! Gitetsanotsitse nmarat'tso aawi b́ woto noosh kitsuwe,
ACT 1:25 Nok'onirwonwere Yhud b́ tookon k'az bíamori k'azb́k'rts wosheetsots finan de'er b́ shaato shegrshosh wotituwo noosh nkiitsishee.»
ACT 1:26 It'onowere bo shap'i Matiyassh b́ keshi, Mansh bí tatse ik woshetswotsnton b́ taaweyi.
ACT 2:1 P'ent'e k'ost'eyi baaliyi aawa eteetso b́ bodtsok'on bo jametsuwots ik wotdek't ikoke kakuwedek'tni botesh,
ACT 2:2 Gawerawo eegurahi kup'ok'o arts k'aaro darotse b́weyi, bítse bo beyiru moonowere s'een b́wutsi.
ACT 2:3 Taaw laluw artso boats bobe'eyi, kaye kayeyatnúwere bo ik ikotsats k'ot'bodek'i.
ACT 2:4 Jamwotswere shayiri S'ayinon bo s'eeni, Shayiri S'ayinon bo keewituwok'o boosh b́ imtsok'on k'osh k'osh noonon keewo dek't botuwi.
ACT 2:5 Dats jamatse beyir datsatse waatsuwots, Ik' k'onon kup'iru ayhudiwots Iyerusalemitsa bobeefo.
ACT 2:6 K'áármano bo shishtsok'on ayi ashuwots bo ko'eyi, bo took took nononowere bokewufere bo shishtsotse bo'adi.
ACT 2:7 Tek'at adtnuwere hank'o bo eti, «Hank'o keewiru jamanots Gelil dats ash nosha?
ACT 2:8 Eshe no nó took noonon keewo bokeewefere noshishir aawuk'oneya?
ACT 2:9 No P'arteen, Miedn, Elamn, Mesp'et'omin, Yhdon, K'op'dok'n, P'ant'osn, Isiyon,
ACT 2:10 Frgiyoon, P'nfiliyon, Gbs'n, K'eren ganoke fa'úwots Libiyi awurajuwotsitse beyiruwotsiye, Romitse waats ayhudiyotsnat ayhudiwots jiro maantso kindtsowots daatseyiruwone,
ACT 2:11 Mank'owere K'ert'esitsnat Araawi dats ashuwots daatsetune, Hamb jamanots Ik'o een fino nononon bo keewufere shishiruwonee!»
ACT 2:12 Mann jametswots adt bo keewituwo t'ut't iko ikosh «Keewan eebiye k'úna b́wotiti!» bo et.
ACT 2:13 K'oshuwotsmó «Weyiniyon dutsets biri handro úsht mashwutsernee!» eton boon boaatsni.
ACT 2:14 Manoor P'et'ros tatse ikuwotsnton need'dek't b́ k'aaro eenshdek't ash ashosh hank'o ett b́ keewi, «It Yhud dats ashuwotsnat Iyerusalemn beyiru jametsuwotso, wotts keewan danosh tkeewo k'ewere,
ACT 2:15 Guuron keez sa'ato b́wottsotse it it aasabtsok'o ashaanots masheratsnee.
ACT 2:16 Ernmó han b́wotiye Nebiyiyo Iyu'el hank'o et b́ keewuts keewo b́ s'eenishe,
ACT 2:17 ‹Ik'oniye dúri s'uwi aawots hank'o wotituwe etre, T Shayiro ash jamats kut'ituwe, Bo nungushnana'onat mááts nana'uwotsn bek'on keewitunee. Bo jawetswotswere bek'o bek'etune. Bo eenashuwotswere gúmo gumetunee.
ACT 2:18 Mank'o, manoori aawumanotsitse T guuts nungushuwotsnat máátsuwots atsats T shayiro kut'ituwe, Bowere bek'on keewitunee.
ACT 2:19 Danbe darotse adits keewwotsi, Dashe datsatse adits milkituwotsi kitsituwe, S'atso, taawo, s'uwi s'aawiyonuwere be'etuwe.
ACT 2:20 Eenonat aditso Doonzo aawo b́waafetsere shino, Aawo t'aluwituwee, Aashitsunuwere s'atso arituwanee.
ACT 2:21 Doonzo shútso s'eegetu jamo kashituwe.›
ACT 2:22 «Israe'el ashuwotso! aap'an k'ewude'ere, It it tookon it dantsok'on Nazrettso Iyesus koni b́wottsok'o Ik'o it dagotse b́weeron b́ k'alts een een finwotsi, aditsuwotsnat milikituwots arikon daneewtsernee.
ACT 2:23 Bíwor b́ tookon Ik'o shin shino b́ k'anitsok'onat b́dants finok'on itsh besheyat bí imeyi. It were morrgonduwots kishon jiteyar b́k'irituwok'o it woshi.
ACT 2:24 Ik'onmó k'iri angotse farit k'irotse bín b́ tuuzi mansh k'iro bín deshde oriyo falrtsatse.
ACT 2:25 Dawit b́ jangosh hank'o etfe, Doonzo úni aawo tshinatse bek'iruwe, T shek'erawok'owere bí t k'ani aaratse
ACT 2:26 Manshe tnibo geneeúwre, T nononwere geneeúwone s'eene, Mank'owere tmeetsonú kótón jangáár beetuwe.
ACT 2:27 T kashunowere Si'olitse k'ayk'reratsnee, N S'ayinonowere dowootse o'or b́ oorituwok'o woshratsnee.
ACT 2:28 Kashi weeronowere taash danirne. Taanton nwottsonowere t geneúwo s'een wotituwe.»
ACT 2:29 «Eshuwotso! yoots nihiwotsitsi iko Dawit b́ k'irtsok'onat b́ duketsok'on, b́ dowonuwere andish b́ borfetso noganok b́ fa'ok'owo kishde itsh keewuna.
ACT 2:30 Ernmó Dawit han b́ keewiye Nebiyo b́ teshtsotsnat Ik'o nnaarotse iko n naashi jorats beezituwe ett taaron jangit b́imts keewo b́ dantsotsne.
ACT 2:31 Manatse tuutson Mesiyo Siolitse b́ oorerawok'onat b́ meetsonuwere o'or b́ oorerawok'o shin shino k'irotse b́tuwi jango b́keewi.
ACT 2:32 Iyesusi Ik'o k'irotse tuuzre, no noúnetswor keewansh gaw noone.
ACT 2:33 Ik'o k'ani aaromants beyosh danbaan b́tuwooronat jangiyets S'ayin shayiro Nihoke b́ dek'tsok'on it bek'iruhannat it shishiruwann kuut'b́k'ri.
ACT 2:34 Eshe dambaan daromantsan keshtso Dawiti b́ woterawotse Dawiti b́tookon hank'o ett keewre, ‹Doonzo t doonzsh N balangarwotsi ntufishirots tgerfetsosh T k'ani aaromants beewe› » etre.
ACT 2:36 «Eshe it itjittso Iyesusi Ik'o Doozonat Mesiyo b́ woshtsok'owo Israe'el ash jamo arikon dan de'e!»
ACT 2:37 Ashuwotswere man bo shishitsok'oon bonibotse ayidek' shiyanat P'et'rosnat k'osh woshetswotssh, «No eshuwotso! eshe and eege nok'aliti?» boeti.
ACT 2:38 P'et'rosuwere hank'o boosh bíeti, «Naandrone erere, it morro itsh orowa eteyish it ik ikets Iyesus Krstos shútson gupewere, Ik'i imtso Shayiri S'ayinono dek'etute
ACT 2:39 B́ jangiyets aap'onwere itnat it nanaúwotssh, no Doonz Izar Izewer b́ maantsan b́ s'eegetu wokoon beyiru jamwotsshe.»
ACT 2:40 K'osh k'osh ay keew keewon gawefetst «K'uur s'oot'anats weet fayotse it tooko kashiwere!» ett boon b́ izi.
ACT 2:41 Boyitse ayuwots b́ aap'tso dek't bogupeyi, manots aawotsowere keez kumok'o wotitwots amantsuwotsats dabebowutsi.
ACT 2:42 Bowere wosheetsots daniyo k'ebon, ikwotde beyonowere, Mishi maratse towaat moonat Ik'o k'ononowere bokup'efooni.
ACT 2:43 Manoor wosheetsots kishon ayo adits keewonat milikitwots bo fineyiruwatse tuutson jametsatse shato oot' b́wutsi.
ACT 2:44 Amants jamwots ikwotde'erni bobeefon boteshi, Bo detsts keewu jamononwere shira b́teshi.
ACT 2:45 Bo taaronat bo detstso kemdek't b́ gizo jametsosh b́geytsok'on bokayifooni.
ACT 2:46 Aawu aawon Ik'i mootsnowere ik nibona bokakuweefo, bomaa mootsnowere misho tishfetsr geneeúwonat nib sheengona bomaafoni botesh.
ACT 2:47 Doonzonowere bo udefoni, ash jamonuwere boon mangiya b́mangifo, Ik'onuwere kashiru ashuwotsi aaw aawon boyits daba b́dabfo.
ACT 3:1 Ik aawu P'et'rosnat Yohansn Ik' k'oneef sa'aton aawitsi jed'i sa'aton Ik'moots boami,
ACT 3:2 Manoknowere «Sheenga» err s'eegef fengesh iko fa'e b́tesh, b́shuwertson tuut dúr wottso ash iko ashaashwots aawu aawon de'ewaar manok ger bok'rofo, bí manoke bede'er Ik' moots kindiru ash ashaatse gizo b́ k'onfoni.
ACT 3:3 Ash han P'et'rosnat Yohansn Ik'i moots bokindfere bek't ms'uwatiyo booke b́k'oni.
ACT 3:4 Bowere ashman t'iwintsdek't s'iilt boere P'et'ros «Nomaants s'iile!» bí eti.
ACT 3:5 Bíwere booke ik jago b́ daatsituwok'o bí arere boon t'iwintsdek't b́ s'iili.
ACT 3:6 P'et'rosmó «Ambaaronat awntson deshatse, t detstsonmó neesh imetuwe, Nazrettso Iyesus Krstos shúútson tuur sha'owe!» bí et.
ACT 3:7 B́ k'ani kishonowere detsdek't tuuz b́k'ri, Manoor b́ tufonat b́ mak'tsi gimbon kup'b́wutsi.
ACT 3:8 Jobk' ettnuwere need'b́dek'i, Sha'eferowere bonton Ik'i moots b́ kindi, shaawefetst t'oolefetstnuwere Ik'o udi.
ACT 3:9 Ash jamonuwere sha'efetst Ik'onowere b́ udefere bobek'i.
ACT 3:10 «Sheeng fengesha» ett s'eegef Ik'i maa fengeshi ganoke bedek't giz k'onfo bí b́ wottsok'o danbok'ri, Bíyatsno wotts keewatse tuutson ayidek't adt dok etbowtsi.
ACT 3:11 Kashts ashman P'et'rosnat Yohansn atse k'aleratse ett detsdek't b́befere ash asho adt «Solomon ananefoka» eteef beyokoke bo maants wos'fere boami.
ACT 3:12 P'et'rosuwere ashuwotsi b́ bek'tsok'on boosh hank'owa bíet, Israe'el ashuwotso! Keewanatse tuutson eegoshe it adiri? Noon eegoshe t'iwints dek'at its'iliri? Noo no took kup'on wee noo sheeng fino nofiintsatse tuutson ashaan b́ sha'ituwok'o no k'altsok'o arefa itsha?
ACT 3:13 No nihotsko, Abrahamko, Yisahak'ko, Ya'ak'obko Izar Izewer b́ naayi Iyesusi mangire, ernmó it bín P'ilat'os shinatse beshidek'at it imi, P'ilat'osuwere dab bín fakshk'ro b́ geere geeratsone it eti.
ACT 3:14 It S'ayinonat kááwu finetso geeratsone etaat kash údts iko itsh b́bitsetuwok'o it k'oni.
ACT 3:15 Kash imts wottsonowere it úd'i, Ik'onmó k'irotse bín b́ tuuzi, keewansh noo gawu noone.
ACT 3:16 It bek'iruwonat it dants ashaan kashat b́ kup'iye Iyesus shúútson daatsets imnetiyone, Iyesus shútson bí amantsatse tuutsonowere it únets shinatse s'een wotts jeeno daatsre.
ACT 3:17 «Andoor ti eshuwotso! it woor iti jishiruwotskok'o daron it k'altsok'o danfee
ACT 3:18 Ik'onmó shinshin b́ nebiyi jametswots noonon ‹Krstos gond bek'o daatso bín geyife› ett bíaap'ts aap'o hank'on b́s'eentsi.
ACT 3:19 Eshe it morro itatse b́ t'afitwok'o naandrone err Doonzo maantsan aanoore.
ACT 3:20 Ik'oke it handrit dúro itsh wetuwee, Ik'o shin itsh b́ marat'tso Krstos Iyesusi itsh woshituwe.
ACT 3:21 Bí darotse b́ teshet Ik'o shin bík S'ayin nebiyiwots noonon b́ keewtsok'on dats jamo bí handrefetsoshee.
ACT 3:22 Musewere hank'o etre, ‹Doonzo Izar Izewer taan b́ tuuztsok'on mank'o it eshuwotsitse Nebiyiyo itsh tuuzituwe, bí itsh b́ keewitu jamo k'ewere,
ACT 3:23 Nebiyiman k'ewawu jamo ashotse k'aleyar b́ jamon t'afituwe.›
ACT 3:24 Manats dabt Samu'el dúrtson teshts nebiyi jamwots, dúran jango mank'o keewurne.
ACT 3:25 It nebiyiwotsi naatetuwots itne, mank'o Ik'o Abrahamsh ‹ash jamwots nnaaron deretúne› ett nonihotsnton b́ kindts taaro naatetuwots itne.
ACT 3:26 Mansh Ik'o b́guutso b́ wosh shin shino itshee b́ teshi, man b́ k'aluwere it ik ikon it took gond weeratse aanar it eree iti b́deerishe.»
ACT 4:1 P'et'rosnat Yohansn ash ashosh keewoke bobefere kahniwotsnat Ik'i maa kotfuwotsatsi naashosh aaninuwere Seduk'awiwots bomaants waat
ACT 4:2 Wosheets gitetsúwots Iyesus k'irotse b́ tuwo ash ashosh bodanitsonat k'irtsuwots k'irotse botwitwok'owo kish bokeewutsotse bofayi.
ACT 4:3 Mansh boon dets bodek'iyakon datso ilat b́teshtsotse yaatsish b́ borfetsosh tipimoots boteshetuwk'o bok'ali.
ACT 4:4 Ernmó bokeewuts keewo k'ebts ashuwotsitse ayuwots amanerno, amants ashuwots taawonwere úts kumo maants dambaan b́ t'iini.
ACT 4:5 Yaats guurok'on Ayhudi naashuwotsnat eenashuwotsn, Muse nemo danifwotswere Iyerusalemits kakuwe bowutsi.
ACT 4:6 Kahniwots naasho Hananat K'eyafn, Yohansnat Indriyasn, Kahni maa naashwotsatsi k'aabo jag jamwots fa'ano,
ACT 4:7 Bowere wosheets gitetsuwotsi botaalotse need'idek't, «Han it k'al eegi angoneyamó kon shútsoneya?» ett boon boaati.
ACT 4:8 Manoor P'et'ros S'ayin shayiron s'eent hank'o ett boosh bíaaniy, «It ash ashaatse naashtswotsonat eenashwotso!
ACT 4:9 Noo hambets no aateyirwo ash dúr ikosh k'aleets sheeng keewonat awuk'on b́ kashtsok'oniyee.
ACT 4:10 Ashaan kashat it shinatse b́ need'ir, it it jiire Ik'onmó k'irotse b́ tuuztso Nazrettso Iyesus Krstos shútson b́ wottsok'o it únetsnat Israe'el ash jamo dane.
ACT 4:11 It gimbi agfwots gac'at it juuts shútso bí nee, ernmó bí gimbiman tungúshatse shútswotsi kaatsde detset shúts eeno wotere.
ACT 4:12 Mansha kasho bína bako k'oshon konnor aaliye, noo bín nokashish geyitso Ik'o ashuwotssh b́ imts shútso bíyere okoon dats jamatse konwor aaliye.»
ACT 4:13 P'et'rosnat Yohansn aawshuk'on bokeewtsok'o moosh mooshiyruwots bos'iltsok'on danaawonat daneraw ash bowoto bo dantsotse bo'adi, Iyesusntonwere bo teshtsok'o danbodek'i.
ACT 4:14 Kashts ashonwere bonton b́ned'efere bo bek'tsosh boatsats bokeewituwo bot'ut'i.
ACT 4:15 Mansha moosh mooshifwotsoke úromaants bokeshetwok'o azazat muk'i boteshiyakon hank'o ett boshiyeyi.
ACT 4:16 «Eshe ashaanotsatse eeg k'aluwono? Adits keewi enan bo kishon b́ fiinetsotse Iyerusalemitse beyiru jamwotsoke danere, mansh keewan haalo falatsonee.
ACT 4:17 Ernmó ash jamoke ayefere bíamawok'o hanyahak Iyesus shúútso s'eer konshor bo keewurawok'o ‹it atso korde'ere› erone.»
ACT 4:18 Manihak s'eegdek't Iyesus shúútso s'eer b́ jamon bodanirawok' kup'idek't boon boazazi.
ACT 4:19 P'et'rosnat Yohansnmó hank'o et boosh boaaniyi, «Ik'osh aleyoniyere itsh aleyo Ik'i shinatse wotituwaa? Aab it it tookonor angshwere.
ACT 4:20 Nooyere nobek'tsonat noshishtson keewo fal k'ayatsone.»
ACT 4:21 Ash ashuwotsatsi naashwotsnat moosh mooshifwots P'et'rosnat Yohansn awuk'on bo fayitwok'o weero t'ut't, ashuwots boshattsotse aaniy sheefat faksh bok'ri, man bok'aluwere ashuwots wotts keewumantse tuutso Ik'o bo udtsosha b́tesh.
ACT 4:22 Adits keewann kashts ashman bí idmeyo hab natoniyere bogka b́ tesh.
ACT 4:23 P'et'rosnat Yohansn faksh k'rere bo toohuwotsok boaantsok'on kahniwotsatse naashuwotsnat eenashuwotsn boosh boetts jamo bokeewi.
ACT 4:24 Bowre man boshishtsok'on, ik wotdek't bok'aaro eenshdek't Ik'o maants hank'o ett bokuhi, «Daro, datso, aatsk'aro, boyitse fa'a jamo aztso Doonz eenono!
ACT 4:25 S'ayin shayiron n guutso no nihi Dawit noonon hank'o etaat keewtso neene, ‹Ik' ash woterawwots eegishe bo shashiri? Ashuwots eegishe gond finosh datsmec'ron bo k'úmiri?
ACT 4:26 Datsatsi naashwots matseedekt, Dats k'ezirwots ik wotdek't ko'edek't, Doonzonat b́ Mesihiyo ats bo tuwi.›
ACT 4:27 «Aron Hirodisnat P'ent'os datsatsi asho P'ilat'os Ik' ash woterawwotsnat Israe'el ashuwotsn kitots ko'edek't nfuuttso S'ayin guutso Iyesus ats botuwi,
ACT 4:28 Hank'o b́ wotiye nee shino niangonat ntook shunon n beezts fino s'eetsoshe,
ACT 4:29 Doonzono!, andoor bo sheefirwan s'iile, n guutsuwots bosharaniye aawo shu'ude n aap'o bokewituwok'o woshuwe,
ACT 4:30 N guuts S'ayino Iyesus shútson shodtswots bo kashitwok'onat adits, een een keewwots bo wotitwok'o n kisho jargwe.»
ACT 4:31 Ik' k'ono bo ishiyakon ko'edek't bo beyiruwok man shek'e b́wutsi, jamwotswere shayiri S'ayinon s'een bowutsi, Ik'i aap'onwre ááwu shuk'on keewo dek't botuwi.
ACT 4:32 Amants jamwots ik nibonat ik maac'on detsfno bo tesh, konuworu ash iko, «Haniye tikee» bí eteet keewo deshatse b́ tesh, bo dagotsere jam keewo bo jamets shira b́ teshi,
ACT 4:33 Woshetswotswere Doonzo Iyesus k'irotse tuwi jango angi eenona bogawefo, jametswotsatsno Ik' s'aati eeno fa'e b́tesh.
ACT 4:34 Datso wee moowo detsts jamwotswere kem dek't b́ gizman dek't boweyiruwotse boyitse konworu t'ut'tso aali b́ tesh.
ACT 4:35 Gizmano dek'wat woshetswotssh im bok'refoni. Bo ik iketssh boosh b́ geyitsok'owa kay bodek'foni.
ACT 4:36 K'op'rsn shuwetso, Yosefi eteetso Lewawi iko fa'e b́ teshi, wosheetswotsu «Barnabasi» ett bo s'eegfoni, b́ bitsonuwere «Kup'shit na'a» etee.
ACT 4:37 Bíwere b́ datso kemt b́ gizo dek'wat woshetswotssh b́ imi.
ACT 5:1 Hnaniyi eteef asho b́ máátsu Sep'iri eteetsunton datso bokemi,
ACT 5:2 B́ máátsunu b́ danfere dats kemeets gizotse k'atso oorik'rat k'atsonmó dek' waat woshetswotssh imb́k'ri,
ACT 5:3 P'et'rosmó bísh hank'owa bí'et, «Hee Ananaiyo! S'ayin shayirats korr datso kemeets gizotse nooridek'etwok'o n nibots Shed'ano eegishe b́ kindi?
ACT 5:4 N kemftsere shino datsman nikoshna b́ teshi? N kemiyakonor gizo nikoshna b́ teshi? Eshe, keewan eegoshe n nibots n gawi? N kootiye Ik'atsa bako ashaatsaliyee.»
ACT 5:5 Hananiyi b́ keewts keewuman b́ shishtsok'on diht b́ k'iri, keewuman shishts ash jamo ayidek't shatbowtsi.
ACT 5:6 Jawetswotsu b́ duuno k'oddek't dek'amt duukbok'ri.
ACT 5:7 Keez sa'atonire okoon Hananiyi máátsu b kenihats bodts keewo b danawo waa bkeshi.
ACT 5:8 P'et'rosuwere «Aab taash keewwe it datso it keemts k'awuntso hank'one?» bish bíet. Biwere «Ee! Mank'o gizoshe?» bi'et.
ACT 5:9 Manoor P'et'ros, «Ik'i Shayiri S'ayino fadosh aawuk'oneya ik it woti? Hamb! nkenihi duukt aaniru ashuwots fengeshatsnee, Nenowere de'amr duuketunee» bí et.
