ACT 5:10 Biwere manoor b́ tufishroots dihat k'irbwutsi, Jawetswotswere bokindtsok'on k'irgutsat b befere daatst dek'amt b kenih ganok duukbok'ri.
ACT 5:11 Ik' mootsi ash ash jamona et keewan shishtsuwots ayidek shato wotb́wtsi.
ACT 5:12 Adits keewu ayuwotsnat milikituwotsn wosh etsúwots kishona bofinefo b́tesh, jametsuwotswere ik nibon wotde'er Selemon dada etefokna bokakuwefoni.
ACT 5:13 Bonton woterawo ikonuwor dab bonton wotosh ááwu shuuk'fo aali b́ tesh, b́ woteferor ash jamo boon mangya bo mangifoni.
ACT 5:14 Doonzono! amaniru máátsonat nungushwots botaawo ayidek't ayefera bíamfoni.
ACT 5:15 Ash ashuwots shodets ayuwotsi weromantsana kishde'er es'onat she'ats bok'eezfoni, mank'o bok'alirwere P'et'ros man weeron b́beshoor b́ s'ilalo dab́ ik iketsuwotsats b́bodishee.
ACT 5:16 Ash asho Iyerusalem gúúratse fa'a kitwotsitse shoodetsonat kim shayiron gondo bek'irwotsi de'erni bowaafo, jametswotswere kasha bokashefo.
ACT 5:17 Kahni naashwotsatsi k'aabonat bínton teshts Seduk'awino eteefuwots jirwots bojamets okooron s'eent boatsats botuwi,
ACT 5:18 Woshetswotsi detsdek't tipimoots kindsh bok'ri.
ACT 5:19 Melakiwotsmó t'ú tipi maa fengesho k'eshdek't boon kishbok'ri,
ACT 5:20 «Ameree! Ik'i mootse need'de'er kashi keewo detsts keewan ash jamosh keewwere!» boosh bíeti,
ACT 5:21 Woshetswotswere b́ tzaziyo dek't guuron Ik'i moowots kindek't daniyo dek't botuwi. Manoor Kahani naashwotsatsi k'aabonat bínton beyirwots wáát mooshiru jirwotsnat Ayhudi eenashts jamwots ikok ko'ebowutsi, ashuwots woshetsauwotsi de'er bowetuwok'o tipi moowo maantsan bowoshi.
ACT 5:22 Woshetswotswere tipi moo maantsan wáát woshtsuwotsi bítse daatsratsno, aanat waatnuwere,
ACT 5:23 «Tipi maa fengsho kup'shdek't is'etsok'on, kotiruwotsuwere b́ fengshatse need'dek't bokotfere nodaatsi, tipi maa is'o nok'sheoromó eegoru bítse datsatsone» ett bokeewi.
ACT 5:24 Ik'i moo kotirwotsi jishruwonat Kahanati naashuwots n han boshishor «Eebi keewan naaroni?» ett daand bowutsi.
ACT 5:25 Manoor ash iko wáát «Tipi moots it gedts ashuwots hamb́, Ik'i mootse need'dek'tniye ashuwotsi bodaniri» ett boosh b́ keewi.
ACT 5:26 Manoor Ik'i maa kotiruwotsi jishiruwonat bínton beyiru ashuwotsnton amt boon dek't boweyi, bodoowuwere angnon b́woteraniye dashdek'tniye, han bok'aliye ashuwots boon shútson bojod'awok'o shatniye.
ACT 5:27 Woshetswotsno dek'wat mooshiyruwots shinat bot'intsi, kahani naashonuwere hank'o ett boon bí aati,
ACT 5:28 «Iyesus shútso s'eer it danirawok'o itn kup'shdek'at azazerone b́teshi, ernmó hamb, Iyerusalemi it daniruwon s'entsk'rerte, itmo ash man k'irotse no aatetuwok'o woshoshe itgeyri.»
ACT 5:29 P'et'rosnat woheets k'oshuwotsn hank'o et boaaniyi, «Ashosh aleyoniyere Ik'osh aleyo noosh geyife,
ACT 5:30 No nihotsko Izar Izewer it mitats jittdek'at it úd'tso Iyesusi k'irotse tuuz b́k'ri,
ACT 5:31 Ik'o Israe'el ash ashosh naandre etonat bomorrosh oorowe eto b́ imetuwok'o Iyesusi jishiruwonat woritson woshdek't b́ k'ani aaromants mangon b́ beetuewk'o woshre,
ACT 5:32 Keewu man jangosh noo gawunone, Ik'o bísh aleets jamwotssh b́ imts S'ayin shayiro gawe.»
ACT 5:33 Moosh mooshiyruwots man bo shishtsok'on ayidek't fayat woshetswotsi úd'o bogeyi.
ACT 5:34 Ernmó ash ashoke mangiyetsonat Muse nemo danik wottso Gemaliyali eteets ferisawi wotat moosh mooshif iko tuut woshetswotsi múk' gizewosh úromaantsan bo kishituwok'o boon bíazazi.
ACT 5:35 Manoor mooshiru jirwotssh hank'owa bíet, «Israe'el ashuwotso! Ashaanotsats it k'aliru keewosh it atso korde'ere.
ACT 5:36 Haniye shin Tewodasi eteets asho ‹Taahe ash een taane› ett tuure b́ teshi, awd balok'o ashonwere bínton ik woterne bo teshi, ernmó bín úd'niyek'reyi, b́ shuutso shairwotsuwere bad' bowutsi, bí'ettsonuwere shiro boraniyere b́ oori.
ACT 5:37 Maniyere hakon ash ashuwotsi taawets dúron Geliltso Yhud tuwut ay ashuwots b́shuutso bosha'itwok'o b́ woshi, bínowere úd'eyi, b́ shuuts sha'irwotswere bad'e bobad'i
ACT 5:38 Mansh and taa itsh tietirwo it ashaanotsoke wokar boon k'ay it k'rituwok'owe, asaabiyan wee finan ashoke waaka wotiyal t'afitkee.
ACT 5:39 Ik'oke waaka wotiyalmó boon t'afiyosh falratste, Ikinuwor Ik'onton fayeye itsh wotitwe.» Bowere Gemalyal iztso bodek'i.
ACT 5:40 Maniyak woshetswotsi bo maants s'eegdek't bojot'iyi, Iyesus shútsonowere s'eer bokeewrawok'o azazat faksh bok'ri.
ACT 5:41 Woshetswotsmó Iyesus shútsi jangosh keteyo boosh b́geyitwok'o bodantsotse gene'úwefetst mooshi jeboke kesht boami,
ACT 5:42 Aawu aawon Ik'i moonat maa mootsnowere Mesihiyo Iyesus jango daniyonat doo shishi keewo ned'iratsno boteshi.
ACT 6:1 Múk'i boteshtsok'on, amantsuwots taawo ayefere bí amee Grik dats noon keewo keewiru ayhudiwots Yhud datsatse shuwets ayhudiwotsats mumundo dek't botuwi, bomumundiruwere aaw aawon bokenih k'irts maatsuwotssh kayiyeyiruwo batk'o bobatefosha b́ tesh.
ACT 6:2 Mansh tatse git wosheetsots amants jametsuwotsi kakuk'raat boosh hank'o boet, «Mish kayiyosha err Ik'o aap' daniyifino k'azo noosh geyiratse.
ACT 6:3 Eshe eshuwotso! bosheeng doyon udetswotsi, S'ayin shayironat danon s'eents shawat ashuwotsi ititse geyore, bonowere finanats naashiwonee.
ACT 6:4 Noomó Ik'o k'ononat Ik'o aap'o daniwosh kup'ituwonee.»
ACT 6:5 Bo ettsan jamwotsi b́ geneúshi, ashaanotsnowere galbodek'i, boowere imnetiyonat S'ayin shayiron s'eentso Ist'ifanosi, Filip'osi, P'rokorosi, Nik'arona, Timona, P'ermena Ayhudi imnetiyo dek't teshtso Ans'okiyi datsatstso Nik'olawosiye.
ACT 6:6 Hanotsi wosheetsots shinats need'i bok'ri, woshetswotsuere Ik'o bok'oniyakon bo kishonowere boats bogedi.
ACT 6:7 Hank'on Ik' aap'o gawunfere bíamtsotse, Iyerusalemitsi amantsuwots taawo ayidek't ayefere bíamtsotse Kahanatiwotsitsnowere ay wottswots bo amani.
ACT 6:8 Ist'ifanos Ik' s'aatonat angon s'eent adits keewuwotsnat een een milikituwotsi ash ashuwots dagotse b́ k'aliri b́ teshi,
ACT 6:9 Manoor, «Nas' kishitu ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni maa» eteets ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni moowotse ashuwots K'erennat Iskndriyas ashuwots, Kilk'iyanat Isiyi datsatatse ik ik ashuwots tuut Ist'ifanosi k'efoon bo mooshfere boteshi.
ACT 6:10 Ernmó Ist'ifanos bín b́ keewiru dani telefo S'ayin shayiro bísh b́ imk b́wotsotse bísh aaniyo falratsno botesh.
ACT 6:11 Manoor ashaan, «Muse nat Ik'ats c'ashi aap'o b́ keewfere shishrone» eteet ashuwotsi degon bí ats tuuz bok'ri.
ACT 6:12 Mank'oon ash ashonat eenashuwotsn Muse nemo danifuwotsnowere bíyatsats tuuz bok'ri, Ist'ifanosokowere amt detsdek't moosh mooshiyiruwots shinats bín t'intsbok'ri.
ACT 6:13 Bíyats kooton gaawit ash ik ikuwotsnowere dek'tboweyi, kooton gawituwotswere hank'o boeti, «Ashaan Ik'i mannat Muse nemo jamawa b́ c'ashfo.
ACT 6:14 Aaninuwere ‹Nazrettso Iyesus Ik'i man gaketuwe, Muse noosh b́ beshits teronowere woniyituwe› ett b́ keewufere shishrone.»
ACT 6:15 Manoor mooshi jebatse fa'a jamwots Ist'ifanosi t'iwintsdek't bos'ile b́ shiitso melaki shitsok'o araat boosh b́ be'eyi.
ACT 7:1 Kahniwotsatsi naasho Ist'fanossh, «Eteets keewan arikeya?» eton bíaati.
ACT 7:2 Ist'fanosuwere hank'o ett bísh bíaniyi, «Ti eeshuwotsnat tnihotso! aab taan k'ewere! Nonih Abraham Karan datsatse beyosh bíamfetsre shino shin Mesp'et'omiya eteets datsatse b́ befere Mangts Ik'o bísh be'eyat
ACT 7:3 ‹N datsatse keer, n jagatse k'alyarr, taa neesh t kitsit datsats amee› bí eti.
ACT 7:4 Manoor Keledawiyots datsatse kesht Karani eteets datsats be b́wtsi, b́ nih b́k'irihakonowere Ik'o Karanitse kisht hambets it beyiru datsanats bín dek'et b́weyi.
ACT 7:5 Wotowabako dab tufi need'okok'o bodts rstiyo bísh imatse, b́wotefere datsani bínat bíyere il b́ naarosh rstiyo woshde'er b́imetuwok'o taarre b́teshi, bísh b́taaruwere Abraham na'o b́ detsfetsere shine.
ACT 7:6 B́ naaronuwere ash datsatse gooshtsi wotar b́beetuwok'o datsmanatsnowere awd bal natosh guuts woshde'er was'o kayde'er boon bokewituwok'o bísh keewure b́ teshi.
ACT 7:7 Manats dabtnwere, ‹Guuts woshde'er b́ keewit ashuwotsats angshitwe, datsmanatse keer hanoke taan ik'itúne› ett Ik'o keewre.
ACT 7:8 Gof ami taaronowere bísh bími, mansha Abraham Yishak'i b́shuwor shimtl aawots gofo b́daamiyi, Mank'o b́ naayi Yisak'i gofo b́daamiyi. Yak'obuwere b́ jir tatse gitetsuwotsi gofo b́damyi.
ACT 7:9 «Yak'ob nanaúwots bo eshuwi Yosefi okoort Gbs' datsatsere guutso b́ wotituwok'o bokemi, Ik'onmó bíntoniye b́ teshi,
ACT 7:10 Gond bek' jamotse bín b́ kishi, Gbs' naasho Fer'on shinatsere baatsonat danitelefo bísh bi'imi. Naashonuwere Gbs'nat b́ maa jamatse alituwo bín b́woshi.
ACT 7:11 Manór Gbs'nat Kene'an dats jamatse ayidek't ash kic'its k'ak'i eeno b́ woti, no nihuwotsuwere misho daatsosh falatsne.
ACT 7:12 Ya'ak'obwere Gbs'itse mááyo b́ beyok'owo b́ shishtsok'on tuwreerosh nonihotsi manok b́ woshi.
ACT 7:13 Aani gitlo aanat Gbs'i bo amor Yosef b́ eshuotsesh b́ tooko b́ daneyi, jag bowotonúwere Fere'onokere b́ daneyi.
ACT 7:14 Maniye hakon Yosef b́ nihi, Yak'obnat b́ jag jamo b́mandan dek't b́weyi, bo bojametsuwre shabe úts ashno.
ACT 7:15 Mansh Yak'ob Gbs' maantsan bí ami, bínat no nihwotsn manoke bok'iri.
ACT 7:16 Bomak'tsonowere Sekem maantsan dek'amt Abraham Sekemn Emor nan'úwotsoke b́ gizon b́keewts doowots dukeyi.
ACT 7:17 Ik'o Abrahamsh taart b́ jangitso wotit aawo b́ t'inor Gbs'n beyiru ashuwots taawo ayefere bí ami.
ACT 7:18 Man b́ wotwere Yosefi danawo k'osh Nugúso Gbs'n b́ naashefetsoniye.
ACT 7:19 Handr naash manuwere no ashuwotsats gondo k'úmt no nihwotsats kic'iyo dek't bo tuwi, bo nana'i marmat'uwotsno bok'irituwok'o úratse kishde'er bo juwituwok'o, no nihuwotsi bokic'iyi.
ACT 7:20 Manór Muse b́ shuweyi, bíwere Ik'i shinatse na'i az sheenge b́teshi, keez shashonowre b́nihi meyitse b́ eeni,
ACT 7:21 Uratso juu k'irewor Fereon mááts naú k'audekat b́ naayik'o woshdek'at b ditsi.
ACT 7:22 Musewwere Gbs' datsi dani teleef jamo danb́dek'i, b́ keewiru keewonat b́ finonowere kup' wotb́wtsi.
ACT 7:23 «Muse hab nato b́ s'eentsok'on bí eshuwotsi Israe'el nana'úwotsi s'iilo b́ tuwi.
ACT 7:24 Bí eshuwotsitse ikonuwere Gbs' dats ash ikon t'uk'eyat was'o b́kashefere bek't bísh b́ gatsi, t'uk'eetsmanshowere weero weersht Gbs' dats asho togdek't b́úd'i.
ACT 7:25 Ik'o b́ weeron boon b́ fakshiyituwok'o b́ jaguwots t'iwints bodek'etuwok'owa bísh araatni b́ tesh, bomó t'iwintsratsno.
ACT 7:26 Yaats guurok'onowere Israe'el ash gitetsuwots bo atsatseyo bo fayefere daatsdek't bonbaziyo geeyat ‹It ashuwtso! itwo eshu itnere, eegishe itfayeyiri?› bíet.
ACT 7:27 B́ tooho togiru ashman Museyi okaan gifnit ‹Neenmó noon alituwonat noatse angshituwo kone nee wosh?
ACT 7:28 Oots Gbs' dats asho núd'tsok'o taanowere úd'osh geefiya?› bíet.
ACT 7:29 Muse man b́shishtsok'on Gbs'itse kesht Midiyam datsomants amt gooshtsi wotat b́beeyi, Manoke nungush nana'a gituwotsi b́shuwi.
ACT 7:30 «Muse datsmanatse hab nato b́beshiyakon Debre Sin woruwotse aat'iru t'ugi atatsi tawi laluwotse melaki iko b́be'eyi.
ACT 7:31 Muse man b́bek'tsok'on bíadi, karndek't b́s'iilorowere hank'o etiru Doonzo k'aro b́shishi,
ACT 7:32 ‹Taahe nnihotsko Izar Izewer taane, Abarhamko Izar Izewer, Yisahak'ko Izar Izewer, Yak'obko Izar Izewer taane,› Muse were shatoon k'ewub́wutsi, s'iloshowere aawo shu'atse.
ACT 7:33 Doonzonuwere hank'o b́ eti, ‹N ned'iruwok man S'ayin datso b́ wottsotse n tufitsi c'aamo kishuwe,
ACT 7:34 Gbs'itse fa'a ti ashuwots weralo gond bo bek'iruwok'o bek're, kic'at bo kuhirwono shishre, mansh boon kashiyosh oot're, andoor wowe! taa neen Gbs'its woshona.›
ACT 7:35 «Israe'el ashuwotsu Musesh ‹Neen noats altsonat angshituwon woshtso kone?› Eton bín k'efatni botesh, wotowa boko t'ugi atatse bísh be'ets melakiyo jangon alituwonat nas' kishituwon woshdek't bomandan bín b́ woshi.
ACT 7:36 Gbs'nat Aats k'ar birokere aditsonat milikito finat bí ashuwotsi kish dek't hab natosh dats woruwtse jishtso Museyiye b́ teshi.
ACT 7:37 ‹Doonzo Izar Izewer taan b́ tiztsok'o mank'o it eshuwotsitse nebiyiyo itsh tuuzitwe› ett Isra'el ashuwots keewutso Museyiye b́teshi.
ACT 7:38 Woruwotse kakuwedek't teshts ashuwotsntonat Sin guri abaatse keewuts Ik'i melakiyonton animank'o no nihotsnton teshtso bíne. Ik'o keewuts kash imetu aap'o noosh beshitsonuwere un bíne Museyiye.
ACT 7:39 «No nihots bína bok'efibako bísh aleratsnee, Bonibotsnowere Gbs' maants aano bo gawi.
ACT 7:40 Aronshowere ‹Noon Gbs'itse kishts Muse han eeg bíyats bodtsok'o no danawotse noshin shinatse sha'arr noon jishituwo Izar izewerotsi noosh doozwe› bo eti.
ACT 7:41 Manór manz aron dozets Ik'o doozdek't bísh wosho bo t'intsi, bokishi finonowere bogenee'úwi.
ACT 7:42 Ik'onmó boatse k'aleniye b́wutsi. Daritsi k'eenwotssh bo ik'ituwok'o boon beshidek't bími. Manwere Nebiywotsn hank'o ett guut'etsok'one, ‹It Israe'el ashuwotso! Shúkeets gizonat woshon Hab nati s'eenosh woruwotse it t'ints tasheya?
ACT 7:43 Dek'at it amtso Molok gofonat Refani eteef k'enon it arits it ik'oniye b́ teshi, Bowere it kishon findek'at, It boosh it boosh sagadat it teshts ik'irwotsiye, Taawere Babloniye ok it gishetuwok'o woshituwe.›
ACT 7:44 «No nihots woruwotse gawi gofu detsfne b́ teshi, gofmanuwere Ik'o b́ keewutsok'onat b́ kitstsok'o bin fintso Museyiye b́ teshi.
ACT 7:45 Ik'o boshinatse b́ gishts Ik' ash Woteraw ashuwots datso bo nator no nihots bodek'ts gofani Iyasunton manok bo kindshi, Dawit dúro b́ borfetsosh manoke b beyi.
ACT 7:46 Dawituwere Ik' shinatse baatso daatst Yak'ob Ik'o Izar Izewersh k'ewok wotit moo agosh Ik'o b́ k'oni.
ACT 7:47 Ernmó Ik'í maa agtso Solomoniye.
ACT 7:48 «B́woteferor jam falts Ik'onmó ash kishon ageets moots beerake, manwere Nebiyon hank'o ett guut'etsoniye,
ACT 7:49 ‹Daro t be jooroniye, Datsonuwere t tufi ned'oke, Eshe ááwu naari mee taash it agetuwoni?› ‹Bíyok t kashituwokonu awuk'one?› Etfe Doonzoni.
ACT 7:50 ‹Jaman taa t kishon t finkoshna?› Bíeti Ik'oni.
ACT 7:51 «It wed'etswotso it nibo is'etswotso! it k'el kúp'uwotso! it nihuwotskok'o jam aawo S'ayin shayiro it k'efiri.
ACT 7:52 Nebíyiwotsitse it nihots bo gisherawo kone fa'oni? boowere kááw finetsman b́ weetuwok'o shin keewutswotsi boúd'i, It were and kááwu finetsan beshidek' imaat it úd'i.
ACT 7:53 It Ik'i melakiwots weeron Muse nemo dek'at it teshi, ernmó kotde'atste.»
ACT 7:54 Mooshiru jirwots han boshishtsok'on nibo k'únbowutsi, Ist'ifanosi fayat bí'ats gasho bo shas'i.
ACT 7:55 Ist'ifanosmó S'ayin shayiron s'eent daro maantsan kawudek't s'iilt, Ik'i mango darotse b́bek'i, Iyesus noowere Ik' k'ani aaromadan b́ need'efere b́ bek'i,
ACT 7:56 Eshe «Hambe, daro k'eshe b́ gwutsere ash na'o Ik'i k'ani aaro maantsan b́ need'efere t bek'iri» bí eti.
ACT 7:57 Manoor bo k'aari eenon bo kuhi, bo waazono is'dekt ik wotdek't b́ maantsan bowos'i.
ACT 7:58 Kitotsno kishdek't shútson bo jot'i, gawuwotsuwre bo shemo dek'amt Sa'oli eteets jawets iko b́ kotetwok'o b́ tufi shirots ged bok'ri.
ACT 7:59 Shútson bín bo jot'fere, Ist'ifanos, «Doonzo Iyesuso! t kashu k'aaú de'e!» ett b́ k'oni.
ACT 7:60 Tuk'umaldek't, «Doonzono! bo morran boats taawk'aye!» ett k'aari eenon kuhat man ettnuwere k'ir b́wutsi.
ACT 8:1 Sawoluwe Ist'ifanosi úd'ewor bontoen ik wotatni b́ teshi, Ist'ifanos b́ k'irts aawots Iyerusalemn fa'a Ik' k'oni moowu ats gisheyewo tuu b́wutsi, woshetswotsiyere okoon amants jamwots Yhudnat Semariy awurajo maantsan bad' bowutsi.
ACT 8:2 Ik ik shayirets ashuwots Ist'fanosi boduki, káári eenono kuhat bísh bo eepi.
ACT 8:3 Sawolmó Ik'i moo t'afiyosh kaarefetstni b́teshi, mootsere moots kindt nungushuwotsnat mááts amantsuwotsn geetsdek' waat tipi moots b́ kindishiri.
ACT 8:4 Bad'wutsts amantsuwotsuwere bo amts jamoke Ik'i aap'o bodanifo.
ACT 8:5 Filp'osuwere Semariy kito maantsan amt ashuwotssh Mesihiyo jango b́ dani.
ACT 8:6 Ashuwotswere Filip'os keewuts keewo bo shishor b́ finiru adits keewuwotsi bo bek'tsok'on ik nibon t'iwintsdek'tni bo k'ebiri.
ACT 8:7 Kim Shayirotsuwere k'áári eenon kuhat ay ashuwotsitse bo keshfo, durwotsnat shoklirwotsn kasha bo kashefo.
ACT 8:8 Mansh kit manitse een gene'o b́ woti.
ACT 8:9 Kit manitse Sm'oni eteets ash iko fa'e b́ teshi, ashman kitotse b́ danon finat Semari ashuwotsi aditniye b́ teshi, «Taa een ash taane!» ettni b́ keewfo.
ACT 8:10 Ash jamo múk'onu eenonu «Ashaan ashi eene ett b́ s'egeyir Ik'i angone!» ett t'iwintsdk't bo k'ebfoni.
ACT 8:11 T'iwintsdek't bo k'ebiruwere ay aawosh danon ashuwotsi adit b́ teshtsotsne.
ACT 8:12 Ernmó Flip'os Ik'i mengisti jagonat Iyesus Krstos shútson b́ keewuts doo shishi keewo bo shishor nungushwotswere máátsuwotsuwere amanat bo gupeyi.
ACT 8:13 Smonuworu b́ oreraniyere amanat b́ gupere Filp'osntonu ik wotb́wtsi, b́ finiru adits keewwotsnat milikituwotsn bek't bíadfera b́ teshi.
ACT 8:14 Iyerusalemitse fa'a wosheetsots Semari ashuwots Ik'i aap'o bodek'tsok'o boshishtsok'on P'et'rosnat Yohanisn Semari datso maantsan bo woshi.
ACT 8:15 Semari ashuwots S'ayin shayiro bo daatsituwok'o P'et'rosnat Yohanisn amt boosh Ik'o bok'oni.
ACT 8:16 Semari ashuwots Doonzo Iyesus shútson bo gupeyi bako S'ayin shayiro konatsoru od'atse b́ teshi.
ACT 8:17 Mansh P'et'rosnat Yohansn bo kisho boats bo gedor ashuwots S'ayin shayiro bo dek'i.
ACT 8:18 Wosheetswotsu boats kisho bogedor S'ayin shayiro ashuwotssh b́ imestsok'o Simon b́ bek'tsok'on gizo dek'wat,
ACT 8:19 «Taa t kisho boats tgere ashuwots S'ayin shayiro bodek'etuwok'o alan taash imere» bí eti.
ACT 8:20 P'et'rosmó hank'o bíeti, «Ik'i imo gizon daatsosh n gawutsotse n gizo neenton t'afuwe!
ACT 8:21 N nibo Ik'i shinatse kááwu woto b́ k'aztsotse nee keewanitse kayo wee bano deshatsne.
ACT 8:22 Eshe n gond finansh shiyanar naandre eree, daneraka n nibitsi gond finan orowa eteetwe wotiyal aab Ik'o k'onuwe.
ACT 8:23 Neehe s'aam okooron ns'eentsok'onat morron tipek n wotok'o taa bek'iruwe.»
ACT 8:24 Sm'onuwere «It keewutsanitsere ik jago ti ats b́ borawok'o it it tookon taash Ik'o k'onuwere» bí eti.
ACT 8:25 P'et'rosnat Yohanisn bo gawiyakonat Doonzo aap'onwere bo keewiyakon Semari gal aywotsitse doo shishiyo nabfere Iyerusalem maantsan bo'ani.
ACT 8:26 Doonzo melakiyo Filip'ossh, «Tuur Iyerusalemiyere Gááz maants damiru weeron Muur maantsan amee» bí eti, weer manuwere woruwi weere b́ teshi.
ACT 8:27 Bíwere tuut bíami, manno, Itiyop'iyi dats naash iko Ik'o k'onosh Iyerusalem maants amt b́ tesh, ashaan Hndeki eteets Itiyop'iyi Nugúsúsh b dets jamatse bish fintsonat b gizatse altsoniye b́teshi,
ACT 8:28 Bí b́ datsomants bíaanefere seregelats bedek't nebiyiyo Isayas mas'afoni b́ nababefe b́tesh.
ACT 8:29 Manóóri sa'aton S'ayin shayiro Filip'osi «Seregel manok t'iinr bínton gonkeewe» bíet.
ACT 8:30 Mansh Filip'os bíyok wos'fere amt Itop'iyi dats ashman nebiyiyo Isayas mas'fo b́ nababefere shisht «N nababiruwo b́ biitso neesh galiruwa?» bí et.
ACT 8:31 Itiyop'iyi dats ashonwere «Taash biishde'er keewituwo aalo taash aawuk'oneya gaalo b́ faliti?» bíet.
ACT 8:32 Bí b́ nababiru mas'aafi beyokonuwere hani b́ tesh, «Bí shukosh jokeyiru mererok'oyiye b́ teshi, Mererna'o b́s'iro k'ut'ewor s'ik bí etfok'o, Bíwere keewosh b́nono aawu'atse.
ACT 8:33 Bíhe keteree, kááwu angshonowere bísh imeratse, B́ kashu datsatse k'aaúbazetsotse B́ s'ooti jango kone fal keewiti?»
ACT 8:34 Naashmanuwere Filip'ossh, «Nebiyiyo han b́keewu kon jangoshe? B́ took jangoshemo wee k'oshi jange? Oona neesha aab taash keewwe» bí eti.
ACT 8:35 Filip'oswere S'ayin mas'afanatse tuut Iyesus jangosh dooshishiyo b́ nabi.
ACT 8:36 Boamferowere aats beyok bobodi, naashmanuwere «Hamb, hanoke aatso fa'ee, tguperawok'o taan bazitu keewo eebi?» bí eti.
ACT 8:37 Filip'oswere «N nibi s'eenon ni'amaniyal gupewo falfne» bí eti. Naashmanwere «Iyesus Krstos Ik'o naayi b́ wottsok'o amaniruwe» b́ eti.
ACT 8:38 Naashmanuwere seregelo b́ ned'iyetuwok'o bíazazi, Bogitetswere aatso maantsan oot't amt bo eree Filip'os Naasho b́ gupi.
ACT 8:39 Aatsotse bokeshiyakon Doonzoko S'ayin shayiro Filip'osi k'aaúbdek'i, janderbonuwere aani gitlo be'atse, b́woteferor geneúwefets b́weero sha'o dek't b́tuwi.
ACT 8:40 Filip'osmó Azat'ositsne b́ daatseyi, K'isariyi maantsowere b́ wafetsosh kit kitotse sha'at dooshishiyo b́ nabfoni b́teshi.
ACT 9:1 Manoor Sawuol doonzo danifuwotsi úd'osh naakefere kahaniyots naashok bíami.
ACT 9:2 Doonzo weerindion shairu ashuwotsi nungushwotsno máátsuwotsno b́ daatsor tifde Iyerusalem maants de'er woo bín faliyit debdabeyo guud'de Demask'oyitsi ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni moowwots sh bísh imetwok'o kahini naash naasho bí aati.
ACT 9:3 Amfetst Demask'o maants b́ t'intsok'on b́ gúúratse gawerawon darotse shááno gol b́wutsi.
ACT 9:4 Manoor datsats dihb́wutsi, «Sa'olo! Sa'olo! eegishe taan ngishiri?» etiru k'aaro b́shishi.
ACT 9:5 Sa'oluwere «Doonzono! kone nee?» bí eti, bíwere «Taahe nee ngishiruwo Iyesus taane, bín kosheef birro n k'efiyale neeshe iki b́gonditi,
ACT 9:6 Eshe, and tuur kitots kiduwee, bíyoke k'alo neesh geyituwonowere manoke neesh keewetuwe» bí eti.
ACT 9:7 Sa'olnton amfetst teshts ashuwots k'aaro shishfetst konnor bobe'awotse bo keewituwo t'ut't s'ik ett need'bowutsi.
ACT 9:8 Sa'oluwere b́ dihtsoke b́ tuwi, bí aawwotsi b́ k'eshormó bek'o falratse, mansh ashaashwots b́ kisho dets dek't jishfere Demask'o maants dek't boam.
ACT 9:9 Keez aawu s'eenosh eegor bek'o b́ falrawo, b́ marawo, b́ úyawo b́tesh.
ACT 9:10 Manoor Demask'on Hananiyi eteefo Iyesus danif iko fa'e b́tesh, doonzo bek'on «Hananiyo!» ett b́s'eegi bíwere «Hamb taane, doonzono!» bí et.
ACT 9:11 Doonzonu hank'o bíeti, «Tuur kááwi eteyiru werindu maants amee, manokno Yhud mootse Sa'oli eteetso T'erses asho gewowe, bíwere and Ik' k'onoke b́ fa'oni.»
ACT 9:12 Sa'oluwere bí ááwuwots aani bek'o bofalituwok'o Hanani eteets asho bíyok kindt b́ kisho bíyats b́ gedfere bek'on b́ bek'i.
ACT 9:13 Hananiyuwere hank'o ett bíaani, «Doonzono! ashaan Iyerusalemitse beyiru amantsuwotsats ay gond keewo b́fintsok'o ayuwotsoke shishre.
ACT 9:14 Manoknowere n shúts s'eegiru jamwotsi tiposh kahni naashuwotsoke alo dek're.»
ACT 9:15 Doonzonuwere Hananiysh hank'owa bíet, «Bí t shútso Ik' danawu ashuwots shinatse, naashuwots shinatsnat Isra'el ashuwotssh danituwoniye, bí t k'ac'i sheengo b́ wottsotse bíyok amee,
ACT 9:16 T jangosh awuk'o gondbek'o b́dek'etuwok'owo kitsituwe bísha.»
ACT 9:17 Mann Ananiyi maa man maants amt b́ beyiru mootsowere b́ kindi, b́ kishonowere Sa'olaats geddek't, «Ti eshu Sa'olo! hanmand n wafere weratse ni ats be'etso Doonzo Iyesus aani bek'o n falituwok'onat S'ayin shayiron n s'enetuwok'o niyok taan woshere» bí eti.
ACT 9:18 Manorowere k'ok'r arts keewo bí ááwatse fed'at bí eree bek'o b́fali, tuutnwere b́gupeyi.
ACT 9:19 Meetwo b́ meeyihakon kup'b́wutsi, Demask'on teshts Iyesus danifuwotsnton muk' aawwotssh manoke b́ teshi.
ACT 9:20 Manorowere Sa'ol Demask'on «Iyesus Ik'o naayiye» etfere ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse daniyo b́ tuwi.
ACT 9:21 Shishts jamwotswere, «Ashaan Iyerusalemitse shútsan s'eegiru jamwotsi t'afifoniyosha? Hanok b́wowuwere boon tifde'er kahni naashuwotsok de'er amooshoshna?» ett bo'adi.
ACT 9:22 Sa'olmó iki kup'efere bí ami, Iyesus mesihiyo b́wottsok'o keewut Demask'oyitse beyat teshts Ayhudiwots noono bo keewituwo b́t'ut'ifoni b́ tesh.
ACT 9:23 Ay aawoniyere il ayhudiwots Sa'oli úd'osh boshiyeyi,
ACT 9:24 Bímo gondon bíats bo shiyetsman danb́k'iri, boowere bín úd'osh t'uwe aawo b́ keshf fengshuwotsi bo kotfoni.
ACT 9:25 Ernmó t'úwon b́ danifuwots Sa'oli oshots geddek't gimbiyi múlotse maskotiyon oorsh bo k'ri.
ACT 9:26 Sa'ol Iyerusalem maants bíamor manoke fa'a Iyesus danifuwotsnton eeho b́geyi, bomó bí Krstosi bí amantsok'o arik boosh arewo b́ k'aztsotse bojamets bín boshati.
ACT 9:27 Bernabasmó Sa'oli woshetswotsok b́ t'intsre weeratse b́befere doonzo bísh b́ be'etsok'onat bín noono b́ keewitsok'o, Iyesus Shútsonowere Demask'on ááwu shuuk'on b́ danitsok'o boosh b́ keewi.
ACT 9:28 Mansh Sa'ol bonton wotdek't Iyerusalemitse bíananefo. Doonzo shútsonowere ááwu shuk'on b́ danifoni.
ACT 9:29 Grik dats ash noonon keewuf ayhudiwotsnton keewefetstni b́ mooshfo, bomó bín úd'osh k'anwutskno botesh.
ACT 9:30 Eshuwots man dan bok'rtsok'on K'isariy maants k'az dek'boami, manoknowere Terses maants k'aybíametuwok'o bowoshi.
ACT 9:31 Yhuditse, Gelilitsnat Semaritse fa'a jam Ik'i moowu jeeno datsrane, kúp'onowere kup'eraniye, Doonzono! mangiyifetsat S'ayin shayirowere kup'efetsat taawon eenranee.
ACT 9:32 P'et'ros dats datsatse gúúroke b́ befere Ldiyn beyiru amantsuwotsok bíami.
ACT 9:33 Manoknowere shmt nati s'eenosh es'atse k'eets Eniyi eteef duro daats b́de'k'i.
ACT 9:34 P'et'rosuwere «Eniyo! Iyesus Krstos neen kashituwe, tuur níees'o ec'ee!» bí eti. Bíwere manoor k'az b́tuwi.
ACT 9:35 Ldaanat Saronon beyiru jametsuwots bín bek't doonzo maants k'az boaani.
ACT 9:36 Iyop'e datsatse T'abiti eteefu amants iku fa'a b tesh, Griki noonon Doork'ayi eta, b́ biitsonwere t'it'a etee, biwere sheeng keewo k'alonat t'owwotssh úni aawu imf máátsi btesh,
ACT 9:37 Manoor bi shodat b k'iri, mashdek'tnuwere dadirotse danbani gaad'ots bin gedbok'ri.
ACT 9:38 Ldi Iyop'esh karn bteshtsotse Iyop'eyitse fa'a Iyesus danifwots P'et'ros Lditse b́ fa'ok'owo shisht «Oona muk'i nteyawo noosh kaari waa boree» et git ashuwotsi bíyok woshbok'ri.
ACT 9:39 Mansh P'et'ros tuut wosheetsuwotsnton b́weyi, b́ bodtsook'onowere dambani maa gáádots dek't boami, bo kenih k'irts mááts jametso bín guurdek' need' dek't eepfetst Doork' bonton kashon b beyor bwozits faaruwotsnat tah tahuwotsi bísh bokitsiri botesh,
ACT 9:40 P'et'ros jametsuwotsnor úratse kishk'raat tuk'maldek't Ik'o b́ k'oni, duuno maantsowere aandek't «T'abitee! tuwwe!» bíeti, biwere bi ááwwotsi wogdek'at P't'rosi b s'iili, tuuwatnu beebdek'i.
ACT 9:41 Bíwere b́ kisho jargt bin detsdek't b́ tuuzi, bo kenihi k'irts máátsuwotsnat k'osh máántsuwotsi s'eegdek't naú kashon bo shinats b́ t'intsi.
ACT 9:42 Keewanuwere Iyop'e dats jamatse b́ daneyi, ay ashuwotswere Doonzon boamani.
ACT 9:43 P'et'ros Simo'oni eteets gook' shik'iru ikonton ay aawosh Iyop'en b́ beyi.
ACT 10:1 K'isari datsatse befo K'orneliyosi eteets ash iko fa'e b́ teshi, bíwere Rom datsatsi kes'fuwots shirotse «It'aliy brgediya» eteyiruwotse bali naasha b́ teshi.
ACT 10:2 Bíwere b́ maa ash jamonton Ik'o shattsonat Ik'a b́ Ik'ifoni b́ teshi, ayhudiyotsi tugretsuwotsno b́ tep'foni, Ik'o mantso jam aawosh b́ k'onfoni.
ACT 10:3 Ik aawu jed'i sa'atok'on melakiyo bíyok t'int «K'orneliyoso!» ett b́ s'egfere shants bek'on b́ bek'i.
ACT 10:4 T'iwints dek't Ik'i melakiyo maants s'iilt tek'on «Doonzono! eebi b́ naaroni?» bí eti. Melakiyonu bísh hank'o bí eti, «Ik' n k'ononat t'owwotsi n tep'iruwok'o bín neen gawetuwo Ik'i shinats t'inre,
ACT 10:5 Ando ashuwotsi Iyop'e maantsan woshar P'et'rosi eteyiruwo Smoni s'egiwe,
ACT 10:6 And bíhe ats k'ari ganoke fa'a gook' shik'iruwo Smon meyitse ib wotatniye b́ beyri.»
ACT 10:7 Han keewts melakiyo bíatse k'aleyat bíamtsok'oon K'ornoliyos b́ mootse fiinefnef gitetsuwotsnat bíats t'ints wotaderwotsitse Ik' shatf iko s'eegdek't
ACT 10:8 Jam keewonowere boosh b́ keewiyakon Iyop'emaants boon b́woshi.
ACT 10:9 Yaats guurok'on bo amt kitok bot'iints shirt sa'atok'on P'et'ros b́ beef moo abaatse gaad'otse Ik'o b́ k'onfera b́keshi.
ACT 10:10 Manorowere P'et'ros k'ak'wutsat ik keewo moosh b́ geyi, aawu mishonu k'aniyeyirwok'o bek'on bí ats b́be'eyi.
ACT 10:11 B́bek'ts bek'onuwere Daro k'esheb́wutsere awd kaaton detsdek'ets eents taho arts keewo datsats b́ oot'fera.
ACT 10:12 Man abatsnowere k'osh k'osh naari s'ootswots bogeroon geetseyiru azeetsuwotsnat darotse bidiru kafuwotsuwere tahmanitse fa'ano botesh.
ACT 10:13 Manoor «P'et'rosoo! Tuur Shuh de'er moowe!» etiru k'aaro b́shishi.
ACT 10:14 P'et'rosmó «Doonzono! woteratse! Taa s'ayin woterawo wee kim keewo maa danaktane» bít.
ACT 10:15 Ando aaninuwere «Ik'o s'ayin b́woshtso, kima eto neesh geyiratse» Etiru k'aaro aaniyi b́shishi.
ACT 10:16 Manuwere keezoto b́wotiyako tah arts keewuman manoor Daromaants k'aaúdek'eyi.
ACT 10:17 P'et'ros bek'an biitso «Eegek'úna b́wotiti?» Etfetst b́ nibots b́ kic'efere K'ornoliwos woshts ashuwots aatt Sim'on moo daatsdek't b́fengeshats boned'fere botesh,
ACT 10:18 S'eegtnurewe «P'et'rosi eteefo Sim'on ib wotat beyiruwo hanokneya b́fa'oni» ett bo aati.
ACT 10:19 P'et'ros bek'i keewuman biitso gawoke b́befere S'ayin shayiro bísh hank'o bíeti, «Eshe keez ashuwots neen geefne,
ACT 10:20 Tuur ood'e, boon woshtso taa twottsosh hake baka nieraawon bonton amee.»
ACT 10:21 P'et'roswere oot't ashuwotsok amt, «Eshe, Itgeyiru asho taane, eegoshe itweyi?» bí eti.
ACT 10:22 Bowere «No noweyiye báli naasho K'ornelewosokne, bíhe Ayhudi ash ash jamwots bo mangiyiru Ik'i ash dooniye, neen b́ moots s'eegiyir n etetuwo b́ k'ebetuwok'o S'ayin melakiyo bísh kitst keewure» bo et.
ACT 10:23 P't'rosu moots boon kindsht bí ibiyakon k'ondek'tnuwere b́ k'eezi. Yaatsok'onowere tuut bonton bíami, Iyop'en fa'a eshuwotsitse ik ikuwots bínton boami.
ACT 10:24 Gitl aawotso K'isari bo bodi, K'orneliyosu b́ jaguwotsnat bíats t'ints b́ tohuwotsi s'eegdek't P'et'rosi b́kotiri.
ACT 10:25 P'et'ros moots b́ kindor K'orneliyos bíyok t'int b́ tufi shirots dihit bín b́ k'oni.
ACT 10:26 P'et'rosmó «Tuuwe! Taa neenk'o ash taane!» ett b́ tizi.
ACT 10:27 Bínton keewefetst gitso maants b́ kindor ay ashuwots ko'edek't bo befere b́ daatsi.
ACT 10:28 Bosh hank'o b́ eti, «Ayhudi wotts ashosh k'osh ashonton ik wotonat b́moots kindo nemo b́ bazitsok'o itworu it tookon danfte, ernmó konuworu s'ayin woterawo wee kima ti erawok'o Ik'o taash kitsre.
ACT 10:29 Mansh taash woshewor ik k'efalo tweyi, eshe eegosh taan it s'eegtsok'owo danosh geefe.»
ACT 10:30 K'orneliyosu hank'o bíeti, «Awd aawoniye shin ewaar jed'i sa'aton t mootse Ik'o tk'onfera t teshi, eshe, tgawraniye ik asho goliru taho tahedek't t shinats b́ need'i,
ACT 10:31 Hank'owere taash bí eti, ‹K'orneliyoso! Ik'o n k'ono shishre, t'owwotsi ntep'irwo gawure,
ACT 10:32 Eshe Iyop'e maants ashuwotsi woshar P'et'rosi eteyiruwo Sim'oni s'egiwe, bíwere ats k'ari ganoke fa'a gook' shiik'fo Simon mootse ibo wotatniye b́ beyiri,›
ACT 10:33 Mansh manoor wosheets ashuwotsi niyok twoshi, neewere n waatsotse sheenge nfini, eshe Ik'o nkeewituwok'o neesh keewuwe bietts jamo shishosh noúnets Ik'i shinatse hanok kaku weerone.»
ACT 10:34 P'et'ros hank'o ett keewo dek't b́tuwi, «Arikon Ik'o asho ashaatse b́ bogabogshrawok'o t'iwintsdek'ree,
ACT 10:35 Aawoki dats asho b́wotiyalor Ik' sharr kááwu keewo b́ finitka wotiyal Ik'o bín k'ebetuwe.
ACT 10:36 Ik'o aap'tso Isra'elsh b́wooshtsok'o daneke, Jami doonzo Iyesus Krstosn jeeno nabfere b́ waawere boshee.
ACT 10:37 Yohans gupi jango nabo b́ tuutsortson Gelilitse tuut Yhud dats jamatse wotts keewo danfte.
ACT 10:38 «Dabtnu Ik'o Nazrettso Iyesusi S'ayin shayiron b́ futtsok'onat angono b́ imtsok'o danfte, Ik'onuwere bínton b́ fa'otse bíwere sheeng keewo finefere Dabilosn detsets jamwots kashifere b́ gúúri.
ACT 10:39 «Yhud gat'eriyotsnat Iyerusalem kitotse b́ k'alts keewu jamosh no gawu noone, bomó bín mitats jitdek't boúd'i.
ACT 10:40 Ernmó Ik'o keezl aawots k'irotse tizt b́ be'etuwok'o b́ woshi.
ACT 10:41 B́ be'ewwere shin shnon Ik'on marat'ets gawwotssha bako ash jamoshaliye, bíwere k'irotse b́ tuwiyakon no bonton iknon maat úshats gawwots no nee,
ACT 10:42 Keewuhan ashuwotssh no shishituwok'o bíwere kashetswotsnat k'irtsuwotsats bíangshituwok'o Ik'oke naashiyetso b́ wottsok'o no gawituwok'o noon azazere.
ACT 10:43 Bín amanitu jamo b́ shútson morrosh oorowe eto b́ daatsituwok'o nebiyi jamwots bísh gawitune.»
ACT 10:44 P'et'ros man b́ keewor b́ keewiruman shishts ash jametsuwotsats S'ayin shayiro b́ oot'i.
ACT 10:45 P'et'rosnton waatsuwots gof amts ayhudiwotsitsi Krstiyaniwotsitse Ik'o Ik'i ash Woteraw ashuwotssh S'ayin shayiro b́ imtsok'o bo bek'tsok'on bo adi.
ACT 10:46 Ik'i ash Woteraw ashuwotssh S'ayin shayiro imetsok'o dantsuwotswere handr noon keewon keewufetst Ik'o údon bomangifere bo shishtsotsna. Manoor P'et'ros
ACT 10:47 «Ashaanots nokok'o S'ayin shayiro dek'reene, béré, bo aatson boguperawok'o kone baziti?» ett b́ keewi.
ACT 10:48 Mansh Iyesus Krstos shútson bogupetuwok'o bíazazi, Maniyere il P'et'ros bonton muk' aawwotssh b́teshetuwok'o bok'oni.
ACT 11:1 Yhud datsatse fa'a woshetswotsnat eshuwwotsn Ik' ash woterawwots Ik' aap'o bo dek'tsok'o bo shishi.
ACT 11:2 P'et'rosu Iyerusalem maantsan aanat b́keshor gof amo geyk b́ wotok'o amaniru ayhudiyots,
ACT 11:3 «Egish gof amaawu ashuwots meyts kindat bonton nmeyi?» ett bín bok'oori.
ACT 11:4 Ernmó P'et'ros wotts jamo hank'o ett ik ikon keewo dek't b́tuwi.
ACT 11:5 «Taa Iyop'e kitotse Ik' k'onatse tbeefere bek'o tbek'i, t bek'tsonúwere een magaraji arts keewo awd kaaton detsdek'ere darotse oot't tiyok b́ weyri,
ACT 11:6 Bínowere t'iwints t s'iile magaraji tahotse Gizuwotsnat dini s'otswotsn, datsatse getseyiruwotsnat daaratse bidiru kafuwotsi t bek'i,
ACT 11:7 ‹P'et'roso! tuur shuhuder moowe!› etiru k'aaro tshishi,
ACT 11:8 Taamó ‹Woteratse Doonzono!! s'ayin woterawo wee kim wotts keewo b́jamon tnonots ger danaak taane› tieti.
ACT 11:9 Ernmó gitlo, ‹Ik'o s'ayin b́ woshtso nee kima eto neesh geyiratse› etiru k'aro darotse taash bíanere t shishi.
ACT 11:10 Hanwere keezoto b́ wotiyakon tah arts keewuman jamon daro maantsan t'op'e b́wutsi.
ACT 11:11 Manoor K'isariyon tiyok wosheets keez ashuwots taa t beyiru moowok waat bobodi.
ACT 11:12 Hake baka t eraniyere bonton t ametuwok'o S'ayin shayiro taash b́ keewi, eshu shirtanotsu taantoniye bo faoni b́ teshi, bonton iknon amatnuwere K'orneliyosi eteyiru asho moots no kindi.
ACT 11:13 Bíwere melakiyo b́ mootse b́ned'efere b́ bek'tsok'on ‹Iyop'e maantsan asho woshar P'et'rosi eteyiruwo Sm'oni s'eegiywe,
ACT 11:14 Bíwere neenat nmaa ash jamo b́ kashit aap'o itsh keewituwe› bíettsok'o noosh b́ keewi.
ACT 11:15 Taawere keewo dek'at t tuure S'ayin shayiro shini noats b́ ot'tsok'o boatso b́ oot'i.
ACT 11:16 Manoor ‹Yohanis aatson b́ gupi, itmó S'ayn Shayiron gupetute› ett Doonzo keewts aap'o gawtdek'i.
ACT 11:17 No doonz Iyesus Krstosn no amanor Ik'o noosh b́ imts imo bosho b́ imtsotse, eshe Ik'o baziyosh falituwo taa kone!»
ACT 11:18 Bowere han boshishtsok'on bo keewituwo t'ut't s'k et bowutsi, «Eshe Ik'o, Ik' ashwoteraw ashuwots kashi handrosh boon betsitu naandre eti nibo boosh imre,» ett Ik'o bo udi.
ACT 11:19 Ist'ifanosi k'is'dek't úd'etson tuwts gisheyi jagon bad'ts amantsuwots Fink'en tuut K'op'rosn Ans'okiyo b́ borfetso bo ami, bí aap'ono ayhudiyotssha bako k'oshuwotssh keewakno bo teshi.
ACT 11:20 Wotowa bako K'op'rosnat K'erenon waats amants ik ikuwots Ans'okiyo bo amor Girikiyotssh dab́ doonzo Iyesus doo shishiyo bo keewi.
ACT 11:21 Doonzonuwere boon bíangon b́ tep'fera b́ teshi, ay ashuwotsu amanat doonzo maantsan boaani.
ACT 11:22 Iyerusalemitse fa'a Ik' moow keewan b shishtsotse Barnabasi Ans'okiyo maantsan b woshi.
ACT 11:23 Bíwere amt Ik'o b́ s'aato ashuwotssh awuk'on b́ imtsok'o b́ bek'tsotse geneú b́wutsi, jamwotsu bo nib s'eenon kup'ar doonzo amanetsuwotsi wotar bo beetuewk'o bíizi.
ACT 11:24 Bíwere S'ayn shayironat imnetiyon s'eenk ash sheeng b́ teshtsotse bo taawo ay wotts ashuwots doonzo maantsan boaani.
ACT 11:25 Maniye okoon Barnabas Sa'oli geyosh T'erses maantsan bíami.
ACT 11:26 Datsdek'tnuwe Ans'okiyo maantsan dek't b́weyi, gitetswotsuwere ik nati s'eenosh amants ashuwotsnton ik wotat ay ashuwotsi bo daniyi, amantsuwotsuwere tewurerosh Ans'okiyon, «Kirstiyaniwotsi» ett s'egeyi.
ACT 11:27 Manoor ik ik Nebiyinee ett s'eegeyiru danifuwots Iyerusalemn Ans'okiyo maantsan bo ami,
ACT 11:28 Boyitsnowere iko Agabosi eteetso tuut dats jamatse k'ak' eeno b́ wotituwok'o S'ayin shayiro b́tizre bek'on bek't b́ keewi, hanuwere b́ woti Rom naashuwots naasho K'elawudiyos dúrone b́ teshi.
ACT 11:29 Mansh Ans'okiyon beyiru amantsuwots Yihudon beyiru eshuwotssh bo took tookon bo faltsok'o c'oc'de'er boon tep'o damiyetuwok'o boeti.
ACT 11:30 Gizmano kishdek't Barnabasnat Sa'ol kishon Ik' máá eenashwotssh bowoshi.
ACT 12:1 Man dúr nuguso Herodis Ik'i maa ash ik ikuwotsi gisho dek' b́tuwi,
ACT 12:2 Yohans eshuwi Yak'obi shikon b́ úd'iyi.
ACT 12:3 Keewu manuwere ayhudiwotsi b́ geneeúshtsok'o b́bek'tsok'on P'et'rosi ando aani detsi b́k'ri, man b́wotuwere ayhudiwots tush meyi baaliyo bomangif aawwotsitsna b́tesh.
ACT 12:4 P'et'rosi b́detsiyehakon tipi moots kindshb́k'ri, ayhudiwots Fazigi baaliyoniye hakon ash ashuwotsok b́ t'intsfetso kes' kes'fwots awd awdon bokotetuwok'o awd jirwotssh imb́k'ri.
ACT 12:5 Mann P'et'ros tipi mootse detseyatni b́ kotefoni, ernmó Ik'i moowu b́ jangosh Ik'o maants kup'idek'atni b k'onfoni.
ACT 12:6 Yaats guurok'on Herodis P't'rosi ash ashosh t'intso gawudek'tni b́tesh, t'úmanots P'et'ros Habliyion tipeyat kes' kes'f giti dagotsa b́k'eyiri b́tesh, k'osh wotaderwotsuwere wee maa fengeshoni bokotiri.
ACT 12:7 Manoor doonzo melkiyo bíats be'eyat, tipi moots c'eesho shaano gol b́wutsi, melakiwonwere P'etros lalk'o t'awit tuzt «Káári tuuwe!» bíeti, habiliyonu b́ kishotsere fed'b́gutsi.
ACT 12:8 Melakiyonu «Ntaho tahade'er! nc'amono gerde'e!» bí eti. P'et'rosuwere azazetsok'o b́ k'ali, melakiyonu «N nat'alo tahader tshuutso wowe!» bí eti.
ACT 12:9 P'et'ros waat b́ shuutso b́tuwi, bek'a b́ bek'iri bísh bíari bako melakiyo b́ k'alts jamo ar areratse.
ACT 12:10 Iknonat gitl koteyiruwokere beshat kitootsan damiru biri is'ok bobodi. Is'onuwere asho b́ t'awirawo hank'on bíaal k'esheb́gutsere kesht ik weridon beshat k'az boami, b́ gawurawo melakiyo P't'rosatse k'aleyat bíami.
ACT 12:11 P'et'rosu b́ atso dant, «Doonzo b́ melakiyo woshat Herodis kishotsnat Ayhudi ashuwots bo kotiru keewu jamotse taan b́ kashitsok'o and taa arikon danre!» bí eti.
ACT 12:12 Man dan b́k'rihakon ay ashuwots ikok kakuwedek't Ik'o bok'oniruwok Mariyam mook bíam, Mariyam manuwere Mark'osi eteetso Yohans indi btesh.
ACT 12:13 P'et'ros manok bodt úriweertso fengesho b́k'oftsok'oon Rodayi eteets gon iku koni b́wottsok'o danosh fengeshomants bweyi.
ACT 12:14 P'et'ros k'aar b́wottsok'o danbk'rtsok'on b gene'úwi aytsatse tuwtson fengesho b k'eshrawon wos'aat gitsomaand kindat «P'et'ros fengeshatse b́need'iri!» etaat b keewi.
ACT 12:15 Bowere «Geeniya nwutsi!» bo eti. Bimó «Arikon bíne!» arikon bín bek're etaat bkeewi, boowere bere «Bín kotiru melakiye b́wotiti» boeti.
ACT 12:16 P'et'rosmó maa fengsho k'ofo ned'iratse, boowere fengesho k'eshdek't bos'iloor bo'adi.
ACT 12:17 Bímó s'k boetetuwok'o b́kishon kitst doonzo awuk'o k'aldek't tipi mootse bín b́kishtsok'o boosh keewut «Keewan Yak'obnat oorts amantsuwotssho keewwere» bíet. Boatse k'aleyat k'osh beyok k'az bími.
ACT 12:18 B́gatstsok'onowere kes' kes'fwots «P'et'rosats eege b́woti k'úna?» ett ayidek't kic'bowutsi.
ACT 12:19 Herodisuwere b́weeron P'et'rosi geyit b́t'ut'tsok'on fengesh kotiruwotsi b́ maramariyakon boon úd'etuwok'o bíazazi, maniyere hakon Herodis Yhud datsatse tuut K'isariyi maants amt manoke beeb́wutsi.
ACT 12:20 Herodis T'irosnat Sidon dats ashuwotsats ayidek't fayatni b́tesh, boowere ikwotdek't waat, Nugúsok karnts guutso Blast'osi bonton b́tep'ish k'ondek't eeki bodek'iyakon Nugúso manosh bo aati, man bok'aluwere bodatsuu misho bdaatsfo Nugúso datsatse b́ teshtsosha.
ACT 12:21 Detsets aawmanots Herodis b́ naashi taho kardek't naashi jorats be'dek't ash ashosh keewo b́keewi.
ACT 12:22 Ash ashonwere «Hanuwo Izar Izewer k'aara bako ash k'aaraliye!» ett bokuhi.
ACT 12:23 Herodis Ik'osh mango b́ imaawo b́ oortsotse manoor doonzo melakiyo togb́k'rere shipro gedt b́k'iri.
ACT 12:24 Ik' aap'onmo aawu aawon eenfetst gawunfera bíamfo.
ACT 12:25 Bernabasnat Sa'oln boamts fino isht Iyerusalemitsere Ans'oki datsomand k'azboaan, Mark'osi eteetso Yohansnowere bonton dek't boweyi.
ACT 13:1 Ans'okitse fa'a Ik'i moowutse nebiyiwotsinat danifuwots fa'ano botesh, boowere, Bernabasi, aak'a eteetso Sm'onu, K'eren datsats asho Lukyosu, awdlo kayo keewutso Herodisnton towaat eentso Mnahenat Sa'olne fa'ane boteshi.
ACT 13:2 Bo doonzosh finefetst s'oomoke bobefere S'ayin shayiro «Taa boon t galts finosh Bernabasnat Sawln taash galuwere» bíet.
ACT 13:3 Bowere s'oomat Ik'o bo k'oniyakon bokishono boats gedt wosh bok'iri.
ACT 13:4 Barnabasnat Sawln S'ayin shayiron wosheyat Selewik'iyo maats boami. Manokno markabon K'op'ros maats boami.
ACT 13:5 Selamis kitots bo bodtsok'on ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni mootse Ik'i aap'o bodani, Yohanis Mark'oswere bonton wotat boosh bodabiri b́teshi.
ACT 13:6 Aatso gúrts K'op'ros datsu k'ut't p'afuyi bo bodtsok'on Baryesusi eteefo ayhudits ik'ets ash iko daats bodek'i, bímó kootets nebiyiya b́ tesh.
ACT 13:7 B́befonuwere Sergyos P'awlosi eteets t'iwintsdek'ts dats k'eezfontoni b́tesh, dats k'eezfan Bernabasnat Sa'oln s'eegt Ik' aap'o k'ebo b́ geyi.
ACT 13:8 Ernmó Griki noon keew keewon «Elimas» ett s'eegets ik'etso Beryesus dats k'eezfo bíamanerawok'o geeyat Bernabasnat Sa'oln b́ k'efi.
ACT 13:9 P'awlosi eteetso Sa'olmó S'ayin shayiron s'eent ashman t'iwintsdek't s'iilt hank'owa bísh bíet,
ACT 13:10 «Nee Dabilos naayo! ar jami t'alatono! dirshonat gond jamon s'eentsono, kááwu wottso doonzo weerindo k'uuriyo k'azalk neeneya!
ACT 13:11 Andoor hambe! doonzo kisho neen togetuwee, doogonowere wotitune, muk' gizewosh aawu shaano be'atsnee.» Manoor bíaawwotsi bampulonat t'aluwo ipb́k'iri, b́ kisho deshde'er jishit asho b́ ganoke geyo dek'b́tuwi.
ACT 13:12 Dats k'ezfonuwere wotts jamo b́ bek'tsok'on bíamani, doonzo jangosho b́shishts danon bíadi.
ACT 13:13 Maniyere okoon P'awlosnt b́ tohuwotsn Markabats keshdek't P'afutse P'nflyo maantse daatseyiru P'erge maants boami, Mark'osi eteyiruwo Yohanismó boatse k'aleyat Iyerusalem maants aanat bíami.
ACT 13:14 Boomó P'ergeyiyere tuut P'isdyayitsi datsatse fa'a Ans'okiyo maats boami, sanbati aawon ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni moots kindt beebowutsi.
ACT 13:15 Muse nemonat Nebiyiwots mas'afwots nababeyakon Ayhudi Ik' k'oni maa naashuwots «T eshuwotso, ashuwotsi kup'it izo detsfte wotiyal keewwere» ett P'awlosots maants asho bo woshi.
ACT 13:16 Mansh P'awlos tuut ashosh kishon b́koli, hank'o ett b́keewi, «Isra'el ashuwotsnat Ik' shatiru Ik' ash woterawwotso! k'ewere!
ACT 13:17 Israe'el ashaanotsko Izar Izewer yoots no nihotsi galre, Gbs'datsatse boteshor een ashuwotsi boon b́woshi, bí een angonowere datsmanatse boon b́kishi.
ACT 13:18 Hab́natonoshowere woruwotse boon b́ k'ami,
ACT 13:19 Kan'an datsatse shawat nugúsuwotsi t'afit bodatso bíashwotssh b́naatiyi,
ACT 13:20 Jaman awd bale balk'ats naato b́ ishi, maniyakowere nebiyo Samu'el dúrosh b́ borfetso Mesafntiyotsi b́ imi.
ACT 13:21 «Manats dabt nugúso boosh b́ naashituwok'o Ik'o bok'oni, Ik'onuwere Biniyam jir wottso K'is naayi Sa'oli hab natosh boosh b́ naashiyi.
ACT 13:22 Sa'olno naashatse b́ orshiyakon Dawiti b́ naashiyi, Ik'onu Dawit jangosh b́ gawor, ‹T shuntsok'o wottso, tshunono fintso, Isey naayi Dwiti daatsre› etre.
ACT 13:23 Ashaan naarotse Ik'o b́ jangits keewok'on Isra'eli kashituwo Iyesusi boosh b́ tuuzi.
ACT 13:24 Iyesus b́ waraftse shinon Yohanis Israe'el ash jamosh naandrone err gupeyo nabre b́teshi.
ACT 13:25 Yohanis b́ fino b́ ishtsok'on ‹Taa kone itsh tiari? Taahe Mesihiyo taanaliye, ernmó b́ c'aami tiponoru dab bitsosh tborawo t shutsatse k'osho weetuwe› bí etfoni.
ACT 13:26 «It Abraham naaratse shuwets eshuwwotsnat itwere Ik' shatiru Ik' ash woterawwotso! bín kashet wóóshan woshe noshee
ACT 13:27 Iyerusalemn beyiru ashuwotsnat boon jishiruwots Iyesus kashitso b́ wottsok'o danatsne, sanbati aawu aawon nababeyiru nebiyiwots mas'aafwotsi t'iwintso bok'aztsosh bíats boangshor bek'on keewetso b́s'eenetuwok'o woshrne.
ACT 13:28 K'irosh bín betsit keewo eegoru bíatse datso bok'azaloru bín boosh b́ úd'ituwok'o P'ilat'osi bo k'oni.
ACT 13:29 B́ jangosh guut'ets jamo b́s'eeniyakon jitatse orshdek't boduki,
ACT 13:30 Ernmó Ik'o k'irotse bín b́tizi.
ACT 13:31 Geliltsere Iyerusalem maants bínton waatsuwotsshowere ay aawosh boats b́ be'eyi, boowere and ashuwots shinatse b́ gawwotsiye.
ACT 13:32 No itsh detsdek' nowatso Ik'o nonihotssh jangit b́ ímts doo shishiyi keewoniye.
ACT 13:33 Ik'o Iyesusi k'irotse b́tiztsotse b́jangitsano noosh bo nanaúwotssh finats jitsre, manuwere gitli Dubotse, ‹Nee tnay neene, taa neen hambets shuure,› ett guut'etsok'one.
ACT 13:34 B́ o'awok'o Ik'o k'irotse b́ tiztsok'o daniyosh, ‹S'ayin amanets deero Dawitsh jangit imetso itsh imetuwe› ett keewure.
ACT 13:35 Dabt k'osh dubotse, ‹N Naayi S'ayino b́ ok'etwok'o woshatsne› bí eti
ACT 13:36 Ernmó Dawit b́ dúr jamo b́ fino Ik'i shuntso b́s'eentsyakon k'irre, nihwotsntonuwere duukere, ok'ree.
ACT 13:37 Ik'o k'irotse b́tiztsonmó oa'atse.
ACT 13:38 Eshe tí eshuwotso! Morrosh oorowe eto datsetuwo Iyesusn b́wottsok'owo itsh nabetsok'o dande'ere,
ACT 13:39 Bín amants jamo Muse weeron imets nemo nas'o kisho b́ falawu morr jamatse nas'o keshituwe.
ACT 13:40 Mansh nebiyatiyotsn Ik'o hank'o ett b́ keewetso itats b́ borawok'o korde'ere,
ACT 13:41 ‹It aatsnirwots s'iilere! adúwere! t'afuwere! Konuworu asho itsh b́ keewure It amanerawu fino itdúroon finitwe.› »
ACT 13:42 P'awlosn at Barnabasn ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni mootse bokeshfere keewan weet sanbatots aani boosh bokewituwok'o ashuwotsi bok'oni.
ACT 13:43 Ayhudi Ik' k'oni moots ko'etswots bad'bowutstsok'oon ay Ayhudi jirwotsnat Ayhudi imnetiyots kindt Ik' Ik'iru Ashuwots P'awlosnt Barnabasn shuutso botuwi, P'awlosnt Barnabasnowere ashuwotsi danit Ik'i s'aaton kup'ar bobetuwok'o boosh bogawiyi.
ACT 13:44 Weet sanbatono kitotse beyiru ashuwotsitse aywots, Ik'i aap'o shishosh ko'ebowutsi,
ACT 13:45 Ayhudiyots ash ashuwots ay bowottsok'o bo bek'tsosh okooron s'een bowutsi, b́ keewono k'efefetst P'awlosi boc'ashi,
ACT 13:46 P'awlosn at Barnabasnomó hank'o ett ááwu shuk'on bokeewi, «Ik' aap'o shini itsh keewo geyife, it de'atsone it etalomó dúre dúr kasho itsh b́ woterawok'o it tookats it angshtsotse hamb no Ik' ash woterawwots maants wongrer ametuwone.
ACT 13:47 Manowere nok'alitiye doonzo, ‹Kasho dats daarats b́borfetso n doowetuwok'o Ik' ash Woteraw ashuwotssh shááno neen woshre› ett b́ azaztsotsne.»
ACT 13:48 Ik' ash woterawwots han boshishtsok'n geneú bowutsi doonzo aap'o bomangiyi, dúre dúr kashosh gaalets jamwotswrere boamani.
ACT 13:49 Doonzo aap'onuwere dats jamanats bad'b́wutsi.
ACT 13:50 Ayhudi jishiruwotsmó ayhudi imnetiyo amaniru gaalets mááts máátsuwtsenat kititsi een een ashuwotsi gondon P'awlosnat Barnabasn gishetuwok'o bowoshi, bo datsatsnowere boon bokishi.
ACT 13:51 P'awlosnat Barnabasn boats botufatsi k'undo tebazt Ik'oniyon maants boami.
ACT 13:52 B́ danifuwosuwere gene'onat S'ayn shayiron bos'eeni.
ACT 14:1 Ik'oniyonitse P'awlosnat Bernabasn towaat ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni moots bokindi, manoknowere ay ayhudiwotsnat Ik' ash Woteraw ayidek't ayts ashuwots bo amanefetsosh bodaniyi.
ACT 14:2 Amaneraw ayhudiwotsmó Ik'i ash woterawwotsi tuzit eshuwotsats shit'o b́weetwok'o bok'ali.
ACT 14:3 Mansh P'awlosnat Bernabasn doonzo keewo ááwu shuk'on keewfetst manoke ayi gizewos boteshi, doonzonwere milikitwotsnat adits keewwotsi bokishon bofinetwok'o alo boosh imt, b́ s'aati aap'o ariko b́wottsok'o b́kiitsfoni.
ACT 14:4 Kitutse beyiruwotsmó, gitoko kayaat bado ayhudiwotsnton bado woshetswotsnton bowoti.
ACT 14:5 Ik' ash woterawwotsna ayhudiwots bo naashuwotsnton wotdek't P'awlosnat Bernabasn kaarar shútson togosh bogeyi,
ACT 14:6 P'awlosn at Bernabasn man bodantsok'on Lst'ranat Derbeyi eteef Lik'a'on kituwotsnat bogúúratse fa'a datsats giifat boami.
ACT 14:7 Manoknowere doo shishiyo bonabi.
ACT 14:8 Lst'ra datsatse b́ tufo lasha'awutsts ash iko fa'e b́tesh, ashaan b́ shuweetson tuut dura b́teshtsotse b́ tufoon sha'a danaka,
ACT 14:9 Ashaan P'awlos b́ keewor bedek'tni b́ k'ebiri b́ tesh, P'awlos ashman t'iwintsdek't s'iilt kashosh bín betsit imnetiyo b́ detso b́ bek'tsok'on,
ACT 14:10 «Kaawde'er ntufoon need'owe!» ett k'aari eenon b́keewi, ashmanwere t'oolat tuut hake bak b́sha'i.
ACT 14:11 Ashuwotswere P'awlos b́ k'altso bo bek'tsok'on, bok'aaro eenshdek't «Ik'uwots ash aron wotdek't nok oot'rnee!» ett Lik'aoni noon keewu keewon bokeewi.
ACT 14:12 Bernabasshower «Dya» boeti. Keewu keewiruwo P'awlosi b́ teshtsotse bísh «Hermeniye» boeti.
ACT 14:13 Kitoniyere úratse fa'o diyako s'ayin máá kahniyo minzi wrwotsnat k'odets funduwotsnowere kiti fengesho maants dek'wat ash ashonton ikwotdek't P'awlosnat Bernabasnsh wosho t'intsosh b́geyi.
ACT 14:14 Wosheets, P'awlosnat Benabasn man boshishtsok'on shiyanon botaho bo gaat'i, ash asho maantsowere wos't kuhefets hank'o boeti,
ACT 14:15 «It ash ashuwots eegishe han itk'aliri? Nowoor itnk'o ash noone, Noo hanok nowaa it hank'o k'awuntsal keewu jamatse wokar daro, datso, aatsk'aronat bogitsotse daatseyiru jamo aztso Kashetso Izar Izewer maants it aanituwok'o sheeng keewo shishiyishee,
ACT 14:16 Beshts dúrowotsitse ash jamo botook weeron boametuwok'o Ik'o boon kazb́k'ri,
ACT 14:17 Wotowa bako bíaawuk'o sheengo Izar Izeweri b́ wottsok'o gaawit sheeng fino k'alo need'iratse, darotse awusho itsh bútsiree, maay kakuwi shashwotsi itsh b́ imi, Mishonat geneeúon itn b́woriyi.»
ACT 14:18 Wosheetsots mank'o dabt bokeewiyalor ash asho boosh wosho t'intso b́k'azetuwok'o bobazi ayidek' kic'oone.
ACT 14:19 Ayhudiwotsmó Ans'okiyonat t Ik'oniyonn manok waat ash asho tuzdek't P'awlosi shútson botogetuwok'o bowoshi, k'irb́wutstsok'o bíarere geets dek't kitotse kishbok'ri.
ACT 14:20 Ernmó b́danifuwots waat bín gúúrdek't boned'fere P'awlos tuut kitots b́kindi, yaats guurok'onowere Bernabasnton Derbe maants bíami.
ACT 14:21 P'awlosnat Bernabasn Derbe datsatse doo shishiyo danit ay ashuwotsi amantsuwotsi bowoshiyakon Lst'ronat Ik'oniyonn beshat P'sdiyin fa'úts Ans'okits boami.
ACT 14:22 Dats jam manotsatsnowere amantsuwots boamantsats kup'bodek'etuwok'o boon kup'iyonat izosh «Ik'i mengstots kindosh ay gondo noosh geyife» etfetst boon bdaniyi.
ACT 14:23 Ik' k'oni maa mootse eenash eenashuwotsnowere boosh bonaashi, s'omat Ik'o bok'oniyakonowere bín boamants doonzosh adaro imbok'ri.
ACT 14:24 P'sdiyanowere beshat P'nfli maants boami,
ACT 14:25 P'ergeyitsnowere Ik' aap'tso bodaniyakon At'aliyi maants boami,
ACT 14:26 Maniyere hakonowere bok'alts Ik'i s'aatosh adaro boosh ímeets Ans'okimaants markabon boami.
ACT 14:27 Manok bobodetsok'on amantsuwotsi ikok kakudek't Ik'o awuk'o k'alt bonton wotdek't b́fiints jamonat Ik'i ash woterawwotswor boamanituwok'o awuk'o k'alt fengesho boosh b́k'eshtsok'o bokeewi
ACT 14:28 Manoknowere amantsuwotsnton ay aawo boteshi.
ACT 15:1 Ash ik ikuwots Yhuditsere Ans'oki maants amt «Musesh imets nemok'on gofo it amala bako kasho falratste» ett amantsuwotsi daniyo dek'botuwi.
ACT 15:2 P'awlosnat Bernabasn manjangosh ash ashuwotsnton wed'eyat moosho bomooshi, Maniyere okoon P'awlosnat Bernabasn Ans'okitse fa'e k'osh muk' eshuwotsnton wotde'er Iyerusalemits amr b́jango woshetswotsnat eenashuwotsnsh bot'intsituwok'o woshi.
ACT 15:3 Mansh bo Ik'i moon wosheyat boami, Fink'enat Semaritse bobesheferowere Ik'i ashwoterawwots Ik'o maants boaano bokeewi, keewetsanuwere krstiyani jametsuwotsi b́geneúshi.
ACT 15:4 Iyerusalemits bobodtsok'on Ik'i moowunat woshetswotsn, eenashuwotswere boon bodek'i, wosheetsuwotswere Ik'o bonton wotdek't b́ fintso boosh bokeewi.
ACT 15:5 Ernmó Ferisawino eteefuwots jirwotsits wotts ik ik amantsuwots tuut «Ik'i ash woterawwots gofo amr Muse nemo bokotetuwok'o k'alo geyife» boeti.
ACT 15:6 Woshetswotsnat eenashuwotsn keewan shuu'ar s'ilosh kakuwebodek'i,
ACT 15:7 Ay moosho mosheyakonowere P'et'ros tuut boosh hank'o bíeti, «Eshuwwotso, Ik'i ash woterawwots taan Doo shishiyo k'ewur boamanituwok'o taan ititse galb́dek'tsok'o danfte.
ACT 15:8 Ash nib dantso Izar Izewer, S'ayin shayiro noosh b́imtsok'o booshowere imtni b́ gawi.
ACT 15:9 Bonibo amanon b́ s'ayntstsosh noonat bodagotse eegoru k'osh k'osho woshratse.
ACT 15:10 Eshe, nonihotsi wotowa noo kuro nofalrawu k'ambariyo amantsuwots bimbats kuriyon and Ik'o eegishe itfadiri?
ACT 15:11 Noo nokashit bokok'o doonzo Iyesus s'aaton b́ woto amaniruwone.»
ACT 15:12 Manoor kakuwets ash jamo s'ik ett Bernabasnat P'awlosn boweeron Ik'o Ik' ash woterawwots dagotse b́ fints milikitonat adits keewu jamo bokeewure adt k'ebeyi.
ACT 15:13 Bo keewut boishiyak, Yak'ob hank'o ett bíaniyi «Ti eshuwotso! aab taan k'ewere!
ACT 15:14 Ik'o b́ shútson s'eeget ik ikashuwotsi bo dagotse galdek'osh shinshino awuk'o k'alt Ik' ash woterawwotsi waa b́s'iiltsok'o Sim'on keewure.
ACT 15:15 Hasabiyantonuwerfe nebiywots keewuts keewo manee, hank'o ett guut'etsok'one,
ACT 15:16 ‹Haniyehak aani weetuwe, Gahtso Dawit moo agetuwe, B́ gahts tiish tishonowere tizde'er aaniy need'ituwe.
ACT 15:17 Hanowere t k'alit oorts ashuwotsnat T shútson s'eegets Ik'i ash Woteraw jamwots Ik'o bogeytuwok'owee,
ACT 15:18 Yootstson jaman danitso Ik'o taa hank'o etiruwe,›
ACT 15:19 «Mansh tiaasabiyo Ik'omaants aanits Ik'i ash woterawwotsi nokic'irawok'owee.
ACT 15:20 Maniyere ‹Woterawu ik'uwotssh t'iintsotse kiimts woshi misho máák'ayere, widatse wokoore, shukeerawonat b́ s'atso b́kud'erawo guuk'at k'irts gizi meetso máák'ayere, s'atsonowere máák'ayere› err boosh guud'one.
ACT 15:21 Yootstson b́ tuutson Muse nemó sanbati aawu jamon ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse nababefe b́teshi, Ik'i keewuts keewonowere kitt kitotse nabefee.»
ACT 15:22 Maniyere hakon woshetswotsnat eenashuwotsn Ik'i maa ash jamonton wotdek't kakuweetsmanotsitse k'ats ashuwotsi marat'dek't P'awlosnat Bernabasnton Ans'okimaants daamiwosh k'ut'bok'ri, Mansh eshuwotsitse jiishon shútsi sheengo detstswotsi Bersabasi eteetso Yhudnat Silasn marat'bodek'i.
ACT 15:23 Guut'ets woshi work'ato bokishon bo damiy, Wosh detsts work'atmanuwere hank'o etka b́tesh, «Noo woshetswotsnat eenash eenashuwots it eshuwots, Ans'okinat Soryon, Kilk'iyitsnowere beyiruwots Ik'i ashwoterawwots jirwotsi wottsuwotssh no eshuwotssh jamo itsh t'intsiruwone.
ACT 15:24 Noyitse ik ik ashuwots noo boon noazazerawon it maants waat itsh bokeewts keewon iti bokic'itsok'onat itn bodanditsok'o shishrone.
ACT 15:25 Mansh ikok ko'enowutsiyakon woshetuwotsi marat'de'er shuneets no eshuu eshuwwots Barenabasnat P'awlosn ton itmaants woshosh no shiyeyi.
ACT 15:26 Barnabasnat P'awlosn doonzo Iyesus Krstos jangosh bo kasho beshidek't imknee.
ACT 15:27 No guut'tsonowere noonon dabr itsh bo keewituwok'o Yhudnat Silasn wosherone.
ACT 15:28 Itsh not'intsts geyit keewanotsiyere okoon k'osh mang kuro itats nokurirawok'oyish noo S'ayin shayironton sheeng b́wotere daatsrone.
ACT 15:29 Woteraw ik'osh t'intsetsotse kiimts misho maak'ayere, gúúk'at k'irts gizi meetsono maak'ayere, s'atsono maak'ayere, widatsnowere wokoore, jamkeewanotsatse it atso it kotal sheenge itk'aliti, jamon beewere.»
ACT 15:30 Wosheetswotswere deen bok'rere Ans'oki maants boami, amantsuwotsnowere kakudek't wosheets work'atman boosh imbok'ri.
ACT 15:31 Amantswotswere wosheets work'ato bonababor bitsi kúp'its woshmann ayidek' boon b́ geneúshi.
ACT 15:32 Yhudnat Silasn nebiyiwotsi boteshtsotse eshu eshuwotsi ay Ik'i keewon izt boon bokup'shi.
ACT 15:33 Yhudnat Silasn muk' aawwotssh manoke boteshiyakon amants eeshuwwotsoke deneyat boon woshtsuwotsok aanat boami.
ACT 15:35 P'awlosnat Bernabasnowere eshu k'osh ayuwotsnton wotdek' Doonzo keewuts keewo danifets nabfetst muk' aawosh Ans'okitse boteshi.
ACT 15:36 Muk' aawwotsiyere hakon P'awlos Bernabassh «Wowe anaanar haniyere shin doonzo keewts keewo boosh noshishits kit jamwotsitse fa'a eeshuwuwotsi s'iilone, awuk'o bowottsok'onowere danonee» bí eti.
ACT 15:37 Bernabasuwere Mark'osi eteetso Yohans bonton towaar bíamo b́ geyi.
ACT 15:38 P'awlosmó ashman bonton bíametuwok'o eekeratse, eek b́k'aztsonuwere bí P'nfiliyitse boatse k'aleyat b́ oortsonat fino maantsowere bonton amo b́ k'aztsoshe.
ACT 15:39 Manatse tuutson P'awlosnat Bernabas dagotse mooshi eeno b́tuure k'ale bowutsi, mansh Bernabas Mark'osi detsdek't markabon K'op'ros maants k'azbíami.
ACT 15:40 P'awlosmó Silasi marat'b́dek'i, eeshuwotswere P'awlosi doonzo s'aatosh adaro beshidek't boimiyakon k'azbími.
ACT 15:41 Bíwere Ik'i moowuwotsi kup'ifere Soriyonat Kilk'iyi weeron b́beshi.
ACT 16:1 P'awlos Derbenat Lst'ra maants bíami, Lst'rn T'imotiwosi eteets amants jawets iko fa'e b́tesh, bínd ayhudiyi ash wotat amank krstiyani btesh, b́ nihmó Grik dats asha b́ tesh.
ACT 16:2 T'imotiyos Lst'ronat Ik'oniyonitse fa'a eeshuwwotsokere sheeng shútso detsfe b́ teshi.
ACT 16:3 P'awlos T'imotiyosi de'er amo b́getsotse manokere beyru ayhudiwotsatse tuutson gofo b́ ametuwok'o b́woshi, mank'o b́ k'aluwere bo T'imotiyos nih Giriki dats ash b́ woto bodantsotse bojangosha etniye.
ACT 16:4 P'awlosnat Silasn kit kitotse beshefetst Iyerusalemn fa'a woshetswotsnat eenashuwotsn eteets nemo amantsuwotssh bodanifere b́teshi, finatsowere bojitsituwok'o boosh bogawifere bo teshi.
ACT 16:5 Mansh Ik' moowwots imnetiyon kup'bowutsi, botaawonúwere dabfere bí'amiri.
ACT 16:6 P'awlosnat Silasn Isiyi datsatse Ik'i aap'o bokeewurawok'o S'ayn shayiro boosh b́ bazitsotse Frgyiyinat Gelatiyi daarok k'az bobeshi,
ACT 16:7 Misiyi daarok bobodtsok'on Bitanimaants amoosh gawtni botesh, ernmó Iyesusko S'ayin shayro man maants boametuwok'o eekeratse.
ACT 16:8 Mansh Misya weeron beshat T'iroadi bo oot'iye.
ACT 16:9 Manoke t'ú Mek'edoni ash iko need'dek't «Mek'edoni maants kimr noon te'úwe!» ett bín b́ k'onfere bek'on b́bek'i.
ACT 16:10 P'awlos bek'man b́bek'iyakon manoor Mek'edoni maants amoosh no geyi, Man b́wotuwere Mek'edoni ashuwotsshowere doo shishiyo nodaniyituwok'o Doonzo noon b́ s'eegtsok'o nodani.
ACT 16:11 T'iroadiyere Markabats keshdek'at kááwon Samtrak'e maants noami, yaats guurok'on Nap'ule maants no ami.
ACT 16:12 Maniyere tuwat Filip'isyosits nobodi, Filip'isyus Mek'edonitse fa'a kit eenunat Rom dats ashuwots dets bodek'ts datsi b tesh, kitmanitsnowere muk' aawwotsi nobeshi.
ACT 16:13 Sanbati aawotsowere Ik' k'onosh boko'efok kitoniyere úratse fa'a foki gúrok noo ami, manoke bedek'at ko'edek'ts máátsuwotssh Ik'i aap'o nodaniyi.
ACT 16:14 Nokeewirman k'ebiru máátswotsitsere iku Tiyat'ros kitotse shuwetsu tahi biro jaakiru Lidiya eteets máátsu fa'a b teshi, biwere Ik' Ik'iru máátsiye b teshi, doonzo b nibo bish b́ k'eshtsotse P'awlos bíaap'iru b k'ebfere b teshi,
ACT 16:15 Binat b meyitsi fa'a ash jamwots bo gupeyakon, «Doonzo ti amantso arik b́woto itkitsitka wotiyal waar t moots beewere,» etaat kup'idek'at noon b k'oni.
ACT 16:16 Ik aawu Ik' k'oneyiruwok noamfere shino maants wotit keewo keewit kim shayiro biyatse fa'a ik'ets Gon baarna'ú weerindatse noon b datsi, Gonmanuwere Ik'o oot'at b doonzotssh ay oot'o b datsifo b teshi.
ACT 16:17 Biwere noonat P'awlosn shuutso shoydek'at sha'at, «Ashaanots een Ik'o gutswotsiye! boowere kash weerindo itsh keewitúnee!» etaat b kuhefooni.
ACT 16:18 Hanoewre ay aawosh aani aani bk'alfoni, P'awlosmó nibok'úúnwutsat wongr et aanat kiimshayirman «Iyesus Krstos shútson biatsotse nkeshetuwok'o neen azazere!» bí eti. Kim sharonuwere manoor k'azb́keshi.
ACT 16:19 Bin keezfwotswere b weeron bodatsit oot'o boatse k'ut'b́wtstsok'o bek'bok'rtsok'on P'awlosnat Silasn detsbodek'i, geetsferowere jebomaants dek'amt naashwots shinats t'intsbok'ri.
ACT 16:20 Rom dats naashuwotsokowere dek'wat hank'o boeti, «Ashaanots Ayhudi jírnee, no kitotsnowere dimbro botuziri,
ACT 16:21 Noo Rom dats ashuwots dek'o nofalrawu niwo noosh bodaniyiri.»
ACT 16:22 Ashjamonwere ik wotdek't boats b́tuwi. Naash naashuwotsuwere P'awlosnat Silasn taho sholbazt gumbon botogetuwok'o boazazi.
ACT 16:23 Ayidek't botogeyi hakon t'ip'moots kindsh bok'iri, tipi maa kotiruwonuwere k'up'ide boon b́kotetuwok'o azazk'reyi,
ACT 16:24 Kotiruwo azazetsman b́dek'iyakon, tipi maaman gitsotsi kayuts boon kindsh b́k'ri, botufonowere gindonat gindi dagots detsidek't tipb́k'ri.
ACT 16:25 T'ú Taali titso maantsowere P'awlosnat Silasn Ik' k'ononat dubon Ik'o údfetstni boteshi, tipeets k'oshuwotswere bóóna bok'ebiri botesh.
ACT 16:26 Gawerawonowere tipimaaman b́ned'oko b́gaahefetsosh een dats shek'eyo wotb́wtsi, fengesh jamwotswere k'eshebowutsi, tipetswotsi boon tipeets habiliyo ik ikon bish b́wutsi.
ACT 16:27 Kotiruwonuwere b́tokrootse tuut tipimaa fengesuwots k'eshewutsat boere bek't tipetswots k'azbokeshtsok'o bísh bíarere b́ tooko úd'osh b́shiko kaas'b́dek'i,
ACT 16:28 Ernmó P'awlos, «No no únetswor hanok noone! manshe ntokats gondofink'aye!» ett k'aar eenon b́kúhi.
ACT 16:29 Manoor kotiruwo c'eesho de'eweetuwok'o wosht gitsots b́kindi, k'eewufetst P'awlosnat Silasn tufi shirots b́baron gúp'nb́wútsi.
ACT 16:30 Úrats boon kishdekt «T Doonzotso! kashosh eegk'ale taan b́geyiyti?» bí eti.
ACT 16:31 Bowere «Doonzo Ieyesusn amanowe, kashituwune, nmeyitsi ashuwotswere kashitúne» boeti.
ACT 16:32 Doonzo aap'onowere bínat b́meyitse fa'a jamwotssh bokeewi.
ACT 16:33 manoori sa'aton t'úwon tipimo kotiruwo dek'amt bogaawo bo atse b́mashi, manoor bínat b́maa ash jamwots bogúpeyi.
ACT 16:34 Maniyere hakon P'awlosnat Silasn b́mook dek'amt misho boosh b́t'intsi, Ik'onowere bí amantsosh b́meyitsi ashuwotsnton geneú b́wutsi.
ACT 16:35 B́ gatstsok'onowere naash naashuwots «Ash manots faksheewunee» ett polisuwotsi bowoshi.
ACT 16:36 Tipi maa kotfonuwere «It it faksheetuwok'o naash naashuwots asho bowoshtsotse eshe keer jeenon ameree» ett Silassh b́keewi.
ACT 16:37 P'awlosmó «Rom datsi ashnowotefere nayiralon jebatse noon jot't tipimoots noon kindshrnee. Andowere tipi mootse ááshon nokeshetuwok'owe bok'aliri? Woteratse! bo botookon waar noon kishunee!» ett bíaani.
ACT 16:38 Poliswots keewuman naash naashuwotssh bokeewi, naah naashuwotswere P'awlosnat Silasn Rom dats ashuwotsi bowoto bodantsok'on shatbowtsi.
ACT 16:39 Mansh waat naandrone ett aatt tipimootse boon kishbok'ri, kitmanitsnowere boametuwok'o boon bok'oni.
ACT 16:40 P'awlosnat Silasnowere tipi mootse kesht Lidiy moots bokindi, manoknowere eshu eshuwotsi daatsdek't boon kup'sht kitmanowere faksht k'azbo ami.
ACT 17:1 P'awlosnat Silasn Anfip'olisnat Ap'olon weeron beshat Teselonk'e maants boami, manoknowere ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni moo fa'ee b́teshi.
ACT 17:2 P'awlos maniyere shin b́ k'alfok'o ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni moots b́ kindi, keez gawuyiwoshowere b́k'ut'raawon S'ayin mas'aafotse ash ashosh kish kitsfetstni b́ danifo.
ACT 17:3 Krstos gond bek'o de'er k'irotse tuwo bín b́geyituwok'o kitsit danifetst «Taa itsh b́ jangosh doo tshishyiru Iyesus Krstosiye» bíetfera b́tesh.
ACT 17:4 Mann boyitse ik ikuwots b́ aap'o t'iwintsdek't P'awlosnat Silasnton ikbowoti, mank'owere Ik' Ik'iruwotswere aydek't ayts Ik'i ash woterawwots, kitutse daneets ay máátsuwots b́ aap'o t'iwintsdek't bínton ik bowoti.
ACT 17:5 Ayhudiwotsmó okoort fay tizitu fin deshawwotsi weer weeratse kakudek't tuuz bok'ri. Kitutse fayo b́tuwitwok'o bo woshi, P'awlosnat Silasn kishde'er ash ashosh imosh Iyason moo guurbodeki.
ACT 17:6 Ernmó boon bo t'ut'tsok'oon Iyasonnat amants ik ikuwotsi kitmanitsi naashuwotssh t'intsosh geetsfere dek't boami, hank'o etfetst bokuhiri boteshi, «Hanots datsjamo gaak rne ando hanok waarnee!
ACT 17:7 Iyasonwere boon dek't ibiree, ‹Iyesusi eteets k'osh nugúso fa'ee› ett Rom Naashi Naasho alo bok'efiri.»
ACT 17:8 Ash ashonat kitutsi naash naashuwots man boshishtsok'on dimbr bowutsi
ACT 17:9 Iyasonnat k'oshuwotsn wusho s'eegiyit fakshbokri.
ACT 17:10 Eshu eshuwots P'awlosnat Silasn káári t'úwon Bery maants bo amtuwok'o bowoshi, Manok bo bodtsok'on ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni moots bokindi.
ACT 17:11 Beriyan fa'a ayhudiyots Teselonk'en fa'wotsiyere bogo kááwu finek boteshtsotse b́ aap'o gene'úwi eenon bodek'i, b́ aap'o ar b́ wotok'o kitsosh aawu aawon S'ayn mas'afotsi bos'ilfoni.
ACT 17:12 Mansh boyitsere ayuwots boamani, ay Grik datsatsi gaaletswots máátswots ay Grik datsatsi nungushuwots boamani.
ACT 17:13 Ernmó Teselok'en fa'a ayhudiyots P'awlos Beriyon Ik'i keewuts keewo b́ nabiruwok'o bodantsok'on manoor waat ashuwotsi gondon tizt bowaac'rituwok'o botizi.
ACT 17:14 Manoor eshu eshuwots káári P'awlos aats k'ari ganok b́ ametuwok'o bowoshi Silasnat T'imotiyosnmó manoke Beriyon bo oori.
ACT 17:15 P'awlosi deents ashuwots Ateni bobetsi «Silasnat T'imotoyosn ja'araniye káári tiyok woonee» etiru P'awlos tzaziyo detsdek't Beriyo maants boaani.
ACT 17:16 P'awlos Atenon wotdek't Silasnat T'imotiyosn b́ kotfere kitutsere dozets ik'uwots bos'entsok'o b́bek'tsotse ayidek't nibo b́k'uni.
ACT 17:17 Mansh ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni mootse ayhudiyotsnat Ik'osh Ik'iru ashuwotsnton jebatse aawu aawon b́ daatsiru ashuwotsnton b́mooshiri b́tehi.
ACT 17:18 Epikorosotsnat Istokotsi eteets bog danetuwots b́ maants waatni bomooshfoni. Ik ikuwots «Ooshiyiruwan eeg etee b́geyi?» bo etor, k'oshuwotsmó «Handr ik'uwots janga arefee b́ keewiri? boetiri, man boetiruwere P'awlos Iyesusnat k'irotse b́tuwi doo shishi keewi jango b́ danitsoshe.
ACT 17:19 Mansh P'awlosi detsdek't Ariyosfagosi eteets beyokoke kakuwets ash ashok dek'wat bísh hank'o boeti, Nee ndaniyiru handr danan eeg b́wottsok'o dano falituwonowáá?
ACT 17:20 Ib wotts ik ik keewwotsi noosh shiyirnee, mansh keewanots eeg bowottsok'o dano geefone.»
ACT 17:21 Man etts Atenitse beyirwotsnat Atenitse beyiru úridatsi ash jamwots handr keewu keewonat k'eboke bogizeyo beshiyo boshunfotsne.
ACT 17:22 Manoor P'awlos Aryosfagosn kakweetswots shinatse need'dek't hank'o bíet, «Ateen ashuwotso! jam weeron ayidek'at ik'uwotsi shatiru itwottsok'o t'iwintsdek'at dandek're,
ACT 17:23 It kitotse gúúrat ananat it Ik' it ik'irwoko t s'iile ‹Danerawo Izar Izeweri› ett guut'etsoko wosh biyatse t'intseyiru t'arap'ezo daatsre, eshe taa and itsh t keewir it danawo bín it ik'iruwo Izar Izewer jangoniye.
ACT 17:24 Bíye Datsonat datsatse fa'a jamo aztsoniyee, Daronat datsonsh doonze, bíye ash kishon ageets Ik'i moots beerake,
ACT 17:25 Kashonat kash jongon, k'osh keewwotsnowere ash jamosh imfo bí b́wottsotse bísh eegor shaprake, asho bín b́ tep'onowere bísh geyiratse.
ACT 17:26 Bíye ash naar jamone ik ashaatse azree, dats jamatsnowere bo beetuwok'o woshre, tiitsets duruwotsnat beyokuwotsnowere boosh b́ beezi.
ACT 17:27 Man b́ k'aluwere ashuwots doonzo geeyar daatso bofalituwok'owe, b́wotiyalor bí no ik iketsatse woka etaliye.
ACT 17:28 ‹Kasho daatsir nogiwit, Noo beetuwere bíne,› Manuwere itk wotts jááwetswots ‹Noo noúnets b́ nana' noone› bo ettsok'onee.
ACT 17:29 Eshe noo b́ nana'a nowotiyakon ‹Ik'o ash danon, hasabiyon awntson wee ambaron wee shútson dozets aroniye bíari› err gawo noosh geyiratse.
ACT 17:30 Eshe ashuwots yoots dúr dáron bok'altso Ik'o kabiraniyere k'az beshere, andomó dats datsatse fa'a ash jamwots naandrone boetetuwok'o azazere,
ACT 17:31 Bí b́marat'ts asho weeron dats jamatse arikon b́angshit aawo beezdek're, hanowere jametsosh daniyidek't b́bek'sh b́marat'ts ashman k'irotse b́tuztsotsnee.»
ACT 17:32 «K'irotse tuuwa» etiru aap'o boshishtsok'on ik ikuwots bín boaatsni, k'oshuwotsmó «Han jango k'osh aawots nkeewure k'ebetuwonee» boeti.
ACT 17:33 Maniyere hakon P'awlos kakuwets ashuwotsoke kesht k'az bíami,
ACT 17:34 Ash ik ikuwotsmó bínton ik wotat boamani, amants ashuwotsitsnowere Aryosfagosn kakuwetsuwotsitso Diyonasyosi eteets ashonat Demarisi eteets mááts ikunu, k'oshuwotswere boyitse fa'ano.
ACT 18:1 Maniyere hakon P'awlos Atenitse tuut K'orontosi bíami,
ACT 18:2 Manoke P'ant'os datsatse shuwek wottso Ak'ili eteetso Ayhudi ash iko b́daatsi, Rom naashi naasho K'elawudiwos Ayhudi jamo Romitse bokeshetuwok'o azazat b́ teshtsotse Ak'il b́ máátsu P'rsk'lntoon It'aaliyitse manoora b́waa, mann P'awlos book amt bonton b́daneyi,
ACT 18:3 B́fiino ari bokok'o dunkani shipo b́teshtsotse bonton towaat beedek'tn b́fiinefo.
ACT 18:4 Sanbati aaw aawonowere ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse datseyar mooyr ayhudiwotsnat Grik dats ashuwots keewman bo dek'etwok'o b́wooshfoni.
ACT 18:5 Silasnat T'imotiwosn Mek'odonitse bowatsok'on P'awlos «Iyesusye Mesihyoniye» eton ayhudiwotssh kup'dek't gawefetst daniyoke bíaawu jamo b́beshifoni b́tesh.
ACT 18:6 Ernmó bín k'efat boc'ashor b́ tahatsi k'úndo tebatt «Eshe itats angsheyal it took t'afiyonee! taan bítse aateratse, haniyak Ik' ash woterawwotsok k'ay ametuwe!» bí eti.
ACT 18:7 Mann boatse k'aleyat Titos Iyost'osi eteets asho mook k'azbiami, ashaan Ik'o Ik'if asha b́tesh, b́moonwere ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mooniyere beshaatni b́tesh.
ACT 18:8 K'ersp'osi eteefo ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni maa jishiruwo b́meytsi ash jamonton Doonzo bíamani, ay K'orontos ashuwotswere P'awlos b́ keewufere shisht amanat bogúpeyi.
ACT 18:9 Doonzonuwere t'ú bek'on P'awlossh hank'o bíeti, «Shatk'aye, keewwe, s'k etk'aye,
ACT 18:10 Taaye neentonye tfa'oni, kitanitsere ay asho tdetstsotse gondo niyats betsosh falituwo konuworu aaliye.»
ACT 18:11 Mansh P'awlos Ik' aap'o ashuwotssh danifere ik natonat badosh manoke b́teshi.
ACT 18:12 Galiyos Akayiya datso altsi wotat b́ naashor ayhudiyots ik wotdek't P'awlosats botuwi, angshituwots shinatso bín dek'amt,
ACT 18:13 «Ashaan Muse nemo b́ k'efts weratse ashuwots Ik'o bo ik'ituwok'o b́ woshiri!» boeti.
ACT 18:14 P'awlos boosh aaniyosh k'andek't b́befere Galyos ayhudiwotssh hank'owa bíet, «It Ayhudi jirwotso! itats gondo wee weralo finere wotink'ere it t'intsts s'aamiyo k'amde tk'ebank'oni b́teshi,
ACT 18:15 Ernmó aap'uwotsnat shúts jango it nemi jangosha it mooshiri wotiyal man it took kis'e, taa keewanotsats angshosh geeratse.»
ACT 18:16 Hank'o ett moosh mooshiruwoke boon b́kishi.
ACT 18:17 Manoor jamwots ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni maa jishiruwo Sostensn detsdek'et angishiruwots shinatse boojot'i, jaman b́wotefere Galyos kis'odeshatse.
ACT 18:18 P'awlos eshuwotsnton ay aawosh K'orontosi b́teshiyakon jamiyere Soriyo maants bíami, P'irsk'lnat Ak'iln bíntoni boteshi, ernmó wosho b́detstsotse bíamoniyere shinon Knkiriya eteyiru datsatse b́tooko b́ s'ageyi.
ACT 18:19 Efesoni bobodtsok'ono P'rsk'lonat Ak'ilon manoke oori bok'ri, bímó Ayhudi Ik' k'oni moots kindt ayhudiyotssh keewo b́ keewufoni.
ACT 18:20 Ay aawosh bonton b́teshetuwok'o bok'oniyalor eekeratse.
ACT 18:21 Ernmó «Ik'o bí eteetka wotiyal k'oshoor itok aanarr weetuwe» etk'raat Efesonitsere markabots kinddek't k'azbíami.
ACT 18:22 K'isarimaantsowere b́bodtsok'on maniyere Iyerusalem maants kesht Ik'i meyitsi ashuwotssh jamo b́ t'intsiyakon aanat Ans'okiyi maants k'az b́ oot'i.
ACT 18:23 Manoknowere muk'i b́teshi, maniyere hakon Gelatiynat Frgiy datsatse ikoke tuut ikok gúúrefetst amantsuwotsi b́ kup'iyi.
ACT 18:24 Iskndri datsatse shuwetso Ap'losi eteets Ayhudi asho Efesoni b́weyi, bí S'ayin mas'aafwotsi t'iwintsdek't dankoonat noon keewonowere sheengshdek't keewo falk asha b́tesh.
ACT 18:25 Doonzo weerindi jangonowere dandek't S'ayin shayronowere aat'k wotat Iyesus jangonowere kaatsdek' nabfetst b́danifoni, wotowa eree bí b́danfo Yohans gupo s'uzi b́tesh.
ACT 18:26 Bí ááwushuk'on ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse keewo dek't b́tuwi, ernmó P'rsk'ilnat Ak'iln b́ keewiruwo boshishtsok'on bo gal dek'amt Ik'i weero baltsoniyere bogo kaatsdek bitsdek't bísh bokitsi.
ACT 18:27 Ap'los Akayiyo maants amoosh b́gawtsok'oon eshuwots b́keewuman botep'i, Akayiyitse fa'a eshuwots bí sheengon de'er boibituwok'o work'atats guut'ets wosho woshbok'ri, manok b́bodtsok'oonowere Ik'i s'aaton amantsuwotsi wotosh bodtswotsi ayidek' b́ tep'i.
ACT 18:28 Iyesus Mesihiyo b́wotsok'o S'ain mas'afwotsitse Ik' aap'o biitsdek' keewut kup'ts mooshon ayhudiwotsi b́ da'afoni.
ACT 19:1 Ap'los K'orontositse b́teshor P'awlos danbani datson beshat Efeson maants b́bodi, manokno muk' Krstaniyotsi daatsdek't
ACT 19:2 «It amanor S'ayn shayiro dek'rteya b́teshi?» ett bíaati. Bowere «De'atsone, S'ayn shayiro b́beyonoru dab shish danaak noone» ett bo aani.
ACT 19:3 P'awlosu «Eshe aawu naari gúpe it gúpetsoni?» bí eti. Bowere «Yohanis gúponiye» boeti.
ACT 19:4 P'awloswere «Yohans guponiyere naandrone etosh k'aleke, ash ashosh b́keewutsonuwere ‹Taayere il wetuwonee amanore› etfetstni b́tesh, bíwere Iyesusiye» etreboosha.
ACT 19:5 Man boshishtsok'on Doonzo Iyesus shútson bogupeyi.
ACT 19:6 P'awlosu b́ kisho boats b́gedor S'ayin shayiro boats b́ od'eehandr noon keewon bokeeweyi, bek'ono keewo dek'tbotuwi.
ACT 19:7 Ash jamwotswere tatse gitne boteshi.
ACT 19:8 P'awlos ayhudiyots Ik' k'oni mook amt keez shashok'owosh Ik' mengst jangosh mooshfetst ash ashuwotssh kish keewut ááwu shuk'ona b́ danifoni.
ACT 19:9 Ik ikuwotsmó maac' kup'o wotat doonzo weerindo ashuwots shinatse c'ashfetst amaneratsone boettsosh boatse k'azb́woki, amantsuwots boaali T'iranosi eteef maa eenok dek'amt aawu aawon boon b́danifoni.
ACT 19:10 P'awlos hank'o b́k'al git natok'osha, manoor Isiy datsatse beyiru ayhudiyotsnat Ik' ashwoterawwotsn doonzo aap'o shisho bofali.
ACT 19:11 Ik'o ayidek't adits keewu wotts milikituwotsi P'awlos kishon b́finefoni.
ACT 19:12 Manatse tuutson P'awlos atsats bodts tahonat marabon dek'amt shodetsuwotsats bobetsor boshodotse bokashefoni, kim shayirwotswere boyitse bokeshfoni.
ACT 19:13 Fo'erawono ashaatse kishfetst ikoke tuut ikok guuriru Ayhudi ik ikuwots «P'awlos b́ nabiruwo doonzo Iyesus shútson it kesheetuwok'o iti azazerone» eton fo'erawo ashaatse kishosh bo etfoni.
ACT 19:14 Ayhudiwots kahinwotsatsi naasho wottso Ask'ewu nana'a shawatuwotswere mank'owa bok'alfo.
ACT 19:15 Ernmó kim shayiro «Iyesusi danfee! P'awlosnor danfee! Eshe it konots itne?» bí eti.
ACT 19:16 Kim shayiro bíatse s'eents ash ikonwere t'oolat gúúk' dek'on boats b́kup'i, bonowere da'ab́dek'i, gaawutnuwere araatswtsaat meyitse giifat bokeshi.
ACT 19:17 Keewumanuwere Efesonitse beyiru ayhudiwotsnat Ik' ash woterawotsoke b́ shishetsotse jametso shatb́wtsi, Doonzo Iyesus shútsonowere ayi eenb́wutsi.
ACT 19:18 Amantsuwotsitse ayuwotsuwere bogond fino kish keewut naandrone err bowaafoni.
ACT 19:19 Atetswotswere bodaniyi mas'aafwotsi kakudek't ash ashi shinatse mitsbok'ri, mas'afmanoots k'awuntsonuwere taanere balk'ats kum ambari katso wotatni b́daatsiyi.
ACT 19:20 Mank'oon doonzo keewo ayidek't gawunfetst da'afera bí amfo b́teshi.
ACT 19:21 Jaman b́wotiyakon P'awlos Mek'edonitsnat Akayiyiweeron beshat Iyerusalem maants amoosh b́gitsoon gawuk'rat «Manok t bodiyakon Rom maants amo taash geyife» bíetí.
ACT 19:22 Mann Ik'i fino finiru ashuwotsitse gitetsuwotsi, T'imotiwosnat Erast'osn Mek'edoni maants woshat bí b́tookon Isiyi datsatse muk' aawosh b́teshi.
ACT 19:23 Manoor doonzo weeri jangosh Efesonitse dimbiro tuub́wtsi.
ACT 19:24 Dimet'rosi eteef ambaar wos'if iko Art'emisn ik' maa aro ambaron doozt ambaar wos'iyiruwotssh ay oot'o b́daatsifoni.
ACT 19:25 Mansh ashaan ambaar wos'iyiruwotsnat bo fini naari fin detsts k'osh ashuwtsi kakudek't boosh hank'o bí eti «It ashuwotso! Noo gaalo nodaatsir finan finat b́wottsok'o danfte,
ACT 19:26 P'awlosan ‹Ash kishon dozets aranots Izar Izewerotsiyaliye› ett Efeson s'uzitse b́woterawo muk' datsuniyere okoon Isiyi dats jamatse awuk'o ayts ashonton keweek'rat bí amanitsok'o it it tookon bek'aat it shishtsoniye.
ACT 19:27 Eshe hank'on nofino b́ gac'ewoniye, manmec'ro b́woterawon Isiyotsnat dats jamatse ash jamo bin b́ ik'yiru een izar izewer Art'emis Ik'i moo dats baashon b́ ooroniye, bi een wotonwere b́wonewoniyee.»
ACT 19:28 Ashuwotswere man boshishtsk'on fayat, «Efesontsu Art'emisiye eeniye!» etfetst bokuhi.
ACT 19:29 Kitunuwere jamon shek'e bwutsi, ashuwotswere Mek'odoni datsatse shuwets P'awlosnton tohaat sha'iru b́ tooh gituwots Gayyosnat Arst'rokosn detsdek't geetsfere ash ashuwots bokoeyiruwok bowos'i.
ACT 19:30 P'awloswere ashuwotsok amoosh geyatni b́tesh, b́ danifuwotsmó bíamawok'o bobazi.
ACT 19:31 Isiy datsatsi naashuwotsitswere b́shuntsuwotsitsi ik ikuwotsi P'awlosok asho woshat «Ashuwots ko'eyiruwok amr n be'erawok'owa» ett bok'oni.
ACT 19:32 Ashuwots dagotse wac'ro b́teshtsotse aywots eegosh bokoetsok'o dab danatsno b́teshi, man jangosh iko ik keewo keewt b́kuheere k'oshonuwere k'osh keewo keewut b́kuhiri.
ACT 19:33 Ik ik Ayhudi jirwots Iskndiri eteets asho ash dagotsere gifnidek't shinats bot'ntsi, ashuwotsitse ik ikuwots sheengshde'ere b́moshetuwok'o boizi, Iskendiruwere ashuwots s'k boetetuwok'o b́kishon kitst bín kishit keewosh k'anb́dek'i.
ACT 19:34 Ernmó Iskendr Ayhudi b́wotok'o ash jamwots bodantsok'on «Efesontsu Art'emis eeniye!» et fetst git sa'atok'osh ik k'aaron bokuhi.
ACT 19:35 B́s'uwatse kitutsi guut'f naash eeno, ash asho s'k boaayituwok'o wosht hank'o bíeti, «It Efeson ashuwotso! Efeson kitutse beyiruwots, eenu Art'emis ik' moonat darotse oot'ts bí'aro bokotetuwok'owo jametsuwotsoke daneke.
ACT 19:36 Han haalitwo konuwor bíaaltsotse s'k it eteetuwok'o, kááronowere gond keewo k'aloniyere it atso kor itdek'tuwok'o geyife.
ACT 19:37 Ik'i moo c'ayawotsnat noko Izar Izeweri c'ayawu gond keewono keewuraw ashuwotsi hanok dek'at waartee.
ACT 19:38 Dimet'rosnat bínton fa'a k'is' k'is'fuwotsi s'aamiru asho b́beyalowere angsh imet aawwots fa'ane, naashuwotsuwere fa'ane, manoke mooynee.
ACT 19:39 K'osho it geyiru keewo b́beyaalmó nemon k'oorosh beyiruwotsn s'iiletuwe.
ACT 19:40 Maniyere okoonmó hambets k'aleets keewo ‹Dimbiro tuuzre› err no s'aamirawok'owa shatituwe, ‹Baad'eyan eegatsneya b́tuwi› err noon aatewor no aaniyituwo deshatsone»
ACT 19:41 Manowere ett kakuwets ashuwots bobad'ituwok'o b́woshi.
ACT 20:1 Dimbro b́ neediyakon P'awlos amantsuwotsi ikok s'eegt izon boon b́kup'iyi, boon jamik'ratnuwere Mek'edoni eteets datso maantsan bíami.
ACT 20:2 B́ beshiru datsmanotsatsno amantsuwotsi ay izon kup'ifere Grik datso maants bíami.
ACT 20:3 Manokno keez shasho b́ teshi, maniyere hakon markabon Soriy datso maats amoosh b́gawi, ayhudiyitsmó bín fayosh botutsok'o b́dantsotse Mek'edoni weeron anoosh k'ut'b́dek'i.
ACT 20:4 P'irhus naay Sop'at'ros Beriyotse, Arst'rokosnat Sikondusn Teselonk'en, Gayyosn Derben, T'imotiwos, Tikik'osnat T'rofimosn Isiyon bínton tohaat boami.
ACT 20:5 Bowere shin shino amt T'iroadn noon bokoti.
ACT 20:6 Noomó tush meyet baalio b́ beshiyakon Filp'isyusitse Markabats keshat úúts aawon bo bobeyiruwok T'iro'adayits bodat bíyokere shawat aawo nobeshyi.
ACT 20:7 Torbanotsere shnts aawots misho tishde'er iknon moowosh nokakweyi, P'awlos yats gúrok'on bíametwootse ko'ets ashuwotssh b́ keewiri, b́ keewono talitiitso b́borfetso b́geezi.
ACT 20:8 No no ko'ets dadratse ay c'eesho fa'e b́teshi.
ACT 20:9 Ewut'ek'isi eteets jawets na'iko meskotiyatse beedek'tniye b́ teshi, P'awlos b́ keewo b́ geezitsotse jawetsman tokri eeno detsb́dek'i, tokro bín b́ datsotse keezl dadratsere dashan b́dihi, ashuwots bok'awere k'irt b́datseyi.
ACT 20:10 Ernmó P'awlos oot't na'ats tuumt matdek't «And kashone b́ fa'oni bíeti, tek'k'ayere!» bí eti.
ACT 20:11 P'awlos dadrats aani kesh waat misho tiitsdek't amantsuwotsnton b́meyi, datso b́gatsfetsosh ashuwotsnton keewefetst b́teshiyakon k'azbíami.
ACT 20:12 Ashuwotswere kashts jawetso moots dek'boami, mannowere ayidek't kup'bowutsi.
ACT 20:13 P'awlosi markabots kindshosh nogawutsatse noo shinat markabots Asosits noami, man nok'aluwere P'awlos Asosits b́borfetso b́ tufoon amoosh bí ettsosh hank'o no k'alituwok'o noon b́ azaztsotsne.
ACT 20:14 Bínton Asositse nogonkewor markabots bín kindshdek' milit'its maants towaat noami.
ACT 20:15 Yaats guurok'on manoke tuwat Kiyositse shinatse fa'a datsuwats markabon amnobodi, yaatsok'o Samos maants kimaat yaats guurok'on Milit'iyits amnobodi.
ACT 20:16 P'awlos Isiyotse t teyawok'wa ett Efesoniyere beshat k'ay amo b́ geyi, man b́ k'aluwere P'ent'ek'ost'yi baaliyo Iyerusalemitse daatseyo gawut b́teshtsotsna b́tesh.
ACT 20:17 P'awlos Milit'itsere Efeson maants asho woshat Ik'i maa eenashuwotsi b́ s'eegiyi,
ACT 20:18 Bíyok bowatsok'on boosh hank'o bíeti, «Isiyots tkindts aawotstson tuut jam aawo itnton awuk'o tbeetsok'o itwoor danfte,
ACT 20:19 Ayhudiwots tiats bo malts k'od'atse tuutson gondbek'o tiats b́bodaloru ttooko dashan detsonat eeponee doonzo fino t finefoni.
ACT 20:20 Jebatsnowere it maa mootsnowere itsh tdaniyor itsh t'ak'amitu jamoni tkeewi bako eegoru itsh t shapitso aaliye.
ACT 20:21 Ayhudiyotsi wotowa Ik' ash woterawwots naandrone err Ik'o maants bo aanituwok'o doonzo Iyesus Krstosi bo amanituwok'oye b́gawi.
ACT 20:22 Andoor bíyok tbodor tiyats bodetwo eeg b́wto t dartsotse s'ayn shayirosh aleyat Eyerusalem maats ti amoniye.
ACT 20:23 Wotowa eree kit kitotse tipewonat gond bek'on taan b́kotiruwok'o S'ayin shayiro taash keewure.
ACT 20:24 Doo shishi keewo Ik' s'aaton daniyosh doonzo Iyesusoke t k'aaútdek'ts fino tishink'ere t kashi jango k'awuntsots gerawunk'e, t kashoshowere kis'o deshawnk'e.
ACT 20:25 «Andish b́borfetso it jamets dagotse ananat Ik'i mengsti jango t nabiri, haniyere okonomó ititsere konuworu t shiitso b́ jamon b́ be'awok'o danfee.
ACT 20:26 Mansh ititsere ikdonzworu b́t'afiyal b́ s'atsotse taan aaterawok'o hambets aawon itsh danirwe.
ACT 20:27 Ik'o bí'asabts jamo itsh keewuni tishi bako eegoru t oorits keewo aaliye.
ACT 20:28 S'ayn shayiro jintswotsi woshdek't iti naashire, eshe it tokonat it jiniru gizi s'eeni jangosh it atso korde'ere, Ik'o b́ naay s'atson keewudeb́k'ts Ik'i moo korere.
ACT 20:29 Taa ti amiyakon gizi s'eenosh máác' k'ewerawo elahok'o maac' kup' wotts ashuwots bits bokindituwok'o danfee.
ACT 20:30 Mank'owore ash ik ikwots ititse tuur k'úúr daniyo daniyir ayi amantsuwotsi bomaants geetsitune.
