ACT 20:31 Eshe it ik iketsi keez natosh t'úwonat aawon ti aac'uwo kuut'fetsat itn ti'iztsok'o gawufetsr itatso korde'ere.
ACT 20:32 «Andoor iti kup'shr S'ayinwots dagotse rstiyo imosh falitu b́s'aati aap'onshowere adaro iti imre.
ACT 20:33 Taa kon ambaaronowere, awntsonowere wee taho tewunratse.
ACT 20:34 T took kishon finefetsat ttooko wotowa ttohuwotsi t tep'fok'o it tookon danfte.
ACT 20:35 ‹Dek'iruwoniyere bogo imiruwo deereke› etiru doonzo Iyesus aap'tso gawufetsr, nokishon angmaawtswotsi tep'o noosh b́ geyituwok'o ay weerindon itsh kitsre.»
ACT 20:36 Maniyere hakon P'awlos jametsuwotsnton tuk'maldek't Ik'o b́k'oni.
ACT 20:37 Jametsuwots eept P'awlosi matdek't bojoobi.
ACT 20:38 Dabtnu aydek't shiyanatnuwere, «Haniyak tshitso be'atste» boosh bí'ettsatse tuutsone, Markabok b́ borfetsosho bín bodeni.
ACT 21:1 Boo'atse nok'aleyakon Markabats keshdek'at kawon K'osi eteets ats k'aron gúrts datsuk noami, yats gúúrok'on Rúdi eteets ats k'aron gúrts datsuk nobodi, manokno P'at'ray eteets kitots no'ami.
ACT 21:2 Manokno Fink'e datso maants amiru Markabu daatsat bíyats keshdek'at sha'osh notuwi.
ACT 21:3 K'op'ros aats k'aron gúrts datsu nogiro maants k'azk'rat Sori datso maants amaat Tiros aats k'ari gúroki datsuk no'ami, markabunwere bkuro manok orsho bín geyfe bteshi.
ACT 21:4 Manokere amantsuwotsi geeyat nodatsiyakon bonton shawat aawosh manoke noteshi. Bowere S'ayn shayiron jisheyat P'awlossh «Iyerusalem maants amk'aye» ett bokeewi.
ACT 21:5 Manoke no ja'ats aawman b́ s'uwutsok'on boatse k'aleyat sha'o notuwi, jametsuwotsuwere bomááts máátsonat bonana'uwotsnton wotat kitoniyere nokeshfetso noon bodeni, aats k'ari gúrats tuk'maldek'at Ik'o no k'oniyakon nok'aleyi.
ACT 21:6 No jamiyakon no markabots no nokindre bo bomoo maants k'az bo aani.
ACT 21:7 T'rositse tuwat P'et'elemays maants nobodi, manokno amantsuwotsnton gonkeyat jamo no'ateyakon bonton ik aawo nojini.
ACT 21:8 Yaats guurok'on manokere keshat K'isariyo maants no'ami, bíyokno shawat Dak'oniyotsitsere ik wottso doo shishiyo nabiruwo Filp'os meyits kindat bínton nobeyi.
ACT 21:9 Bíwere bek'on keewo boosh imets awd baar nana'a mááts amawwotsi detsfe b́teshi.
ACT 21:10 Ay aawosh manokere nobemanoor Agabosi eteets Nebiyo Yhud datsatse b́weyi.
ACT 21:11 Nebiyanuwere nook t'int, P'awlos edo k'aaúdek't b́ took kishonat b́tufuwotsi tipt «S'ayin shayiro eedan doonzi Iyerusalemn fa'a ayhudiyots hank'o tifde'er Ik' ash woterawwotssh beshide'er imetune etfe» bí eti.
ACT 21:12 Man noshishtsok'on noowere manoke fa'a ashuwotswere P'awlos Iyerusalem maants bíamawok'o nok'oni.
ACT 21:13 P'awlosmó «Hank'o eepat eegishe tnibo shiyanon it tiitsiri? Taa doonzo Iyesus shúts jangosh Iyerusalemitse tipee mec'r b́woterawo k'irosh k'andek'ktaane» ett bíaani.
ACT 21:14 Bo izono de'atse bíere «Beree doonzo bíettsok'o wotowe» etaat k'aznok'iri.
ACT 21:15 Manokno muk' aawwotssh noteshiyakon nok'ac'o k'anidek'at Iyerusalem maants noami.
ACT 21:16 K'isariyitse fa'a amants ik ikuwots noonton tohaat boweyi, boowere Mnason meyts nokashdek'etwok'o b́moo maants noon bojishi, ashaamanwere shini amantso K'op'ros datsatse shuweke b́teshi.
ACT 21:17 Iyerusalemits nobodtsok'on amantsuwots geneúwon noon bodek'i.
ACT 21:18 Yaats guurok'on P'awlos noonton Yak'obok bíami, Ik'i maa eenash jamwots manokna botesh.
ACT 21:19 P'awlos jametsuwotsi jamo b́aatiyakon b́weeron Ik'o Ik' ashwoteraw ashuwotsitse b́k'alts jamo ik ikon b́ keewi.
ACT 21:20 Man boshishtsok'on jametsuwots doonzo boúdi, P'awlosshowere hank'o boeti, «Eshuwonoo! ay kumon taawetu amantsuwots ayhudiwotsitse bo beyiruwok'onat jametsuwotswor bo nemosh okooretsuwotsi bowottsok'o danfnee,
ACT 21:21 Nee Ik' ash Woteraw ashuwotsitse beyiru ayhudiyi jamwotssh ‹It nanaúwotsi gofo damik'ayere wee nemok'o fink'ayere› etaat daniyat Muse nemo b́ gahituwok'o nk'aliri ett keeweyirwo bo shishrne.
ACT 21:22 Eshe eeg k'ale b́ geyiyiti? n woono arikon shishrne,
ACT 21:23 Eshe no no'etetuwo k'aluwe, noyitse wosho detsts awd ashuwots fa'ane.
ACT 21:24 Boon de'amr bonton wotar ntooko s'ayintsuwe, botook s'iiro bos'agetuwok'o Ik' moosho imet mebi gizono nee boosh daye, hank'o n k'aliyal níats keewets jamo k'awuntsalk b́wottsok'onat neewere n tookon Muse nemosh alek nwottsok'o jametsuwots danetunee.
ACT 21:25 Ik' ashwoterawwots jirwotsitse amantsuwotsmó Woteraw ik'osh b́ t'intsotse kiimts woshi misho maak'ayere, s'atsonowere maak'ayere, guuk'at k'irts gizi meetso maak'ayere, widats wokoore ett guutt'eets keewu detsts woshi work'ato guut'dek'at itsh wosherone.»
ACT 21:26 Maniyere hakon P'awlos ashuwotsi dek'amt yaats guurok'on b́tooko b́s'ayintsi, bos'ayinet aawwots awur bo s'uwitwok'onat ik ikuwots jangoshowere Ik'osh imet mabi gizo b́ dashet gizwo awur b́wottsok'o daniyosh Ik'i moots b́kindi.
ACT 21:27 Shawt aawu manu beshosh b́t'intsk'on Isiyon waats ayhudiyots P'awlosi Ik'i mootse bobek'tsosh ash jamo bíyats tizt bín bodetsi,
ACT 21:28 «Israe'el ashuwotso! noosh gaatsowere! no ashonat no nemon, beyokanowere c'ashfetst dats datsatsi ash jamonowere daniruwo ashaaniye, hanuwere boratse ett Ik' ash woteraw ashuwotsi Ik' moots kindsht s'ayin beyokan k'imhsre!» ett bokuhi.
ACT 21:29 Hano boetuwere maniyere shin Efesonn shuwetso T'rofimos bínton kitotse bek't boteshtsoosh P'awlos bín Ik' moots dek't b́kindtsok'o boosh bíarernee.
ACT 21:30 Kit jamunwere dimbir bwutsi, ash jamonuwere wos'fere ikwotdek't waat P'awlosi detsdek't geetsfere Ik'i mootse bokishi, Ik'i maa fengeshuwotswere iknun is'ebowutsi.
ACT 21:31 Ashuwots P'awlosi úd'osh bogeetsok'on «Iyerusalem kitu bjamoon dimbir bwutsi» etiru wosho Rom datsatsi kes' naashok b́bodi.
ACT 21:32 Mansh bí kes'fuwotsnat bali naashuwotsi b́shuutsats jishdek't ashuwots maants kaari wos'fere bíami. Ashuwotswere kes'fuwotsnat boon jishiruwon bobek'tsok'on P'awlosi jot'o k'azbok'iri.
ACT 21:33 Jishiruwonuwere P'awlosok t'int detsdek't git habliyon b́tipetuwok'o bíazazi, maniyere hakon koni b́wottsok'onat eeg b́k'altsok'owo danosh geeyat bíaati.
ACT 21:34 Ash ashonwere ik ikwots ik keewo boere k'oshuwotsuwere k'osh keewa boetfera botesh, azazirumanwere ash ash kuhatse tuutson ari keewo dano b́maawtsotse P'awlosi kes' kes'fuwots kot bokotiru gimbiyok de'er boametuwok'o bí azazi.
ACT 21:35 P'awlos bíyats need'dek' dambaan kesheyirwok b́bodtsok'on ash jamo ayidek't b́faytsatse tuutson gondo biats betsosh bogeyiruwosh kes' kes'fuwots bín kurdek't k'azboami.
ACT 21:36 Ash ashonwere «Bín úd'ewe» etfere b́shuutso bosha'i.
ACT 21:37 Kes' kes'fuwots bo koti gimbiyok bín kindshosh bot'intsok'on P'awlos kes'iruwots abaatse alirwoh «Ik keewo neesh t keewituwok'o eekituneya taasha?» bí eti. Altsmanuwere «Grik dats noon keewu keewo danfiya? bí eti.
ACT 21:38 Eshe, and karnon fayo tizat awd kum kash úd'tswotsi woruwo maants dek't t'afts Gbs' asho nenalneya?»
ACT 21:39 P'awloswere «Taa Kilk'iyitse fa'a daneek wotts T'erses kitutse shuwets Ayhudi ash taane, oona neesha ashuwotssh t keewituwok'o taash eekowe» bí eti.
ACT 21:40 B́ keewituwok'o b́ ektsok'on P'awlos bíyatsneedeyiruwats need'dek't ash ashuwots s'ik boetetuwok'o b́kali, ash asho s'ik boettsok'on Ibrayist'iyi noon keewon hank'o ett keewo dek'btuwi.
ACT 22:1 «Ti eeshuwotsnat tnihotso! eshe and itsh tt'intsiru aani tdek'etuwo tiko k'ewere!»
ACT 22:2 Ibrayist'i noon keewu keewon b́ keewufere boshishtsok'on iki s'k etbowtsi, P'awloswere b́keewiru keewo b́ need'irawo hank'o bí eti.
ACT 22:3 «Taa Kilk'iyitse daatseyiru T'erses kitotse shuwets ayhudiwi taane, tieenmó Iyerusalem Kitmanitsne. Taan danifonuwere Gemalyailiye b́teshi, nih nihwots nemono shengshdek'at danre, hambets it k'aliruwank'o Ik'osh ookorona tfinefoni.
ACT 22:4 Krstni imneti shuuts sha'iryiru jamwotsi k'irosh borfetso t gishfoni, nungushuwotsnat máátsuwotsn tifde'er tipi moots bokindituwok'o twoshfoni.
ACT 22:5 Manuwere ar b́wottsok'o kahni naashonat eenashuwots taash gawitune. Eshe Demask'on fa'a ashaanotsi tifde'er Iyerusalem maants dewar boon Seziyosh taan falituwo Demask'on fa'a jirwotsoke guut'ets worek'ato tdek'iye boowokne.
ACT 22:6 «Taa Demask'o maants amfetsat kituk tt'infere aawu taalon t gawuraniyere een shááno darotse t gúratse b́goli.
ACT 22:7 Manoor dattsats dihi twutsi, ‹Sawulo! Sawulo! eegishe taan ngishiri?› etiru k'aaro tshshi.
ACT 22:8 Taawere ‹Doonzono! kone nee?› t eti, bíwere ‹Taahe nee ngishiruwo Nazrettso Iyesus taane› bí eti.
ACT 22:9 Taanton beyiru ashuwotswere shaanmani bobek'i bako taan b́keewiyor b́k'aaro shiyatsne.
ACT 22:10 Taawere ‹Doonzono! eeg k'aluta!› t eti. Doonzonuwere ‹Tuur Demask'o maants amee, k'alo neen b́geyit keewu jamo manoke neesh keewetuwe› bí eti.
ACT 22:11 Shanman goltsatse tuutson bek'o tfalrawotse taanton teshts ashuwots tkisho detsdek't taan jishfere Demask'oyi bobetsi.
ACT 22:12 «Manoke Hananiy eteef ash iko fa'e b́teshi, Demask'oyitse beyiru Ayhudi jamwotsoke udetso, Muse nemo kottsonat shayiri ashe b́teshi.
ACT 22:13 Bí waat t ganok need' dek't ‹Tieshu Sawulo! ni'aawo aani be'e!› taash bíeti, manorun tiaawo b́ bek'i, bínowere tbek'i.
ACT 22:14 Bíwere hank'o taash bíeti, ‹Nonihotsko Izar Izeweriye bíettso ndanetuwok'o kááwono be'er b́k'aronowere nshishetwok'o shin shino neen marat'ere,
ACT 22:15 Man b́k'aluwere bín bek'aat nshishtsotse ash jami shinatse bísh gawu nwotishe.
ACT 22:16 Eshe and eebi nkotiri? tuur b́shútso s'eer gúpeyowe, nmorratsnowere mashowe.›
ACT 22:17 «Maniyerehakon Iyerusalem maants aanat Ik'i mootse Ik'o tk'onfere tgitsotse t'iwintson bek'o tbek'i.
ACT 22:18 Doonzonwere taash be'eyat ‹Nee t jangosh n imet gawo bode'awotse nja'arawo káári Iyerusalemitse kee› bí eti
ACT 22:19 Taawere hank'o tieti, ‹Doonzono! Ayhudi Ik' k'oni maa mootse neen amants jamwotsi t tiptsok'onat tjot'tsok'o bo botookon danfnee.
ACT 22:20 N gawu teshtso Ist'ifanos úd'ewor taawere ttookon úd'iruwots ganok need'dek'at bonton keewumanats shiyeyatniye tteshi, botaahono tekotfere b́teshi,›
ACT 22:21 Doonzonuwere ‹Wokooke fa'a Ik' ash Woteraw ashuwotsok neen twoshitwotse tuur amee!› bí eti.»
ACT 22:22 Han b́ borfetsosh ash jamwots P'awlos keewiru keewo bok'ebfere boteshi, maniyre hakon bok'aaro eenshdek't, «Hank'o ashaan datsatse t'afuwe! hank'o ashaan kashon beyo bísh geyiratse!» ett bokuhi.
ACT 22:23 Bowere kuhefetst botaho shap'fetst shawono darots bobad'ri.
ACT 22:24 Altsonuwere man b́bek'tsok'on P'awlosi kes' kes'fuwots galots bokindshituwok'o bíazazi, ash ashonwere eegosh hank'o bíats bokúhiruwok'o danosh jod'fetsr aatetuwok'o bíazazi.
ACT 22:25 Ernmó shaak'on tifde'er jot'osh bok'anefere P'awlos b́ganoke need'iru bali naashosh «Rom dats ash iko tafiyalo njot'etuwok'o neesh faletuwá?» bí eti.
ACT 22:26 Bali naashonuwere han b́shishtsok'on alirwok amt «Eeg k'alishe? Ashaan Rom datsi ashe!» bí eti.
ACT 22:27 Mansh alirwo P'awlos maants t'int «Ab taash keewwe, nee Rom datsatsi ashneneya?» bíeti, bíwere «Ee taane» bí eti.
ACT 22:28 Azazefonuwere «Rom dats ashok'o taaweyosh ay gize tkishi» bíet, P'awloswere «Taayere Rom dats asho woto tdaats shuweyonee» bí eti.
ACT 22:29 Mansh bín aatosh k'andek't teshts ashuwots manoor bíyatse k'azbowoki, azazirwonuwere Rom dats asho habliyon b́tipo danb́k'rtsok'on shatb́wtsi.
ACT 22:30 Yaatsok'on azaziruwo, ayhudiwots P'awlosi bos'amitso arikon eegosh b́wottsok'o dano b́geyi, mansh kahni naashuwotsnat mooshiruwotsitsi jamwots bokakuweetuwok'o bí azazi, P'awlosnowere bits dek'amt boshinaats bí t'intsi.
ACT 23:1 P'awlos moosheyiruwok kakuweetsuwotsi t'iwintsdek't s'iilt «Ti eshuwotso! hambetsish b́ borfetso jam aawo Ik'i shinatse sheeng beyon tbeetsok'o t nibon danfee» bí et.
ACT 23:2 K'eesi naasho Hananiyimó P'awlos noono botogetuwok'o P'awlos ganoke need'iru ashuwotsi bíazazi.
ACT 23:3 Manoor P'awlos Hananiyish, «Nee nooron futets maa dir artsono! nenowere Ik'o togetuwee! nemok'on tjangosh angshosh beedek'atniya nemalon taan botogetuwok'o niazaziri?»
ACT 23:4 Manoke teshts ashuwots P'awlossh «Ik'i kahniwots naashoneya nc'shiri?» boeti.
ACT 23:5 P'awloswere «Ti eshuwotso! kahaniwotsatsi naasho b́wottsok'o danatse b́teshi, manwere eegoshe ‹Ni ashaatsi naashatse gondo aap'k'aye› etiruwo guut'ere» bí eti.
ACT 23:6 P'awloswere manoke fa'a ashuwotsitse k'atsuwots Seduk'awiya etetsuwotsi k'atsuwotswere feresawi etefuwotsi bo wotok'o dant «Ti eshuwotso! taa feresawi etetswotsatse feresawi taane, hamb! and angsheyiruwo tt'iniye noosh jangit imets k'irotse tuwi jangoshe» ett b́ k'aaro eenshdek't mooshiruwots taalotse b́ keewi.
ACT 23:7 P'awlos han b́ keewutsok'on feresawiyotsnat Seduk'awiya eteefuwots dagotse fayo tuut mooshiruwotsi gitok kay b́k'ri.
ACT 23:8 Seduk'awiya eteefuwots «K'irotse tuwo aaliye, melakiywotswere aalne shayironwere aaliye» boere feresawiyotsmó «Jamanots fa'ane» ettniye boamanefo.
ACT 23:9 Manoor dimbri eeno wotb́wtsi, ferisawi jirwotsitse ik ik nem danifuwots tuwut «Noo ashaanatse eegoru gond keewo daatsratsone, Shayro wee melakiyo bísh keewure b́wotiti, no eegoru danatsone?» ett bomooshi.
ACT 23:10 Fyonuwere kup'efere bíame ashuwots P'awlosn yec' yec'ay tiish ishitune ett shatt azaziruwo «Od'er P'awlosi ashuwots dagotse kishde'er woowere! kes'fuwots galots dek' boami!» et wotaderwotsi bíazazi.
ACT 23:11 Yatsok'ono t'úwun doonzo P'awlos ganok need'dek't «Shenono! Iyerusalemn taash n gawutsok'o, mannk'o Romits taash gawo neen geyituwe» bí eti.
ACT 23:12 Datso b́ gatstsok'on ayhudiyots kakuweewutsat «P'awlosn noo úd'raniyere mááyo máárátsone, aatsono úyatsone» ett botaareyi.
ACT 23:13 Malaanats shiyeets ashuwots taawonwere haboniyere bogfno boteshi.
ACT 23:14 Bowere kahni naashuwotsnat eenashuwotsok amt hank'o ett boosh bokeewi «P'awlosi nó úd'raniyere maayo nonots nogerawok'o kup'shdek'at taareerone,
ACT 23:15 Mansh it mooshiruwotsnton shiyede'er kúp'de'er bín it aatit keewok'o aride'er P'awlosi itsh bodewetuwok'o azaziruwo aatuwere, noowere hanok b́ boraftsere shinon úd'osh k'andek'rone.»
ACT 23:16 Ernmó P'awlos mish naay mal man b́shishtsotse kes' kes'fuwots galots amkindt P'awlossh b́keewi.
ACT 23:17 P'awloswere bali naashuwotsitse iko s'eegdek't «Na'an kes' azaziruwosh b́keewit keewo b́detstsotse bíyokde'er t'ine» bí eti.
ACT 23:18 Bali naashonuwere na'aman azaziruwok dek' kindt «Tipetso P'awlos taan s'eegt na'an neesh b́keewit keewo b́detstsotse niyok t t'intsituwok'o taan b́k'oni» bí eti.
ACT 23:19 Azaziruwonuwere na'o kisho detsdek't okaan dek'amt, «Taash nkeewituwo eebi?» ett bíaali bíaati.
ACT 23:20 Na'onuwere hank'o bíeti, «Ayhudiwots P'awlos keewo katsidek' k'ebiruwok'o araat yaats mooshiruwots shinaanats boosh nt'intsitwok'o neen aatosh ik wotwutserne.
ACT 23:21 Ernmó boosh eekfne, bín noúd'raawo mááyo máratsone, aatsonowere úyatsone ett taarts haboniyere bogts ashuwots bín úd'osh aashdek'rne, and bo bokotir boosh nkeewituwo s'uziye.»
ACT 23:22 Azaziruwonuwere «Keewan taash n keewutsok'o konshor daniyik'aye» ett na'o deen b́k'ri.
ACT 23:23 Maniyere hakon kes' azazefman bali naashwotsitse gituwotsi s'eegdek't «Ilitsi keez sa'ato b́wottsok'on K'isari maants git bal kes'fuwotsnat shab farshetsuwotsi, git bal gin shap'fuwotsnowere k'aniwere,
ACT 23:24 P'awlosshowere farsho it k'anire dats keewiruwok Filksok jeenon b́bodetuwok'o woshwore» bí eti.
ACT 23:25 Hank'o etiru woshonowere work'atats guut' b́k'ri,
ACT 23:26 «K'elawudiyos Lusyosoke, mangts dats k'eezfo Flkissh! jeeno neesh wotowe!
ACT 23:27 Ashaan ayhudiwots detsdek't úd'oshe boteshi, taamo Rom dats ash b́woto tdantsosh kes' kes'fuwotsnton bodat bín t wooriyi.
ACT 23:28 Eegatse tuutson bos'aamitsok'o danosh geeyat mooshiruwotsok t'intsree b́teshi.
ACT 23:29 Bos'amiwere bo nematse tuuts keewon b́wottsok'o tdaatsi, ernmó k'irosh wee tiposh bín betsit keewo aaliye.
ACT 23:30 Ashaan údosh maletsok'o tshishtsok'on manoor níyok twoshi, s'amiruwotsuwere bíyatse bodetsts s'aamiyo nshinatse bot'intsituwok'o boosh keewure.»
ACT 23:31 Mansh kes'kes'iruwots boon azazetsok'o Pawlosi t'úwon dek'amt Antip'at'risok bobetsi.
ACT 23:32 Yatsok'on Farshetsuwots P'awlosn ton boametuwok'o wosht boowere k'es' kes'fuwots gálo maants k'azboaani.
ACT 23:33 Farshetsuwotsuwere K'isariyo bo bodtsok'on worek'atats guut'ets woshman dats k'eziruwosh imt P'awlosi b́shinats bot'intsi.
ACT 23:34 Dats k'ezirowonu worek'atats gút'ets woshman b́nababi hakon P'awlossh Aawoki dats ashnene? ett bíaati, Kilik'iy dats ash b́ woto b́ dantsok'on
ACT 23:35 «Neen s'amiruwots boowor njango shishetuwe» bí eti. Herodis mengst moots b́ koteetuwok'owere bíazazi.
ACT 24:1 Úúts aawoniyere il kahni naasho Hanani eenash ikikuwotsnat T'ert'elusi eteef Nemo sheengshdek' dantsonton K'isari maants bíami, boowere dats k'eeziruwo Filiksok t'int P'awlosi bo s'aami,
ACT 24:2 P'awlosi s'eegdek't t'intsetsok'on T'ert'elus hank'o eton s'aamiyo dek't b́tuwi. «Shiimetso Filikso! niyatse tuwtson ay jeeno daatsrone, n sheeng k'eezonowere noashosh sheeng wonewo daatsere,
ACT 24:3 Ayidek'at mangtso Filikso n k'alts sheeng keewan jamoke jam weeron een údone nodek'iri.
ACT 24:4 Andmó t ja'irawo k'awunon neesh t keewit keewo n doon noon nk'ebetuwok'o neen k'oniruwe,
ACT 24:5 Ashaan noosh gondshoodo wotwutsere, datsatse fa'a Ayhudi jamwotsats dimbiro b́tuuziri, noimnetiyatse k'aldek'ets naazrawiwotsi eteefwotsshowere boon jishirwooniye.
ACT 24:6 Ik' moonowere kimshosh bíetfere bín nodetsi, bíyats not'intsts s'aami jaman ar b́ wottsok'o nee ntookon bín aatr dano falitune.» ik ik bitsuwotsitsere han boyits dabfno [No nemok'on bíyats angsheyish gawurone b́teshi, Ernmó gin jishiruwo Lusyos waat angnon nookishotse fos'dek't bíami, bín s'aamirwotsu níyok boweetwok'o bíazazi]
ACT 24:9 Ayhudiyots «Jam keewan aree» Etfetst s'amiyosh ik wotbowtsi.
ACT 24:10 Dats k'eeziruwo Filiks b́kishon kolat P'awlos b́ keewitwok'owa bíeti, P'awlos hank'o ett bíaaniy. «Ay dúrosh datsan keewutso nwoto tdantsosh taan s'amiyets keewosh aani tdek'etuwok'o nshinaats tt'intsor ayidek'at geneeúwefetsatniye,
ACT 24:11 Ik' k'onosh Iyerusalem maants ti'amron tatse git aawoniyere b́bowok'o nee ntookon danofalfnee,
ACT 24:12 Ik'i mootse wotowa ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse wee kitotse kontonuwor t mooshfere wee asho dimbirosh ttuuzfere taan daatsratsne,
ACT 24:13 And tiats bot'intsts s'amiyosh gawo b́jamon neesh t'intsosh falratsne.
ACT 24:14 Ernmó han neesh kish kitso shunfee, bo kooti dana bo etiru imnetiyi kayo no nihotsko Izar Izeweri Ik'irwe, Muse nemonat Nebiyiwots mas'aafotse guut'ets jamo amanirwe.
ACT 24:15 Bowere bojangirwok'o taawor kaawwotsnat morretsuwots k'irotse botuwitwok'o Ik'on jangirwe.
ACT 24:16 Mansha Ik'onat ash shinatse nib s'ayino tdetsetuk'o jamaawo kup'irwe.
ACT 24:17 «Iyerusalemitsnowere tkeshiyak ay natuwots bobeshiyakon t jirwotssh tep'wotit gizonat Ik'osh imet mebi gizo dek'at tweyi.
ACT 24:18 Ik'o mootsnowere taan daatstsuwots man tk'alfere, manoori gizeyonuwere s'ayini fino fin tk'rtsok'one, taantonuwere ay asho aaliye b́teshi, dimbironwere tuuratse.
ACT 24:19 Ernmó Isiyon waats ayhudiwots manoke fa'ane boteshi, bo taan bos'aamit keewo detsfno wotiyal nshinaats t'inr keewune.
ACT 24:20 Haniyakonowere moosh mooshiyiruwots shinats tt'iinoor t t'afitso fa'ewotiyal t'ints ashaanots keewune.
ACT 24:21 Arikon bo taalotse need'dek'at ‹K'irtsuwots tuwo fa'e tiettsosh hambets angshosh it shinats t'inre› etaat een k'aaron keewure, haniyere okoon k'osho tk'alts keewo aaliye.»
ACT 24:22 Filiksmó Krstiyani imnetiyi jango sheengshdek't b́dantsotse «Kes' azazefo Lusyos b́waatsok'on itjangosh angshituwe» ett boon deenb́k'ri.
ACT 24:23 P'awlosi kotiru bali naashoshowere «Ayide b́ kic'irawonat b́ jaguwotswere bish k'alo bogetso baziyerawon b́kotetuwok'wa» bí eti.
ACT 24:24 Muk' aawwotsiyere hakon Filkis Dursili eteets b́mááts ayhudiyunton b́weyi, P'awlosnowere s'egiydek't Iyesus Krstos shútson amani jango b́keewufere b́shshi.
ACT 24:25 P'awlos kááwu woti jangonat took kewdek'i jango weet angshonowere b́keewor Filiks shatt «And k'ayamee, taash b́k'anoor k'osh aawots neen s'eegituwe» bí eti.
ACT 24:26 Filiks P'awlosoke gubo dek'osh jangitniye b́tesh, mansh ayoto P'awlosi s'eegiyir b́keewifoni.
ACT 24:27 Git natoniyere okoon P'ork'iyos Fist'os Filikis shegro b́beyok b́beeyi, Filiks ayhudiwotsi geneúshosh geeyat P'awlosi b́ tipetsok'on k'azb́k'ri.
ACT 25:1 Fist'os bí alguro K'isariyotse kindt keez aawo b́ teshiyakon manokere Iyerusalm maants bíami
ACT 25:2 Manoknowere kahni naashwotsnat ik ik een een Ayhudi jirwots Pawlosats bo s'aamiyo bot'intsi, «P'awlosi Iyerusalemi deewáár noosh sheeng keewo k'aluwe» ett bok'oni, han boettsonuwere P'awlosi weerindatse korde'er úd'osh bo geetsotsne.
ACT 25:4 Fist'osmó «P'awlos K'isariyon tipi mootsne koteyiri, taawere kaari and aanar b́maants ametuwe,
ACT 25:5 It naash naashuwotsuwere taanton K'isariyo maants amnee, P'awlos b́ fints gond fino b́beyal manoke s'amiwune» bí eti.
ACT 25:6 Fist'os shmt aawoniye wee tats aawoniye bowawu aawwotsi bonton b́ beshiyakon K'isariyo maants no ami, manok nobodtsok'on yaatsok'on naashi jorats bedek't P'awlosi bíyok de'er bot'inetuwok'o bíazazi.
ACT 25:7 P'awlos b́ t'intsok'on Iyerusalemn waats ayhudiyots gúrdek't need'at gaawu deshaw ay een een s'amiyotsi bí'ats bot'intsi,
ACT 25:8 P'awloswere «Taa ayhudiyots Nemats wotowa Ik' maats wee Rom nugúsats t fints gond fino aaliye» ett bí'atse bíaniyit keewo b́keewi.
ACT 25:9 Fist'osmó ayhudiyotsi geneúsho geeyat P'awlosi «Iyerusalem maants amr han jangosh manoke tshinatse angsho dek'osh geefneya?» bí eti.
ACT 25:10 P'awlosmó hank'o ett bíaani, «Hambe! taa b́shinaatse mooshosh Rom nugúso angshi jori shinatse t need'iri, nee sheengsh dek'at ndantsok'on ayhudiyotsats t fints gond fino aaliye.
ACT 25:11 Morretso twotiyal wee k'irosh betsit fayo tiats betsit morro finere wotiyal woruna eraatse, ernmó bo s'amiyan k'awuntsalka wotiyalmó konuwor bosh taan beshide'er imo falratse, taa Rom nugúsosh taash s'iilewe etaat t'intsree.»
ACT 25:12 Manoor Fist'os bín izfwotsnton keewedek't «Romko nugúso taash s'iile etri wotiyal nugúsok ametunee» bí eti.
ACT 25:13 Muk' aawwotsiyere hakon Nogúso Agrip'nat Bernik'e Fist'ossh «Dan jeenon waarne» etosh K'isari maants boweyi.
ACT 25:14 Manoknowere ay aawosh beyat boteshtsosh Fist'os P'awlos jango hank'o ett Nuguso Agrip'sh b́ keewi, «Filks tipk'rat k'az b́k'rts ash iko hanoke fa'e b́teshi,
ACT 25:15 Taa Iyerusalemitse tteshor kahni naashuwotsnat Ayhudi eenashuwotsn ashaan bos'amiye hakon bíats t angshituwok'o boaati.
ACT 25:16 Taamó ‹Ash iko bín s'amiruwots shinats t'inr bín bos'amirumansh b́keewude'aniyere s'amiyetsman beshide'er imo Rom datsatsi ashuwots neemaliye› etaat boosh tiaanyi.
ACT 25:17 Mansh ashaan s'amiruwots ko'eyat hanok bowatsok'on ja'araniyere yaatsok'on angshi jorats bedek'at P'awlosi t shinats bot'intsituwok'o ti azazi,
ACT 25:18 Bín s'aamirwots keewosh b́ganok need' bodek'tsok'on bí gond fino finere ett tgawtsok'o bín s'amiyosh betsit keew eegonoru bíats t'intsratsne.
ACT 25:19 Ernmó bínton bomooshiru moosho bo haymanoti jangonat k'irt teshtso P'awlos ‹Kashetsiye› bí etiruwo Iyesus jange.
ACT 25:20 Taawere hannaari keewo s'ilosh taan b́kic'ire P'awlosi ‹Iyerusalem maants amr bíyoke keewan jango angsho daatso shunfiya?› tieti.
ACT 25:21 Bímó bí jango Rom nugúsoke bísh s'ileyish geeyat nugúsok taash s'iilewe bíettsosh manok tdaamifetsosh tipi moots b́teshetuwok'o tiazazi.»
ACT 25:22 Agrip'were Fist'ossh «Taawor ashaan b́keewufere k'ebo geefe» bí eti. Fist'osuwere «Yaats bín k'ebetunee» bíet.
ACT 25:23 Mansh yatsok'on Agrip'nat Bernik'e bo naashi taho tahdek't een baatson wotdek't kes'iruwotsatse naashuwotsnat kit kitotsi een een ashuwotsn deneyat waat angshi maa eenots bokindi, maniyere hakon Fist'os P'awlosi b́ s'eegiyi.
ACT 25:24 Hank'owere bíeti, «Nugúso Agrip'o! Itwere noonton fa'a ash jametsuwotso! ayhudiwots ‹Ashaan haniyere hakon kashon beyo bísh geyiratse› ett kuhefetst Iyerusalemitse, hanoknowere ti angshituwok'o taan boaattso it bek'iru ashaaniye.
ACT 25:25 Taayere bíyatse k'irosh bín betsit gond fino daatsratse, bí Rom naashi naashosh ‹t jango taash s'iilewe› bíettsotse hanok woshosh t k'ut'i.
ACT 25:26 Wotowa eree b́jangosh t doonzsh tguut'etwo daneets keewo deshatse, mansha s'ileyakon tguut'etuwo tdaatsituwok'owa etaat it shinats bítsnor iki Nugúso Agrip'o! nshinaats t'intsree.
ACT 25:27 Tipetso danbaan dameeyor bí s'amiyets jango kits k'azo dartsi araatniye taash b́be'eyi.»
ACT 26:1 Agrip' P'awlossh, «N took jangosh keewundek'etuok'o taaro neesh imere» bíet, Pawlosuwere b́kisho jargdek't hank'o ett keewut aani b́dek'i.
ACT 26:2 «Nugúso Agrip'o! Ayhudiwots taan bos'aamits keewujamosh hambets nshinatse keewur aani tdek'or ayiniye t geneúwiri.
ACT 26:3 Bítsnowere nee ayhudiwots niwonat moosh jamo t'iwintsdek'at danfnee, mansh k'amoon taan nk'ebetuwok'o neen k'onirwe.
ACT 26:4 «Na'ortson tuwat awuk'o t beetsok'owo ayhudiwots danfnee, shintson tuwat tiash ashi dagotsnat Iyerusalemitse t be beyo danfnee.
ACT 26:5 Ando aani gawo bogeyiyal no haymanotiwotse kup'idek'at nonemo kotiru kayuwotsitse ferisawi wotat tbewok'owo shintson detst danfnee.
ACT 26:6 Andmó angshosh hanok tneed'ir Ik'o nonihotssh taart b́ imts b́ jangiitsoshee.
ACT 26:7 Jangiyetsanok bodosh no jir tatse gituwots Ik'o t'uwe aawo Ik'ifetstni bokotfo, Nugúsono! taawor ayhudiwotsn taan bos'aamits jangiyetsan jangatsne.
ACT 26:8 Ik'o k'irtswotsi b́tuuzitwok'o eegoshe itoke amano maawek b́woti?
ACT 26:9 «Taa t tookish Nazrettso Iyesus shútso tfaltsok'on k'efo taash geyife etaat asaabefe b́teshi.
ACT 26:10 Iyerusalemitse tk'altsonúwere haniye b́teshi, kahni naashuwotsoke t dek'ts alon amantsuwotsitse ayuwots tipimoots bokindituwok'o k'alre, boon boúd'orowere úd'iruwotsnton ik wotere.
ACT 26:11 Ayoto ayhudiwots Ik' k'oni mootse boon jod'r doonzo boc'ashetuwok'o woshfee, boon ayide fayarnuwere k'osh úratsi kituwotsokor kesh amaat boon giishefe.
ACT 26:12 «Han jangosho kahni naash jamwotsoke alonat tzaziyo dek'at Demask'o maants tí amifere tteshi.
ACT 26:13 Nugúsono! weeratse t befere aawu taalon aawu sháánoniyere bogo sháánts shááno tbek'i, sháánanuwere tiyatso taanton sha'irwots gúúratso darotse sháániyi b́k'ri.
ACT 26:14 Noúnetswere datsats dih s'uwat nobefere ayhudiwots noon keewu keewon ‹Sawul! Sawulo! eegishe taan ngishiri? Shiki shashats nned'iyal neesh b́ gonditi!› etiru k'ááro tshishi.
ACT 26:15 Taawere ‹Doonzono! nee kone?› tieti, doozonuwere, taash hank'o bíeti, ‹Taa nee ngishiruwo Iyesus taane.
ACT 26:16 Andmó tuur n tufoon need'owe, taa neesh tbe'eyiye and taan nbek'tsannat shino maants neesh tbe'et keewosh gútsonat gawo nwotitsh tgetsotsne.
ACT 26:17 Israe'el ash ashuwotsnat bo maants neen twoshit Ik' danawu ashuwots kishotse neen farituwe.
ACT 26:18 Bo aawo n k'eshituwok'onat t'aluwotse shááno maants nkishituwok'o Shed'anosh keeweewotsno Ik'o maants ni aanituwok'o woshituwe, boowere taan bo amantsi jangon bo morrosh orowa eto daatsitune, galdek'etsuwotsnton ritstiyo kaydek'etune.›
ACT 26:19 «Eshe nugúso Agrip'o! daaratse taash imets bek'osh k'aztso woteratse.
ACT 26:20 Ernmó shino Demask'on fa'a ashuwotsi, maants dabat Iyerusalemnat Yhud dats jamatse, Ik' danawu ashuwotsi naandrone err Ik'o maants bo aanituwok'o tdaniyi, naandrone boettsok'ono kitsit fino bo finituwok'o boon tdani.
ACT 26:21 Han jangosh ayhudiyots Ik'i mootse t befere taan detsdek't úd'osh boeti.
ACT 26:22 Hambetsish b́borfetsosh Ik' tep'o tiyatse k'aleratse, manshe múk'osho enosho gawefetsat hanoke ned'iruwe, nebiyiwotsnat Musen shino hank'o wotituwe boetts keewo keewoniyere okoon k'osho eegoru keewuratse.
ACT 26:23 Bowere bokeewu ‹Mesihiyo gond bek'o dek'etuwe, k'irotse tuwonowere shintso wotar kashi sháánono Israe'el ashuwotsnat Ik'i ash woterawwotsnsh kitsituwe› ettniye.»
ACT 26:24 P'awlos man keewoke b́befere Fist'os «P'awloso! ando geewutsernee, ay ndano neen geyomants betsk'rere!» ett kuhat b́keewi.
ACT 26:25 P'awlosmó hank'o ett bíaniyi, «Ayidek' shiimetso Fist'oso! arikonat kaawu keewoni tkeewiri bako geeyaliye tgeyi.
ACT 26:26 B́ shinatse keewan tkeewiru nugúso keewan danfee. Hanwere ashon k'alerawo b́wottsotse nugúso b́dantsok'owo danfee.
ACT 26:27 Nugúso Agrip'o! nebiyiwotsi amanirunosha? Ni'amaniruwok'o danfee.»
ACT 26:28 Agrip'were P'awlossh, «Nee k'awun sa'atanitse taan krstiyani woshk'rishale» bí eti.
ACT 26:29 P'awloswere, «K'awun gizewotse wotowa geenz gizewotse n s'uzi b́woterawon hamnbets tkeewuts keewo shishts jamo t tipeyaniyere okoon taank'o bowotish Ik'o k'oniruwe!» bí eti.
ACT 26:30 Haniyere hakon nugúso, altsonat Bernik'ewu bonton bedek't teshts ash jamwots k'az botuwi.
ACT 26:31 Manoke kesht boamferowe, «Ashaan k'irosh wee tipewosh bín betsituwo eegoru k'alratse» boeti.
ACT 26:32 Agrip'were Fist'ossh, «Ashaan Rom nugúsoke tkeewo taash s'iilewe eto b́ k'azink'ere hank'on fakshk'ryank'e» bí eti.
ACT 27:1 It'ali datso maants markabon no ametuwok'owa eteetsok'on P'awlosnat k'osh k'osh tipetswotsn Rom dats k'eeziru Awugst'osi eteetso kes' jishiruwots kayotse teshtso Yuliyosi eteets bali abaatsi naashosh boimi,
ACT 27:2 Isiyon aatsi k'ari gúratse markabi bíyok need'irwok amiru Adramit'yon markabats keeshdekat no sha'i, mek'odeni awurajotse fa'a Teselonk'e kitotsi asho Arst'rokoswere nontoniye b́teshi.
ACT 27:3 Yaatsok'on Sidoni amnobodi, Yulyus P'awlossh sheengo b́teshtsotse b́ shunfwotsok amt bísh geyit tep'o bish bok'alituwok'owa bí eti.
ACT 27:4 Manoke tuwatnwere jongo noshinaatse noats b́ jongiruwotse K'op'rositse aats k'aritsi datsu te'o woshdek'at markabatsi sha'o dek'atnotuwi.
ACT 27:5 Kilk'iyanat P'infiliyo ganoke fa'a aats k'aro nokimiyakon Lik'iyon fa'ú Mura kitto nobodi.
ACT 27:6 Manoke bali abaatse altso It'aliyomants ametuwo Iskndr markabo daatsdek't bíats nokeshetuwok'o b́woshi.
ACT 27:7 Ay aawo t'awaash dek'at sha'at ay gond bek'on K'enidos kitu ganok amnobodi, jongonwere shinomaants noamawok'o noon b́bazitsotse Selmona dats gúúri ganoke beshat k'ert'es aatson gúrets datsu naaydek'at noami.
ACT 27:8 Ay gondbek'on gúr gúron nobeshiyakon Lasiy kitu ganoke daatseyiru, «Markabi need'ok sheengi» eteef beyokuk amnobodi.
ACT 27:9 No weeratsnowere ay gizewo hank'on b́ís'uure s'oomi gizeyo b́beshtsotse manoor aats k'aratse sha'o ayidek' shatiko b́teshtsotse P'awlos ashuwotssh hank'o ett bo atso bokotetuwok'o b́woshi,
ACT 27:10 «It ashuwotso! haniyak nosha'it sha'o shatiyits keewo bítse b́beyok'o taash be'eyiruwe, Kuronat markaboon s'uzats b́woterawo ash kashatsor kup'ts t'afonat s'uwo bodetuwe.»
ACT 27:11 Bali abaatse altsonmó P'awlos izoniyere markabu azaziruwonat markabudoonz boetiruwoni b́ k'ebiri.
ACT 27:12 Markabwots need'okman jooshi kimoosh sheengo woto b́k'aztsotse ay ashuwots, «Shinomaants sha'arr faletkawotyal gaar weeron, muur aawukindomantsi fengesho maantse fa'o Fink'eyi eteefo K'ert'esitse markab ned'efok borr manoke joosho beshiwone» ett bo asaabiyo bot'intsi.
ACT 27:13 Muur maantse muk' jongu b jongefere bobek'tsok'on boasaabtsok'o boosh b́wottsok'o bíarere markab bín bojokiru bitsdek't aatsatse sha'o dek't botuwi, markabi ned'iruwoke tuut k'ert'es ganoke gúr gúron bobeshi.
ACT 27:14 Ernmó muk'i boteshiyakon, «Gaar maantsi aawu keshon eegurahi jongo» kup'ts jongo aats k'aro bin gúrts datsuatse tuut aats k'aromaants bomaants b́weyi.
ACT 27:15 Markabonwere b́gifniyetsonat jongmansh b́maawutsotse s'k etaat jongon jokeyat noami.
ACT 27:16 K'eda eteets aats k'aron gúrts datsu naaydek'at nosha'or ay gond bek'on Markabuko jelbo detsdekat nokishots geddek'o nofali.
ACT 27:17 Markab jookiruwots jelbu markabots geetsdek't bokishiyakon markabu gúridek't jokon bo s'aas'i, markabu Surtisi eteets shiyi datsu maants bdihirawok'o shatt sharo k'o'úbazt jongon jokefere boami.
ACT 27:18 Egúrahon were kup'efere bíamtsotse yatsok'on markabats kuryets k'ac'o ik ikon aats k'aromaants juwo dek'botuwi.
ACT 27:19 Keezl aawots markabi k'ac'o bokishon k'aaúdek't shap't bojuwi,
ACT 27:20 Ay aawosh aawuno wotowa, k'eeno bo bee'awotse jongonwere kup'efere bíamtsotse haniyere hakon kashosh falatsonee ett maac'o k'ut'bodek'i.
ACT 27:21 Ashuwots misho b́jamon bomarawo ay aawo boteshi, mansh P'awlos bodagots need'dek't hank'o bíeti, «It ashuwotso! taa tiettso shishat T'ersesn turatste wotink'ere awaashonat t'af jamann itats borawnk'ee b́teshi.
ACT 27:22 Andoor markabo s'uzi awaashiti bako ititse konatsor t'afo boratse, mansha shenuwotso shatk'ayere! etaat itn iziruwe.
ACT 27:23 Oots t'ú bík twottso bín t Ik'iruwo Izar Izewer b́woshts melakiyo t ganok need'de'k't
ACT 27:24 ‹P'awloso! shatk'aye! Romko naashi naasho shinatse need'o neesh geyife! hambe neenton sha'iru jamo Ik'o neesha err k'irotse worituwe› ett taash keewure.
ACT 27:25 Manshe it ashuwotso shatk'ayere! Ik'o taash b́keewuts jaman b́jamon b́s'eentsituwok'o bín amaniruwe.
ACT 27:26 B́woteferemó jongo noon aatson gúrts dats ikuk de'amr juuk'rituwe.»
ACT 27:27 Tatse aauwdl t'úwotse Adriyay aats k'ari taalotse jongon jod'efe noamfere taali titson markab jookiruwots datsomants bot'intsok'o boosh bíari.
ACT 27:28 Mansha aats k'ari woko bín indeef joko dek't boindere dashan b́woko habigit indok'o wotat b́datseyi, muk'i boteshiyakon ando boindere shiits indok'o dashan b́geenztsok'o bodaatsi.
ACT 27:29 Nomarkabo aats k'ari gúúratse fa'a shutsuwotsats b́gawerawok'o shatt markabi shutsomantse markab bín jookef awdwotsi aatsots oorsh bok'ri, maniyere hakon t'úwo beshar bíere aawo boosh b́weetuwok'o Ik' k'ono dek' botuwi.
ACT 27:30 Markabu jookiruwots markabutse kesht wos'o geeyat boteshtsotse markabu shinomaantse bín need'iyeyiru biro dashan juwiruwo araat markabutse fa'a jelbu aats k'aromaants bojuwi.
ACT 27:31 Manoor P'awlos bali naashonat kes' kes'fuwotssh «Markabu jokirwots markabatse giwuk'ayr bobeyala bako it faro falratste» bíti.
ACT 27:32 Mansh kes' kes'fuwots jelbu detsts joko k'ut'k'raat aatsats juubok'ri.
ACT 27:33 Datso gatsosh bíetfere jametsuwots misho bo meetuwok'o P'awlos k'ont boosh hank'o bíeti «Eegonor mook'zat koto dek' it tuwiyako hamb hambetson tatse awdl aawe.
ACT 27:34 Manshe maayo it nonots itgedetwok'oye iti tk'oniri. Mannowere faritute, it took s'iirotse ikunwor dats fed'eratsatsane.»
ACT 27:35 Man bietihakon misho k'aaúdek't jamishinaatse Ik'o b́údi, titsdek'tnuwere moo dek'b́tuwi.
ACT 27:36 Mann jametsuwots kup'at misho bomeyi.
ACT 27:37 Markabutse b́ jamon git baalona shabe shrt ashuwotsn fa'ane noteshi.
ACT 27:38 Jamwots máát boworiyakon Markabats kuriyets Sindeyo aatsi k'aro maats juwat bíyatsi kuro boketi.
ACT 27:39 B́ gatstsok'on bobodoko danatsno botesh, wotowa bako shiyo bítse be'eyiru aatsi k'aro bo bek'i, boosh b́faleyal markabu b́ maants gifnir úratse kishosh bogawi.
ACT 27:40 Markabo bín bneed'iru bíro bítsdek't aats k'arots faksh bok'iri, manoor bín markabo jokeyiru jokono bítsbok'ri, man kaawats fa'a sharono jongo maants dambaan k'aaúdek't aatsi k'ari gúúro maants keshosh boami.
ACT 27:41 Ernmó markabu kakuwets shiyats bgaawetsosh dashan gúp'n bwutsi, b́shino maantsno dashan k'ons'ewtsat giwo bk'azti, b́shuutso maantsnomó jongi gifniyatse tuwtson tisho b́tuwi.
ACT 27:42 Tipetswotsitsere ikonuworu wáákr b́keeyawok'o kes' kes'fwots úd'osh bogawi.
ACT 27:43 Baalats naashonmó P'awlosi oriyosh b́getsotse boetts man de'atse, dab waak faltso shini markabots aatsi k'aro maants t'olar datsats k'ayi bokeshetuwok'o bíazazi.
ACT 27:44 Oortsuwotsmó Markabi is'uwotsnat markabi tishats bede'er bokeshetuwok'o bíazazi, mank'oon jamwots jeenon datsats bo bodi.
ACT 28:1 K'aznofariyakon biats nobodts aats gúrdek'ts datsu Maltayi eteefu b wottsok'o dan nok'ri.
ACT 28:2 Aatson gúrts datsmanatse beyiruwots adits shuno noosh bokitsi, manorowere awusho b́buye ak' b́wottsotse tawo aat'idek't noon s'eeg dek't boibii.
ACT 28:3 P'awlos shooto kakudek't taawots b́gedfere, k'ees'manatse tuutson dawunz ik kesht b́kishats deshwutsat joor b́wutsi,
ACT 28:4 Malta dats ashuwots dawunzo P'awlos kishats joorat b́befre bek't «Arikon ashaan kash údk ashe! aats k'aratsi jongotse jeenon b́keshalor Izar Izewer angshotse oorat kashon beyo falratse» boeti.
ACT 28:5 P'awlosmó dawunzo taawots tebdek' juuk'rat eegor gondo bín b́datsrawo b́oori.
ACT 28:6 Ashuwotswere «Andemo andek'úna bíatso b́gaapiti, wee danerawon k'irr b́dihiti» ettni bokotfera botesh. Ernmó ayoto bokore bíats gondo eegoru bodo b́k'aye bobek'tsotse boaasabiyo wonidek't «Hanuwo Izar Izeweriye!» boeti.
ACT 28:7 Manok noteshts beyok man ganoke aats gúrts dats mani altso puplyus datso fa'e b́tesh, ashaan b́ meyits nondek't keez aawosh sheengshdek't noon b́ ibiyi.
ACT 28:8 Manoor puplyos nih atsik'es'onat ac'uwoo bín detsbde'e shoodtni b́k'eyiri b́tesh, P'awlos bíyok kindt Ik'o bísh b́k'oni, b́ kishonowere bíats geddek't kashiyib́k'ri.
ACT 28:9 Man b́wotiyakon aatson gúriyets datsmanatsi k'osh shodetsuwots waat bokashi.
ACT 28:10 Ash ashuwotswere ime keewo noosh dek't boweyi, noon bomangitsok'onowere noosh bokitsi, markabon amoosh notuworowere noosh geyitu jamo markabats noosh bokuriyi.
ACT 28:11 Keez shashosh Maltan noteshiyakon joshman aats kaaron gúrts datsmanatse no beshitso Eskndriyaa markabats keshdek'at notuwi, merkabunu Diyosk'orosi eteetso Woteraw maat ik'wots milkito btookatse detsfe b́teshi.
ACT 28:12 Srakus kitamots no bodtsok'on manoke keez aawo nobeyi.
ACT 28:13 Mokno aats k'aaro gúúrat Regiyum kitu nobodi, manoke ik aawo nobeshiyakon muur jongo b́ jongtsosh gitl aawots putiyolus maants noami.
ACT 28:14 Eshumanotsnowere daatsat bonton shawat aawo nobeysh noon bok'oni, maniyere hakono Rom maants noami.
ACT 28:15 Romitse fa'a amantsuwots nojango boshishtsok'on Afiyos gawuyonat «Keez k'eewokuwotsi» eteefuwotsok b́borfetso noon dek'osh boweyi, P'awlos boon b́bek'tsok'on Ik'o udat kup'b́wutsi.
ACT 28:16 Romits nokindtsok'on P'awlosi kotet kes' kes'f iko imt bíyal b́ beetuewk'o wosheyi.
ACT 28:17 Keez aawoniyere okoon P'awlos Romitse fa'a ayhuditsi een een ashuwotsi b́ s'eegiyi, bokakuwetsok'ono hank'o bíeti, «Tieshuwotso! Israe'el ash ashonat nihwots nemats tk'altso egonuworu gond fino aaliye, wotowa bako Iyerusalemn tipeyat Rom ashuwotssh besheyat ti'imeyi.
ACT 28:18 Rom ashuwots taan boatiyakon k'irosh taan betsit weero datso bok'aztsotse hank'on taan fakshosh gawtniye boteshi.
ACT 28:19 Ayhudiyotsmó taa hank'on tfakshewo bok'eftsotse Rom nugusoke taash s'iilewe eto geyik b́woti, b́wotiyaloru ti ashuwotsi ts'aamit keewo deshatseb́teshi.
ACT 28:20 And itn ts'egiye itn bek'osh geeyat manowere itsh keewoshe, taa habiliyan ttipe Isra'elsh jangit imets keewi jangoshe.»
ACT 28:21 Bowere hank'o ett bísh boaani, «Yhud datsatse njangosh gúút'ets wosho noosh boratse, hanok waats ashuwotsitse konuworu ngondo keewtso aaliye.
ACT 28:22 Namaniru haymanotiyan b́ be beyoke ash ashuwots bok'efiruwok'o danfone, mansh níasabtso eeg b́wottsok'o shisho geefone.»
ACT 28:23 Aawo bísh bodetsiyakon aywotdek't b́ beyiru moo maants boweyi, bíwere guurtson kooc'ish b́borfetsosh Ik'i mengsti jangosh gawon bíasabiyo boosh kish b́ kitsi, boon amaniyoshowere Muse nemonat nebiyiwots mas'aafotse kitsfetst Iyesus jangosh boosh b́daniyi.
ACT 28:24 Ik ikuwots b́aap'o boamani, k'oshuwotsmó amaneratsno.
ACT 28:25 Bowere boatsetseyo ik bowoterawon bok'aleyi. B́wotefere bok'aleyoniyere shino P'awlos b́keewo b́ ishoor hank'o ett b́keewi, «S'ayin shayiro Nebiyiwo Isayasn it nihotssh b́ keewtso arikee b́teshi!
ACT 28:26 B́ keewts aap'o hankowa b́wotiti, ‹Ash ashaanotsok amrniye Shishonere shishetute, ernmó t'iwintsratste, Bek'onere bek'etute, ernmó nibn de'atste eree boosha,
ACT 28:27 Ashaanots nibo kup'wtsere, Bowaazonuwere ipewutsere, boaawonuwere is'ewutsere, Hnk'o wotob́k'azink'ee, Bo aawon be'er, Bowaazon shide'er, Bonibonowere t'iwintsde'er Tmaants bo aanere, Taawere boon tkashyank'oni b́teshi.› »
ACT 28:28 «Eshe Ik'i kashiyi wosho Ik'i ash woterawwotssh woshetsok'owo dande'ere, boowere eekar bín dek'etune.
ACT 28:29 [P'awlos han b́keewiyakon ayhudiwots k'up'shdek't mooshfere manoke kesht boami.]»
ACT 28:30 P'awlos b́kirayits mootse gitnati s'eeno b́beeyi, b́maants weyiru ashjamwotsno dek'fee b́teshi,
ACT 28:31 Ik'i mengstonowere nabfetst doonzo Iyesus Krstos jango konuwor bín b́bazirawon ááwu shuk'on b́danifoni b́teshi.
ROM 1:1 Iyesus Krstossh guuts wottso woshosh s'egetsoke, Ik'i doo shishiyo daniyosh marat'etso P'awlosoke wosheets wosho.
ROM 1:2 Doo shishiyanwere Ik'o nebiyiwots weeron S'ayn mas'aafotse shin shin jangiyets aap'oniye.
ROM 1:3 Doo shishiyonuwere Ik'i na'o b́ naaron Dawit naarotse b́shuweetsok'o kitsitkee,
ROM 1:4 Mank'owere no doonz Iyesus Krstos b́ S'ayin shayiron k'irotse b́tuwon Ik' na'a b́wottsok'o bíangi eenon b́daneyi.
ROM 1:5 Krstos shúúts jangosh Ik' ash Woteraw jamwots bo amanituwok'onat boaletwok'o woshosh b́ weeron wosh na'o wotosh noon betsit s'aato dek'rone.
ROM 1:6 Itwoor Iyesus Krstosk itwotituwok'o Ik'o b́ s'eegts jirwots taalots itne.
ROM 1:7 Eshe Romitse beyiru, Ik'o iti b́ shuntswotsnat b́jiro it wotituwok'o itn s'eegts jamwotso! Noo nih Ik'oknat nodoonz Iyesus Krstos s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
ROM 1:8 It imneti shúútso dats jamats b́shishetsotse, jamoniyere shinon Iyesus Krstos weeron it únets jangosh Izar Izeweri údituwe.
ROM 1:9 Jam aawo Ik'o tk'onor itn t gawiruwok'o b́ naay jangosh keewiruwo doo shishiyo daniyosh t nib s'eenon bísh t finiruwu Ik'o taash tgaawoniye.
ROM 1:10 Ando dabr s'uwanatse itok wosh Ik' shuno b́ wotere t weerindo b́káátsituwok'o jam aawo Ik'o t k'oniri.
ROM 1:11 Imnetiyats it kup'ituwok'o itn woshituwo shayiri imo itsh betsosho, itn bek'osh tewuniruwe.
ROM 1:12 Man ti etiruwere taa it imnetiyon, itwere t imnetiyon no atsatsewo nokup'itwok'owe.
ROM 1:13 Ti eshuwotso! k'osh k'osh Ik' ash woterawwotsitse ay amantsuwotsi tdatstsok'o mank'o ititsnoru shuwo daatsosh geeyatniye tteshi, ernmó itok wosh ay aawo tk'anere andish b́borfetso taash k'ano b́k'aztsok'o it danetwok'o geefe.
ROM 1:14 Salat'antswotsi wotowa salat'anerawotsi wotowa dantsuwotsi wotowa danawu ashuwotsi daniyo fal k'ayaatse.
ROM 1:15 Eshe itsh Romn beyiruwotssh doo shishiyo daniyosh tewuniruwe.
ROM 1:16 Taa doo shishi aap'on jitseratse, doo shishi aap'o shino ayhudiyotssh, bíyats aanat Ik' ash woterawwotssh, Mank'o amants ash jamwotsi kashiyosh falit Ik'i angoniye.
ROM 1:17 Kááwu wotituwo imnetiyon kasho daatsituwe ett guut'ere, Ik'i kááw woto doo shishyon b́be'etsotse b́ jamon asho kááw b́ wotit imnetiyone.
ROM 1:18 Ashuwots bogondon aro b́daneerawok'owe bok'aliri, Ik'onowere shato bo k'ztsotse bo gondi jangosh jametsats daaratse Ik' fayo be'etuwe.
ROM 1:19 Boon b́ sezituwere Ik' jango dano boosh b́ geyituwok'o Ik'o b́tookon b́kitsre dant boteshtsotsne.
ROM 1:20 Datso bíazetson tuut ashuwotssh be'erawo Ik'i doyo, manuwere dúre dúri bí angonat Izar Izeweri b́woton bí bíazts keewwots weeron sháánt b́be'eyirwonat t'iwintsosh ashuwots bot'afits t'afiyosh bo etetuwo deshatsne.
ROM 1:21 Bowere Ik'o dant bísh wotit mangonat údon imatsne, bohasabiyon woterawo bowoti t'iwintsraw bonibo t'alu b́wtsi,
ROM 1:22 «Dantsuwots noone» ett dartsuwotsi bowoti.
ROM 1:23 Besherawu Ik'o mangiyoniyere beshit asho aro wotts ariyetso, Kafon, awd tuf detsts gizuwotsn, datsatse geetseyiru dins'otswots aron arit finetsuwotssh mango boími.
ROM 1:24 Mansh boatsatsewo botook atsats jitsit fino bok'alitwok'o Ik'o kimon s'eents bonib tewunosh keewetswotsi bowotitwok'o k'azb́k'iri.
ROM 1:25 Man b́wotuwere Ik' aro kooton bowonitsosh, aztso shegro azeetso boik'itsonat bísh guuts bowottsoshe, Ik'onmó dúre dúrosh údeke! Amen.
ROM 1:26 Ashuwots man bok'altsotse Ik'o Woteraw wic'ets tewunosh beshidek't boon bí imi, bo mááts máátsuwots dab azeewon daneets gonkewo daneerawu gonkeyi naaron woni bok'ri.
ROM 1:27 Mank'o nungushuwotswere daneets gonkewo máátsuwotswotsnton wosho k'azt boatsatsewo bogúsiyon bomis'i, mansh nungushuwots nungushonton jitsits keewo bofini, bo sheeltsi jangosho boosh wotit fayo bomeetson bodek'i.
ROM 1:28 Ashuwots Ik' dano geyo bok'aztsotse wic'ets keewo bo finituwok'o Ik'o Woteraw nibosh beshidek't imb́k'ri.
ROM 1:29 Mansha morron, gondon, jaalon, weerigondon, okooron, kashúd'on, shid'eyon, dirshon, gond tewunon s'eent, ando oonetswotsiye,
ROM 1:30 Ash shúúts t'afiyruwots, Ik'o shit'iruwots, ash ketiyiruwots, mishetswots, noona boguwotsi etiruwots, gond finosh malo geyiruwots, bonih indosh azazerawwots,
ROM 1:31 T'iwintsde'awwots, keewetso gakiruwots, shuno deshawwots, maac'kup'uwotsiye.
ROM 1:32 «Keewanotsi k'aliru jamwots k'ire boosh wotiti» etiru Ik'o nemo danfetstniye jaman bok'aliri, k'al mec'ro woterawon, man k'alirwotsnowere bokup'iri.
ROM 2:1 Nee k'osh ashaats angshirwono nee ntokish bíyats nwebitwo deshatsne, k'osh ashaats ni angshor n tookatse niangshiri, nee k'osh ashaats angshfetsat, n angshts ashman b́ k'alirwoniye nk'aliri.
ROM 2:2 Mank'o k'aliru ashuwotsats, Ik'o boosh wotituwo boosh b́ angshiruwok'o danfone.
ROM 2:3 Nee ashono! mank'o k'aliru ashuwotsats angishfetsat, bo bok'aliruwo nk'alor Ik' angishi shirotse nkeeshtsok'o neesh arefa?
ROM 2:4 Himo Ik'o b́ sheeng wotonat jam falk b́woto, noosh b́ k'amonwere bí ankattsono ngac'iri? Ik'o sheeng b́ woto noosh bíayiyi, neen n morrosh naandre eto maants jishosh b́wotok'o danatsneya?
ROM 2:5 Eshe nee n morrosh naandre eto nk'aztsotsnat maac'o kup' nwottsotse Ik'i fayonat ari angshon b́be'et aawots fayo niats bí ayituwok'owe nk'aliri.
ROM 2:6 Ik'o ik ikuwotssh bofinok'oye boosh b́ imeti.
ROM 2:7 Sheeng finats kup'de'er údonat mangon t'afrawu kashonowere geyiruwotssh Ik'o boosh dúre dúri kasho imetuwe.
ROM 2:8 Botooki keewo geyiruwotsi, ari keewosh azazerawwotsnat gondosh azazeyiru gonduowotsatsomó Ik'i fayonat kaak k'iro boats weetuwe.
ROM 2:9 Shin shino ayhudiwotsats maantsnowere Ik'i ash woterawwotsats gond finiru ash jamwotsats gond bek'onat kic'on weetuwe.
ROM 2:10 Ernmó sheeng keewo kaliru ash jamats Ayhudi wotowa Ik'i ashwoterawwotsi wotowa údono mango jeeno boosh imetuwe.
ROM 2:11 Ik'oniye ashuwotsi boga bogshraake.
ROM 2:12 Nemo bodeshawo morr finiru jamwots nemo bot'ut'alor t'afitúne, nemonowere deshfetsr morr finiru jamwotsmó nemon bo ats angshetuwe.
ROM 2:13 Ik' shinatse kááwu wotituwots nemo shisht finats jitsiruwotsiye bako nemo shisht finats jitsrawotsiyaliye.
ROM 2:14 Nem deshaw Ik' ash woterawwots bo azeewon nemo bí azaziru keewo kalirune, man weeron nemo bot'ut'aloru botookk wotts azeeyi nemo bodetstsotse k'alosh boon b́geyituwo danfnee.
ROM 2:15 Bo keewanúwere nemi etiru jam keewo bo nibats b́ guut'ets b́ wotok'o kitsiruwe, aaninuere bonibo boats gawituwe, ikn ikno boon bonibo b́gac'iti, ikn iknonomó boon b́ tep'eti.
ROM 2:16 Han sháánon b́be'etwere, taa t nabiru doo shishi aap'ok'on Ik'o Iyesus Krstos weeron ashuwots ááshon bofints keewats b́ angshit aawotse.
ROM 2:17 Hamb, nee «Ayhudi taane» etirune, nematse nte'eyiri, Ik'k nwottsosho bogtaana etaat ni'it'iri.
ROM 2:18 Nee Ik' ettso danfnee, Muse nemo ndantsotse sheeng fino danfnee.
ROM 2:19 «Nee dogwotsi jishiruwo taane, t'aluwotse faúwotssho sháán taane,
ROM 2:20 Danawwotssh dano kitsituwe, nanaúwotsno danituwe» níetiri, mank'o, «Muse nemon dano s'eenon detsfe» níetiri,
ROM 2:21 K'oshuwotsi daniruwo nwotor bére ntooko eegishe daniyo nk'azi? úp'mk'ayere nietiri, nemon úmp'e n úmp'iri,
ROM 2:22 Wido amk'ayere etirune, nemo wide niamiri, nee Woteraw Ik'uwotsi wic'irune, bo Ik' k'oni moowwotsno fa'o nbiik'iri.
ROM 2:23 Nee Ik'i nemwotsne n'it'ri, ernmó b́nemman gakat Ik'o ngac'iri.
ROM 2:24 Manuwere, «It ayhudiwotsatse tuutson Ik'i shútso Ik' danawu ashuwotsoke c'ashetwe» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 2:25 Gof amo arikon neesh b́ sheenget nemo nkotaale, nemo n gaaketka wotiyalmó gof niamo gofo niamawok'owe b́taaweti.
ROM 2:26 Mansha gof amaaw Ik' ashwoterawwots jiro nemi tzaziyo b́kotetka wotiyal gofo am b́ k'azo gof bíamtsok'o tawetwoshna?
ROM 2:27 Nee guut'ets nemo detstsonat gof amtso wotar nemo ngakal b́ meetson gof amawo wotar nemo s'eentsiru Ik' ash woteraw jiro níyats angshituwe.
ROM 2:28 Eshe shúúts mec'ron Ayhudi wottso ari ayhudiyaliye, mank'owere úratse be'eyiru meetson gof amo ari gof amaliyee.
ROM 2:29 Ari Ayhudiwo b́gitsitse Ayhudi wottsoniye, ari gof amonwere Ik'i shayiron S'ayinon wotit nibotse gof amoniye bako nemon guut'etsok'on meetson gof amaliyee. Eshe hannaari asho údo b́dek'et Ik'okna bako ashoknaliye.
ROM 3:1 Beree ayhudiyots Ik' ashwoterawwotsiyere bok'an eegoneya? Gof amo ayhudiwotssh eebi b́ k'aliti?
ROM 3:2 Arikon Ayhudi woto ay weeron k'anefe, bog keewo Ik'o aap'o ayhudiyotssh adaro bíimtsoniye.
ROM 3:3 Eshe Ayhudiyotsitsere ik ikuwots amanek wotar daatseyo bok'azal, bo amanetsuwotsi wotbok'azo Ik'o amanek b́ woto ooritúwa?
ROM 3:4 B́ jamon oriratse! «N aap'ts aap'atse tuutson arikeewetsoniye nwotiti, N mooshorowere angshon da'itune» Ett guut'etsok'on ash jamo kootetso b́ wotiyalor Ik'o arikeewetske.
ROM 3:5 Ernmó no morro Ik' kááwo b́ kitsitka wotiyal eshe eebi no'eteti? Ik'o nomorrosh noon b́seziyal kááwon angshratse eteya b́ wotiti? Hanoke t keewiruwo ashkok'one.
ROM 3:6 B́ jamon woteratse! hank'o b́wotitkawotiyal Ik'o datsuwats aak'oneya b́ angshiti?
ROM 3:7 Ernmó kootetsi twoto Ik'o ar keewutsi b́woto kitsre, b́mangi ayono kitsitk b́ wotiyal, bere taa morretsok'o tiyats angshet eegoshe?
ROM 3:8 Ik ik ashuwots «Bére, Sheeng keewo b́weyish gond keewo eege nok'aliyala?» etaat tdaniruwok'o woshdek't taan bo s'aamiyir, mansh mank'owwotsats angshet angsho kááwe.
ROM 3:9 Bére no ayhudiyots Ik' ash woterawwotsyere k'anefone eteya? Mank'o woteratse! k'osh ash jamo Ayhudi wotowa Ik' ashwoterawwotsi wotowa morretsuwotsi bowottsok'o shin shin kitsre.
ROM 3:10 Hank'o ett guut'etsok'on, «Dab ikonúwor kááwu asho aaliye, ik doonzuwor aaliye,
ROM 3:11 Nibetsonuwere aaliye, Ik'onowere geyiruwo ikdonzwor aaliye.
ROM 3:12 Jametsuwotswere weeratse k'az keshrne, Ik wotdek't darwutserne. Doo fino finiruwo dab ikdoonzuwor aaliye.
ROM 3:13 Bogogo k'eshets dook'oyiye, bo alberonowere antelcerne, bonoon keewi shuwonwere dawnz marziyok'oyiye
ROM 3:14 Bonoonuwere c'ashonat s'aamon bín s'eenwtskee.
ROM 3:15 Botufo ash úd'osh káárke,
ROM 3:16 Boweeratse daatsetuwere t'afonat dash aanone.
ROM 3:17 Jeeni weeronowere danatsne,
ROM 3:18 Ik'onowere b́ jamon sharaatsne.»
ROM 3:19 Muse nemi tzaziyo b́ s'iilfo nemmaniyere dashe fa'úwotsi b́wottsok'o danfone, manatse tuutson ashuwots bíyats boweebituwo t'ut't s'k bo etiri, dats jamonuwere Ik'i angshi shirots wotitwe.
ROM 3:20 Mansha asho konuwor Ik'o shinatse, Muse nemo s'eentson Kasheratse, Nemman b́kitsir ash jamo morretsi b́wotoniye.
ROM 3:21 Andmó Ik'o ashuwotsi kááwu b́ woshit weero nemalon b́ woteraawok'o be'ere, manuwere Muse nemonat nebiyiwots mas'aafotse gawere.
ROM 3:22 Mansha eshe Ik'o b́ k'osh k'oshirawon Iyesus Krstosi amanon amaniru jamosh kááwu woto imetuwe.
ROM 3:23 Ash jamwots morro finernre, Ik'o boosh b́'imts mangonowere t'ut'rnee.
ROM 3:24 Mansh ashuwots Iyesus Krstos b́ k'alts kashiyi fino Ik'i s'aat mec'ron kááw wotitune.
ROM 3:25 Ik'o Iyesus Krstosi wosho woshdek't b́ t'ints bín amanitu jamwots b́ s'atson bomorrosh oorowe eto bodatsishee, Ik'o man b́k'al b́k'amoon morr shintso k'azoon ar wotts b́took kááwo kitsoshe.
ROM 3:26 And dúranatse Ik'o b́ tookon kááwu b́woto b́kitsir Iyesusi amants jamwotsi kááwu woshoshe.
ROM 3:27 Haniyak bín noít'et keewo eebi fa'oni? Eegonor id'atsone! bín no id'awok'o woshitwonúwere eebi? Nemo no s'eenirwosheya? Woteratse, ernmó imneti nemone.
ROM 3:28 Mansh eshe Ik'i asho kááwu b́ woshit, asho nemi fino b́kaltsosh b́woterawo imnetiyon b́wottsok'o t'iwintsdek'etwone.
ROM 3:29 Himó Izar Izewer ayhudiwots s'uzshe Ik' b́woti? Izar Izewer Ik'i ash woterawwotsshor bokooshna? Arikon Izar Izewer Ik' ash woterawwotsshor boke.
ROM 3:30 Ik'o ike, ayhudiwotsi wotowa Ik' ash woterawwotsi bo amanere kááwu woshituwo bíne.
ROM 3:31 Bére, imnetiyatse tuutson nemo gaketuwone eteya? Iya'a, iki nemo kup'ide'erniye nodetsetiye.
ROM 4:1 Eshe meetson nonih wottso Abraham daatsre noetetuwo eebi?
ROM 4:2 Abraham kááwu b́wot finona wotink'ere, bín b́ it'et keewo daatsiyank'e b́teshi, ernmó Ik'i shinatse it'o falratse.
ROM 4:3 S'ayin mas'aafo, «Abarham Ik'on amanere, bíamantsonwere kááwu b́wottsok'o wotatniye bísh b́taaweyi» etfe.
ROM 4:4 Finiru asho b́ daatsitwo bí angi k'awnts wottsoni bako bísh imet imoniyaliye.
ROM 4:5 Asho sheeng fino b́t'ut'alor dab́ morretswotsi Kashitwo Izar Izeweri bíamaniyal bíamantso kááw wotar bísh taawetwe.
ROM 4:6 Dawit b́kaaton Ik'o sheeng finalon kááw b́woshit asho awuk'o derek b́wottsok'o b́ kitsor hank'owe bíeti,
ROM 4:7 «Bo daro boosh oorowe eteetsuwotsnat Bomorro boosh ipk'reets ashuwots Derekne!
ROM 4:8 Doonzo b́morro bíats b́taawurawu asho Deereke!»
ROM 4:9 Bére, Dawit b́keewuts deeran gofdamiyetsuwots s'uzsheya? Himó gof damiyerawwotsshe? Gof daamiyerawtsshowere, «Abraham Ik'o bíamanere bíamantsman bísh kááwu wotat b́taaweyi» etrone.
ROM 4:10 Eshe Abrahamsh b́imnetiyo kááwu wotat bísh b́taawe awure? Gofo bíamftse shinemó gofo bíamiyake? Gofo bímfetsere shina bako gofo bíamiyakaliye.
ROM 4:11 Abraham gofo bíamfetsere shino b́imnetiyo kááwu wotat b́datsetsok'o kitsosh milikito bísh b́wotituwok'o gofo bí amiye, hanuwere ando gofo boamaawo amanitu jamwots kááwu wotar botaawetuwok'o boosh niho b́wotishe.
ROM 4:12 Mank'owere Abraham gof amtsuwotsshor nihe, gof amtsuwotssh niho b́wottsonuwere gof boamtso s'uzosh b́woterawo bí gofo bí amfetsere shino b́detsts imnetiyi shuutso sha'iruwotsshe.
ROM 4:13 Abrahamnat b́ naaro datsu b́naatetwok'o Ik'o b́ jangiyi imnetiyon b́daatsts kááwona bako nem kotonaliye.
ROM 4:14 Ik'o b́jangitsman naatetwots nemo s'eentsde'e kotet ashuwotsi wotiyalma imnetiyo k'awuntso deshatse, b́jangtsonwere k'awntsalke.
ROM 4:15 Nemo b́dowet Ik'i faye, ernmó nemo bíaalink'e morro berawuk'ee.
ROM 4:16 Mansh Ik'o b́jangitsman bodaats imnetiyona b́ tesh, Ik' jangitsanwere Abraham naar jamwotssh Ik'oki s'aaton imek b́woto arikee. Manúwere nemo shoydek't sha'iru ashuwots s'uzsh b́woterawo Abrahamkok'o amants jamwotsshe, mank'onowere Abraham noúnetssh nihe
ROM 4:17 Abraham jangosh, «Ay ashuwots niho neen woshre» ett guut'ere, bí k'irtsuwotsi tuuzituwonat aalo b́ fa'ok'o woshituwo Izar Izeweri bí amantsotsne.
ROM 4:18 Abrahamsh n naaro ayider ayituwe ett keewetsok'on ay ashi niho b́wotituwok'o bí amananat b́ jang eegoru jangosh wotit keewo bíalefere.
ROM 4:19 B́ idmewo bal natok'o b́teshtsotse b́ meetso b́maawutsotse k'irts ashok'o b́wottsotse shuwo b́falrawonat Sarawwere mahanat gawertsu b́wottsotse shuwo b́falrawok'o b́danaloru b́ imnetiyon maawk woteratse.
ROM 4:20 B́ imnetiyon kup' wotat Ik'osh manga b́ imi bako Ik'o bísh b́ jangitsatse aman k'azoon b́jamon hakebaka eraatse.
ROM 4:21 Ik'o b́jangitsonowere s'eentsitwo b́wotok'o b́ maac'i s'eenona bíamnefo b́teshi.
ROM 4:22 Mansha b́ amantso kááw wotat b́ taaweyi.
ROM 4:23 Ernmó, «Kááwu wotat bísh taawere» ett guut't aap'etso Abraham s'uzsh b́woterawo
ROM 4:24 noshorniye, nodoonz Iyesusi k'irotse tuuztso Izar Izeweri amaniruwotssh nooshor no amantso kááwu wotar b́taaweti.
ROM 4:25 Nodoonz Iyesuswere no morrosha ett k'irosh beshyat b́imeetsonat nonowere kááw woshosh k'irotse tutsoniye.
ROM 5:1 Eshe no kááw woto nodaats amanon b́ wottsotse no doonz Iyesus Krstosn Ik'onton jeeno detsfone.
ROM 5:2 And kup'dek'at nodatseyiru s'aatok nokind bín amanon b́wottsotse Ik'o noosh b́jangits b́ mango kayitwotsi nowottsosh mann it'irwone.
ROM 5:3 Hanmec'ron b́woterawo gond bek'o k'amo noosh b́daatsitwok'o nodantsotse noo gond bek'on it'iruwone.
ROM 5:4 K'amotsnowere fadeyar kup'o, kup'otsnowere jangiyetso daatsetwe.
ROM 5:5 Noosh imets S'ayin shayri weeron Ik'i shuno nonibotse b́ s'eentstsotse b́ jangitso noon jitsiratse.
ROM 5:6 Maawk wotat nobefere Ik'o bíetts aawon Krstos morretswotssha ett b́k'iri.
ROM 5:7 Kááw ash shegro wotar k'irit asho daatso ayide'er kic'ike, b́woteferor doo ash shegro kirosh daneraka daatso faletuwe.
ROM 5:8 Ernmó noo morretswotsi wotat nofa'e noshegro Krstos k'irre, manuwere Ik'o noosh b́detsts shuno awuk'o een b́wottsoniye b́kitsiri.
ROM 5:9 No kááwutso Iyesus Krstos s'atsona wotiyal ikibogshr Ik'i fayotse no kashit b́weerone.
ROM 5:10 Noo Ik'o balangarwotsi wotat nobefere b́naay k'iron Ik'onton no manerone, and Ik'onton nomaneyakon b́ naay kashi weeron iki bogo kashituwone.
ROM 5:11 Han mec'ronaliye, Ik'onton mano bín nodatstso nodoonz Iyesus Krstos weeron Ik'on ít'irwone.
ROM 5:12 Ik ashaatse tuutson morro datsuwats b́weyi, morratse tuutsonowere k'iro b́weyi, mank'owere ash jamo morro b́fintsotse ash jamats k'iro b́weyi,
ROM 5:13 Muse nemo b́ imftsere shin morro datsuwatse fa'e b́teshi, ernmó nemo bíaltsoke morro b́ tookon morrok'o taaweratse b́ teshi.
ROM 5:14 B́ wotiyaloru Adamkok'o nematse beshat morro finerawotsworu dab bo'orerawo k'iro Adamatse tuut Muse ats b́ borfetso ash jamatse alo b́ daatsi, Adamwere shinomaants weetu Krstossh bí aroniye.
ROM 5:15 Ernmó Ik'o b́ s'aati imo ash morronton nuutsaliye, ik ash morri jangon aywots bo k'irtsok'o mank'o Ik' s'aatonat ik asho Iyesus Krstos weeron daatsets s'aaton imetso ayuwotssh bogshdek't imere.
ROM 5:16 Mank'owere Ik'o beenon b́doots imo s'aati oot'o ash iko morro b́doots oot'ok'oyiyaliye. Ash iko morratse tuutson imetso angsho b́doyi, ay morratse tuutson imets imo kááwe wot b́dowi.
ROM 5:17 Ash iko morratse tuutson k'iro ash jamatse alo b́detsiyakon bére Ik'i ay s'aatonat beenon imetso s'aat bín kashitu ash jamwots Iyesus Krstos weeron kashon naashitune.
ROM 5:18 Eshe Adam iks'uzo morri fayi angsho ash jamats b́dootsok'o mank'o Krstos ikoko kashi fino ayuwotsi fayotse kishr kasho imetwe.
ROM 5:19 Ash iko aleyo b́k'aztsatse tuutson ayuwots morretswotsi bowottsok'o mank'o ash iko bíaletsatse tuutson ayuwots kááwitune.
ROM 5:20 Morro bíayitsotse nemo b́weyi, ernmó morro bíaytsok'on Ik'i s'aato iki bogsht bíayi.
ROM 5:21 Man b́wowwere k'iratse tuutson morro b́naashtsok'o mank'o ando aani nodoonz Iyesus Krstos weeron dúre dúri kasho b́ daatseyish Ik'i s'aato kasho imon naashituwe.
ROM 6:1 Eshe eebi noeteti? Ik' s'aato bí ayituwok'o morrats kup'ar beyonowa?
ROM 6:2 Woteratse! no k'iron galetsok'o morratse galetswotsi wotefetsr aawk'oneya morratse kup'ar nobeeti?
ROM 6:3 Krstos Iyesusnton ik wotosh gupets jamwots, b́ k'irono kaytswotsi wotosh, no guupetsok'o danatsteya?
ROM 6:4 Gupon bínton noduukeyor b́k'ironowere kaytsuwotsi woterone, mansh Krstos Niho mangon k'irotse b́ tuutsok'o noowere handr beyon beetuwone.
ROM 6:5 B́ k'iron bínton ik nowottsok'o k'irotse b́tuwon bínton ik wotituwone.
ROM 6:6 No ats morretso no atse b́tuwituwok'o morrosh guuts nowoto b́ oritwok'o no ats nato Krstosnton jitetsok'o danfone.
ROM 6:7 K'irts asho morrosh kewewotse nas'o keshre.
ROM 6:8 Eshe Krstosnton nok'iriyakon bínton kashon nobetuwok'o amanituwone,
ROM 6:9 Krstos k'irotse b́tuutsi jangosh gitlo b́ k'irawok'onat k'ironuwere bíyatse alo b́deshawok'o danfone.
ROM 6:10 K'iroone b́jamon iknoto morrosh k'irre, kashon b́beyonmó Ik'oshe b́beyiri.
ROM 6:11 Mank'o it k'iron k'alwok'o k'alewon morratse it k'aletsok'o Krstos Iyesus weeron Ik'osh kashon itbeyirwok'o taawwere.
ROM 6:12 Mansh morro it ats k'iritwatse alo b́detsetwok'onat it meets tewnosh keewetswotsi itn b́woshitwok'o eekk'ayere.
ROM 6:13 Mank'o it atsi kayuwotsi gondosh k'ac'o woshder morrosh kewik'ayere, ernmó k'irotse tuwat kashetswotsi it wottsok'o woshde'er it tooko Ik'osh t'intsuwere, it atsi kay jamwotsi kááwu finosh k'ac'o woshde'er Ik'osh kewiwere.
ROM 6:14 And it beyir s'aatoniyere dasha bako nemoniyere dash wot b́k'aztsotse morro itn b́ keewo geyiratse.
ROM 6:15 Eshe eege no eteti? Nemoniyere dash nowoto b́ oorere s'aatoniyere dash wotar morro finone eteya? B́jamon woteratse!
ROM 6:16 Bísh alewosh guutswotsi wotosh it tooko bísh it t'iintsiruwosh, bísh it aleyirwosh b́guutsuwotsi it wottsok'o danatsteya? K'irosh morri guutswotsi wee kááwwotosh aleyi guutswots itne.
ROM 6:17 Itiye shin morrosh guutse it teshi, andmó itsh imets danosh it nibon itazazetsotse Ik'osh údo wotowe.
ROM 6:18 Morrosh guuts wototse nas'o keshat kááawu woti guutswotsi woterte.
ROM 6:19 Taa hank'o ashosh b́wotit noon keew keewon tkeewir ash azeyon maawuk it wottsatsne. Shin shin it atsi kay kayuwotsi bokiimish weeri gondonat nemalon beyosh guutswotsi woshdek'at it t'intstsok'o andoor itatsi kayuwots bo S'ayinetwok'o kááw wotosh guutswotsi woshde'er t'intswere.
ROM 6:20 Morrosh guutso itteshor kááwo fino finosh kic'erak itne b́teshi.
ROM 6:21 Bére, manoor eebi it daatsi? And iti b́ jitsiyiruwoniyere okoon eegor daatsatste, keewhan b́ s'uwo k'ire.
ROM 6:22 Andmó morri guuts wototse nas'o keshat Ik'o guutsuwotsi itwottsotse S'ayin woto daatsitute, weeronwere b́s'uwatse dúre dúri kashe.
ROM 6:23 Morrotse daatset k'awuntso k'ire, Ik'oke imet imonmó nodoonz Iyesus Krstosn daatset dúre dúri kashoniye.
ROM 7:1 Tieshuwotso! han danatsteya? Tkeewir nemo dants ashuwotsshe, nemo ashaatse alo b́ detset asho kashon b́befetso s'uziye.
ROM 7:2 Aab s'iilere mááts amts máátsu b́kenih kashon b́befetsosh bínton nemon tipekiye, bkenih b́k'iriyalmó btipets nemotse s'aynat keshraniye.
ROM 7:3 Mansh bkenih kashon b́befere k'osh kenihosh máátso bi amal widetsuniye bish eteti. Bkenih b́k'iryalmó bínton btipets nemotse nas'o keshetuwane, k'osh kenihosh máátso biamalor widetsuni eteeratse.
ROM 7:4 Ti eshuwotso! it keewonuwere hank'oyiye, it Krstos atsi kaywotsi it wottsotse k'iron k'alewok'o k'alewon nematse k'alerte, mansh Ik'i finon shuwo noshuwitwok'o k'osho k'irotse tuutsosh b́ jirwotsi woterte.
ROM 7:5 Meets shunon ananat noteshor nemon tuwiru morri tewuno k'irosh shuwo noshuwish noatsi kayutsitse finefe b́teshi.
ROM 7:6 Andmó noon tipdek' teshts nemo k'iron galetsok'o no'atse b́ galetsotse nemi tipotse keshrone, mansh haniyere oki bísh nofinit handr shayiri jishona bako shin guut'etsnat wotts nemi jishonaliye.
ROM 7:7 Eshe eebi no eteti? Nemo b́tookon morreya? woteratse! ernmó morro eeg b́ wotok'o nodanish woshtso nemoniye. Nemo «Tewunk'aye» eto b́k'azik'e tewuno eeg b́wotok'o danawuk'e b́teshi.
ROM 7:8 Morro nemoke waats tzaziyon gowo daatsdek't jam naari tewuno ti'atsotse b́tuwitwok'o b́woshi. Nemo bíalink'ermó morro k'irke.
ROM 7:9 Shinon nemo bí aalor taa kashone tbeefoni, nemi tzaziyo b́ watsok'onmó taa tk'irre morro kasho b́daatsi.
ROM 7:10 Kashosh imetso nemi tzaziyo tiats k'iro b́doy.
ROM 7:11 Morro nemi tzaziyo weeb woshdk't taan b́ ant'elci, tzaziyanatse tuutsonowere taan b́úd'i.
ROM 7:12 Mansh nemo S'ayine, tzaziyonuwere S'ayinona, k'ááwonat sheenge.
ROM 7:13 Bére sheeng wotts keewan tiats k'iro dek'waare eteya? Iya'a! ernmó morro, morr wotar b́be'etuwok'o sheeng keewatse tuutson k'iro tiats dek'b́weyi, mansha morro tzaziyatse tuutson iki bog morretso b́woti.
ROM 7:14 Nemo shayiri weero b́wottsok'o danfone. Taamó morri guutso wotosh kemeets meetsik taane.
ROM 7:15 Taa t k'aliruwo danatse, t shunts keewo k'alo k'azat tshit'ts keewo k'alirwe.
ROM 7:16 Eshe taa t k'alir tshunaaw keewoni wotiyal nemo sheeng b́wottsok'o gawituwe.
ROM 7:17 K'alo tgeeraw keewo k'aliruwo tiatsotse fa'a morroni bako taanaliye.
ROM 7:18 Tigitsotse wee tmeets doyotse eegor sheeng keewo k'alosh falaatsetsee.
ROM 7:19 K'alosh tgeyiru sheeng keewo k'alratse, ernmó tgeerawu gond keewoniye tk'aliri.
ROM 7:20 K'alosh t geerawu gond keewoni tk'aliri wotiyal han k'aliruwo tgitsotse fa'o morroni bako taanaliye etee.
ROM 7:21 Eshe nemo finats b́jine bek'etuwe, sheeng keewo tgeefere gond keewo tik'altwok'o taan b́woshiri
ROM 7:22 Tgitsi atson Ik'i nemon geneúwituwe.
ROM 7:23 Wotowa eree nibots nemonton k'efefetst ti'atsotsi kayuwotsitse finiru morri nemosh tipetso taan woshiru k'osho azeewon taan jeep'iruwo ti atsi kayuwotsitse b́ beyok'o bek'iruwe.
ROM 7:24 Aawuk'o woteraw ash taane! k'iritu tiatsanowere kone taan kashiti?
ROM 7:25 No doonz Iyesus Krstos weeron Ik'osh údo wotowe! Eshe taa tnibotse, Ik'i nemosh keewetso wotat t meets doyon morri nemosh keewetso wotere.
ROM 8:1 Mansh Iyesus Krstosn beeyruwots and boats angshetuwo deshatsno.
ROM 8:2 Iyesus Krstosn datsetuwo kash imetu S'ayn shayri nemo, morronat k'ir dowet nemotse nas'o taan kishre.
ROM 8:3 Ash doyo maawk b́ wottsatse tuutson nemo s'eentsosh b́ falawo Ik'o k'alre, b́took na'onowere morrets meets aron morri jangosh woshat b́ meetson morro angshon ok b́ bazi.
ROM 8:4 Man b́k'aluwere meets shunon b́ woterawo no'atsitsi Shayiri shuntsok'on ananiruwotsats noats nemi tzaziy ariko bí b́s'eentsitwok'owe.
ROM 8:5 Meets shunon beyiruwotsi meets keewo, Shayiri shunok'on beyiruwotsmó Shayiri keewe bogawiri.
ROM 8:6 Meets keewu gawo k'ire b́ doweti, Shayiri gawirúwok'on wotoonmó kashonat jeenone b́imeeti.
ROM 8:7 Meets keew gawo Ik'oke shit'eek b́wottstse Ik'i nemosh bíalerawotse, kewewono maawre,
ROM 8:8 Meets keewosh kéweyirwots Ik'o geneúsho falatsne.
ROM 8:9 Itmó Ik' S'ayn shayiro ititse beyiruwe wotiyal Shayiri shúnona bako meets shunon beeratste, Krstos Shayiro deshaw ashonúwere Krstos jiraliye.
ROM 8:10 Krstos itits b́ wotiyal it meetso morri jangon k'irk b́ wotiyaloru Ik'o itn b́ káátstsotse it shayiro beyar beetke.
ROM 8:11 Iyesusi k'irotse tizts Ik' Shayiro ititse b́beyal, Iyesus Krstosi k'irotse tiztso Izar Izewer it gitsitse beyiru shayiri weeron k'iritk wotts it meetsosh kasho imetuwe.
ROM 8:12 Eshe t eshuwotso! no kashosh kup'o noosh geyife, ernmó noo beyon meets shunok'on beyo noosh geyiratse.
ROM 8:13 Meets shunok'on it beyal k'iritute, ernmó S'ayn Shayiri angon it meets fino it úd'iyal kashon beetute.
ROM 8:14 Ik' Shayiron jisheyru jamwots Ik' nanaúwotsiye.
ROM 8:15 Mansh «Niho! no nihono!» etaat it s'eegirwo na'ok'o woti Shayiro it dek'i bako shatoon beyosh aani guuts woti Shayiro de'atste.
ROM 8:16 Ik' Shayiro no Shayironton wotar Ik' nanaúwotsi nowottsok'o noosh gawituwe.
ROM 8:17 Eshe Ik' nanaúwotsi nowotiyakon bín naatetuwots noone, Krstosntonuwere naatetuwone, andowere Krstos gond bek'o kaytsuwotsi nowotiyal maniyere okoon b́ mango kayituwotsi wotituwone.
ROM 8:18 And gond bek'an shinomaants noosh be'et mangonton b́ taatseyal eegonoru talosh b́ falawok'o woshde tawituwe.
ROM 8:19 Azets jamo Ik' nanaúwots be'ewo een tewunone b́kotiri.
ROM 8:20 Azets jamo k'awunts deshawosh kewewtsere, manwere b́ took shunon b́ woterawo jangde'er b́ kotetwok'o woshts Ik' shunone.
ROM 8:21 Jangiyetsonwere azeetso b́tookon t'afi guuts wototse nas'o kesht Ik'i nana'úwotsnton s'ayinonat mang kayituwo b́wotituwok'oyiye.
ROM 8:22 Azets jamó ik wotat hambetsish b́borfetso na'a it'i kic'on detseyat kash k'as'oke b́beyiruwok'o danfone.
ROM 8:23 Ernmó gúútoke fa'o azeetso s'uziyaliye, S'ayin shayir shintso imets dek'tsuwots noworu no atsi shegr wottso Ik'o nana'ok'o woto kotfetsat nogitsitsi atson gúútoke nofa'oni,
ROM 8:24 No noworiye jangiyetsanne. Ernmó no no jangiru keewo be'etka wotiyal jangeet keewo b́woto oorituwe, be'eyiruwonere kone jangiti?
ROM 8:25 Nobe'aawu keewo nojangiyalmó k'amoon kotetuwone.
ROM 8:26 Mank'owere awuk'o Ik'o k'ono noon b́geiyitsok'o nodanaawotse S'ayin shayiro nomaawóko noon tep'etuwe, noonon kish keewo falerawo gúúton noosh Ik'o b́k'oniri.
ROM 8:27 Ash nibo shuu'at s'iliruwo Izar Izewer S'ayin shayiri asaabiyo eeg b́wottsok'o danfee, S'ayin shayiro amantsuwots jangosh Ik'o b́ k'onir Ik'i shuntsok'one.
ROM 8:28 Ik'o shuntswotsnat b́shuntsok'onowere s'eegets ashuwots Ik'o jam keewo sheengosh boosh b́k'alituwok'o danfone.
ROM 8:29 Shin b́dantsuwots b́ naayi araar b́ na'onúwere eshu ayuwotsitse k'aab b́wotituwok'o Ik'o shino wotituwe bíettsotsne.
ROM 8:30 Shino wotitune bíettsuwotsi b́s'eegi, b́s'eegtswotsnowere kááwu b́woshi, kááwu b́ woshtsuwotsnowere b́ mangiyi.
ROM 8:31 Eshe keewan jangosh eege noeteti? Ik'o noonton b́wotitka wotiyal kone noon k'efo faliti?
ROM 8:32 Ik'o b́ naay ik s'uzosh maac'o b́k'ewerawo noosha ett bíimiyakon b́ naaynton jamkeewo beenon aawuk'oneya noosh ímo b́k'azeti?
ROM 8:33 Ik'o galb'dek'tsuwotsi kone s'aamituwoni? Boon kááwwotsi woshituwo bíne.
ROM 8:34 Kone angshituwoni? Bí noshegro k'irre, k'irotse tuut Ik'o niho k'ani aaromants beedek'tso, nooshowere Ik'o k'onirwo Krstos Iyesusiye.
ROM 8:35 Krstos shunatse noon k'álo falituwo kone? Kic'eemó, gondbek'e? Gishee himó k'ak'e? Himó araats wote, t'up'ertawemó? Shike?
ROM 8:36 Hanwere «N jangosh aaw jamó noone úd'eyiri, Shukeyiru mereerwotskok'o taa weerone» Ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 8:37 Eshe noon shuntson bín keew jamanotsida'adek'on da'atswotsiyere bogfone.
ROM 8:38 Mansh k'iro b́wotiyalor, kasho b́wotiyalor, melakiwotsi bowotiyalor, naashuwotsnor bowotiyal, andfa'o b́wotiyalor, shutsi weetuwo b́wotiyalor, kup'uwotsi bowotiyalor
ROM 8:39 Danbaan tuuka wotiyalor, dashaanowere gop'awotiyalor, kon naaro wotowa azeetso wotiyal no doonz Iyesus Krstosn nodaatsts Ik'i shunotse noon k'álosh falituwo eegonwor biaalok'owo arikon dandek'roone.
ROM 9:1 Krstosn arikoniye t keewiri, kooratse, S'ayn shayiron t nibonúwere tkorawok'o taash gawirwe.
ROM 9:2 Een shiyanonat k'ut'eraw kic'on t nibotse fa'ee,
ROM 9:3 Meetson t jag wotts tjiruwotssha err taa Krstosatse k'aleyar Ik' c'asho tiyats b́bodink'e shunfee b́teshi.
ROM 9:4 Boye Israe'el ashuwotsiye, na'ok'o wotonat mangi wuliyo nemono b́imi, aron Ik'o bo ik'itywok'ono b́kitsi, b́ jangits keewo bíimi.
ROM 9:5 Amants nihwotswere bokne, Krstos meetson b́wáá bo naarotsne, bíye jamoniyere dambe. Bíwere dúre dúrosh deeretso Izar Izeweriye. Amen!
ROM 9:6 Wotowa eree Ik' aap'tso wonere etaliye, Israe'el naar jamwots ari Israe'el ashnaliye.
ROM 9:7 Mank'o Abraham naar jamo Abraham nanaúwotsiye etaliye. Ik'o Abrahamsh «N naaro b́ keshetiye Yisak'ne» bíettsoshe,
ROM 9:8 Mansh meetson shuwetswots Ik' nanaúwotsiyaliye, ernmó naaro wotar taawetuwots Ik'o Abrahamsh b́jangitsok'on shuwetswots s'uziye.
ROM 9:9 Hanuwere Ik'o b́jangits aap'otse «Hambets naton hank'o aawon weetuwe, Sara nungush na'o shuwitwane» etke b́teshi.
ROM 9:10 Man mec'ro b́ woterawo Rbk'aa naruwotssh niho wottsosh Yisak'sh nungush nana'a maatúwotsi b maac'ro,
ROM 9:11 Ik'i marat' marat'o finon b́woterawo b́s'eegon b́woto kitsosh git nan'úwots boshuwewonat gondonowere sheengonowere bok'aloniyere shino
ROM 9:12 Ik'o Rbk'ash «Eenfo múk'efosh keewek wotituwe» bí eti.
ROM 9:13 Manúwere «Yak'obi shunre Esawunmó shit're» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 9:14 Eshe eege noeteti? Ik'o boga bogshirwe eronowa? B́jamon mank'o woteratse!
ROM 9:15 Ik'oniye Musesh «Bísh doosh tgeyruwosh doowituwe, bísh maac' k'ewo tgeyiruwoshowere maac'o k'ewituwe» etre.
ROM 9:16 Eshe Ik'i marat'o b́daatset ash shunonat ash finon b́woterawo Ik' dowon b́wottsatsne.
ROM 9:17 Manatse tuutson S'ayin mas'aafotse Gbs' nugúsosh «Neen tiango kitsr tshútsonowere dats jamatse b́daneetuwok'o woshosh neen naashiyire» ett aap'etso guut'ere.
ROM 9:18 Mansh eshe Ik'o b́shuntsosh maac'o k'ewefe, b́shuntsonowere k'el kúp'etso woshituwe.
ROM 9:19 Eshe «Ik'i shunts keewo k'efosh konuwor falratse, béré bí ashuwots bo shuntso bo fintsosh eegishe boon b́ b́s'aamiyiri» err taan aato falfete.
ROM 9:20 Nee ashono! Ik'onton mooshosh eegoneya nfali? Shalon dozets k'ac'o bín dooztsosh «Eegishe hank'o kaldek'at taan ndoozi?» etosh falituwa?
ROM 9:21 Eshe shal wozirwo iknaari shali tok'ootse k'ac iko mangosh, k'oshonowere ketts finosh woshde wozosh alo deshatsá?
ROM 9:22 Ik'o b́fayo kitsosho bíangonowere bek'shosh geeyat t'afiyosh k'antsuwotsi fayi k'ac'uwotsi ayoto k'amare wotiyal eendani?
ROM 9:23 Han b́ k'aluwere shin mangosh b́k'anitso sheeng b́woto dek'ets k'ac'uwotssh b́mangi ayo kitsoshe.
ROM 9:24 Sheeng b́ woto dek'ets k'ac'uwotsnmó ayhudiwots mec'rotse b́woterawon Ik'i ash woterawwotsitsnowere noon s'eegree.
ROM 9:25 Hanwere nebiyiyo Hose'n hank'o eteetsok'one, «Tiash teyawuwotsne ‹Tiashuwotsi› err s'eegetuwe, Shuneerawu ashuwotsnowere ‹Shuneeka› err s'eegetuwe,
ROM 9:26 Itiye ‹Tiashuwots itnaaliye› eteets beyokoke ‹Beyat beets Ik'o nanaúwotsi› err boon s'eegetuwe.»
ROM 9:27 Isayasuwere Israe'el jangosh hank'o eton b́ k'ááro eenshdek'tine b́keewi, «Isra'el nanaúwots taawo aats k'aritsi shiyok'o dab bíayiyaloru boyitse kashituwots múk'nee.
ROM 9:28 Doonzo b́ ja'arawo kááronat s'eenon bí angsho imetwe.»
ROM 9:29 Mank'owere Isayas «Dari jirwotssh doonzo shooko noosh oriyo b́k'azink'ere Sedom kituk'o wotiyank'one b́teshi Gemor kitukok'o wotiyank'one b́teshi» ett shin shin keewure.
ROM 9:30 Eshe eege no keewiti? Kááwi weero sha'erawu Ik'i ash woterawwots kááw woto bodaatsi, kááwo wotonwere amanar daatsetuwoniye.
ROM 9:31 Ernmó kááw woto daatsit nemo shuuts sha'at teshts Isra'elots, nemo s'eentsosh bomawutsotse kááwok boratsne.
ROM 9:32 «Eegoshe kááwok bodobok'azi?» eteyala bo kááw wottso daatsosh boge amanon b́woterawon finon b́wottsotsne, manshe t'ugwotsn bo k'is'eyi.
ROM 9:33 Manuwere «Hambe! ashuwotsi k'is'iru shútso S'iyonits beezree, Shútsanuwere ashuwotsi k'ic'de'er dikitu s'aloniye, Bín amanituwonmó jiitsratse» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 10:1 Ti eshuwotso! t maac'otse beyiru een tewunonat Ik'o maants t t'intsiru k'onon Israe'el ashuwots bokashituwok'owe.
ROM 10:2 Ari danon woto b́ k'aztsosha bako bo Ik'osh okooro bo detstsok'osh taa boosh gawituwe.
ROM 10:3 Ik'o ashuwotsi kááw b́ woshit weerindo bodartsotse bo took kááw weerona bosha'i bako Ik' kááw weeron sha'eratsnee.
ROM 10:4 Ash jamo imnetiyon kááwo b́ wotish nemi s'uwo Krstosiye.
ROM 10:5 Nem kotón daatset kááw woto Muse b́ guut'tso «Nemo fenats jitsiru jamo kashon beetuwe» etiruwoniye.
ROM 10:6 Ik'o ashuwotsi imnetiyon kááw b́ woshtsok'onomó hank'o ett guut'ere, «N nibon daro maants kone kesheti?» etk'aye, hanúwere Krstosi orshoshe,
ROM 10:7 Wee n nibon «Si'olits kone ot'eti?» etk'aye, hanúwere Krstosi k'irotse tizoshe.
ROM 10:8 Dabtnu hank'o ett guut'ere, «Ik' aap'tso n ganoke, dab nnononat n maac'otse,» keewanúwere no nokeewiiru imneti aap'oniye.
ROM 10:9 Iyesus doonz b́wotok'o nnonon ngawiyal, Ik'o k'irotse bín b́tiztsok'o n maac'on niamaniyal kashitune.
ROM 10:10 Asho b́ maac'on amanar kááwituwe, b́nonon b́ gawiyal kashituwe,
ROM 10:11 S'ayn mas'aafotse guut'etsok'on, «Bín amants jamo jitseratse.»
ROM 10:12 Eshe ikosh doonz wottso jamosho doonz b́wottsosh ayhudiyonat ayhudiy woteraw dagotse eegoru k'osh k'osheyo aaliye, bín k'oniru jamosh b́s'aato ayide'er imetuwe,
ROM 10:13 «Doonzo shúúts s'eegiru jamo kashituwe» eteere.
ROM 10:14 Ernmó bo amaneraniyere aawuk'oneya s'eegosh bofaliti? B́ jango booshiyaniyere aawuk'oneya bo amaniti? Nabirwo alonomó aawuk'oneya shishosh bo faliti?
ROM 10:15 Nabirwotsi wosheerawonomó aawuk'oneya nabosh bo faliti? Hanuwere, «Doo keewuman shishituwots wáá woo awuk'owe b́geneúshiti!» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 10:16 Ernmó Isayas, «Doonzono! no no aap'tso kone amani» ett b́ keewtsok'o, jamwots doo shishiy keewo de'atsne.
ROM 10:17 Eshe imnetiyo b́ daatset k'ebokne, k'ebetuwonúwere Ik'i aap'otsoniye.
ROM 10:18 Aab aatuna, eshe, b́ keewts keewo shiyatsno eteya? S'ayin mas'aafotse, «Bo k'aro dats jamats b́shiyeyi, Bo aap'ts aap'onuwere dats daarats b́ bodi» ett guut'etsok'on, arikon shishrne.
ROM 10:19 Israe'el ashuwots b́ aap'tso danatsno eteya? Han eterawok'o Muse shinon «Gac'ets ash ashon okoriyat itn tgoyni, T'iwitsrawu ash ashon itn tfayi» eteere.
ROM 10:20 Isayasuwere, «Taan geerawwotssh tdatseyi, ‹Ik'o aawoke?› ett Taan aatrawwotssh tbe'eyi,» ett ááwushúk'on keewure.
ROM 10:21 Israe'el ashuwotsshomó «Azazerawonat gond ashuwots tmaants boweetwok'o aawu jamo tkishuwotsi t jargi» etre.
ROM 11:1 Aab́ dab neen aatuna, Ik'o bí ashuwotsi juuwera? B́ jamon juweratse! taa ttookon Israe'el ash taane, Abraham naaro wotat Bíniyam jirots taane.
ROM 11:2 Ik'o shini b́ marat'ts ashuwotsi juweratse, S'ayn mas'aafo Eliyas jangosh eeg bíettsok'o gawatsteya? Dab Eliyas Israe'el ashuwotsi Ik' shinatse awuk'o ett b́ s'aamitsok'o danatsteya?
ROM 11:3 Manoor Eliyas «Doonzono! nebiyiwotsi úd'rne wosh t'intseyiru t'arap'ezono gaakrne, ts'uziye oori, taano úd'oshe bogeyiri» etre b́ teshi.
ROM 11:4 Ernmó Ik'o eega ettniya bísh bíaani? «Ba'ali eteets dozets ik'osh tuk'umalerawo shawat kúm ashuwotsi ttokish ooridek're» etre bísha.
ROM 11:5 And dúranatse b́wotsiyal, s'aaton marat'ere ortsuwots muk' Israe'el ashuwots fa'ane.
ROM 11:6 Marat'onwere s'aaton b́ wotiyal finonaliye etee, finon b́ wotiyal, s'aato s'aat b́ woto orerere etee.
ROM 11:7 Eahe b́ k'awuntso eebi b́wotiti? Esra'el ashuwots bogetso datsatsno, marat'etswotsmó bo geyiruwo daatsrne, oortsuwotsmó bo maac'o bokup'i.
ROM 11:8 Hanuwere «Ik'o bo nibo b́ dúngiyi, mansh eshe hambetsish b́ borfetso bo ááwo be'atse, boowazonuwere shiyatse» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 11:9 Dawitwere, «Bomishi maronu detset kambo, dikit gop'o wotar boon kic'ituwe! bofiniru gond fino botokats boree!
ROM 11:10 Bo ááwo b́ be'awok'o t'aluwowe, bojik'o gond bek'on jam aawo k'urowe» etre.
ROM 11:11 Aab́ aani neen aatuna, ayhudiyots bodihi aani boturawok'o wotatniya? Mank'owaliye! ernmó ayhudiyots gondo bo fintsi jangosh Ayhudi woterawwots kasho bodaatsi, han b́wotiye ayhudiyots Ayhudi woterawwotsi bo ookoritwok'o woshoshe.
ROM 11:12 Ayhudiyots gond fino dats jamosh deero datsire, bodiho Ik' ash woterawotssh deero wotere, Ayhudi jamwots bookashink'ee deero awuk'o aye b́wotiyank'oni!
ROM 11:13 And nokeewir itsh Ik' ash woterawwotsshe, Ik' ash woterawwotssh wosheetso twottsok'osh t finosh mango taash shiyeetuwe,
ROM 11:14 T meets jag wotts ayhudiwotsi okooriyoshe, mank'onowere daneraka ik ikuwotsi kashiyo falituwe etee.
ROM 11:15 Ik'o boon b́ juwoor datsatsi ash k'oshuwots Ik'onton b́ manetka wotiyal Ik'o boon b́ dek'or eeg b́wotituwok'o arefa? Haniyere k'irotse tuwok'oyi etee!
ROM 11:16 Ik naari boot'otse shintsotsi kayo S'ayinka wotiyal boot' jamo S'ayinkee b́ wotiti, mank'o mit iko b́s'ap'o S'ayina wotiyal b́ jabwotswere S'ayine bowotiti.
ROM 11:17 Worfitsi woyra eteyiru mit jaabo wotts ayhudiyots k'ut'eyar bodihitka wotiyal it boditsi woyiriy mit jaabo wotts Ik' ash woterawwots bo shegro shááto shegrshr weyiri zeyito bítse b́keshiru s'ap'ootse keshiru gaalonat deeron kaytsuwotsi itwotiyakon, b́ jaabwotsats ít'k'ayere.
ROM 11:18 It Ik' ash woterawotso jaabwotsats ít'k'ayere, it it'alomó it jaab mec'ro it wottsosh s'ap'oni itn kuriti bako it b́ s'ap'o kurirwotsi itwoterawok'o dande'ere.
ROM 11:19 Ernmó «Jabúwots tishat bodihi, taa bo beyok tikinditwok'o» etaatne b́ teshi.
ROM 11:20 It ettso aree, ernmó bo k'ut'at bojuwe amano bok'aztsosh b́ wottsotse itwere k'up'at it ned'iye itamantsoshe, eshe, shata bako hit'o itn geyiratse.
ROM 11:21 Ik'o azeewon jaab wotts ayhudiyotssh maac'o k'ewo b́ k'aziyakon itsh maac'o k'eweratse.
ROM 11:22 Eshe Ik' doowonat Ik' shatiyon aab s'iilere, b́ shatiyonu b́kitsir dihitswotsats b́ wotor b́ doo wotonu b́ kitsir itshee, hanowere b́k'alir b́ dowon k'up'ar it betka wotiyalemó b́ doo itsh wotituwe, kup'o itk'azalomó itwere k'ut'eyarniye it dihiti.
ROM 11:23 Ayhudiyots bo amaniyal yoots bobeyok aanitune, Ik'o yoots bobeyok boon aaniyosh falituwe.
ROM 11:24 It Ik' ash woterawwotsmó azeyon boditsi woyiri miti jaabo wotat teshtsuwots it beyokalo worfotsi woyiri mitats tokeyo it faliyakon hanots bo azeyon worfitsi woyiri miti jaabo wotts ayhudiyotsmó yoots bobeyok aanar tokeyo aawuk'oneya boosh b́ maaweeti!
ROM 11:25 Ti eshuwotso! «Danfone» err it'k'ayere itsh tkeewitwo ááshts keewo fa'ee, bíwrer Israe'el ashuwots k'azts woto b́ jamosh b́woterawo Ik' ash Woteraw jamwots s'eenon Ik'ok bowafetsoshe.
ROM 11:26 Eshe hank'on Israe'el asha ash jamwots kashitúne. Mansh hank'o ett guut'ere, «Kashituwo S'iyonn weetuwe, Yak'ob naar jamatse gondo wokiituwe,
ROM 11:27 Bomorro boosh t t'afiyor bonton tkindit taaro haniye.»
ROM 11:28 Israe'el ashuwots doo shishiyosh aap'etso dek'o bok'aztsotse, itjangosh it Ik' ash woterawotssh b́dooyish Ik'osh balangaro bowoti, bomarat'ewonmó nihiwots jangats tuutson Ik'o boon shunknee.
ROM 11:29 Ik'o noon marat'de'er b́ deero bí imiyakon b́ k'alts keewumansh b́gawtso woniratse.
ROM 11:30 It Ik' ash woterawwots shin Ik'osh alerawwotsiye it teshi, andomó ayhudiyots aleyo bok'aztsotse it Ik' maac' k'ewo it datsi.
ROM 11:31 It maac' k'ewo it daatstsok'on boowere maac' k'ewo bodatsituwok'o boowere and Ik'osh alerawwotsi woterne.
ROM 11:32 Ik'o b́ maac' k'ewo ash jamosh kitsosha ett ash jamwotsi ale k'azon is'k'reroshná.
ROM 11:33 Ik' gaalona, dani teleefonat danoonúwere awuk'o eene! bí angsho fal bíats boderake, b́ werindonu danerake.
ROM 11:34 «Ik' hasabiyo danetuwo kone? Bísh iztsi wotituwonmó kone?
ROM 11:35 Ik'osh gushituwonat b́ gushitsono dek'etuwo kone?»
ROM 11:36 Jam keewo b́ daatse bíyokne, jam keewo bíne b́beeti, jam keewo bíshe b́ beeyeti, dúre dúron mango bísh wotowe! Amen!
ROM 12:1 Eshe eshuwotso! Ik'o genee'úshitwo, beyar beetwonat S'ayin wosho woshde'er it atso it t'intsitwok'o maarts Ik'o shútson itn k'onirwe. Manowere t'intso itn b́ geyitso ari Ik'osh finet finoniye.
ROM 12:2 Sheengonat genee'úshitwo kim deshawonowere Ik'o shuntso fadbek'o it falitwok'o it nibi gawirwon handraar, it beyo woneewa bako datsani ark'ayere.
