ROM 12:3 Aaninuwere it ik ikets Ik'o itsh b́imts imnetiyok'on tooko dashan detson asaabore bako it angoniyere danb it tookosh bogotaane err asaabk'ayere ett taash imets s'aaton keewirwe.
ROM 12:4 No ats ikatse ay kayuwots fa'ane, noatsi kay ik ikonuwere k'osh k'osh fino detsfe.
ROM 12:5 Mank'owere noo ayuwotsi wotat nobefere Krstosn ik ats noone, ik atsi kayuwotsi nowottsok'on noatsatsewo desheeknone.
ROM 12:6 Mansh Ik'o b́ s'aaton noosh b́ ímts k'osh k'osh naari deero finats jiitswone, noosh imetso Ik'o aap'ts keewa wotiyal no amantsok'on Ik' aap'tso keewwone.
ROM 12:7 Noosh imetso k'oshwotssh fina wotiyal kup'ar finone, noosh imetso daniya wotiyal sheengshde'er daniwone,
ROM 12:8 noosh imetso iza wotiyal izwone, noosh imetso tuwdi dowawotiyal nib s'eenon imone, noosh imetso ashuwotsi k'eeza wotiyal kup'ar k'eezwone, noosh imetso mihretiya wotiyal hanowere gene'on k'aluwone.
ROM 12:9 Git alber deshaw ari shunewo t'ut'k'ayere, gond keewo shid'ere, sheeng keewi shuutso sha'ore.
ROM 12:10 It ats atsewo eshuwwots shunon shunewere, it ats atsewosh mango imosh nohewere,
ROM 12:11 mawuk'ayr, Shayron aat'iruwotsi wotoore, doonzosh keewewere.
ROM 12:12 Jangiyetson gene'owere, gond bek'o k'amoore, jam aawo Ik'o k'onwere.
ROM 12:13 Amants eshuwotsi bokic'or te'úwere, ibwotsno ibíewre.
ROM 12:14 Itn gishirwotsi deerwere, derwere bako c'ashk'ayere.
ROM 12:15 Geneúwirwotsnton gene'ore, epiruwotsnton efere.
ROM 12:16 It ats atseyo ik hasabiyon ikwotar beewere, it tooko danbaan deshr bog taana eto k'ayr t'owwotsnton ik wotar beewere. It tookosh danfone etk'ayere.
ROM 12:17 Ash jami shinats sheeng wotts keewo k'aluwere bako, ashuwots itats gond keewo bok'aliyal, it aanide'er gondo boosh k'alk'ayere.
ROM 12:18 Itsh b́ faleyal ash jamonton jeenon beyosh it weeron it falitu jamo k'aluwere.
ROM 12:19 T jirwotso! fayo Ik'osh k'ayere boko it it tookon weero oorshk'ayere, «Weer weershtwonat weer worshi gushono anituwo taane etfe Doozo Ik'oni» ett guut'ere.
ROM 12:20 Mansh weer worshoniyere n balangaro b́k'ak'iyal mazuwe, b́shashuwiyal shashuwo kishwe, hank'o n k'aliyal goyinar b́ jitsituwok'o woshitune.
ROM 12:21 Mansh gond keewo sheeng keewon da'úwere boko gond keewon da'ek'ayere.
ROM 13:1 Konuworu naash wottso b́ daatsit Ik' shunon b́ wottssotse and datsk'eziruwots bo naash Ik'on b́ wottsotse ash jamo naashwotssh alewo bísh geyife.
ROM 13:2 Mansh naashuwotsi k'efitu jamo Ik' aloniye b́k'efiri, aleraw jamonuwere sezi angsheyo b́ tookats dowetuwe.
ROM 13:3 Dats k'eziruwotsi shatet gond finirwotsi bako sheeng finiruwotsiyaliye, naashuwotsi shat k'azo geefneya? Bére sheeng fino finowe, booke údo daatsitune.
ROM 13:4 Naasho neesh sheengo b́ k'alituwok'o naashiyets Ik' guutsoniye, dats k'eeziruwo shiki gorado bí'ed hank'on woto b́k'aztsotse gond fintso nwotiyal dats k'eeziruwo share, bíwere gond finiruwotsi sezosh Ik' weer wershono kitsr Ik'osh finitune.
ROM 13:5 Mansh mengst naashuwotssh alewo itsh geyife, it aletwere Ik' fay mec'ro shatoon b́ woterawo it nibo itn b́ gac'ituwosh woto geyituwe.
ROM 13:6 Ereero it imiru manshe, naashuwots finan finosh botuu Ik'osh finoshe.
ROM 13:7 Eshe danbi naashuwotssh k'alo geyituwu jamo k'aluwere, ereero bísh wotituwosh ereero, t'ilisho bísh wotituwosh t'ilisho imere, shatetwono sharere, mango bísh wotituwosho mango imere.
ROM 13:8 Kon k'awuntsonúwor itatse beek'aye, itatse beeyet k'awuntsoniye itats atseyo shúnee mec'r wotowe, ash shunetuwo nemo finats jitsre.
ROM 13:9 «Wido amk'aye, úd'́k'aye, úmp'k'aye, k'osh ashk wotts keewu jamo tewunk'aye» etiru tzaziyotsnat k'osh tzazi jamwots, «Asho ntookok'o woshde'er shune» etiru ik tzaziyotse ko'eyat bofa'oni.
ROM 13:10 Ash shuniru jamo b́ shuniru ash manats gond keewo k'alatse, mansh ash shuniruwo nem jamo finats jitsre etee.
ROM 13:11 Eshe tokrotse it tuwit sa'ato and b́bodtsok'o dande'ere, shini noamanortsoniyere bogo and no kashit aawo iki nomaants t'inre.
ROM 13:12 T'úwonu beshe b́ beshiri, aawonu t'inree, eshe t'aluwotse fineyiru finon fink'ayone, sháánon bin finet kes'i tahono tahade'one.
ROM 13:13 Weral míshon, mashon, widonat máátsonat nungushi iko ikats keshon, fayonat okooron b́ woterawo aawu shanon beyiruwu ashuwotskok'o s'ayinon sha'owone.
ROM 13:14 Eshe Doonzo Iyesus Krstosi tahade'ere bako it meets shuni shashuwo kishosh gawuk'ayre.
ROM 14:1 Ititse b́ imnetiyon maawuk wotts asho b́ keewo de'ere bako b́ took asaabiyats moosho tuuzk'ayere.
ROM 14:2 Dab ash iko konnari keewo móósh faliyit imnetiyo detsetwe, b́ imnetiyon kup'eraw ashonmó worfi maay mec'ro meetuwe.
ROM 14:3 Mansh jam keew meyiru asho mááraw asho gac'k'aye, máárawonwere meet asho ats angshk'aye, Ik'o bínowere dek're.
ROM 14:4 Bére, ash k'oshi guutso ats angshiruwan nee kone? Bí b́ need'iyal wee b́ dihiyal b́ doonzo kis'e. Dab Ik'o bín need'iyo b́ falituwotse kup'ar need'ituwe.
ROM 14:5 Mank'o aawu iko aawu ikoniyere bogo mangfe et gawiruwo beyo falituwe, ando k'oshonu aawu jamwots mango taale bako aawwotsitse bogabogo aaliye ett asaabirwe. Eshe hanan arts keewwotsatse asho ik ikon b́nibots bíamantsok'o woshuwe.
ROM 14:6 Ik aawo k'osh aawoniyere bogshde'er mangiyituwo b́ beyal han b́ k'alirwe doonzo mangosha ettniye, jam naari mishono meyiruwo doonzo mangosha etniye b́meyiri, b́ meyiru mishosh Ik'o údituwe, jam naari mishono marawo doonzo mangosha err maratse, maa b́ k'aztsotsno Ik'o údituwe.
ROM 14:7 Noyitsere ikonuworu b́ kashon wotowa b́ k'iron b́tokkaliye.
ROM 14:8 Nobeyalo doonzosha nobeeti, no k'iriyalo doonzosha no k'iriti, eshe nobeyalo, nok'iriyalo doonzok noone,
ROM 14:9 Eshe Krstos k'irt k'irotse b́ tuu kashon betuwotsnat k'irtsuwotssh doonz wotoshe.
ROM 14:10 Bére, nee n eshuwats eegoshe n angshiri? Wee ni eshuwi eegishe n gac'iri? No únets Ik' angshi jori shinats ned'ituwone.
ROM 14:11 Manwere, «Taa kashon betuwo taane etfe Ik'oni, Ash jamo b́ gurbon tshinatse tuk'umalituwe, B́ alberon taa Ik' twottsok'o gawituwe» ett guut'ere.
ROM 14:12 Eshe notook tookon no took fini jangosh Ik' shinats t'inr aatetwone.
ROM 14:13 Eshe iko ikats angshk'aye, ernmó asho b́ eshuwsh weratse kambo wee t'úgo gedk'azosh no atso korde'one.
ROM 14:14 Ik keewo kiime err asaabiru ashosh keew man kima b́ wotiti bako kon naari keewonworu b́ tookon kim b́ woterawok'o taa doonzo Iyesusn t'iwintsdek' danre.
ROM 14:15 Nee n meyiru mishi jangon ni eshush t'ugo n wotiyal shúnonaliye nbeyiri, eshe Krstos bísh b́k'irts asho n meyiru mishi jangon b́ t'afitwok'o woshk'aye.
ROM 14:16 Eshe itoke sheeng keew wotts keewo k'oshuwots bok'efetuwok'o woshk'ayere.
ROM 14:17 Ik' mengsto S'ayin shayiron datsetsetk kááwe, jeenonat gene'ona bako, móónat úshi keewaliye.
ROM 14:18 Han jangosh Krstissh guuts wotts asho Ik'o geneúshituwe, ashoknowere údeek wotituwe.
ROM 14:19 Eshe jeenwoto bín datsetuwonat no ats atseyo bín nokup'it keewon sha'owone.
ROM 14:20 Mishi jangosh Ik' fino gakk'ayone. Mish jamo s'ayine, ernmó k'osh ashosh t'ug wotitu mish móó dáree.
ROM 14:21 Eshe ni eshúsh t'úg wotk'azosh meetso maak'azo, Weyinyon dútsets biro úsh k'azo, wee kon naari t'ug wotituwo fino fin k'azo sheenge b́ wotiti.
ROM 14:22 Eshe imnetiyan itnat Ik' dagots wotowe, err n amants keewo b́k'alor b́ maac'o bín b́gac'erawu asho údekee.
ROM 14:23 B́ amaneraniyere meyiru ashonmó b́ k'aliruwo imnetiyatse tuutson wot b́ k'aztsosh bíyats angshetuwe, imnetiyon k'aleraw keewu jamo morre.
ROM 15:1 No imnetiyon kúp wottswots, mawirwots kuro kurdek'o geyife bako no took mec'ro geneúshitu woto geyiratse,
ROM 15:2 no took tookon k'osh asho b́ imnetiyon b́ kup'ituwok'o bín t'ak'amituwonat geneúshit keewo k'aluwone.
ROM 15:3 Krstos b́ tooko geneúshratse, dab «Ashuwots neen boc'ashts c'asho ti'ats b́ oot'i» etiru S'ayn mas'aafotse eteetso bí ats b́ bodi.
ROM 15:4 S'ayin mas'aafotse nodatsituwots k'amonat kup'on, noosh jángo b́beetuwok'o shin guut'ets jamo dano noosh b́ wotituwok'o guut'ere.
ROM 15:5 Ik níbon wotde'er ik noonon Ik'o nodoonz Iyesus Krstos nihi, bín it mangitwok'o, k'amikonat angi kúp'iko Ik'o Izar Izewer Krstos Iyesus shunok'on it atsatsewo ik níbetsuwotsi woto itsh ime.
ROM 15:7 Krstos Ik' mangosh itn b́ dek'tsok'o it jamets iko iko de'e.
ROM 15:8 Hanowere t keewor Ik'o shints nihuwotssh b́ jangitso b́ wotituwok'onat Ik'o arikeewets b́ wotonwere b́ danetuwok'o Krstos ayhudiyotssh guutso wotere etee.
ROM 15:9 Krstos ayhudiyots guutso b́ wottso k'osh jango Ik' ash woterawwots Ik'o b́ mhretiyosh bín bo údituwok'owe, hanuwere, «Eshe Ik' ash woterawwots dagotse neen udituwe, n shúútsosh dubon údo t'intsituwe» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 15:10 Aaninu «It Ik' ash woterawotso, Ik' ashuwotsnton gene'owere!» ett guut'ere.
ROM 15:11 Aaninuwere, «Ik' ash Woteraw jamwots! doonz údoore, Ash ash jamwotswere údoore!» ett guut'ere.
ROM 15:12 Ando Isiyas, «Iseyi naarotse shuwetuwo weetuwe, Ik' ash woterawwotssho jishituwo wotar tuwituwe, boowere bojangtso biyats woshdek'etune» etfe.
ROM 15:13 It jangtso S'ayin shayiri angon eenfere b́ ametuwok'o jangetso Izar Izewer bín it amanetsosh gene'únat jeenon s'eenon itsh ime.
ROM 15:14 Ti eshuwotso! doo woton s'eentsuwotsi, danon gaaltsuwotsnat it ik iketsuwots k'osho izosh falituwotsi itwottsok'o danre.
ROM 15:15 Ik ik keewwotsi itsh gawiyosh geeyat woshan Ik'o taash b́ imts s'aatok'on ááwushuk'on itsh guut're.
ROM 15:16 Deeranuwere taash b́ime Ik'o doo shishi keewo Ik'i ashwoterawwotssh shishiyosh kahniyo wotat Krstos Iyesush finoshe, Mansh Ik' ashwoteraw ashuwotssh S'ayin shayiro S'ayintsonat Ik'onowere gene'úshit wosho wotáár bot'inetuwok'o finiruwone.
ROM 15:17 Manatse tuutson Krstos Iyesun Ik'osh fino tfaltsotse it'iruwee.
ROM 15:18 Ik'i ash woterawwots bo aletwok'o woshosh Krstos ti aap'onat finatse tuutson b́ fints keewo wotiyalabako k'osho aap'osh aawo shu'atse.
ROM 15:19 Hank'owere een adits milikit finuwotsn S'ayin shayiri angon Iyerusalemnat b gúúratse tuut Elwarik'oni b́ borfetso Krstos doo shishiyo danire.
ROM 15:20 Jam aawu t tewuno k'osh asho b́ agtsats dabr ago b́woterawo Krstos shutso b́ shiyerawu beyok jamok sheeng doo shishiyi keewuman daniye.
ROM 15:21 Hanu, «Haniyere shinon b́ jangosh eegoru keewerawu ashuwots bek'etune, b́ jangosh shiyawwots t'iwitsitunee» ett guut'etsok'one.
ROM 15:22 Manshowere itmaants twarawok'o ayoto taan baziyeree.
ROM 15:23 Andomó han gúúratsi fa'a datsuwotsatse t finit beeyokuwots bo beetsotse, hank'o ay dúrosh itn s'ilosh een tewuno tdetstsotse
ROM 15:24 Ispen maants t amor man weeron itn s'ilosh gawure. Muk' aawosh itnton gene'útsat tteshiyakon twerindo ttuwosh taan falit tep'o it k'alituwok'o jangere.
ROM 15:25 Andomó Ik' jirwots tep'et gizo deshde'er Iyerusalem maants ametuwe.
ROM 15:26 Hanuwere Mek'odoniyonat Ak'yiyi datsatse fa'a Ik' jirwots Iyerusalemn beyiru tugúretsuwotssh boon tep'et gizo woshosh boshunon bogawutsotsne.
ROM 15:27 Tep'anowere bo shunon imo boosh geyik b́wottsotsne, Ik' ash woterawots ayhudiyotsnton shayiri deero kayosh b́wotiyal boowere bomeets deeron ayhudiyotsi tep'o boosh geyife.
ROM 15:28 Eshe ko'iyets gizan Iyerusalem maants de'am boosh t imiyakon it weeron waar Ispen maants t ameti.
ROM 15:29 Itok twoor Krstos deero s'eenon itsh de'er tweetuwok'o danfee.
ROM 15:30 Tieshuwotso! t jangosh Ik'o maants k'onon tmaak'oriruwo taash itdabish nodoonz Iyesus Krstosnat S'ayin shayiri shunon iti k'oniruwe.
ROM 15:31 Ik'o taash it k'onituwere Yihud datsatsi fa'a amanerawu ashuwots kishotse farr Iyeresalemitse t detsts fiinonuwere Ik'i jirwotsoke dek'eyo b́daatsituwok'owe.
ROM 15:32 Han b́wotiyakon Ik'o bíetal geneúwon itok waarr itoke kashdek'o shunfee.
ROM 15:33 Jeeniko Izar Izewer it únetsnton wotowe! Amen.
ROM 16:1 Feben Knkriy kitotse Ik' moowosh finiru nomish amanetsu b wottsok'o it dano geefe.
ROM 16:2 Bi taanat k'osh ay ashuwotsi b tep'iruwotse amants ibuwotsi ibiyo boosh b́ wotituwok'o doonzo shútson de'er bish geyit keewo jamon bin it tep'etuwok'o oona itsh etiruwe.
ROM 16:3 Iyesus Krstos fino finiruwotsnton ik wottsuwots P'rsk'lnat Ak'ilnsh jamo keewwere,
ROM 16:4 boowere t shegro k'iroshoru dab k'andek'kne boteshi, hann boon jam aawosh úditwe, t s'uzi b́ woterawo Ik' ashwoteraw krstani woto maants aants Ik' moowwotsworu it údirune.
ROM 16:5 Bo moots Ik' k'onosh kakuwets amantsuwotssh jamo t'intsuwere. Isiyi dats kayatse shini Krstosn amantsonat tshuntso Ep'enet'ossh jamo keewwere.
ROM 16:6 Itsh ayidek'at maawutsu Mariyamsh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:7 Taanton tipeyat teshts woshetswotsitsere daneets teshts ayhudiyots jaagúwots Andronik'osnat Yuniyassh jamo t'intsuwere, boowere taayere shine Krstosi bo amani.
ROM 16:8 Doonzon tshúntso Amp'ilyat'ossh jamo t'intsuwere,
ROM 16:9 Krstos finon noonton ik wottso Úrbanosnat tshúntso Ist'akussh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:10 Krstosk b́ wottsotse fadeyat bíere bísh gawetso Ap'elissh jamo t'intsuwere, Arst'obulos maa ash wottsuwotssh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:11 Ayhudiyotse t jago Herodiyonsh jamo t'intsuwere, Narsises maa ashuwotsitse Doonzon amantsuwotssh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:12 Doonzosh finon ayidek't maawirwotssh Trufaynnat Trufolsh jamo t'intsuwere. Doonzo finon ayidek'at mááwtsunat Krstosn ayidek'at tshunts Persissh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:13 Doonzosh finon ayidek't danetso Rufossh jamo t'intsuwere, taan b naayikok'o shunfu b́ indshowre jamo t'intswere.
ROM 16:14 Asnkritosnat Flegonsh, Hermesmsh, Patrobasmsh, Hermasmsh, bonton fa'a eshúwotssh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:15 Filologossh, Yulyash, Neryanat b́ mishsh jamo t'intsuwere, hank'o Olumpasnat bínton fa'a amantsuwots jamwotssh jamo t'intsuwere.
ROM 16:16 S'ayin jobon it atsatseyo jobeyar jamo aatewere. Krstosk wotts Ik' maa jamwots jamo itsh t'intsirune.
ROM 16:17 Ti eshuwotso! it dek'ts dan man k'efituwotsi wotat it dagotse k'aleyon gond bek'o dowet ashuwotsatse it atso korde'ere, boatsere wokoore!
ROM 16:18 Hank'o ashuwots botookosha bako Krstosshaliye bo finiri. Bonono shaawshdek' dáshon garaamiwots nibo boant'elciri.
ROM 16:19 Doo shishi aap'osh aleets ash it wottso ash jamokere b́ danetsotse geneúk t wotwotiyaloru, sheeng keewosh dantswotsi, gond keewoshomó maac' kúp'uwotsi it wotitwok'o geefe.
ROM 16:20 Jeeniko Izar Izewer káári Shed'ano it tufi shirots tiitsetwe. No Doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aato itnton wotowe.
ROM 16:21 T finonton ik wottso T'imotiwos jamo itsh t'intsiruwe, eshe ayhudiyotse t jag wotts Luk'iyosnat Iyason Sosip'at'roswere jamo t'intsirune.
ROM 16:22 Woshhan guut'tso taawe T'ert'iyos Doonzon jamo t'intsituwe.
ROM 16:23 Taanat hanokere fa'a jamo Ik' moowwotsi Ibiiruwo Gayiyos jamo t'intsiruwe, kitutsi gizo detsiruwo Erast'os, no eshú K'a'rt'os jamo itsh t'intsiruwe.
ROM 16:24 
ROM 16:25 Taa tdaniru doo shishi keewan Iyesus Krstos jangosh beshiyeyiru woshonat yootstson aashat teshtso, andomó be'ets ari ááshts keewon Ik'onwere it imnetiyats it ned'ituwok'o iti woshosh falituwe.
ROM 16:26 Andomó arikan be'ere, dúre dúrts Ik'o tzaziyon jamwots amanar bo aletwok'o Nebiywots mas'aafi weeron ash jamwots bo danetuwok'o k'alere.
ROM 16:27 B́ s'uzn dani teleefo detsts Ik'o Izar Izewersh, Iyesus Krstosn dúre dúron údo wotowe! Amen.
1CO 1:1 Ik' shunon Iyesus Krstossh wosheets wotosh s'eegetso P'awlosnat no eshu Sostensokere.
1CO 1:2 K'orontos kitotse fa'a Ik' moosh, biyitsnowere Iyesus Krstosn S'ayin wotts S'ayin bowotish s'eegetswotssh, mank'owero bo be beyoke, bonat nonsh Doonz wottso no Doonz Iyesus Krstos shúútso s'eegiru jamwotssh.
1CO 1:3 No nihi Ik'onat Doonzo Iyesus Krstosokere s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
1CO 1:4 Iyesus Krtosnton s'aato itsh imetsosh it jangosh jam aawo Ik'o údituwe.
1CO 1:5 Jam keewon, noon keewon wotowa danon Krstosn gaalwutserte.
1CO 1:6 Krstos jangosh itsh t keewts gawo itokere kúp'ere.
1CO 1:7 Eshe no Doonz Iyesus Krstos be'ewo koton nobefere kon naari shayiri imo itsh shapratse,
1CO 1:8 No doonz Iyesus Krstos aani woor eeg eeg deshawwotsi wotar nodatsetwok'o bí s'uwosh b́ borfetsosh kup'ar it beetuewk'o woshúwe.
1CO 1:9 B́ naay no Doonz Iyesus Krstosnton ikwoto itdetsetuwok'o itn s'eegtso Ik'o amaneke.
1CO 1:10 Ti eshuwotso! «K'alewo it dagotse b́ berawok'o, it jamets shiyeyar ik níbonat ik s'iil s'iilon kup'ar beewere,» etaat no Doonz Iyesus Krstos shúútson itn k'oniruwe.
1CO 1:11 T eshuwotso! it dagotse fayo b́ beyiruwok'o K'elo'e maa ashuwotsoke shishre.
1CO 1:12 Manuwere it itok tookon «Taa P'awlosk taane, taa Ap'losk taane, taa P'et'rosk taane, taa Krstosk taane» it etiri.
1CO 1:13 Bére Krstos kayera? P'awlos itsh jiitera? Himó it gupe P'awlos shútsoneya?
1CO 1:14 Taa K'ersp'osnat Gayyosiyere okoon ititsere konnoru t gufawotse Ik'o údituwe.
1CO 1:15 Eshe «Taan P'awlos shútson guuperte» err keewosh falituwo aaliye. [
1CO 1:16 Arikee, Ist'ifanos maa ashuwotsi gupre, maniyere okoon k'osho taa t gupts asho b́ bewok'o gawratse.]
1CO 1:17 Krstos taan b́wosh doo shishi keewo t danituwok'owa bako t gupishaliye, Krstos jiito hank'on b́ oorerawok'o doo shishi keewan tdanir ashoke daatsets dani telfi noon keewok'onaliye.
1CO 1:18 B́ jiti keewo t'afit ashuwotssh darok'owe b́ taaweti, noosh kashituwotsshomó Ik' angee.
1CO 1:19 «Dani telefetswots dano t'afituwe, Dani telefetswots danono ok k'aaú bazetuwe» ett guut'ere.
1CO 1:20 Eshe dantso aawoke b́ fa'oni? Nem daniruwonu aawoke b́ fa'oni? Danosh geyiruwonu aawoke b́ fa'oni? Ik'o datsanatsi dani telefo eegoru bítse dandeshawok'o woshk'rerosha?
1CO 1:21 Datsnatsi ashuwots bo took danitelefon Ik'o danosh bo falawok'o Ik'o b́ danon boats is'k'rere, ernmó dárok'o taaweyiru no nodaniru doo shishiy keewon amanituwots bo kashituwok'o Ik' shún wotere.
1CO 1:22 Ayihudiyots adits keewo bek'oshe bo geefoni, Girik ashuwotswere danitelefe bogefoni.
1CO 1:23 Noomó Krstos noosh b́ jitetsok'oniye no daniri, Hanuwere ayhudiyotssh t'uge, Grik ashuwotssh dáree.
1CO 1:24 S'eegetswotsshomó ayhudiyotssh wotowa Grik ashuwotssh, Krstos Ik' angonat Ik' danitelefe.
1CO 1:25 Ik' dára ett gaweyiru keewo ash danitelefoniyere bogfe, Ik'o maawa ett gaweyiru keewo ash kup'oniyere bogfe.
1CO 1:26 T eshuwotso! Ik'o itn b́ s'eegor awuk'o ash it wottsok'o aab gawde'ere, ash gaawiruwok'on it dagotse aywots daanetsuwots wee kúp'uwots wee een een ashuwots aalne.
1CO 1:27 Ik'o dantelfetswotsi jitsiyosh datsanatse dartsok'o taawets ashuwotsi b́ marat'i, kúp'uwotsi jitsiyosh datsatse maawtsok'o taawetswotsi b́ marat'i,
1CO 1:28 Ik'o datsatsi ashuwotsoke fa'ane ett be'eyiru keewwotsi bo berawok'o woshosh datsanatse dash antsonat gac'ets k'awnts deshaw keewo b́ marat'i.
1CO 1:29 Hanowere b́k'al konwor asho Ik' shinatse b́ tooko dambaan b́deshawok'owe.
1CO 1:30 Itnomó Ik'o Iyesus Krstosnton ik woto it detsetwok'o b́ woshi, mansh Ik'o Iyesus Krstosn noko danitelefo bíne, noosh noko kááwo bíne, no s'ayinonat no bín nofaritwok'o b́ woshi.
1CO 1:31 Eshe mas'aafotse guut'etsok'on «It'etuwo b́ beyal Ik'on id'ee.»
1CO 2:1 Ti eshuwotso! taa itok twoor Ik' jango itsh t gawutso, keew falonat bog dan kitsonaliye.
1CO 2:2 Itnton t beyor Iyesus Krstosiyere oko dab jitats jiteyat b́ k'ironiyere k'osho eegoru tdanawok'osh k'ut'dek'atniye t teshi.
1CO 2:3 Eshe itnton t beyor maawk wotat shatonat ay k'eewone tteshi.
1CO 2:4 T noon keewonat nabo ash danitelefonat noon keew shawshats b́ woterawo Ik' shayiri angaats tep'ekee b́teshi.
1CO 2:5 Hanowere tk'altso it imnetiyo ash danitelefats b́ woterawo ik' angaats te'ek b́ wotishee.
1CO 2:6 Ernmó bo shayiri beyon katsuwotssh dantelefi aap'o keewituwone, wotowa eree nokeewitwo datsanatsi danitelefon wee s'uwatse t'afosh wotit datsan k'eeziruwots danitelefoniyaliye.
1CO 2:7 No no keewiruwonmó Ik'o yoots dúroniye shinon no mangosh b́ k'anitsonat aashat teshts Ik' danitelefoniye.
1CO 2:8 Datsni k'eziruwitsitsere danitelefo dantso konworu aaliye, danfno wotik'ee mang wotts Doonzo jirawuk'ne b́ tshi.
1CO 2:9 Wotowa eree mas'aafo, «Ash ááw be'awo, Ash waaz shiyawo, Ash nib gawawo, Ik'o b́ shúntswotssh k'anire» etfe.
1CO 2:10 Nooshmó Ik'o b́ shayiron aashts man kitsre, Ik' shayiro dashan wokts Ik'oke aashtsonoru b́ oreraniyere jam keewo p'ec'at b́ s'iili.
1CO 2:11 Ash iko jangosh b́ took shayironiyere okoon b́ gawiruwo dantso kone? mank'o Ik' shayironiyere okoon Ik' gawiruwo dantso konuworu aaliye.
1CO 2:12 Ik'oke noosh b́ imets keewo nodanish Ik' shayira bako datsanatsi shayiro de'atsone.
1CO 2:13 Eshe no shayiri keewo shayiron wotts ashuwotssh no danir ashokere daatsets danitelefon b́ woterawo Ik' shayirokere daatsets dantelefone.
1CO 2:14 Ik' shayiro deshaw meets ashonmó Ik' shayiroke imeyiru imo dek'osh falatse, bí im eenonuwere p'ec'ar b́s'ilet Ik' shayiron b́wottsotse t'iwints dek'osh falatse, hanuwere bísh darok'owe woshder b́ s'ileti.
1CO 2:15 Ik' shayir detsts jamonmó jam keewo p'ec'ar s'iilo falituwe, b́ took keewonomó konuwor p'ec'ar s'iilo falatse.
1CO 2:16 Hanu, «Doonzo gawiruwo kone danosh faliti? Bísh izosh falituwo kone?» Ett guut'etsok'one. Noomó Krstos nibo detsfone.
1CO 3:1 T eshuwotso! taa iti t daniyor meets asho Krstosats kúp'eraw na'i marmat'ok'o it wottsok'ona bako shayiretswotsk'o it wottsoshaliye.
1CO 3:2 Kúp' mish moo máá falaaw na'i marmat'ok'o it wottsotse taa itsh t maanztso ezaa bako kúp' mishaliye, andoor b́ wotiyal kúp' mish moo falrafa'ate.
1CO 3:3 It andoru meets ash itne, it ats atseyo it okoreyirwotsnat it mosheyirwotse meets ash itnosha? it finirwore k'osh ashok'owosha?
1CO 3:4 Iko «Taa P'awlosk taane» k'osho «Taa Ap'losk taane» bí etor datsanatsi ash itnosha?
1CO 3:5 wotowa bako Ap'los kone? P'awlos kone? boowere it itk'alirwok'o k'alts guutsne, botook tookon bo finir Doonzo botook tookon boosh b́ eezts finoniye,
1CO 3:6 Taa ttooki, Ap'los aatso b́ ishi, eenshtsonmó Ik'oniye.
1CO 3:7 Eshe bos'man enshtso Ik'oni bako tooktsonu aats ishirwonu eegnaliye.
1CO 3:8 Tooktso wotowa aats ishtsonu taalne, bo took tookon bofintsok'o bo k'awntso dek'etune.
1CO 3:9 No Ik'osh tohar finit guutswots noone, itmó Ik' goshonat Ik' agiru maa itne.
1CO 3:10 Ik' taash b́imts s'aatok'on maa agiru s'ekok'o agoko need'itdek'i, koshonu taa need'itsmanats bíagi, ernmó ik iko manats awuk'o bíagiruwok'o t'iwintso bísh geyife.
1CO 3:11 Ikn ned'yetsmantsere okoon konuworu k'osho ned'iyosh falatse, need'yokanwere Iyesus Krstosiye.
1CO 3:12 Ned'okanats awntson, wee ambaron wee k'awunts shaaw shúútson, mitoon, tootson wee buyon agetuwo b́beyal
1CO 3:13 ik ik asho b́ fino b́be'et angshiy aawo weetuwe, manots aaw ik ik asho b́ fino awuk'o b́ wotok'o tawon fadere be'etuwe.
1CO 3:14 Gmbi agf iko bíagtso tawon b́fadeyor mic'aniyere b́ oriyal b́ k'awntso daatsituwe.
1CO 3:15 B́ fino tawon mic'r t'afitu agtsonmó t'ut'etuwe, wotoa eree bí b́tookon tawotse beshat mic'aniyere oorts ashok'o kashituwe.
1CO 3:16 Ik' maa it wottsok'onat Ik' shayiro ititse b́ beyiruwok'o danatsteya?
1CO 3:17 Eshe asho Ik' moo b́ gakal Ik'o bín gaketuwe, Ik' mooniye S'ayine, Ik' maa S'aynwotswere itne.
1CO 3:18 Konworu b́ tooko ant'elck'aye, datsanatse danitelefetso araar be'etwo fa'e wotiyal Ik'oki arik wottso danitelefo b́datsish b́ tooko dartsok'o taawwe.
1CO 3:19 Datsatsi danitelefo Ik' shinatse dáree, hanu, «Ik'o dani telefetswotsi bogond finon detsetwe» ett guut'etsok'one.
1CO 3:20 Hank'owere, «Doonzo dani telefetsuwots asaabiyo k'awuntso b́deshawok'o danfee» ettso guut'ere.
1CO 3:21 Eshe jam keewo itk b́wottsotse konworu ashon it'k'aye.
1CO 3:22 P'awlosi wotowa, Ap'losi b́ wotowa, P'et'rosi wotowa, Datsan wotowa, kasho wotowa, k'iro wotowa, and beyiruwo wotowa, shuuts wetuwo wotowa, jámonwor itkee.
1CO 3:23 Itmó Krstos nanaúwots itne, Krstoswere Ik' na'ee.
1CO 4:1 Eshe ash jámo noon Krstos guutswotsi nowottsok'o Ik'oke aashtso kitso adaro boosh imetswotsk'o woshde noon taawwe.
1CO 4:2 Adar dek'tswotswere amanetswotsi wotar daatsewo boosh geyife.
1CO 4:3 T jangosh b́wotitka wotiyal itwoor tiyats itangshiyal wee k'osh asho tiyats b́angshiyal eegonor kic'eratse, arikon taawor dab ttookats angsho falatse.
1CO 4:4 Taa tdantsok'oyi wotiyal tnibo taan gac'eratse, hanuwere taa s'ayin twottsok'owo kitsratse, ernmó tiyats angshituwo doonzo s'uziye.
1CO 4:5 Mansh bíaawo b́ borawo, doonzo angshosh b́waftsere shino konatsor angshk'ayere, bí b́woor t'aluwotse ááshtso mist'iriyo shanomaants kishituwe, ashuwots nibotse ááshts hasabiyo kishituwe, manoor ik ikon Ik'oke bísh wotit údono daatsituwe.
1CO 4:6 Eshuwwotso! iti t'ak'amosha etaat keewanats taanat Ap'losi aridek'at tkeewi, hanowere tk'al «Guut'etsatse beshk'aye» etiru izi biitso no atse it danetuwok'wa etaatniye, mansh ash ikon it'o k'oshonowere gac'o geyiratse itsha.
1CO 4:7 Nee k'oshuwotsiyere eegneya nbogi? K'oshoke nde'aw keewo eebi fa'oni? Eshe jam keewo k'oshoke ndek'ka wotiyal de'aw ashok'o eegoshe n it'iri.?
1CO 4:8 Andere itsh geyiru keew jamo daatsrte, andere galetswotsi wotertee, no atse k'aleyat naashwtserte, arikon it naashka wotink'ere, noowere itnton toowar nonaashitwotse it naashonuwere sheenge b́wotiyank'oni,
1CO 4:9 Ik'o noon b́woshtswotsi k'iro boatsats angshr bo úd'etuwoki beewok de'amet ashuwotsitse shutstsuwotsi noon b́wooshtsok'o arefee, manatse tuutso dats jamatse melakiwotsnat ashuwots shinatse miis'i mit wotatniye nobe'eyiri,
1CO 4:10 Noo Krstos jangosha etaat dogwotsi woterone, itmó Krstosn ayidek'at dantsuwotsi wotwutserte, mank'owere noo mawtswotsi woterone, itmó kup'uwotsi woterte, it mangiyeyirwotsi woterte, noomó keteyeyiruwotsi woterone.
1CO 4:11 And b́ wotiyaloru and sa'atansh b́ borfetso nok'ak'iri, no shashúwiri, no aratsiri, no jot'eyiri beyoko t'út'at hake bako nojawriri.
1CO 4:12 No kishon finat ango nomaawiri, noon bo c'ashor noderiri, noon bo gishor no k'amiri,
1CO 4:13 noon boc'ashonat noshútso bot'afiyor maac' nefon boosh no aaniri, andish b́ borfetso datsanatse juwetsok'onat datsatse fokets kímo woterone.
1CO 4:14 Taa han itsh tguut'ir shuneets tnana'úwotsk'o woshdek'at izosh gawatni bako iti jiitsiyo geyatniyaliyee.
1CO 4:15 Krstosn jishiru ayuwotsi it detsalor nih ayuwotsi deshatste, taayere itn Iyesus Krstos doo shishiyon shuure.
1CO 4:16 Mansh tjafro sha'ar taan it arituwok'o iti k'oniruwe.
1CO 4:17 Hanatse tuutson shuneetsonat amanets doonzon t naayi wottso T'imotiyosi itsh woshere, b́ be beyokenowere Ik'i maa mooke t daniyirwok'o bí taa Krstosn t daatsts handr beyon bín it jishetuwo itsh gawituwe.
1CO 4:18 Ernmó ititse ik ikuwots taa itn s'iilo twarawok'o boosh bí arere kofangon s'eenwtserne.
1CO 4:19 Ernmó doonzon tooh karn aawotse itok weetuwe, manoor kofangirwanots bo noon keew s'uzi b́woterawo bokúp' kúp'onor dano geefe.
1CO 4:20 Ik'i mengsto noon keewi kis' b́ woterawo Ik'i kúp'e.
1CO 4:21 It geyirwo eebi? Sezi gumbo de'er it maants twoo geeftee? Himo shunonat tooko dashan detsi shayiron twoone it geyi?
1CO 5:1 Ititse jitsits widi fino b́beyok'o keeweyiruwe, han naari widi fino dab Ik'i ash woterawwotsoke k'alekaliye, manuwere b́ nih máátsu máátsok'o woshdek't beyiruwo fa'ee eteefe.
1CO 5:2 Eshe, hank'o jitsits keewo ititse b́ befere eegoshe bognone etaat it míshiri? Maniyere dab keewanatse tuutso shiyano itsh geyiratsa? Han naari fino fints asho ititse kishuwere.
1CO 5:3 Taa meetson dab itnton woto tk'azalor shayiron itntoniye tfa'oni, ar itnton tbeyiruk'o wotde'er han naari fino k'alts ashaats Doonzo Iyesus shúútson angshuwere,
1CO 5:4 It kakwewor taawere nodoonz Iyesus angon it dagotse shayiron tdaatsetuwotse,
1CO 5:5 Morron s'eents ashaan meetso b́ gáhituwok'o Shed'anosh imo itsh geyiyank'ee. Han it k'alitwere doonzo Iyesus angshosh b́weyi aawots ashaan kashu bkashituwok'wee.
1CO 5:6 Eshe it it'o shengaliye, boot' shash múk'naú boot' jamo b́ shashituwok'o danatsteya?
1CO 5:7 And it wotts jamok'o boot' shasho bítse deshaw handr boot'ok'o it wotish boot'i nato ok juuk'rore, nofazigi mereer wottso Krstos shukeere,
1CO 5:8 Mansh gondonat gondon s'eents boot'i shashon b́woterawo boot' shasho bítse deshaw kaawonat ari tushon nobaaliyo mangiwone.
1CO 5:9 Haniyere shin itsh tguut'ts woshatse gobetswotsnton ik wotk'ayere etreb́teshi.
1CO 5:10 Han tietoorowere b́ jamon datsanatsi gobetsuwotsatse wee jaalets ashuwotsatse wee úmp'etswotsatse wee woteraw Ik'o ik'iyrwotston iko wotk'ayere etaliye, mank'o b́wotink'ere datsuatse kesho itsh geyife etee.
1CO 5:11 Taayere itsh tguut' krstiyaniyotsi etefere wido sha'iruwotsnton, k'awntiruwotsnton, Woteraw Ik'o ik'iruwotsnton, wee ash shúúts t'afiruwotsnton, wee mashiruwotsnton, wee biik'iruwotsnton ik wotk'ayere etniye. Hanotsk'o ashuwotsnton towaar maak'ayere.
1CO 5:12 Krstiyaniwots mabariyoniyere úre fa'a ashuwotsats angshosh kone taa? Krstiyaniwots mabariyatse fa'úwotsatsnmó itwoor angsho faliyalkitneya?
1CO 5:13 Úratse fa'a ashuwots jango angshituwo Ik'oniye, eshe mas'aafo bíetiruwok'on «Gond asho ititse kishuwere.»
1CO 6:1 Ititsere iko bí eshu amantsonton b́ fayeyal b́ keewman amantsuwots angshon bísh bo s'iiletwok'o b́ k'aloniyere s'amiyosh Ik' ash woteraw angshiruwots shinats daamosh ááweya b́ shúk'eti?
1CO 6:2 Ik' ashuwots datsatsi ashaats bo angshituwok'o danatsteya? eshe, datsanatse angshiruwots it wotor keew muk'anats angshosh maawituteya?
1CO 6:3 Melakiwotsats dab it angshitwok'o danatsteya? eshe, datsanatsi keewwotsats bogshde aawuk'oneya angsho nomaawiti?
1CO 6:4 Eshe it took tookon it fayeyal krstyaniwots ik mabariyoniyere úratsi gac'ets ashuwots shinats bokeew man aawuk'oneya it t'intsituteya?
1CO 6:5 Hano tíetir it jitsituwok'owa etaatniye, wotowa ére eshuwotsitsere angsh falitu dants eenasho datseyalkeya?
1CO 6:6 Eshe, ik krstiyaniyo k'osh krstiyaniyo s'amir Ik' ashwoterawwotsok angshi moots daamo geyiyituwa?
1CO 6:7 Eshe it took tookon s'amiyeyar mooshewo b́tookon itsh it took keetiye, maniyere iti dadewo k'aneratsa? mank'o iti dirshewo k'aneratsa?
1CO 6:8 Itmó it eshuwotsi wotts krstiyaaniwotsnoor dadaat itdirshiri.
1CO 6:9 Eshe weergondetswots Ik'i mengsto bonaarawok'o danftooshna? Keewhan jangatsno daand k'ayere, gusiyetswots, wee woteraw Ik'o ik'iruwots, wee gobetsuwots, wee gad'ayirwots,
1CO 6:10 Wee úmp'etswots, wee jaaletswots, wee máshetsuwots, wee ash shúúts t'afifuwots, wee biik'tswots Ik'i mengsto naaratsno.
1CO 6:11 Ititsnor ik ikuwots mank'o itne b́teshi, andmó Doonzo Iyesus Krstos shútsonat noko Izar Izewer shayiron morrotse mash bazrte, Ik'osh gaalets S'ayin ashuwotsi wotat, kááwerte.
1CO 6:12 «Jam keewo taash baziyeratse,» ernmó jamkeewo taash t'ak'amituwe etaliye, jam keewo taash baziyeratse, wotowa ére keew jamosh guuts wotarr kéweratse,
1CO 6:13 «Misho maac'osha, maac'onwere mishooshe,» bere Ik'o, mishonowere, maac'onowere t'afituwe, ernmó no atso Doonzo Iyesussh, Doonzo Iyesuswere no atsosh b́wottsotse noatso widosh wosho geyiratse.
1CO 6:14 Ik'o Doonzo Iyesusi k'irotse tuuzre, nonowere bíangon k'irotse tuuzituwe.
1CO 6:15 It atso Krstos atsi k'at' b́ wottsok'o danatsteya? Eshe Krstos aatsi kayo de'er gobets maatsu aatsi kayo b́ wotituwok'o wosho taash geyifa? B́ jamon woteratse!
1CO 6:16 Máátsok gobo amr binton k'etuwo bínton ik atso bo wotituwok'o danatsteya? «Gituwots ik atse bo wotiti» ett guut'ere.
1CO 6:17 Doonzo Iyesusnton ik wotit ashonmó bínton shayiron ik wotituwe.
1CO 6:18 Mansh widatse wokoore, asho b́finiru k'osh morr jamo b́took atsoniyere okoone b́ finiri wid amiru ashonmó b́ took aatsatse morro b́finiri,
1CO 6:19 It atso Ik'oke it dek'tsonat ititse beyiru S'ayin shayirosh Ik' maa b́ wotok'o danatsteya? Eshe it Ik'k itna bako it tokik itnaliye.
1CO 6:20 Bíwere itn k'awuntson keewere, mansh it aatson Ik'o mangiwere.
1CO 7:1 Taash guut'at it attso, asho máátsonton gonkewo b́k'azink'ere shege.
1CO 7:2 Ernmó widatse wokoosh nungush ik iko b́ took máátso de'e, mááts ik ikunu b took kenihosh máátso amiye.
1CO 7:3 Keniho b́máátsush k'alo bín geyitu de'eyi niwo bísh bazik'aye, mank'o máátsu bkenihsh k'alo bish geyit de'eyi niwo bísh bazik'ayiye.
1CO 7:4 Máátsu bi atsatse alo deshatsane, biatsatse alo detstso b kenihiye. Mank'owere keniho bíatsatse alo deshatse, bí atsatse alo detstsu máátsuniye.
1CO 7:5 Kup'ar Ik' k'onosh it gitets ik wotde manorush b́wotiyala bako k'aleyon iko ikosh de'eyi niwo bazik'aye. Manatse tuutson it tooko kordek'o maawr it eree shed'ano it ats fadewo b́doorawok'o aani towaar wotoore.
1CO 7:6 Han itsh tietir izook'owa bako tzaziyok'owaliye.
1CO 7:7 Ash jamo tikok'o máátso b́de'aawo b́beyink'ere shunfee b́teshi, ernmó Ik'o ik ikosh k'osh k'osh imo imre, iko ik naari imo, k'oshnuwere k'osh imo detsfe.
1CO 7:8 De'erawwotsnat bokenih k'irts máátswotssh tietetuwo hank'oyiye, bode'erawo tikok'o wotarr bobeyink'ere sheenge.
1CO 7:9 Ernmó meetsi tewnon mis'oniyere de'ewo b́k'antsotse botoko kordek'o bomawiyal de'ewne.
1CO 7:10 De'etsuwotsshmó t'imet tzaziyo haniye, tzaziyanwere Doonzoka bako tikaliye, dek'ets máátsu bkenihatse fakshek'ayiye.
1CO 7:11 B faksheeyalowere máátso amaniyere bíyal beewiye, wee bkenihnton maneewiye, mank'owere keniho b́máátsu fakshk'aye.
1CO 7:12 K'oshuwotsshmó doonzo b́woterawo taa ttookon t etiruwo hank'owiye, krstiyani ash iko krstiyani woteraw máátsu b́detsal err towaar beyo bgeyiyal fakshk'aye.
1CO 7:13 Krstiyani wotts máátsu krstiyani woteraw kenihodetsfawotiyal binton towaar beyo b́geyiyal keshk'ayiye.
1CO 7:14 Krstiyani woteraw keniho krstiyan wotts b́máátsu atse tuutson Ik'i jir wotituwe, krstiyani woteraw máátsunwere krtiyani wotts kenihoatse tuutson Ik'i jir wotituwane, mank'o wotob́k'azink'ere it nana'úwots Ik'i ashuwotsi wotofalrawnk'nee, mank'oon it beyalmó it nana'úwots Ik'i ashuwotsiye.
1CO 7:15 Krstiyani woterawo fakshewo b́geyiyal fakshewe, mank'onmó krstiyaniwo mantstso kenih wotowa máátso eegi naari keewon detseratse. Ik'o noon b́s'eeg jeenon nobetuwok'owe.
1CO 7:16 Nee krstiyani máátsune, krstiyani woterawo nkenihi daneraka nworitka wotiyal eege ndani? Neewere krstiyani nungushono, krstiyani woteraw nmáátsu nworitka wotiyal eege ndani?
1CO 7:17 Ik iko Doonzo b́ imts imok'onat b́ s'eegeori b́teshtsok'on beewe, Ik'i moowwotssh ti imtso bín bojisheetuwo haniye.
1CO 7:18 Asho konuwor wotowa gofo bíamiyak s'eegeka wotiyal gofo amawok'o wotosh gawuk'aye, gofo bíamawo s'eegeka wotiyalo gofamo geek'aye.
1CO 7:19 Gof amonu gof amk'azonuwere k'awuntso deshatse, Ik'o tzaziyo korde'er finats jitsoniye k'awtsetsoni.
1CO 7:20 Mansh asho ik ikon Ik'o bín b́ s'eegor b́teshtsok'on beewe.
1CO 7:21 Ik'o neen b́ s'eegor guutse nteshi? Nwotiyalor eegor woteratse, mansh kic'k'aye, nas' keshi goo ndatsitka wotiyal goo man neesh beshk'aye.
1CO 7:22 Guuts wotat b́befere Doonzon s'eegets asho Doonzon nas' keshke, mank'owere nas'o wotat b́befere s'eegets asho Krstossh guutse.
1CO 7:23 Ik'o k'awuntson iti b́kewutsotse ashuwots guutso wotk'ayere.
1CO 7:24 Mansh tíeeshwotso asho ik ikon b́ seegeyori b́teshtsok'on Ik'onton mank'oon beewe.
1CO 7:25 De'eraw ashuwots jangosh Doonzoke tdek'ts tzaziyo deshatse, ernmó doonzo mhretyon amanek twottsotse ttook asaabiyo hanats dabr tt'intsitwoniye.
1CO 7:26 And nobeyiru gizeyo kic'its gize b́wottsotse de'eraniye bíyal beyo sheeng arefee taasha,
1CO 7:27 B́woteferowere máátso dek'ri wotiyal faksho geek'aye, máátso de'atsne wotiyal dek'osh geek'aye.
1CO 7:28 Ernmó nee máátso ndek'al niats morro wotituwe etaliye, mank'owere baarna'a iku máátso bíamal morro bi ats wotituwe etaliye, wotowa ére de'eyiru ashuwotsi datsanatsi beyi kic'o ayide boon daatsituwe, ttewunonuwere kic'anitse itkashitwok'owe.
1CO 7:29 Ti eshuwotso! taa itsh tietirwo hank'oyiye, dúronúwo k'awnwtsere, haniyak eshe mááts detstswots mááts deshawok'o wotaarr beewne. Mááts detstswots deshawok'o wotarr beewne.
1CO 7:30 Shiyanirwonwere shiyaanerawwotsk'o, geneeúwirwots geneeúwerawwotskok'o wotde'er beewunee, k'ac' keewirwots, k'ac' iko deshawwotsk'ok'o woshde'er boatso taawunee.
1CO 7:31 Datsanatsi gaalon kis' keshiru jamwots bín kis' keyawok'o wotde'er beewunee, andi be'eyiru datsan beshitke.
1CO 7:32 Mansh konnari hasabiyon it kic'eraawon it beyo shunfee, mááts de'awu asho doonzo b́geneeúshit keewo b́geyiruwotse bíasabiyo b́ t'iwintsit doonzosh s'iilit finatse.
1CO 7:33 Mááts dek'ts asho bíasabiruwo datsan keewonat b́máátsú bín b́geneeúshit keewe.
1CO 7:34 Manatse tuutson bíasabiyo gitok kaywutsere etee. Mank'o mááts amaaw máátsu wee baarnaú bmeetsonat bshayiron S'ayinr doonzok woto bgeyituwotse bi asaabiyo b́t'iwintsit doonzo s'ilits finatse, mááts amts máátsunmó bkenihi máác'o k'eezosh bgeyiruwotse bgawir datsatsi keewe.
1CO 7:35 Taa han itsh tietiru kamboots kindr it kic'ituwok'owa etaatniyaliye itsh b́ sheengetuwok'owa etaatniye, t tewunonuwere it niwon beyarr it asaabiyo b́ bad'erawo nibi s'eenon doonzosh itfinituwok'owe.
1CO 7:36 Ik asho b́ wid'tsu dek' k'azosh b́ k'ut'iyakon mank'o b́ k'alo na'a mansh sheeng wot b́ k'azok'o bísh b́shiyeyal, maniyere okoon bin dek'o b́ geyiyal, b́ deek'onu ar bísh bíariyal b́ tewuntsok'on b́ dek'al morro woteratse, eshe dee'ewune.
1CO 7:37 Ernmó ik asho b́ nibo b́ kúp'iyal, b́ dek'etuwok'o bín woshit keewo aali wotiyal, b́ tewuno kordeketuwe wotiyal, b́ wid'tsu dek' k'azosh b́ k'ut'iyal sheenge b́ k'ali.
1CO 7:38 Eshe mááts dek'etuwo sheenge b́k'ali, mááts de'awonmó bogshdek't sheenge b́ k'ali.
1CO 7:39 Máátsu b kenihi kashon b́ befetsosh de'eyi nemon tipekiye, b kenihi b́ k'iriyalomó b shúntsosh amoosh falfane, bi amet asho amants woto geyife.
1CO 7:40 T s'ilok'onomó máátso amaniyere biyal b beyink'e k'anefe, geene'arniye b beeti, taa Ik' shayiro t detstsok'o arefee.
1CO 8:1 Woteraw ik'osh shukeets meetsi janga wotiyalo arikee «No jametswor dano detsfone» b́woteferor dano ashe bogtane etee b́dofoni, shunonmó age bíagfoni.
1CO 8:2 «Dano detsfe» ett gawiru asho fa'ewotiyal bísh dan geyiitowok'o andoor danafa'ee.
1CO 8:3 Ik' shunts ashonmó Ik'oke daneke b́wotiti.
1CO 8:4 Mansh woteraw ik'osh shukeets meetso meyi jango b́wotiyalo, woteraw Ik'o kasho deshaw b́wottsosh Ik' ikoniyere okoniye k'osho Izar Izewer bíaalok'owo danfone.
1CO 8:5 Dab Izar Izeweri b́woterawo Izar izewerotsi ett s'eegeyirwots ayuwots Izar izewerotsnat ay doonzuwots daronat datsatse fa'ane eteyalor,
1CO 8:6 Noko Izar Izewermó jam keewo aztsonat noowere bíko no wottsuwots Ik'o niho b́s'uziye, mank'owere jamkeewo bín azetsonat noowere bín nobeyirwo Doonz iko Iyesus Krstos s'uziye.
1CO 8:7 Ernmó han dan jametswotsiyaliye, ik ikuwots han b́borfetsosh woteraw Ik'o ik'iyo bo doyo wosh bodek'tsotse meestso bomeyir woteraw ik'osh shuketsok'o woshdek'tniye, mansh bo asaabiyo maawk b́wottsosh bokiimiri.
1CO 8:8 B́wotiyalor Ik'ok noon t'intsituwo mooniyaliye, moonok'azalor noosh shapit keewo aaliye, nomaalor noosh oot'et keew aaliye.
1CO 8:9 Wotowa ére nas' it keshtsan imnetiyon kup'eraw ashuwotssh t'ug b́ woterawok'o it atso korde'ere.
1CO 8:10 «Dano detsfe» err woshosh shúketso wosh shukeyiruwoke nmaafere b́ imnetiyon kúp'eraw asho neen b́ bek'al n fintsan ashman woshosh shuketso b́ meetuwok'o bíango n kúp'iri etosha?
1CO 8:11 Eshe nee «Dank taane» err Krstos bísh b́ k'irtsonat b́ imnetiyon kúp'eraw krstyaniyo t'afituwe etee.
1CO 8:12 Hank'on amants it eshuwotsi dadar bo nib maawtso gaawiyon Krstosi it dadiri.
1CO 8:13 Eshe misho t eshu amantsosh t'ug b́ wotitka wotiyal t eshush t'ug wot k'azosh b́ jamon meetso maaratse.
1CO 9:1 Taa nas' keshk taanosha? Taa wosheets taanalneya? Taa doonzo Iyesusi be'atsta? Itwere doonzon t fini oot' itnalneya?
1CO 9:2 Doonzon wosheets t wottsok'o kitsit mahatabo it itwottsotse k'oshuwotssh dab wosheets woto tk'azal itshere arikon wosh na'a taane.
1CO 9:3 «Wosheets woti mebtiyo deshatsne» err keewituwotssh ti aanitwo haniye,
1CO 9:4 No mishonat úshon daatsi mebtiyo deshatsnowa?
1CO 9:5 K'osh wosheetskok'o doonzon eshúwotsk'o P'et'rosotsk'o krstiyani máátsu de'e gúrosh mebtiyo deshatsnowa?
1CO 9:6 Wee finar beyo b́ geyit taanat Barnabas s'uzsheya?
1CO 9:7 Demozalo b́ took gizon kes'fo kone? Woyiniyo tohr b́ shuwo maarawo kone? Gizi s'eeno jinr bíezo úyawo kone?
1CO 9:8 Han t keewir ash asaabiyok'oneya? Nemonu hank'o eratsa?
1CO 9:9 «Mááy sirbiru minz beero b́ noono tipk'aye» ett nemotse guut'ere, eshe Ik'o hank'o bíet minz beruwotssh shiyanatneya?
1CO 9:10 Ik'o han bíet noosh shiyanatniyosha? Gosh goshiruwo jángát b́ goshiruwok'o, mááy bútsirwo jángát b́ bútsiruwotse, hank'on jamo b́ bano b́ daatsituwok'o, han arikon b́ guut'e no jangoshe.
1CO 9:11 Noo shayiri keewo itsh no shookori wotiyal it meets deero itoke no k'es'al een keeweya b́ wotiti?
1CO 9:12 K'oshwots keewan itoke daatso boosh geyife wotiyal eshe no haniyere bogo daatso aawuk'oneya noosh geyiyo b́ k'azeti? Nooyere mebtiyann t'ak'ameratsone, no Krstosko doo shishiyosh t'ug b́woterawok'o jam keewo k'ama nok'amri bako mebtiyan t'ak'ameratsone.
1CO 9:13 Ik' mootse finiruwots bo misho Ik' mootsne bodatsituwok'o wosh t'inetseyiru t'arap'ezoke finirwitsu wosh manatse kayide'er bometwok'o danatsteya?
1CO 9:14 Mank'o doo shishiyo daniruwotsu bometuwo fin manatse bo daatsituwok'o Ik'o azazere.
1CO 9:15 Taamó mebtiyanotsitsere ikunoru t'ak'ameratse, hanowre t guut' t mebtiyan eegishe taash koteyo b́ k'azi? Etaatniyaliye, asho bín t ít'iruwo datsmec'ron b́ oriyoniyere k'iro taash k'anefe.
1CO 9:16 Doo shishiyo daniyo taash geyik b́ wottsotse t it'et keewo aaliye dab doo shishiyan daniyo tk'azal indowe taana!
1CO 9:17 Doo shishi keew angnon b́ woterawo t shunon tdaniruwosh k'awutso detsfe, angnona t finiri wotiyalomó taash imetsmani ti fini bako k'osh tk'alts keewo fa'ee etaliye.
1CO 9:18 Eshe t maawirwosh t k'awuntso eebi? T maawi k'awntso doo shishwo daniyir daats taash geyituwo t de'aawo doo shishi fino damozalo hank'on t finoniye.
1CO 9:19 Taa konshor guuts twoterawo nas' ash taane, wotowa ére t faltsok'on aywotsi kashiyir boon t'akamosha etaat jamosh guutso wotere.
1CO 9:20 Ayhudiyotston t wotor ayhudiyotsi kashiyosh ayhudiyotsk'o twoti, taa nemi shirots woto t k'azalor dab́ nemi shirotstsuwotsi kashiyosha etaat nemi shirotse beyiru ashuwotsk'o t woti.
1CO 9:21 Taa Ik' nemo detstsonat Krstos nemi shirots t wotiyaloru dab́ nem deshaw Ik' ash woterawotsi kashiyosha etaat nem deshaw ashok'o twoti.
1CO 9:22 Bo imnetiyon maawtswotsi kashiyosha etaat maawtswotskok'o maawk t woti, t faltsok'on muk'uwotsi kashiyosh jamonton jam keewo t woti.
1CO 9:23 Jaman t k'alir dooshishiko deero kayosh dooshiyosha etaatniye.
1CO 9:24 Wos'i nokorewor jametso b́wos'fook'o boyitsnowere ik s'uzo shlmatiyo b́dek'fook'o danatsteya? Mansh itwoor shlmatiyo dek'osh woc'ere.
1CO 9:25 Wos'on noheyiru jamwots maawfetsr anaanshr dano woshfne, bo mank'o bomaawir beshituwo t'afitwonat andish wotitu akliliyo daatsoshe, noomó nomaawir t'afraawonat dúre dúrik wotts akliliyo daatsoshe.
1CO 9:26 Taamó am b́ bodooko danawu ashokok'o datsmec'ro woc'atse, jongo kisho t'umde'er jot'iruwok'o datsmec'ro shóótetk taanaliye.
1CO 9:27 Mansh k'oshuwotsi nohewo maants s'eetk'riyakon taa t tookon nohemanitse úr wotaarr tdaatserawok'o tiatso korde'er taash bíazazetuwok'o woshituwe.
1CO 10:1 Tieshuwotso! Nonihots daawno bo abaatse wotdek't boon b́ jishfere b́teshok'o jametswots aatsk'ar biro bokimtsok'o itsh gawiyo geefe.
1CO 10:2 Musenton ikwotoshat daawnanat aats k'aranits bogupeyi.
1CO 10:3 Únetswotsu ik naari shayiri mishman máárne, bo únetswere Shayiri úshman úshrnee,
1CO 10:4 Únetswotswor iknaari shayiri úshe boúshi, bo úshtsonwere boon shoyidek't sha'efetst teshts shayiri s'almanitse t'úúp'ke b́tesh, s'almanuwere b́tookon Krstosiye b́teshi.
1CO 10:5 Man b́woteferor ayuwotsn Ik'o genee'úweratse, mansh bo duuno woruwots juweyat b́oori.
1CO 10:6 Bo gond keewo botewntsok'o noowere gond keewo notewunrawok'o jaman noosh ats kotiyosh ariyetso wotere.
1CO 10:7 «Ashuwots móónat úshosh beebodek'i, weeralonowere duubosh botuwi» ett bo jangosh guut'etsok'on, bo woteraw Ik'o bo ik'itsok'o it were bokok'o woteraw ik'uwotsi Ik'i k'ayere.
1CO 10:8 Boyitsere ik ikuwots widi morro bofintsok'o noowere widi morro finonowa? Bo han bok'altsotse boyitse hiye keez kum ashuwots ik aawon k'irrne.
1CO 10:9 Boyitsi ik ikuwots fadt dawunzoon shaas'eyat bok'irtsok'o noowere Krstosi fadk'ayone.
1CO 10:10 Boyitse ik ikuwots mumundat úd'iru melakiyon bot'aftsok'o itwere mumund k'ayere.
1CO 10:11 Keew jaman boats b́bod noosh no ats kotiyosh ariyeyi, guut'ewwere dúri s'uwaatse fa'úwotssh noosh dano b́wotishe.
1CO 10:12 Eshe need'iruwok'o ariru asho b́ dihrawok'o bí atso korde'e.
1CO 10:13 Ashaats bodiru fadewoniyere k'osh fadewo itats boratse, Ik'o amaneke, it angoniyere bog wotts fadewo it ats b́ bodetuwok'o eekeratse, it fadeworo bín it k'amit ango imr fademanitse it keshet weero itsh k'anitwe.
1CO 10:14 Mansh eshe shuneetswotso! woteraw ik'uwotsi ik'iyatse wokoore.
1CO 10:15 Hanowre itsh t'iwintsirwotsi itwottsotsne, hansh taa tkeewirwo it itokon aab angshuwere.
1CO 10:16 Noo Ik'o udat nokayirwo deerets úshi wanc'o Krstos s'atsonton ik woto detsfoshna? Notitsiru mishonwere Krstos meetsenton ik woto detsfoshna?
1CO 10:17 Meeyiru mishman ik b́wottsotse noowere ikánatse kayiruwotsi nowottsotse aywotsi nowotiyalor ik ats noone.
1CO 10:18 Aab Israe'el ashaashwots bok'altso s'iilere, tiiniru wosho meyiruwots wosht'intseyiru t'arap'ezonton ikwoto deshatsnowa boteshi?
1CO 10:19 Eshe hank'o t etor woshosh t'intsets meetso wotk keewa eteya tieti? Himó woteraw Ik'o wotk keewa etya tieti?
1CO 10:20 Mank'owiyaliye! Ik' ash woterawwots wosho bot'ntsir Ik'osh b́ woterawo fo'erawwotsshe, eshe it fo'erawwotsnton ik woto itdetsetuwok'o geeratse,
1CO 10:21 Doonzo úshi wanc'o úyifetsr aani fo'erawwots úshi wanc'o úsho falatste, doonzo mishi marats kayefetsr fo'erawwots mishi maratse kayiruwotsi woto falatste,
1CO 10:22 Eshe hank'o k'alr doonzo okoriwonowa? No bíyere bogo kúp'efnwa?
1CO 10:23 Jam keewo baziyekaliye, ernmó jam keewo t'ak'amitkaliye, jam keewo baziyekaliye, ernmó jam keewo agetkaliye.
1CO 10:24 Asho ik ikon k'oshuwotssh b́ sheengetwok'owa bako b́ took t'k'miyo geek'aye.
1CO 10:25 It nibots tuwiru amank'azo okjuk'rar gawuyatse kemeyiru meetso eega eega iterawon moore.
1CO 10:26 «Datsunat biitse fa'a jamo Doonzoke.»
1CO 10:27 Krstiyani woteraw asho iti móósh b́s'eegal móósh iti b́s'eegtsmanok itametka wotiyal itsh t'inetu mish jamo it tookotse tuwit amank'azjamo okjuk'rar eega eega iterawon moore.
1CO 10:28 Ernmó ash iko «Meetsan woteraw ik'osh shukeeke» bíetal ash man han b́ keewtsonat nibo b́dantsotse meetsman maak'ayere.
1CO 10:29 Niba ti etorowere asho niboni eta bako it niboniyaliye tietiriye. Bére s'ayin twoto k'osh ash nibats bíangshiir eegoshe?
1CO 10:30 Taa Ik'o údefetśr tmáal Ik'o bín túdiru keewatse tuutson eegoshe taan k'ooreti?
1CO 10:31 Eshe it moor wotowa it úshor wotowa jamkeewo it k'alor jamkeewo Ik' mangosh k'alwere.
1CO 10:32 Ayhudiwotsi wotowá, Ik' ash woterawwotsi wotowá, Ik'i moonor b́wotiyal, kon shoor t'ug wotk'ayere.
1CO 10:33 Taa jametsuwots bokashituwok'o jametswotssh b́shengisha bako ttookosh b́sheengetuwok'o tgeerawotse, ash jamo tk'aliru k'alon tgene'úshiruwok'o itwoor mank'o k'aluwere.
1CO 11:1 Taa Krstosi tiartsok'o itwere taan arore.
1CO 11:2 Jam aawo taan it gawirwonat itsh t imts dano kúp'idek'at dets itdek'tsotse, itn údiruwe.
1CO 11:3 Ernmó nungush jami tooko Krstosi, mááts tooko nungusho, Krstos tokonwere Ik'o niho b́wottsok'o it danetwok'o shunfee.
1CO 11:4 Tooko p'urdek't Ik' k'oniruwo wee bek'i aap'o keewiru nungush jamo b́ tookoniye b́ketiyiri.
1CO 11:5 Mank'owere btooko p'ur bde'awon Ik' k'oniru wee bek'i aap'o keewiru máátsu b tookoniye bketiri, btooko p'ureraw máátsu bs'ageetsok'owe b́taaweti.
1CO 11:6 Máátsu b tooko p'ureratsane wotiyal b took s'iiro k'ut'ewiye, ernmó btook s'iiro k'ut'ewo wee s'ageyo bin ketit keewa wotiyal b tooko p'urowiye.
1CO 11:7 Nungusho Ik'o ariyetsonat Ik' mango bín b́ be'etk b́ wottsotse b́ tooko p'uro geyiratse, máátsunmó nungushi mangiye.
1CO 11:8 Máátsuni nungushatse daatseyi bako nungusho máátsatse daatseratse.
1CO 11:9 Mank'were máátsu nungushosha bi azeeyi bako nungusho máátsush azeratse
1CO 11:10 Hanatse tutsonat melakiwots shinatse alishirootse b́fa'ok'o kitsitwo, p'uro b tookats gerde'iye.
1CO 11:11 Doonzoke no detsts beyon máátsu nungushalo beratsane, nungushonu máátsalo beeratse.
1CO 11:12 Máátsu nungushatse b datetsok'o nungushonu b́ shuwet máátsatsne, ernmó nungusha wotowa mááts wotowa k'osh jamkeewonu Ik'okne b́ daatseti.
1CO 11:13 Aab it tookon anghsuwere, máátsu btooko b p'urerawo Ik'o k'ono bish wotituwa?
1CO 11:14 Nungusho b́ took s'iiro b́genziyal bísh keeti mit b́ wotok'o hank'on azeyon danekosha?
1CO 11:15 Máátsunmó bish took s'iiro ime btooko bín ipbdek'etuwok'o b́wottsotse btook s'iiro bgeenziyal bish bmangee.
1CO 11:16 Han jangatse moosh geyiru asho fa'ewotiyal noon wotowa Ik'i maa k'oshuwots wotowa hank'o doyo deshatsone.
1CO 11:17 It ko'ewor it k'aliruwo gonda bako sheeng keew b́woterawotse and itsh ti imiru dananatse iti úderatse.
1CO 11:18 Jamoniyere shino ikwotdek'at it kakuwewor it dagotse k'osh k'oshewo b́beyo shishre, t shishts keewonwere badooko arik b́wottsok'o amaniruwe.
1CO 11:19 Ar keewetsuwots konotsi bowottsok'o galeyar bodanetwok'o ititse k'osh k'oshewo b́beyo jinatse.
1CO 11:20 Ikok it kakuwewor it meeyir doonzo kooc'i mishaliye.
1CO 11:21 It móór iko iko b́ korááwo bíyaailye b́meyiri, mank'oon iko b́ k'ak'efere iko mashe b́mashiri.
1CO 11:22 Eshe it meetuwoknat it úshet moo deshatsteya? Himó Ik' moone it gac'iri? Himó eegoru bo meetu deshawwotsne it jiitsiri? Eshe eege itsh tieteti? Keewansh iten údota? B́ jamon úderatse!
1CO 11:23 Doonzoke t dek'tsonat itsh tbeshits dano haniye, doonzo besheyat b́ imewots t'ú manots misho k'aúb́dek'i,
1CO 11:24 Ik'o b́ údiyakon tiitsdek't, «[nahere móóre,] han itsh wotituwo tiaatsoniye, han taan bín itgawitwo wosh de'ere» bíeti
1CO 11:25 Mank'o kooc' mishoniyre il úshi wanc'o k'aaúdek't «Úshi wanc'an t s'atson finet handr taaroniye, jam aawo han itúshor bín taan gawosh wosh de'ere» bí eti.
1CO 11:26 Mishan itmooronat úshi wanc'an it úshor jam aawo doonzo b́ wafetsosh b́ k'iro keewitute.
1CO 11:27 Konuworu asho bísh wot geyirawo doonzo tusho b́ móónat doonzo úshi wanc'an b́ úshal doonzo atsonat s'atso k'awunts bí ats wotituwe.
1CO 11:28 Eshe konworu asho tushan b́ mooniyere shinonat wanc'an b́ úshoneyere shino b́ tooko shú s'iilo bísh geyife.
1CO 11:29 Asho konworu doonzo atso eeg b́ wotok'o galde'er b́ dananiyere doonzo tusho b́ maal doonzo úshi wanc'o b́ úshal b́ tookats angshe b́ doweti.
1CO 11:30 It dagotsere ayuwots bomawutsonat boshodu ik ikuwotsu bok'iriye han jangatsne.
1CO 11:31 Noo notokats angshrone wotink'e no ats angsherawunk'ee b́teshi.
1CO 11:32 Ernmó il datsunton noats angsherawok'o and angshiru doonzo noon b́ seziri.
1CO 11:33 Eshe t eshuwotso! Doonzo kooc' mishosh it ko'eyor it ats atseyo korewere.
1CO 11:34 It ko'ewo angshosh b́ woterawok'o ititse k'ak'ts asho b́ beyal b́ meyitse moowe. Oorts keewosh taa manok twoor dabr bín jiishetwo itsh imetuwe.
1CO 12:1 Ti eshuwotso! ando S'ayin shayiro b́imet imuwotsi it dano geefe.
1CO 12:2 Ik'i ash woterawwotsi it teshor it danaw keewwotsn jisheyat noon keew falraw woteraw ik'uwots maants iti daamefok'o danfte.
1CO 12:3 Mansh Ik'i shayiron jisheyar Iyesusi c'ashetuwo konwor aaliye, mank'owere S'ayin shayiron jisheyarni bako «Iyesus doonze!» etetuwo konworu bí aalok'o itsh keewituwe.
1CO 12:4 K'osh k'osh S'ayin shayiri imuwots fa'ane, S'ayin shayironmó ike.
1CO 12:5 K'osh k'osh finuwots fa'ane, doonzonmó ike.
1CO 12:6 K'osh k'osh fini naaruwots fa'ane, ernmó jamo b́jamon finituwo ik Ik'oniye.
1CO 12:7 No ik iketsitse S'ayin shayiro be'eyat b́ fiinirye jametsi t'k'miyoshe.
1CO 12:8 S'ayin shayiro ik ashosh dani teleefi aap'o imetuwe, k'osh ashoshowere shayirman dani aap'o bí imeti,
1CO 12:9 Ik shayirman ikosh imnetiyo bí imeti, k'oshoshmó shodets kashiyit imo bí imeti,
1CO 12:10 Ikosho Ik'oke bek'on keewo, ikoshowere Shayirwotsi galde dano, ikosho k'osh naari noon keewo, k'oshoshowere imets k'osh noonon keewtso bits falo bí imeti,
1CO 12:11 Wotowa'ere jamán k'alituwo ik shayirmaniye, S'ayin shayiro b́ shunok'o ik ik ashosh k'osh k'osh imo b́ imeti.
1CO 12:12 Ash iko ayi atsi kayuwotsi detsfe, bí atsi kaywots ayi bowotefere bobeyir ik ash manatse. Hank'o Krstos ayi atsi kaywotsi detsts ik atsi kayok'owiye.
1CO 12:13 Ayhudi nowotiyalo Grik ash nowotiyalo, guutswotsi nowotiyalo, S'ayinwotsi nowotiyalor, ik ats wotosh ik shayiri S'ayinon guuperoone, noúnetswor shayir ikanitse úshrone.
1CO 12:14 Ik atso b́fiine ay atsi kaywotsatsna bako ik atsi kayo s'uzatsnaliye!
1CO 12:15 Tufo «Taa kish woto tk'aztsotse atsi kay taanaliye!» bíetal eshe hank'o bíettsosh atsi kay b́woto oorituwa?
1CO 12:16 Waazonuwere «Taa ááw woto tk'aztsotse atsi kay taanaliye» bíetal, eshe, hank'o bíettsosh atsi kay b́woto oorituwa?
1CO 12:17 Ats iko b́ jamon ááw b́wotink'ere eegneya shisho b́faliyank'oni? Ats iko b́ jamon waaz b́ wotink'ere eegneya shink'o b́faliti?
1CO 12:18 Andmó Ik'o b́ shunok'o ik ik atsi kayo atsotse bísh wotit beyokok b́beyoko deshde'er b́datseetuwok'o woshre.
1CO 12:19 Boúnetswor ik kayo s'uzi bowotink'ere ats jamo eewkneya b́ datseeyank'oni?
1CO 12:20 Andomó ay atsi kaywots bobeyalor atso ik s'uzee.
1CO 12:21 Aawo kishosh «Nee taash geyiratsne!» etosh falratse, tookonuwere tufosh «Nee taash geyiratsne!» etosh falratse,
1CO 12:22 Dab́nuwor bítsi maawkwotsi araat be'eyiru atsi kaywots iki bogshdek't geyiknee.
1CO 12:23 Mangi muk' detstswotsi araat noosh be'eyiru atsi kayuwots iki bog mango boosh imetuwone, bek'osh jitsik araat noosh be'eyiru atsi kaywotssh iki bog mango imaat boon nokotiriye,
1CO 12:24 Bek'osh sheengiru atsi kaywotsmó jaman boosh geyiratse, Ik'onmó s'ilosh jitsitu araat be'eyiru atsi kayuwotssh bog mango bo detsetwok'o woshdek'́t atsi kayuwotsi gonkire.
1CO 12:25 Hanowere b́k'al atsi kaywots dagotse k'osh k'osheyalo bo ats atseyo bogawetuwok'owe.
1CO 12:26 Ik atsi kayo b́ kic'iyal k'osh atsi kaywotsuwere jamon bíntoniye bo kic'iti, ik atsi kayonu mango b́ daatsor k'osh atsi kaywotswere bínton ikn bo geneúwiti.
1CO 12:27 It Krstos atsi kayi itne, it ik ikon bíatsi kay itne.
1CO 12:28 Mansh Ik'o ik ik asho Ik' mootse k'osh k'osh fino bodetsetuwok'o woshre, hank'on shino woshetswotsi, gitlo nebiyatiyotsi, kezlon danirwotsi naashire. Dabtnuwere adits finituwotsi, dabt shodtso kashiyo boosh imetswotsi, ashuwotsi t'ep'o boosh imetswotsi, jiishiruwotsnat k'osh k'osh noonon keewiru ashuwotsi woshre.
1CO 12:29 Jamwots wosheetswtsneya? Jamwots nebiyatiyotsneya? Jamwots danirwotsneya? Jamwots adits finirwotsneya?
1CO 12:30 Jamwots shodts kashiyo boosh imeknowa? Jamwots handr noonon keewo falfnowa? Jamwots handr noonon keewetso biitso falfnowa?
1CO 12:31 Eshe ayidek't bogf imo daatsosh gewoore. Dab and jamoniyere bog weerindo itsh kitsuna.
1CO 13:1 Taa ashuwots noon keewon wee melakiwots handr noonon keewo falr shuno deshatse wotiyal kuhiru biri wee cicilru bilbilyo twotoniye.
1CO 13:2 Bek'on keewi imo tdetsalor aashts jamo tdanalor, danjamo tdetsalor, guro beyokere k'osh beyok beshit imnetiyi jamo t detsal shuno deshatse wotiyal taash eegor k'aatse.
1CO 13:3 T detsts jamo t'owwotssh t kayiyal, dab tiatso b́ ooriraniyere bín it'osha err, beshide'er ti imal, shuno t t'ut'al eegoru taash k'alatse.
1CO 13:4 Shuno k'ame b́ k'amefoni, shuno sheenge b́ k'alfoni, shuno okoorrake, shuno bog taana erake, shuno id'ake,
1CO 13:5 Shuno niwalo finerake, shuno b́ took jang mec'ro geerake, shuno nibo k'unake, shuno bín dadeyaloru dadman dadok'o taawakee,
1CO 13:6 Shuno ar wotts keewatsa b́ geneúiti bako kááw woterawonton geneúwerakee,
1CO 13:7 Shuno jamo falituwe, jamono amanituwe, b́ jangituwere jamoniye, jam keewon kúp'e b́wotiti.
1CO 13:8 Shuno b́ jamon dihiratse, bek'on keewo imets imo beshituwe handr noonon keew falo beshituwe, dan wotiyalowere beshituwe.
1CO 13:9 No danon wotowa bek'on no keewitwo k'atsoniye.
1CO 13:10 Ernmó s'een wottso b́woor k'atso ooritke.
1CO 13:11 Na'a t wotor na'ok'owa t keewufo, na'ok'owa t gawfo, nana'ok'owa t maramarefni, gan asho t wotoromó nana'i doy jamo k'aztk'iri.
1CO 13:12 And mestawut shuwa shuwa etir mastawit gondotse s'ilirwotskok'o noone, bíyormó shin shinaatsne nobek'eti, and tdanir k'atsoniye, bíyoromó Ik'o taan b́ dantsok'osh s'een dano detsetwe.
1CO 13:13 Eshe imnetiyo, jángo, shuno, keezanots oorar betknee, ernmó hanotsitsere bogetuwo shune.
1CO 14:1 Eshe shuno daatsosh gewoore, S'ayin shayiri imuwotsitse dab bitsnor bek'on keewo kup'arr gewoore.
1CO 14:2 Andr noonon noon keewitwo Ik'osha bako ashoshaliye b́keewiri, ááshk wotts keewo S'ayin shayiri angon b́ keewirwosh b́ keewirman danetuwo aaliye.
1CO 14:3 Bek'on keewitwonmó k'osho agosh, kup'iyonat atskup'iyosha ashuwotssh keewituwe.
1CO 14:4 Andr noon keewon keewit asho b́ took mec'roniye bíagiriye, bek'on keewirwonmó Ik' moo agetwe.
1CO 14:5 No jamets andr noon keewon it keewo shunfee b́ teshi, bogshde'er t shunetuwonmó bek'on it keewink'ere, Ik' maa ashuwotsi agosh andr noon keewon keewetso biitsetuwo bí alitka wotiyal, andr noon keewiru ashoniyere bek'on keewiru asho bogfe.
1CO 14:6 Eshe t eshuwotso! itok twoor andr noonon keewon keewufere t weyi wotink'ere eebi itsh t k'aliyank'oni? Bogo itsh t k'alitiye Ik'oke ááshtso kitson wee danon wee bek'on keewon wee dano itsh deshde'er twaale.
1CO 14:7 Turarok'onat T'imbok'o kash deshaw duubi k'ac'uwots k'osh jááwi k'ááro bo t'ut'al bo imiru duubi k'ááro awuk'o b́ wotok'o aawuk'oneya b́ daneti?
1CO 14:8 Ezbedo daneraw k'ááron b́ fugeyal, kes'osh kone k'aniti?
1CO 14:9 Mank'owere it be'ets andr noonon keewetsman it keewor it dants noon keewon keewo it k'azal it keewirwo kone danosh faliti? Jongosh keewirwok'owe it wotiti.
1CO 14:10 Datsanatsere ay naari noon keewwots fa'ane bits deshaw noon keewo aaliye.
1CO 14:11 Taash keeweyiru noon keewi biitso danatse wotiyal keewiru ash mansh ibee t wotiti, bíwere taash ibee b́ wotiti.
1CO 14:12 It S'ayin shayiri imuwotsi kup'shdek'at it geyiruwosh, bogshde'er geyo itn b́geyiyit Ik' maa ashuwots bín bokup'it imuwots boayituwok'owe.
1CO 14:13 Andr noon keewiru asho b́ keewirwo biitso b́ falituwok'o Ik'o k'onuwe.
1CO 14:14 Andr noon keewon Ik'o t k'oniyal t shayirona Ik'o tk'oniri bako t níbo shuwalke b́ wotiti.
1CO 14:15 Bére eeg t k'ale taan b́ geyiyiti? T shayiron Ik'o k'onituwe, t nibon dab Ik'o k'onituwe, t shayirono Ik'osh dúbetuwe, t nibon Ik'osh dúbetuwe
1CO 14:16 Hank'o woto b́ k'azal nee shayiron Ik'o n údor, nee ni etiruwo danawu asho n údonat ni Ik' k'onosh «Amen» eto aawuk'oneya b́ faliti?
1CO 14:17 Arikon nee nt'iintstso údon Ik'o k'ono sheengetskee, ernmó ash k'osho bín kup'eratse.
1CO 14:18 Taa it úneetsiyere bogo handr noonon keewirwo twottsosh Ik'o údirwe.
1CO 14:19 Ernmó k'oshuwotsi daniyosha err Ik' mootse tats kum aap'uwotsi handr noonon keewoniye úts aap'uwotsi ttookon keewo shunfee.
1CO 14:20 T eshuwwotso! gond keewosh nana'i marmat'ok'o wotoore bako it asaabiyon nan'i marmat'uwotskok'o wotk'ayere, maniyere it asaabiyon katstswotsi wotoore.
1CO 14:21 Manuwere, «Handr noonon keewiru ashuwotsnat Bo noon keew keewo daneraw ashuwots noonon ash ashaanotssh keewitwe, Mank'o b́wotiyalor taan k'ewatsne etfe Doonzo Ik'oni» ett nemoots guut'ere.
1CO 14:22 Hansh andr noon keew keewon keewo milikit b́wotit amaneraw ashuwotssh bako amaniru ashuwotsshaliye, bek'on keewets keewo keewonmó milikit b́wotit amaniru ashuwotssha bako amaneraw ashuwotsshaliye.
1CO 14:23 Krstiyaniwots bokakuwewor Ik' maa ashuwots andr noon keew keewon b́ keewor danawwots wee amaneraw ashuwots bowaal keewirwotssh «Ashaanots geeniya bowutsi» etaalknowa?
1CO 14:24 Ernmó ik iko bek'on bo keewiyal amanerawo wee danaw asho b́waal b́shishts keew jamon bísh shiyeetuwe, wee jamon bíyats angshituwe.
1CO 14:25 B́ nibots ááshts keewo keer be'etuwe, b́ baronowere gup' gup'dek't «Arikon Ik'o itdagootse!» eton Ik'osh b́sagaditi.
1CO 14:26 Eshuwwotso! eshe eeg k'alo geyifa? Ik' k'onosh it kakuwewor ititse iko Ik'osh duubo detsfe, k'oshonu daniyo detsfe, k'oshonu ááshts keewo kish kitso detsfe, iko ando andr noonon keewo detsfe, ikonu keewetsman biitso detsfe. Eshe, jaman krstiyaniwotsi agetk woto bíngeyife.
1CO 14:27 Andr noon keewwotsi keewirwots bobeyal git bor wee bí ayiyal keez wotde'er keewne, bo bokeewirwono k'osh asho biishe.
1CO 14:28 Keewetsman biitsiru asho bíaalitka wotiyalmó andr noonon keewirwo kakweetsmanotsitse s'k eree, b́tookonat Ik'osh keewwe.
1CO 14:29 Bek'on keewitu gito wee keez wotar keewitunee, k'oshuwotsmó keewetsman k'ewude t'iwintsde s'iilne.
1CO 14:30 Ko'eyat beyirwotsitse k'osh asho ik jago b́ bek'al, shini keewiru man s'k err beewe.
1CO 14:31 Ik ikuwots bo danetuwok'onat bo kup'ituwok'o it jamets taron Ik' wosho keewo falfte.
1CO 14:32 Nebiyiwots bek'i shayiro nebiyiyotssh keewetuwe.
1CO 14:33 Jeeni Ik'o Izar Izeweri bako fayi Ik'o Izar Izeweriyaliye. S'ayin Ik'i maa ash jamotse k'alefok'o,
1CO 14:34 máátswots Ik' maa ashuwotsitse s'k erne. Nemonmó bí etir bo boaletwok'owa bako bo alititwok'o eekeratse.
1CO 14:35 Ik ik keewo danosh bo geyiyal bo kenih keniho bo meyitse aatune, Ik' k'onosh ko'eyor máátsuwots bo keewo jiitsike.
1CO 14:36 Beree Ik' aap'o b́ waa itokneya? Himó Ik' aap'o b́ waa itok mec'ree?
1CO 14:37 «Taa nebiyi taane wee taa Shayiron imetso detsfe» eteet asho b́ beyal t guut'tsan doonzo tzaziyo b́ wotok'o dande'e.
1CO 14:38 Han danawo b́ beyal bíwere danek'aye.
1CO 14:39 Eshe t eshuwotso! bek'on keewosh kup'ar gewoore, andr noon keewono bazik'ayere.
1CO 14:40 Ernmó jam keewo niwonat matson wotowe.
1CO 15:1 Eshe ando t eshuwotso! itsh tdanits doo shishi aap'o itsh gawiwo geefe, doo shishy aap'onwere it dek'tsonat kup'dek'at bíyats it needirwoniye.
1CO 15:2 Taa itsh tdaniitso doo shishi aap'o kup'ide'er desh it dek'ink'ere bín kashiyank'te, maniyere okoonmó it amantso datsmec'roone.
1CO 15:3 Taa t dek'ts shintso jamoniyere bogo itsh beshire, itsh tbeshits keewonwere S'ayin mas'aafotse guut'etsok'on Krstos no morrosh k'irre,
1CO 15:4 duukere, S'ayin mas'aafotse guut'etsok'onowere keezl aawots k'irotse tuure etke.
1CO 15:5 Bí P'et'rossh be'ere, ilowere tatse git woshetswotssh be'ere,
1CO 15:6 Úts bal ashuwotsiyere bogts b́shuuts shoydek't sha'iruwotssh iknoto be'ere, boyitse ayuwots andish b́borfetsosh fa'ane, ik ikuwotsmó k'irrne.
1CO 15:7 Maniye hakonowere Yak'obsh be'ere, wosheets jamwotssho be'ere.
1CO 15:8 Jami s'uwaatsnowere shabetsok'o wottsosh taash ando be'ere.
1CO 15:9 Taa Ik'i moo gishtso twottsotse wosheets jamwotsitse dashonat wosheka err s'eegeyo taash geyirawo taane.
1CO 15:10 Ernmó taa and twottso wotat tdaatseyir Ik'i s'aatonee, taashowere imets s'aato shuwalon ooreratse, dabnuwor k'oshuwotsiyere bogo finon mawure, erenmó han k'alirwo taanton fa'a Ik'i s'aatoni bako taanaliye.
1CO 15:11 Eshe taan wotowa boon wotowa nodaniyrwo haniye, itwere itamantso haniye.
1CO 15:12 Krstos k'irotse b́ tuutsk'owa no daniyiri wotiyalmó ititsere ik ikuwots aawk'oneya k'irots tuwo aaliye boetiri?
1CO 15:13 K'irotse tuwo aali wotiyal Krstos k'irotse tuuratse etee,
1CO 15:14 Krstos k'irotse tuuratse wotiyal no daniruwoni wotowa it imnetiyo k'awuntso deshatse etee,
1CO 15:15 Ik'o Krstosi k'irotse tizre etaat daniruwots kootets Ik'i gawwotsi woterone etee, eshe k'irts ashuwots k'irotse tuwatsno wotiyal Ik'o Krstosi k'irotse tuzatse etee.
1CO 15:16 K'irts ashuwots k'irotse tuwatsno wotiyal Krstos k'irotse tuwatse etee.
1CO 15:17 Krstos k'irotse tuuratse wotiyal it imnetiyo k'awuntso deshatse etee, andoru morrotsa it beyiri etee,
1CO 15:18 Krstosn amanat k'irtswots t'afrnee etee,
1CO 15:19 Krstosi nojangir datsanatsi be mec'rosha wotiyal ash jamoniyere bogo noosh shiyanetk nowotoniye.
1CO 15:20 Ernmó Krstos k'irtswotssh k'irotse tuwon k'aabo wotat arikon k'irotse tuure.
1CO 15:21 K'iro b́ waa ik asho atse tuutson b́ wottsok'o k'irotse tuwonu b́ weet ik asho atse tuutsone.
1CO 15:22 Adam atse tuutson ash jamo b́k'iriruowok'o mank'o Krstos atse tuutson ash jamo kasho daatsituwe.
1CO 15:23 Man b́wotituwere ik ikosh b́ tar tarone, Krstos k'irotse tuwooke shintsoniye, ilowere Krstos b́woor bík wottsuwots k'irotse tuwitune.
1CO 15:24 Maniyere hakowere bíalguronat alona ang jamo t'afir mengsto Ik'o Nihosh beshide b́ ímet aawo dúri s'uwoniye b́ wotiti.
1CO 15:25 Ik'o b́ balangar jamwotsi bí ali shirots b́ woshfetsosh Krstos b́ naasho geyiyituwe.
1CO 15:26 Da'eyar s'uwatse t'afitu t'elato k'ironiye.
1CO 15:27 «Ik'o jam keewo bí ali shirots woshk'rere» ettso guut'ere, maniye daneke, ernmó «Jam keewo bí ali shirots wotere» bíetor jam keewo bí ali shirots woshts Ik'o nihono dabaatse
1CO 15:28 Jam keewo Krstos ali shirots b́ wotiyakon Ik'o niho jámo b́jámon b́ wotituwok'o naayo b́ tookon jám keewo bí ali shirots woshtso Ik'o niho shirots wotitwe.
1CO 15:29 Eshe k'irts ashuwots tuwatsno wotiyal k'irts ashuwots jangosh guupeyiru jamwots eebi bo'ot'oni? k'irts ashuwots b́ jamon k'irotse tuuratsno wotiyal ashuwots boshegro eegosha etniya bo gupeyiri?
1CO 15:30 Noo nowotiyaloru aaw aawon t'up' er tawootse nobeyir eegoshe?
1CO 15:31 T eshuwotso! taa aaw aawuon k'iro taan b́ datsiri, hanowere t keewir doonzo Iyesus Krstos jangosh itatse t detsts it'o arik b́wottsotsne.
1CO 15:32 Ash asaabiyok'on taa Efesonn dini s'ootswotsnton t kaare eeg orshoshe? K'irtswots k'irotse tuuratsno wotiyal «Yaats nok'iritwotse woore moone, úyone» eteetsok'oyiye.
1CO 15:33 Dáshek'ayere, «Woteraw tooho sheeng doyoniye bí awashifoni.»
1CO 15:34 It nibo maants aanoore, morro fink'ayere, ititsere ik ikuwots Ik' danawwots fa'ane. Hano ti etiri it jitsitwok'wa etaatniye.
1CO 15:35 Asho iko «K'irts ashuwots aawk'oneya botuwit? k'irotse bo tuwor bodetset atso awuk'one?» err aato falitwe,
1CO 15:36 Nee dogono n shokiru mááyo b́ k'irrawo boc'r beyo falatse,
1CO 15:37 Nee n shokor Geshi shooko wee k'osh mááyi shooko s'uzi n shooketi bako ili bos'et miti gindoniyaliye.
1CO 15:38 Ik'onmó shook mansh b́ shuntsok'o miti gindo b́ imeti, ik ik shookosh k'osh k'osh miti gindo b́ imeti.
1CO 15:39 Meets jamo ik naaraliye, ash meetso ik naare, gizi meetso k'osh naare, Kafuwots meetso k'osh naare, Mus' meets k'osh naare.
1CO 15:40 Mank'o daritsi atso fa'ee, datsatsi atsonu fa'ee, ernmó daratsi atsi mango ik naare, datsatsi atsi mangonu k'osh naare.
1CO 15:41 Aawi mango ik naare, Ashitsi mangonuwere k'osh naare, K'enuwots mangonu k'osh naare, ik k'eeno k'osh k'eenoniyere k'osh mango detsfe.
1CO 15:42 K'irotse tuwit ashuwots jango haniye bíari, t'afitu k'irts atso wotat shooketso k'irawu beetk atso wotar tuwituwe.
1CO 15:43 Ketoon shooketso mangon tuwitwe, maawon shooketso kúp'on tuwituwe,
1CO 15:44 Meetsi ats wotat shooketso shayiri atso wotar tuwituwe. Meetsi atso b́ beyok' shayiri atsonuwere fa'ee.
1CO 15:45 Mansh, «Shints asho Adam kashets azeetso b́ woti» ett guut'ere, iltso Adam Krstosmó kash imet shayiro b́ woti.
1CO 15:46 Ernmó shintso b́ waa meetsone bako shayironaliye, shayiron wottso b́waa meetson wottsoniyere ile.
1CO 15:47 Shints asho Adam bí azee shawatse b́ wottsosh datsatsike, gitl ashonmó b́waa daratsnee.
1CO 15:48 Datsats wottswots datsatse azeets ashok'one, daaratse wottsuwots daaratse waats ashok'one.
1CO 15:49 Datsatsi asho aro noartsok'o daratsi asho aronowere aritwone.
1CO 15:50 Eshuwotso! itsh tkeewirwo haniye, meetsonat s'atson Ik'i mengsto naaratse, mank'owere k'irr t'afit atso t'afrawu kashets atso naaratse.
1CO 15:51 Eshe! mist'iri iko itsh keewirwe. Noo noúnetswor k'irratsone. Ernmó no únets wonetuwone.
1CO 15:52 Nowoneetwonwere s'uwatse ezbedo fugewor ááwi k'iluowok'o iknotone. Ezbedo fugetuwe, k'irts ashuwotswere t'afraw kashetswotsi wotar tuwitune, noowere wonetuwone,
1CO 15:53 T'afituhan t'afrawo k'irituhanwere k'irrawo tahdek'o bísh geyituwe.
1CO 15:54 T'afituwaan t'afrawo k'iritwanwere k'irrawo tah b́dek'or «K'iro da'ewon k'oot'ewtsere!» ett guut'etso s'eenetwe.
1CO 15:55 Mank'owere, «K'irono! bín nkoshetuwo aawoke b́fa'oni? K'irono! ash bín n t'afit ango ewuke?» etetuwe.
1CO 15:56 K'iro bín b́koshet ango morre, morri angonuwere neme.
1CO 15:57 Ernmó nodoonz Iyesus Krstos weeron da'o noosh imetuwosh Ik'osh údo wotowe!
1CO 15:58 Eshe mansha shuneets eshuwotso! kup'ar need'ore, ik keewonor shek'ek'ayere, doonzo finosh it shaatso datsmec'r b́woterawok'o dande'er, it eed'irawo jam aawo doonzo fino finosh kup'ore.
1CO 16:1 Amantsuwotssh giz kishi jango Gelatitsi Ik' moosh t imts bín bojisheeyirwok'on it were mank'o k'alwere.
1CO 16:2 Taa twoor giz kisherawok'o ik ik gawiyotsi sanbat eenots ititsi ik iko b́datsiruwok'on kishde'er beezwe.
1CO 16:3 Taa itok twoor, amoosh falitúne it etts ashuwots it kishts gizo de'er Iyerusalem maants boametuwok'o bín bodeenet dabdabeyonton boon woshituwe.
1CO 16:4 Taa tiamo b́ geyitka wotiyalo, taanton ametúne.
1CO 16:5 Mek'odoniiweeron amoosh t etirwotse manweeron t beshoor iki it weeron weetwe.
1CO 16:6 Tiametu jamok tweerosh taash wotit tep'o taash it woshituwok'o daneraka itok teshetwe, daneraka jooshonor itnton beshiyosh falituwe,
1CO 16:7 And tbeshor iki b́weeron itn s'iilo geeratse, doonzontoh b́wotiyal múk'i geenzts gizeyosh itnton teshosh geyirwe.
1CO 16:8 Ernmó P'ent'ek'ost'eyi bali aawo b́borfetsosh Efesonitse teshetwe.
1CO 16:9 Ayi eenonat shuu detsts fin fengesho taash k'eshewutsere, k'efirwotsu aynee.
1CO 16:10 T'imotiwos itok b́woor shatalon itnton b́beetuwok'o bín tewu'ere, bíwere tikok'o doonzo fino finiruwe.
1CO 16:11 Mansh konwor bín b́gac'eraawok'owa, bí eshwwotsnton t maants b́weetuwok'o tkotirwotse tiyok jeenon aanar b́weetwok'o b́weerosh bín geyitwon bín tewu'ere.
1CO 16:12 No eshu Ap'los k'osh eshwwotsnton it b́ s'iiletwok'o kup'shdek'at k'onre b́teshi, bímó and it maants wosh eekeratse, bísh b́k'anoor weetwe.
1CO 16:13 Maaw k'ayere, it amantsok'on kup'arr need'ore, kup'ore, aawo shuu'ere.
1CO 16:14 It k'aliru jamo shunon k'aluwere.
1CO 16:15 Ti eshwotso! Ist'ifanos maa ashuwots Akayiy datsatse amants shintswotsi bowottsok'onat amantsuwotssh finoshowere botoko beshidek't boimtsok'owo danfte.
1CO 16:16 Hanotsk'o ashuwotsnat bontonwere finon maawiru jamwotssh it aletwok'o kup'idek'at it baterawok'o gawirwe.
1CO 16:17 Ist'ifanosna, Ferdonat's Akayik'oswere t maants bo waatsotse gene'owere, it tiyoke daatsewo itk'aztsotse bo it shegro taash shaptso s'eentsrne.
1CO 16:18 Bo t shayironat it shayiron kashirne, mansh hanotsk'o ashuwotsi dande'ere.
1CO 16:19 Isiyon fa'a Ik'i moowwots jamo itsh t'intsirune, Ak'ilnat K'irisp'iln, bomootse kakuweyiru krstiyani jamwotswere bo nibon jamo doonzo shúútson itsh t'intsirúne.
1CO 16:20 Hanoke fa'a krstiyani jamwots jamo itsh t'intsirune, S'ayints joobewon jamó it atsatsewosh aatewere.
1CO 16:21 Taa P'awlos jamáán t kishon itsh guut're.
1CO 16:22 Doonzo shunawo b́beyal c'ashek wotowe! No doonzo wowe!
1CO 16:23 No doonz Iyesus s'aato itnton wotowe.
1CO 16:24 T shuno Iyesus Krstosn it únetsnton wotowe.
2CO 1:1 Ik' ettsok'on Iyesus Krstossh wosheets wottso P'awlosnat no eshuu T'imotiyosoke. K'orontos kitotse fa'a Ik' moonat Akayiyin fa'a Krstiyani wotts ash jamwotssh.
2CO 1:2 No nihi Ik'oke, no doonz Iyesus Krstosoknowere s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
2CO 1:3 Maarts nihonat kup' jam imet Izar Izewer, no doonz Iyesus Krstos nihi Ik'osh údo wotowe,
2CO 1:4 Noo Ik'oke nodatsiru kúp'iyon gond bek'otse beyiru jamwotsi kúp'sho no falituwok'o Ik'o noon no gond bek' jamotse kúp'shitwe.
2CO 1:5 Krstos gond bek'o ayidek'at no kayidek'tsok'on hank'o Krstosn kúp'eyo ayide'er datsituwone.
2CO 1:6 Noo gondo nobek'or it kúp'eyonat kashon daatsitute, no nokúp'iri itwere itkup'twok'owe. Kup'han b́datsewe no ats bodets gond bek'i naari k'amoon it itned'tsoshe.
2CO 1:7 Noo gond bek'o it kayok'o mank'o no kúp'ono it kayituwok'o no dantsosh itatsere nodetsts jángo kúp'e.
2CO 1:8 T eshuwotso! Isiyi datskayotse no beyor no'ats bodts gond bek'o it danetuwok'o geefone, no'ats bodts gond bek'onuwere kurosh nofalitwoniyere bogo no'ats dihit b́ teshtsotse kashon beyosh nojangtso dab k'ut'dek're b́ teshi.
2CO 1:9 Mank'o k'iro no'ats angshetsok'owe noosh shiyeyat b́ teshi, jaman no'ats b́ boduwere no amaniruwo k'irts tizitu Ik'ona bako no took angon b́ woterawok'o nibn no dek'ishe.
2CO 1:10 Mansha bí noon hank'o een k'irosh betsit t'úp'er tawatse kashire, kashitwe, dabnwere b́ kashitwok'o bíne nojágiti.
2CO 1:11 It noosh Ik' k'onon it tep'o geyituwe, ayi ashuwots Ik' k'onatse tuutson noosh imets Ik' s'aatosh aywots udo t'intsitune.
2CO 1:12 No it'et keewo haniye, hanwere ar b́ wotok'o no nibo gawitwe, k'osh ashuwotsnat bítsnooru itnton nobeets beyo Ik'oke nodek'ts S'ayinonat kááwatse tuutsone, han b́ wotuwere Ik' s'aatone b́ teshi bako ash dani telefonaliye.
2CO 1:13 Nababar t'iwintso it falit keewoniyere okoon k'osho eegoru guud'atsone,
2CO 1:14 no jangosh k'atso it dantsok'o mank'o s'eenon it danetwok'o amanitwe, manshowere doonzo Iyesus b́ weet aawor no itn noit'etuwok'o itwere noon it'etuute.
2CO 1:15 Keewann arik twottsosh gitoto it t'ak'ametuwok'owa etaat shin shino iti s'ilosh geeyatniye tteshi,
2CO 1:16 Itn s'ilosh tietwere Mk'odoniy datso maants it weeron t beshoronat bíyokere aanar twore b́ teshi, hank'onowere Yhud datso maantsan t sha'or taan it tep'etuwk'o gawatniye t teshi.
2CO 1:17 Hanowere t gawor t k'aliru danaw hake baka etirwok'o arefta itsha? Han t gawirwo iknon «ee, etonat iya'a» etaat ash gawirwok'o hake baka eton t k'altsok'o arefta itsha?
2CO 1:18 Ik'o amanek b́ wottsotse no nokeewirwo, «ee wee iya'a» etiru hake baka eton keeweyiru aap'ok'oyiyaliye.
2CO 1:19 Taanat Silasn T'imotiyosu itsh nonabtso Ik' na'o Iyesus K'rstosi «ee wee iya'a» etonaliye b́teshi, ernmó ee eto bín wotere.
2CO 1:20 Ik'o noosh b́ jangits jamo, «ee» etiruwo Krstosne, mansh Ik' mangosh Krstosn «Amen» no etiri.
2CO 1:21 Noo itnton Krstosats no kúp'ituwok'o woshtso Ik'oniye, noon galdek' futtso bíne,
2CO 1:22 Bík nowotok'o kitsit mahatabon no'ats gedtsona shino maants noosh b́ imet gaalosh no níbots S'ayin shayiro agitok'o woshdek't imtso bíne.
2CO 1:23 Taa K'orontos maants aanat woo t k'azitsi jango itn tshiyanirawok'o itsh maac'o keewatniye, hansh Ik'o gawosh s'eegetwe,
2CO 1:24 It it imnetiyon kúp' it wottsotse it itgeneúitwok'o itnton finituwone boko it imnetiyon iti azazeratsone.
2CO 2:1 Eshe iti tshiyanirawok'o gawat iti s'iilo it maants ando aanar twarawok'o k'ut'dek'niye tteshi.
2CO 2:2 Dab iti tshiyaaniyalor ityere t shiyanitswotsiyere oko taan geneeúshituwo kone?
2CO 2:3 Mank'o itsh t guut'uwere itok twoor taan geneúsho boon geyit ashuwots taan boshiyanirawok'o geeyatniye, t geneúwo it únets geneúwo b́wottsok'o amanirwe.
2CO 2:4 Shiyani eenonat nibi kic'on, ay aac'uwonowere wotdek'at itsh tguut' ayidek'at iti tshuntsok'o itdanetwok'owa etni bako iti shiyaaniyosha etaatniyaliye.
2CO 2:5 Ash shiyanitso konwor fa'e wotiyal b́shiyaniyi taan b́woterawo b́ naando k'ees'iyo wot k'aya bako k'osh weeron ititse ayuwotsnoor shiyaanire.
2CO 2:6 Han naari ashosh ititse ayuwots bíats boangshts fayo bísh bodfe.
2CO 2:7 Mansha ashaan weeralon shiyaanotse b́kindrawok'o dab maniyere bísh orowa err bín it kup'iyo itsh geyife.
2CO 2:8 Mank'owere bín it shuntsok'o aaniyi arikon it kiitsituwok'owo iti k'onirwe.
2CO 2:9 Wosh ekeewnowere itsh tguut' fadeyar jam keewon aletswotsi it woto danoosha etaatniye.
2CO 2:10 It bísh oorowe it eteet ashosh taawere oorowe etetuwe, bísh oorowe ti eteet naando b́beyalor taa Krstos shinatse oorowe tietet itsha erniye.
2CO 2:11 Man t k'alirwere shed'ani gond fino nodantsotse shed'ano noon b́ darirawk'owa etaatniye.
2CO 2:12 Maniyere hakon Krstos doo shishiyo daniyosh T'iro'ad maants ti amor doonzo fini fengsho taash k'eshree,
2CO 2:13 Ernmó t eshúwi Titoyi daatso t k'aztsotse t shayiro kash de'atse, mansh manoki krstiyaniwotsi jamiyat Mek'odoniyo maants ti ami.
2CO 2:14 Ernmó jam aawo Krstos da'oon noon jishirwonat sheeng sháák' detsts shituwok'o Krstossh no detsts dano jam beyok nobetsitwok'o woshtso Izar Izewersh údo wotowe!
2CO 2:15 No kashitwotssh wotowa t'afitwotssh wotowa Krstosn Ik'osh sheeng sháák'o detsts it'anok'o noone.
2CO 2:16 Ikosh k'iro maants jishit k'iri sháák' noone, k'oshosh kasho maants jishit kashi sháák' noone, beré finansh bodts wotituwo kone?
2CO 2:17 Noo Ik' aap'tso jaak k'ac' kemiru ayuwotsk'o noonaliye, ernmó Ik'oke wosheets kááw woshetswotsk'o wotar Krstosn Ik' shinatse keewituwone.
2CO 3:1 Ando aani notooko údo tuuwwonoowa? Himo ik ikuwots bok'aliruwok'o itsh wee itoke noon tep'osh guut'etso noosh geyiyifek'úna?
2CO 3:2 Ash jamo b́ dantswotsnat b́ nababirwotsn nonibots guut'ts dabdabewwots itne.
2CO 3:3 It no finon daatsets Krstos dabdabewotsi it wottsok'o daneke, woshanuwere b́ guut'e beyat beyiru Ik' shayirona bako k'elemiyonaliye, manuwere ash nibatsa bako gashets shúts tabtabats gut'ekaliye.
2CO 3:4 Hanowere no etir Krstos weeron Ik'atse nodetsts imnetiyoshe.
2CO 3:5 Ik keewonwor nowooke b́wottsok'o gawosh flratsone, manwere eegoshe nonotokon bodknoonaliye, ernmó noon bodtswotsi woshtso Ik'oniye.
2CO 3:6 Handr taarosh finirwotsi nowotitwok'o noon falitso bíne, hanuwere fidelon guut'ets nemon b́woteraniyere S'ayin shayiri tep'one, fidelon guut'ets nemo ud'itkee, S'ayin shayironmó kash imetke.
2CO 3:7 Nemo fideliyon gashdek't guut'e shúts tabtabatse b́ teshi, nemo imeyori shááno k'aawe'efe bíamiri wotiyaloru Israe'el ashuwots Muse shiitso t'iwints de s'iilo falatsno boteshi, eshe k'ir dowet nemo hank'o mangon b́ be'eyal
2CO 3:8 bére, S'ayin Shayiri weeron daatset fino bog mango deetsalkeya?
2CO 3:9 Ashuwotsats morr doots fino hank'o mango b́ detsiyakon ashuwots bín kááw bowotit fino aawuk'oneya bog mango b́ t'ut'eti?
2CO 3:10 Ilts mango ayidek't bog b́wottsatse tuutson beshts mango eegoru b́ berawok'o tawetwe.
2CO 3:11 Ili t'afitwonworu hank'o mango b́ detsiyakon, dúre dúrosh kúp'ar beet keewonmó aawuk'oneya bog mango b t'ut'eti!
2CO 3:12 Hank'o jangetso nodetstsosh ááwu shúk'on keewitwone.
2CO 3:13 Muse múk'efere amiru b́ shiits golo b́ t'affetsosh Israe'el ashuwots bo be'awok'o b́ shiitso b́ ipefoni b́ teshi, nooyere Musek'o noonaliye.
2CO 3:14 Bo nibo arikon dúnguwtsere, andish b́ borfetso nat taari mas'aafo bo nababor bonibo manoori ipetsmann ipetsok'one b́fa'oni. Ipman ipalon b́wotit Krstos s'uzn b́ wottsotsne.
2CO 3:15 Hambetsish b́ borfetsosh nemi mas'fo nababeyi taawo bonibo ipeyirumann ipeke.
2CO 3:16 Ernmó asho doonzo maants bíaanor «Ipeyiruman k'ayb́tuwiti.»
2CO 3:17 Doonzo shayire, doonzo shiyiri beyokonowere s'ayin kesho fa'ee.
2CO 3:18 Noo noúnets iperaw shiits wotar doonzo mango mestawtotse bek'eyirwok'o bek'irwone, Shayir wottso doonzo aro aroosh mangoniyere mango maants wonetuwone.
2CO 4:1 Ik'o b́ mhretwon bísh finet finan noosh b́imtsotse maac'o k'ut'r shuuts aaneratsone.
2CO 4:2 Aashtsonat jitsik wotts keewo juuk'rerone, nemi gondon fineratsone, Ik'i aap'ono kooton woniratsone, dab iki ariko sháánatse nokitsiri, notook jangoshmo ash jami nibots Ik'i shinatse ariko keewitwone.
2CO 4:3 No danits doo shishi aap'o dab ááshka wotiyal bíáásh t'afitwotsshee.
2CO 4:4 Datsani keewiru shed'ano amaneraw ashuwots níbo deekk'rere, mannowere Ik'i aron be'eetso Krstos b́mangi dooshishiyon boosh b́sháánits shááno bobea'awok'o b́woshi.
2CO 4:5 Noo nodaniyirwo Iyesus Krstos doonz b́wotonat noowere notookon Iyesus jangosh it guuts nowottsok'oni bako notooko nabratsone.
2CO 4:6 «Shááno t'aluwotse shááne!» ett keewts Ik'o Krstos aron goliruwo Ik'i mango dani shááno noosh b́ imetwok'o b́ shááno nonibots b́ sháánetwok'o woshre.
2CO 4:7 Ernmó jamoniyere bogts angaan Ik'oka bako nok b́woterawotse mangts keewan shali k'ac'ok'o wotdek'at detsdek'rone.
2CO 4:8 B́ kaat kaaton gond bek'o noats bodiruwe, ernmó da'eratsone, ayoto daandirwonee, ernmó maac'o k'ut'ratsone.
2CO 4:9 Giishefoone, ernmó noon shuntswotsi t'ud' danaknone, togeere dihfoone erenmó k'irraknoone,
2CO 4:10 Iyesus kasho no atsotse b́be'etuwok'o Iyesus ats bodts k'iro noatsatsowere jam aawo kurdek'aatniye nogúúriri.
2CO 4:11 Iyesus kasho noats k'irituwanitse b́be'etuwok'o no kashetswots Iyesus jangosh jam aawo beshat noimeyiri.
2CO 4:12 Mansh k'iro noyitse, kasho ityitse b́ finiri.
2CO 4:13 Wotowa eré «Taa amanere, manshe tkeewiri» ett guut'etsok'on, noowere imneti ikman shayiro nodetstsotsene no amaniri, manshowerowe keewirwone.
2CO 4:14 Doonzo Iyesusi k'irotse tiztso Izar Izewer nonowere Iyesusnton b́ tizituwok'onat itntonwere noon b́ shinats b́ t'intsituwok'o danfone.
2CO 4:15 Jaman it t'k'imiyosh wotts s'aato s'eent b́ ooyefetsosh ay ashuwotssh b́ bodtsi taawon Ik' mangosh wotit údo bí ayituwok'owe.
2CO 4:16 Mansh no maac'o k'ut'ratsone, úratsi noaro b́ t'afiyaloru gitsitsi no atso aawu aawon handr wotituwe
2CO 4:17 Keet wotts gond bek' andish nodek'irwan s'uu deshaw ayidek't een wotts dúre dúri mango noosh daatsituwe.
2CO 4:18 Noo nokotirwo be'eraw keewoni bako be'eyirwoniyaliye, be'eyirwo andkee, be'erawonmó dúre dúrikoniye.
2CO 5:1 And gofok'o wotts datsatsi nomeetso b́gahor ash kishon b́ woterawo Ik'on ageets dúre dúri beyoko darotse nodetstsok'o danfone.
2CO 5:2 Andi beshit gofanitse nobeyor kashe no k'ushiri.
2CO 5:3 Mansh no meets datsatsan b́k'alewor araats wotaarr datseratsone.
