2CO 5:4 Arikon k'iritwo kashots b́k'ot'etwok'o tahdek'osha bako noatse giinbazeyo no shunaawotse noo daritsi atso han abaats dabde'er tahdek'o geefone, mansh datsatsi dunkaniyotse fa'uwots noo noats b́mangre kasho nok'as'iri.
2CO 5:5 Keewansh noon k'anitso Ik'oniye, maniyere bog keewo noosh b́ imetu jamosh agito b́ wotish b́ shayiro noosh imtso bíne.
2CO 5:6 Datsatse no atson no befetsosh doonzo'atse no woktsok'o no danaloru jam aawo bín amanetuwone.
2CO 5:7 No nobeyir amanona bako keewwotsi bek'onaliye.
2CO 5:8 No beewok wotts meetsanitsere k'aleyar doonzonton wotoshe no tewniri, mansh amanon beetuwone.
2CO 5:9 No meetsanton nowotiyal wee bíyatse no k'aleyal no k'os'ó doonzo geneúshe.
2CO 5:10 Datsatsi beyon nok'altso gond wotowa doo keewosh ik iko b́ finok'o b́ k'auntso dek'osh noúnets Krstos angshi jori shinats t'ino noosh geyife.
2CO 5:11 Doonzo shato eeg b́wottsok'o no dantsosh, ashuwotssh sheenga err bodek'etwok'o woshitwone, no eeg nowotok'o Ik'o danfee, itwere it nibotse eeg nowotok'o it danetuwok'o jangirwe.
2CO 5:12 Nibotse beyiruwon b́ woterawo be'eyiruwon it'iruwotssh aaniyo it falituwok'o noon it it'etuwok'o itsh gowo imetuwone bako aani no itsh notooko úderatsone.
2CO 5:13 Geetsuwotsi no wotiyalowere Ik'osha etaatniye nogeyi, nibetsuwotsi woterone wotiyalowere itsha etaatniye nibetsuwotsi nowoti.
2CO 5:14 Manjangosh Krstos shuno noon detsetwe. Iko jametsosh b́k'irre jametsotswotswere bok'iro dandek'roone.
2CO 5:15 Kashon fa'a jamwots boosh k'irtsonat k'irotse tuutsosh bobeetuwok'owa bako haniyak botookosha err boberawok'o Krstos jametswotsshowere k'irre.
2CO 5:16 Haniyere okoon noo asho konnor meetsi s'iil s'iilon s'iilatsone, haniyere shin Krstosnor nos'iil ash jamikok'o meetsi s'iil s'iilona wotiyal shinomaants han k'alratsone.
2CO 5:17 Mansh eshe asho konuwor wotowa Krstos jiro b́wotiyal handr azeeke, nattso beshwtseree, jamonu handr wotwtsere.
2CO 5:18 Jamhan b́wotuwere noon b́ tookonton Krstosn manitsonat maniyi fino noosh imts Ik'one.
2CO 5:19 Hanuwere Ik'o Krstosn datsatsi ashjamo b́tookonton maniree etee, bo naandonowere boats taawratse, nooshowere asho doonzonton nomaniyish bí aap'o noosh imre.
2CO 5:20 Ik'o ashuwotsi noweeron b́ s'egetwotse Krstos shegro wotat wosherone, mansh «Ik'onton manewere!» err Krstos shútson itn k'onitwone
2CO 5:21 Noo Krstosn Ik' kááw fino kayituwotsi nowotitwok'o Ik'o morr deshawo Krstosi no morrosh wosho b́wotitwok'o b́ k'ali.
2CO 6:1 Ik'onton tohaat finirwotsi nowottsotse itdek'ts s'aato datsmec'ron oorik'r k'ayere etaat itn k'oniruwe.
2CO 6:2 Ik'o, «Taash wotts aawots nkeewo k'ebre! Kashiyi aawotsowere neen tep'ree!» bí etirwotse «Eshe hambe! wotts aawo andee, kashi aawonwere andee.»
2CO 6:3 No fino k'efeerawok'o ik keewon konshor t'ugo woteratsone.
2CO 6:4 Maniyere gond bek'ona, ono bek'ono, k'ic'onowere k'amefetsr Ik'osh finirwotskok'o notooko jam weeron t'intsituwone.
2CO 6:5 Ik'osh fintsuwotsi nowoto nokitsitwere jot'ewon, tipewon, noats tuuzeyiru dimbiron, finon maawon, tokr t'ut'onat s'oomiyonee,
2CO 6:6 Mank'owere s'ayinon, danon, k'amoon, doowoton, S'ayin shayiron jisheewonat bíats daro bítse aalts shunon,
2CO 6:7 ari aap'onat Ik' angone. Bín da'osh wotowa noatse k'arbazosh kes'i kac' wotts kááw fino no k'anonat giri kishon deshdek'etwone.
2CO 6:8 Mangosh wee ketosh, k'orewosh wee údewosh k'an dek'k noone, aretswotsi nowotefere, dirshtswotsi eteyi.
2CO 6:9 Danetswotsi wotefetsat danerawwotskok'o nowoti, k'irrne etefere hamb kashetswotsi wotat nodatseyri, no jot'eyaloru úd'eratsone,
2CO 6:10 Shiyano noats b́ bodaloru jam aawo geneúituwone, tuguretswotsi wotefetsat ayuwotsi gaaletso nowoshiri, eegoru deshawwots wotefetsat, jam keewo detsfone.
2CO 6:11 It K'orotosn beyiru ashuwotso! hamb, itsh kish dek'at keewurone, no nibonowere gawintsdek'at itsh k'eshrone.
2CO 6:12 Itna itshuno noosh baziyi bako no itsh bayatsone.
2CO 6:13 Niho b́nana'úwotssh b́keewfok'o tkeewre, noo nonibo gawunon k'eshde'er nogitsotse shisheyirwo itsh kish nokitstsok'o itwere mank'o noosh k'aluwere.
2CO 6:14 Woteraw finon, amaneraw ashuwotsnton ikn s'andek'ayere, kááwonat morron awuk'o k'alrniya ikwoto bofaliti? Sháánonat t'aluwon towaar beyo aawk'oneya bofaliti?
2CO 6:15 Krstosnat Diyablosn aawuk'oneya ik woto bofaliti? Amantsonat amanerawonmó aawuk'oneya kod'ewo bofaliti?
2CO 6:16 Ik'i maa S'ayino woteraw dozets ik'uwotsnton eeg ikwote b́detsi? Ik'onwere, «T beyokonowere tiashuwots taalots woshituwe, Bontonwere beetwe, Taa boosh boko Izar Izeweri wotituwe, Bowere ti ashuwotsi wotitúne» ett b́ keewtsok'on no beyat beyiru Ik'osh S'ayin Ik' maa noone.
2CO 6:17 Manats dabt doonzo hank'o etre, «Bo dagotse galeyar keere, Kim wotts keewo t'awik'ayere, Taawere iti dek'etuwe,
2CO 6:18 Taawere itnihi wotituwe, Itwere t nungush nana'úwotsnat mááts nanaúwotsi wotitute, Etre jam faltso Izar Izeweri.»
2CO 7:1 Tmashotso! jam keewo jangit noosh imetsotse atsonat shayiron kimshit kon naari keewatse notooko s'ayitsuwone, Ik' shatoon S'ayin nowoto s'een b́ wotituwok'o woshwone.
2CO 7:2 It nibon noon de'ere, no konnoru daderatsone, konatsor gondo fineratsone, dirshon konatsno ik jago geeratsone.
2CO 7:3 Hano t etir itats angshoshaliye. Haniye shini itsh tkeewtsok'o it no nibots itne, eshe kashon wotowa k'iron jam aawo itatse k'aleratsone.
2CO 7:4 Itatse tdetsts imnetiyo eene, itatse tdetsts it'o eene, kup'wtsere, nokic' jamon ayide geneúituwe.
2CO 7:5 Mek'edoniyots nobodiyakon ay kaaton gondbek'a no atsats bodi bako kash dek'o iknotonor daatsratsone, úratse fayo gitsotsnowere shate nodetsi.
2CO 7:6 Ernmó juweetswotsi kup'shit Ik'o Izar Izewer Tito b́woon noon kup'shre.
2CO 7:7 Nokup'uwere b́ waats mec'rosh b́woterawo it bín it kup'shtso noshishtsotsne, t jangosh it detsts mirac'o, shiyanonat tjangosh it kic'irwok'o noosh b́keewre iki tgeneúwi.
2CO 7:8 Haniyere shin itsh t guut'ts wosho itn shiyaanik b́wotiyalor dab woshman tguut'tsotse goyineraatse, goyinere wotiyalowere tgoyin twoshon múk'na'a gizewosh itn tshiyanitsotsne.
2CO 7:9 Andmó gene'owere, tgene'útsonuwere eegoshe itn tshiyanitsosh b́woterawon it shiyantsatse tuutson naandrone etaat itwonetsotsne, eshe it shiyano Ik'o ettsok'o b́wottsotse no itn eegor daderatsone etee.
2CO 7:10 Ik'o ettsok'on wotts shiyano woro maants jishituwo naandre eton daatset wonewo b́daatsitwotse goyino dooratse, datsatsi shiyanonmó k'ire b́doweti.
2CO 7:11 It shiyaanan Ik' ettsok'on b́wottsok'owo awuk'o kup'de fino, awuk'o wotts aniyidek'o, awuk'o kááron fayo, awuk'o shato, awuk'o mirac'o, awuk'o okooro, awuk'o sezonowere b́dootsok'owo nibnde'er t'iwintsde s'iilere. Ando it jam keewon s'ayin it wottsok'o gawon gawirute.
2CO 7:12 Itsh t guut'alor taa itsh tguut' no jangosh itdetsts kup'ar fino Ik'o shinatse itsh shaanr b́daneetwok'owa etaatni bako morro bín dadets ashosha etaatniyaliye.
2CO 7:13 Jamanatse tuutson noo kup'erone, no nokup'tsoniyere bogo ando Tito b́daatsts geneúwon iki ayidek'at geneeúweroone, manu eegishe b́shayirosh kashdek'o itdatsitsoshe.
2CO 7:14 It atse t detsts it'onowere Titosh keewre b́teshi, itwere taan jitsiratste, jam aawo itsh arikeewono itsh keewufoone b́teshi, hanuwere it jango Titosh nokeewtso itn it'o arbwotoon be'ere.
2CO 7:15 It únetswor azazeyirwotsi itwottsotsnat shatoonat k'ewon bín itdek'tsok'owo Tito b́gawor itsh b́detsts shuno ayidek't eeno wotere.
2CO 7:16 Taawere jam weeron itn it'o tfaltsotse iki bogshdek' geneúwere.
2CO 8:1 T eshuwotso! Ik'o Mek'odonin fa'a Ik' maa moowwotssh bí imts s'aato itsh daniyo shunfone.
2CO 8:2 Bowere ay gond bek'on faderne, b́woteferoru bogen'úo ayidek't eene, ayidek't tugurtswotsi bo wotiyaloru dab een teudo woshrne.
2CO 8:3 Bo faltsok'onat bofaltsoniyere bogo bo shunon bo imtsok'o taa boosh gawitwe,
2CO 8:4 Yhud datsatse beyiru Kirstiyaniwots ash tep'i gowo boosh baziyerawok'o kup'idek't noon bok'oni.
2CO 8:5 Bowere bo k'oltso no nokotirwoniyere boge, shin shin botoko doonzosh boimi, manats dabtnu Ik' shunok'on botoko noosh imrne.
2CO 8:6 Finan shin shinon fintso Titoyi b́ wottsotse andoor bo teudi finan s'uwaats de'am b́ betsitwok'o bín k'onitwe
2CO 8:7 It imnetiyon, noon keew keewon, danon, kup'on, nooke dan itdek'ts shunon jam keewono bogfte, tewd dooyi finannowere it bogetwok'o wotowe.
2CO 8:8 Eshe, tietir azazonaliye, ernmó k'oshuwots imon kup' woto it kup' wotonton no nohir it shuno ar b́ woto shu'ar s'iilosha etaatniye.
2CO 8:9 It no doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aato danfte bí eegoru dab gaaletsk b́ wotiyaloru bí tugurets wotat it galetswotsi it wotituwok'o itsha ett tugretsk b́ woti.
2CO 8:10 Han jagosh itsh sheeng araat be'ets izo itsh imetwe, beshts dúron im mec'r b́ woterawo han k'alosh shini geetswots itne b́ teshi.
2CO 8:11 Eshe imosh it detsts shúno finats jitsit s'uwo maants b́ bodetwok'o it faltsok'on it gawts man and k'aluwere.
2CO 8:12 Imosh sheeng shun detstso b́ beyal ashman tewdi doon b́ detstso b́ imala boko bíangalon b́ímíshaliye.
2CO 8:13 Hanowere ti etir it únets taalo it wotitwok'owa bako it imon it kic'efere k'oshwots bín kash bodek'isha etaatniyaliye
2CO 8:14 It it kic'or bogizo it kic'ats b́ jinetwok'o and it gizo bok'ic'ats jinee, hank'on it dagotse manuts woto beetwe.
2CO 8:15 Hanwere, «Ayi ko'itswotssh oreratse, múk' ko'itswotsshowere shapratse» ett guut'etsok'one.
2CO 8:16 Taa itsh t shiyanirwok'o Titowere itsh b́ nibon b́ shiyanituwok'o woshts Ik'o údewe.
2CO 8:17 Tito it maants b́weet b́ took shunon tuut gene'ona bako no nok'onts mec'roshaliye.
2CO 8:18 Doo shishiy nabon Ik'maa jamooke údetso eshúwo bínton woshitwone.
2CO 8:19 Haniyere dambon eshuwan no sheeng finan doonzo mangosh nofinorat finosh nodetsts sheeng shuno nokitsor noonton amt nofiinman b́ tep'etwok'o Ik'i moowwots n marat'etsoniye.
2CO 8:20 Tewdi doon imets gizan nok'eezor noshútso b́ t'afrawok'o no atso kordek'etwone.
2CO 8:21 Noo nogeyiru keewo doonzo shinatse s'uz b́woterawo ashuwots shinatse kááw wotts keewo k'ale.
2CO 8:22 Ayoto ay weeron fadere kup'at fintso wotat daatsetso no'eshuwi Titowi bonton woshitwone, bí itatse b́detsts imnetiyo een b́wottsotse and finann iti tep'osh b́detsts kup'at fino awurtsooniyere boge.
2CO 8:23 Tito jango dano b́geyitka wotiyal itn tep'osh taanton finirwo, fini weeron ttohe, bínton tohaat weyiru k'oshwots jango b́wotiyalowere bo Ik'i moowwotsatse naashuwots, Krstos mangosh need'tswotsiye.
2CO 8:24 Mansh it shúno boosh kitswere, hank'on it shunonat itatse nodetsts it'o k'awtsalko b́ woterawok'o Ik'i maa jamwotssh kitsitute.
2CO 9:1 Yhuditse fa'a krstiyaniwotssh kisheet gizi jango itsh guut'o taan geyiratse,
2CO 9:2 «Akayiy dats ashuwots natstsoon tuut tep'osh k'andek'kne» etaat mek'edoniitsi ashuwotsoke it jangosh ti ít'ir it kup'ar it finitwok'o t dantsoshe, it kup'at itfiintsonwere k'oshwotsnoor tuuzere.
2CO 9:3 Keewanatse itatse no detsts it'o dats mec'ro wotar b́oorerawok'o eeshwanotsi woshiirwe, itwere ari taa haniyere shin ti ettsok'o k'ande'er korere.
2CO 9:4 Mek'edoni dats ashuwots taanton itok waarr itk'ande'aawo bodatsiyal itats noit'tsatse tuutson jiitsitwone, itmó ayde'erniye itjiitsiti.
2CO 9:5 Mansha imetuwone it etts tewud doon it imiruwo it k'aniyitwok'o itsh bogawitwok'owa etaat eshwaanots taayere shino itok boweetwok'o wosho b́ geyiko b́wottsok'o daatsre, mank'oon taa twoor tewudi dowon it imetuwo k'anke b́wotiti, itwere it imet angnon b́woterawo shunon b́wottsok'owoniye b́kitsiti.
2CO 9:6 «Múk'shde shooketwo muk'e b́kakuwiti, ay shooktso aye b́ ko'iyiti» ett keewetso gawde'ere.
2CO 9:7 Eshe Ik'o b́shunfo geneúwon imet asho b́wottsotse asho ik ikon b́nibotse imosh b́geetso shunr ima bako shiyaanefetsr wee b́maac'otse aalo imk'aye.
2CO 9:8 Jam aawo jamkeewon it tooko falr shengfiinats jinosh itfalitwok'o ayide b́ deero itsh imo falfe.
2CO 9:9 «Hanwere t'owwotssh tewdi dowon imre, B́ kááw finonwere dúre dúrosh beetuwe» et t guut'etsok'one.
2CO 9:10 Shooko shooktsosh, moowosh misho imirwo Izar Izewer it shooket shooko ayde'er imetwe, it kááwi shuwonowere itsh ayituwe.
2CO 9:11 It tewdi doo noweeron boosh b́bodiru ash jamwots Ik'o bo úditwok'o jam aawo it imetwok'o Ik'o jam keewon iti deritwe.
2CO 9:12 It kaliru tewdi finan krstiyaniyots kic'otse kishoniyere bogo ashuwots Ik'osh ay udo bot'intsitwok'o woshitwe.
2CO 9:13 It tewdi dowi finann Krstos doo shishiyo dek'at bísh azazetswotsi itwottsok'onat, bonat k'oshwotsnsh tewdi doo kitsosh b́ wottsotse jametswots Ik'o úditúne.
2CO 9:14 It atse fa'a s'eent kud'ts Ik'i s'aatatse tuutson itjangosh Ik'o k'onfetsr itn gawitune.
2CO 9:15 Ash noon keewon keewosh falerawo bí imtsosh Ik'o údeek wotowe.
2CO 10:1 Taa P'awlos it shinats twotor ááwu nefe eteyiri, itokere tworomó ááwu shúk'e eteyiri, Krstos doowootonat maac'nefon iti k'onirwe,
2CO 10:2 Meets ettsok'on no sha'irwok'o woshdek't taawiru ik ik ashuwots shinatse ááw shuuk'on keewo t geeyiyaloru itok twoor ááw shuk'on t keewitwok'o k'alk'ayere.
2CO 10:3 Dab datsanatse no beyaloru nokaarit datsatsi kaaraliye.
2CO 10:4 No kes' k'ac'onwere ááshet gop'o gaak faliyit Ik' ang detstswoni bako datsanatsi kes' k'ac'wotsiliye.
2CO 10:5 Ik'o danosh t'ug wotar tuwit mooshonat míshon gaaketwone, asaabi jamono k'aa'uder Krstossh bíaletwok'o woshitwone.
2CO 10:6 It aleyo s'een b́wotor konnari alek'azono sezosh k'andek'tswotsi wotitwone.
2CO 10:7 It its'iilirwo úratse bek'eyiru keewo s'uziye, asho konwor wotowa Krstosk taane ett bíatso amanirwo aanide'er t'iwintswe, noowere bíkok'o Krstosk nowottsok'o dande'e.
2CO 10:8 Doonzo noosh b́imts alon ayide'er ti it'alor bín jitseratse, alan noosh ime iti agosha bako gaakoshaliye.
2CO 10:9 T woshon itn t shatiyirwok'o ark'ye itsha.
2CO 10:10 Ik ikuwots «P'awlos woshwots mangtswotsnat kup'knee, bí b́tookon noonton b́wotormó maawke, b́ noon keew keewonwere k'awntsalke» etiirunee.
2CO 10:11 Man etiru ashuwots noo wokoon wotdek'at nowoshtswotsitse noguut'irwonat t karnonowere itnton wotdek'at nofiiniruwi dagotse k'osh k'osho b́beerawok'owo dande'ene.
2CO 10:12 B́ wotefere botoko údiru ash ik ikwotsnton no tooko nohiwosh wee notooko nuutsir s'iilosh ááwo shu'atsone, bomó botoko botookonton botatstsonat botookonowere botookonton bonohitsotse t'iwints dek'knaliye.
2CO 10:13 Noomó dab itok no borfetso Ik'o noosh b́ imts fini gúúron it'etuwoone bako tatsoniyere dambo id'atsone.
2CO 10:14 It beyruwere nofiiniru gúúrots b́wottsotse Krstos dooshishiyo daniyoh itok nowoor gúúrmaniyere besheratsone.
2CO 10:15 Mansha Ik'o noosh b́beezts gúúroniyere beshar k'oshwots finon weeralo id'atsone, maniyeremó it imnetiyo b́daboor Ik'o noosh b́beezts gúúrotse noon it mangitwok'o tewnirwone.
2CO 10:16 Eshe k'osh ashi fini gúúrots kindr shin fiinets finon noid'awo itiyere oke fa'a datswotsatse bíko doo shishi aap'o shishiyosh falfone.
2CO 10:17 Ernmó «It'etwo doonzon id'ee.»
2CO 10:18 Asho údewosh b́bodet doonzo bín b́údora bako b́tooko b́tookon b́údoraliye.
2CO 11:1 Taa muk'i dog t wottsotse taash it k'amitwok'o jangirwe, oona! taash k'amde'ere.
2CO 11:2 Baarna'a s'eenu ikukok'o iti kenih iko Krstossh twid'tsotse, Ik'i okooron okoorirwe.
2CO 11:3 Dawunzo Hewaani weeri gondon b́ sheelitsok'o daneraka it asaabiyonwere awaashwtsar Krstossh itdetsts okooronat s'ayinon wottso it amanewo k'ayk'ritute etaat shatirwe.
2CO 11:4 Ik asho itok waar no nó nabtso b́woterawo k'osh Iyesusi itsh b́nabiyal wee it itdek'ts shayiro b́woteraniyere k'osh shayiro itdek'al, wee it dek'ts doo shishiyo b́ woterawo k'osh doo shishiyo it dek'al, s'k etaatni it dek'i etee.
2CO 11:5 Ernmó taa een een woshetswotsiyere jam keewon tdashtsok'o areratse.
2CO 11:6 Noon keewon dantso woto tk'azaloru dab dano taash shapatse, hanowere ayoto ay weeron kishdek' itsh danirone.
2CO 11:7 Taa Ik'i doo shushiyo itsh k'awntsalon tnabonat itn dambaan tizosh t tooko dashan t detso morrok'oweya b́ taaweyiri?
2CO 11:8 Itsh finosh k'osh Ik' moowwotsoke tep'o dek'at boon biik're.
2CO 11:9 Itnton tbeyor taash wotit keewo b shapor, Mek'odoniyon waats t eshwots taash geyits jam keewon botep'irwotse konatsoru kuro woteratse, andish b́ borfetsosh itats jam keewon kuro woteratse, shino maantsisho kuro woteratse.
2CO 11:10 Krstos arikeewo t gitsotse b́ beyirwtse hanatse tuutson t id'awok'o woshitwo Akayiyi datsatse konworu aaliye.
2CO 11:11 B́ jango eebi? Itn shuno tk'ztsosheya? Itn tshuntsok'o Ik'o danfee.
2CO 11:12 K'osh wosheets manots, «No bonk'o finirwone» err boit'et weero t'ut'iyosh and tk'alirwok'o shino maantsoru dab k'alituwe.
2CO 11:13 Hank'o ashaanots Krstossh woshetswotsi aroosh botook wonawoniru kootets woshetswotsnat ash ant'elcef finetswotsiye.
2CO 11:14 Hanwere adiyit keewaliye, shed'anonworu dab shááno melakiwotsi aroosh b́ tooko b́woniti.
2CO 11:15 Mansh eshe shed'anosh finirwots kááwosh finirwotsi aroosh bo tooko bowoniyal noon adiratse, s'uwatse bo fini k'awntso daatsitune.
2CO 11:16 «Asho konwor dartso twottsok'o bísh ark'aye» err aani keewituwe. Dartsi twotiyaloru dab múk'i t it'etwok'o dartsok'o woshde'er taan taawwore.
2CO 11:17 Hank'o it'on tkeewor t keewirwo doonzo shunok'o b́ woterawo dartsok'o wotatniye.
2CO 11:18 Aywots meets keewon bo it'iruwosh taawor it'etuwe.
2CO 11:19 It t'iwintsirwotsi it wottsok'on dartswots jangosh gene'on k'amitute.
2CO 11:20 Hank'o konworu guutsok'o itn b́ woshiyal, konworu itko b́maal, iti b́finiyal, iti b́gac'iyal, it malalats b́ jabiyal k'amitute.
2CO 11:21 Taan jitsitka wotiyaloru dab keewanotsi finosh kup'uwotsi wotnok'azo itsh kitsitwe. Ernmó konwor it'osh ááwo b́ shúk'ol taaworu bíkok'o ááwo shúk'twe, hanowere ti etir and dartsok'o wotatniye.
2CO 11:22 Bo Ibrawi ashnowa? Taawere Ibrawi ash taane, bo Israe'el ashnowa? Taawere Israe'el ash taane, bo Abraham naarnowa? Taawere Abraham naar taane.
2CO 11:23 Bo Krstos guutsnowa? Taawere boyere bogo Krstossh guuts taane, hanowere ti etor geyetsok'o wotatniye t keewiri, boyere bogo ayoto finon mawure, ayoto tipere, ayoto jot'ere, ayoto k'iri t'up'er tawats bodre,
2CO 11:24 Útsoti shaashe jeed'iyoto ayhudiwots k'ac'eyon jot'ere,
2CO 11:25 Keezoto gúmbon jot'ere, iknoto shútson k'is'ere, keezoto markabotse t'up'er tawo tiyats bodre, ik t'úwonat ik aawon aats k'aratse t teshi,
2CO 11:26 T sha'i ayon foki s'eenonat aats di'on, biik'irwotsn bik'ewo ti'ats bodre, Ayhudi jirwotsnat Ik' ash woterawotsokere t'up'er tawo tiyats bodre, Kitonat worwotse aats k'aratsnowere t'up'er tawo tiyats bodre, mank'o kootets amantsuwotsoke t'up'ertawo tiyats bodre.
2CO 11:27 Ayo finonat maawo detsfe b́ teshi, ayoto tokro t t'utfoni, k'ak'efe, shashwefe, ayoto mish t'ut'o tiyats bodre, ak'onat araats woto tiyats bodre.
2CO 11:28 K'osh jam keewo t taawoniyere Ik'i moowwotsosh aawu aawon shiyanat t kic'efoni.
2CO 11:29 Maawrawo kone, taawor mááwratsta? ash iko morron b́ dihor taawer nib t k'únaw aawo egore?
2CO 11:30 It'o b́ geyitka wotink'e taa bín ti it'etwo taa maaw ash twoto kitsit keewwotsne,
2CO 11:31 Dúre dúrosh údeek wottso no doonz Iyesus nihi Ik'o t koorawok'o danfee.
2CO 11:32 Demask'o kitotse tbeyor nugúso Aretasiyere dashe dats k'eeziruwo taan detso geeyat kitutse bín keshet weero kotirwotsn b́ kotifere b́ teshi.
2CO 11:33 Wotowa bako ashuwots kas'i tungushi fúri weeron ooshon taan oorsh bok'rere b́ kishotse k'az t keshi.
2CO 12:1 Dab it'otse daatset keewo b́ t'ut'aloru it'etwe, ernmo and doonzoke tdaatsts bek'onat be'etson keewo shunfee.
2CO 12:2 Krstosk wotts ik asho danfee, ashaan tatse awd natoniyere shinon keezl darok b́ borfetso b́ dek'eyi, b́ dek'ewewere b́ meetsontoni wotowa b́ meeston wot b́k'zo danatse, Ik'o danfee.
2CO 12:3 Ernmó ashaan Geneto maants b́ dek'etsok'o danfone, b́ meetson wotowá wotb́k'azon danatsone, Ik'o danfee,
2CO 12:4 Bíwere Geneto maants dek'eyat ash noon keewon keewosh falerawonat asho keewo b́ falaaw keewo b́ shishi.
2CO 12:5 Hank'o ashonn it'etuwe, t tokoshomó maawuk t wotoniyere okoon k'osh bín ti it'et keewo aaliye.
2CO 12:6 Eshe, taa ariko tkeewirwosh it'o tgeyiyalor dartsi woteratse, ernmó konwor tiatse b́bek'irwonat tiyoke b́k'ebirwoniyere bogshde'er taan b́s'iilawok'owa etaat it'atse tiatso kotdek'irwe.
2CO 12:7 Taash be'ets een een keewanotsatse tuutson t id'awok'o t meetso angitsok'o koshet weesho taash imeyi, hanuwere shed'ani melakiyo wotat taan túúzit onobek'shr ti id'awok'o taan b́woshiti.
2CO 12:8 Taan weeshiru keewan tiatse b́ k'aawu'etwok'o doonzo keezoto t k'oni.
2CO 12:9 Ernmó «Ti ango s'eenon b́fiinit n maaw manits b́wottsotse ts'aato neesh bodfe» taash bíeti, mansh Krstos ango tiats b́wotitwok'o jamoniyre bogo maawk twoton geneúfetsr it'o shunfee
2CO 12:10 Ango t daatsit maawk t wotor b́ wottsotse Krstos jangosh t maawor, t c'ashewor, gondo tbek'or, t gishewor, tkic'oro geneútwe.
2CO 12:11 Doogok'o keewre! eshe hank'o tkeewitwok'o taan k'altswots itne, taan údiyank'wots itna b́teshi, taa daneraw ash twotiyalor dab een eenne eteets woshetswotsiyere eegonor dasheraatse.
2CO 12:12 Ari wosheetso twoto kitsiru keewwots itnton tbewor k'amoon t k'alts fiinwotsiye, milikitanotsnat adits keewanotswere adiknee.
2CO 12:13 It ats kuro wot tk'azoniyere okoon k'osh Ik'i moowwotsiyere iti t dashiyi eegneya? Hanuwere naandok'o b́taawetka wotiyal taash oorowe erere!
2CO 12:14 Itok wosh k'andek' ttuwiyakon han keezloniye, taa itats kuro woto geeratse, taa tgeyir itna bako it gizoniyaliye. Bo nana'osh giz kakuwo b́s'ili ind nihwotsi bako nanaúwots indnihwotssh gizo ko'irakne.
2CO 12:15 Itsha err dab t gizonat t tookon beshide'er t imink'e ayideniye t geneuti, eshe taa itn ayidek'at t shunfere it taan it shunir hank'o múk'sh dek'atneya?
2CO 12:16 Ekewin wotowa hann wotowa taa itsh kuro woteratse, weeri gondonat ant'elcon iti tdetstsok'oye itsh bíari.?
2CO 12:17 T woshts ashuwotsitsere ikon dab kis'o keshrta?
2CO 12:18 Tito it maants b́ weetwok'o t k'oni, no eshu manowere bínton t woshi, eshe, Tito itoke t'k'miyo datsra? Taanat bín itsh nofin ik shayiron woteratsa? No sha sha'onwere ik woteratsa?
2CO 12:19 It únets andish b́ borfetsosh it gawir noo it shinatse notook jangosha etaat aninodek'irwok'o woshdek'aatni k'úna? Noo Krstosn wotdek'at nokeewirwo Ik'o shinaatsne, shuneetswotso! no jaman nokeewir iti kup'iyosha etaatniye.
2CO 12:20 Taa manmaants t woor daneraka it wotish t geyirwok'o it woterawon, taawere it itgeyirwok'o twoterawo gonketwonek'úna etaat shatirwe, mank'o itoke kaareyo, okooro, fayo, tookshuntsi woto, ash shúúts t'afiyo, óóno, bogtaana etonat dimbron beetúne etaat shatirwee.
2CO 12:21 Aani aanar itok twoor tiko Izar Izewer daneraka taan itshinatse ketitwe etaat shatirwe, haniyere shin bofints morratse tuutson kiimo, wido, shiraats jintsi wotatse tuutson naandrone eraaw ashuwots jangatse shiyanots kindiftak'úna etaat shatirwe.
2CO 13:1 Eshe, itok twoor han keezloniye taasha, awror b́wotiyal jam keewo arik b́ wotit wee git wee keez gawwotsne.
2CO 13:2 Gitlts s'iilo twoor itnton tteshor it tooko kor itdek'etwok'o keewatniye t teshi, andoor aaniy haniyere shin morro fintswotsnat k'oshwotsshor boatso korbodek'etwok'o keewitwe, and taa itok aanar twoor konshor maac'o k'eweratse,
2CO 13:3 It t gitsotse beyat keewirwo Krstosi b́wottsok'o dandek'oshe itgeyiri, itoke beyrwo b́kúp'a bako b́maawoniyaliye.
2CO 13:4 Bí mask'aliyats jiteyat b́k'ir maawona wotiyalor and Ik'i angon kashone b́ beyiri, noowere bíkok'o maawtswotsi woterone, itnton nodetsts gonkewok'onmó bínton Ik'i angon beetuwone.
2CO 13:5 It amantsatse it kúp'tsok'o sheengsh danosh it tooko t'iwintsde'er s'iilere, it atsono fads'iilere, Iyesus Krstos itgitsots b́wottsok'owo t'iwintsde'atsteya? Mank'o wotob́k'zal fadewor dihrte etee,
2CO 13:6 Noo fadewor nodihrawok'o dan itdek'etwok'owe nojangiri.
2CO 13:7 Gond keewo itk'alrawok'o Ik'o k'onirwone, Ik'o nok'onirwere no took faltswotsi wotat be'erani no'ooriyal it úni aawo sheeng wotts keewo it finitwok'owa bako tooko nofalo kitsoshaliye.
2CO 13:8 Noo ari keewosha nofinri bako ari keewo k'efitwo eegor k'alo falatsonee.
2CO 13:9 Noo maawtswotsi nowotere it kúp'uwotsi it wottsosh gene'úwirwone, no Ik'o nok'onir it s'eenwotsi it wotitwok'owe.
2CO 13:10 Woshan itoke wokdek' befetsat tguut'ir manatse tuutsone, hank'on itok twoor doonzo taash b́ imts alon itn kic'iratse, doonzo alo taash b́ im itn tiagisha bako iti gaakoshaliye.
2CO 13:11 Eshe ti eshúwotso! jamon beewere! it bebeyo manutside'ere, t izonowere beewere, it ats atseyosh ikwotore, jeenon beewere, shunonat jeeniko Izar Izewer itnton wotituwe.
2CO 13:12 S'ayin wotts jobon jobeyar jamo aatewere.
2CO 13:13 Amants jamwots jamo itsh t'intsirune.
2CO 13:14 Doonzo Iyesus Krstos s'aato, Ik' shuno, S'ayin shayro ik woto it únetsnton wotowe.
GAL 1:1 Ashuwotsoke wee ash weeron b́ woterawo Iyesus Krstosnat bín k'irotse tizts Ik'o nihon wosheetso wotat wosheetso taa P'awlosoke,
GAL 1:2 Tiyoke fa'a eshú jamwotsoke Gelati Ik'i moowwotssh wosheetso.
GAL 1:3 No nihi Ik'okere, no doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
GAL 1:4 Gond dúranitse noon kashiyosh noko Izar Izewernat no nihi bí eektsosh Krstos no morrosh b́ tooko beshidek't b́ imi.
GAL 1:5 Dúre dúrosh b́ borfetso Ik'osh mango wotowe! Amen.
GAL 1:6 Krstos s'aaton itn s'eegtso Izar Izeweratse káári it k'aletsonat k'osh doo shishiyo maants it aantsok'o taane bí adiri.
GAL 1:7 Hanowere ti etir itn dandirwotsnat Krstos doo shishiyonowere k'uriyosh geyiru ik ik ashuwots bobetsosha bako doo shishiyoniyere shinoor ik s'uzee.
GAL 1:8 Wotowa eree noon wotowá, daratsi melakiyo wotowa, no nonabtsonton gáwet k'osh doo shishiyo itsh nabitwo c'ashek wotowe!
GAL 1:9 Haniyere shini t ettsok'o andoru aani eteetwe, it it dek'tsonton ik woteraw doo shishiyo konworu itsh b́ nabiyal c'ashek wotowe!
GAL 1:10 Bére, taa t geyir asho taan b́ úditwok'owemó? Ik'o taan b́ úditwok'owe? Himó ashuwotsi geneúshosh t geetsok'oweya bí ariri? Ashuwotsi geneúshosh t geyiyal Krstossh guutso woterawnk'e b́ teshi.
GAL 1:11 Ti eshwwotso! taa itsh tnaabts doo shishiyo ashoke daatsek b́woterawok'o it danetwok'o geefe.
GAL 1:12 Doo shishiyanowere Iyesus Krstosi taash bek'shi bako konoknoor de'atse, wee asho konwor taash daniratse.
GAL 1:13 Joots ayhudiwots imnetiyots tteshor aawk'o tbefok'o shishrte, Ik' moowwotsi weeralo gishefetsat t'afi bazoshe tnokorefooni.
GAL 1:14 Ayhudiwots imnetiyo kotósh tdúron teshts t jir Ayhudi jamwotsiyere bogfe b́teshi, nih nihwots niwosho okoori eeno detsfe b́teshi.
GAL 1:15 Ernmó tind maac'otse tbeefere Ik'o taan galbdek'i, b́s'aatonowere taan s'eeg b́dek'i.
GAL 1:16 Ik'i ash woterawots b́ naay jangosh doo shishiyi aap'o t shishitwok'o Ik'o b́ naayi taash kitsosh b́geyor taa kontonwor shiyeratse,
GAL 1:17 Taayere shin teshts woshetswotsi gonkeyono Iyerusalem maants amatse, ernmó shin Araawi datsomants k'az tiami, ando aaninwere Demask'o maantse k'az tiaani.
GAL 1:18 Maniyehakowere keez natoniye hakon Keefi eteefo P'et'rosnton daneyosh Iyerusalem maants ti ami, manoknowere bínton tatse úúts aawo tteshi.
GAL 1:19 Doonzo eshu Yak'obi tbek'i bako wosheets k'oshwotsitse konnor be'atse.
GAL 1:20 Itsh tguut'irwan kooto b́ woterawok'o Ik' shinatse itsh katsidek' danirwe.
GAL 1:21 Maniyere hakon Soriyi datsonat Kilk'i datso maants tiami.
GAL 1:22 Yhud Datsatse fa'a Krstos Ik'i moowwots t shiitso bek' danakne boteshi.
GAL 1:23 Bo boshishtsonu «Bali noon giishat teshts asho bali t'afiyosh b́geyiru imnetiyo and b́nabiri» etirwoniye.
GAL 1:24 Ti atse tuutsonowere Ik'o boúdi.
GAL 2:1 Tatse awd natoniyere hakon Bernabasnton Iyerusalem maants aanat tiami, Titonowere taanton dek'at amree b́teshi.
GAL 2:2 Man maants tiamwere Ik'o taash kitst b́bek'shtsok'onee. Haniyere shin t fintso wotowa and t fintso dats mec'r wotar b́datserawok'owa etaat Ik'i ash woterawwotssh tnabiru doo shishiyo een een wotts jishirwotssh bo aal aalshe t daniyi.
GAL 2:3 Taanton fa'o Tito Grik dats ash b́wotiyalor gofo bíametwok'o kic'iyeeratse.
GAL 2:4 Ernmó nodagots ááshon mut'at kindts ik ik kootets eshwots gofo bíametwok'o geeyatniye boteshi, ashaanots k'ororosh noyits mut'at bokind Krstos Iyesusn nodetsts s'ayin no keshtso bi'ide'er guutsmots noon aaniyo geeyatniye.
GAL 2:5 Noomó doo shishiyi arikeewo itoke kup'arr b́beetwok'wa etaat dab múk' sa'atoshor ekewotssh da'eratsone.
GAL 2:6 Ik'o ash ááwo s'iilr b́bogabogshrawotse, jisht teshts ashaanots koni bowotiyalor bojangosh taa kic'eratse, bo taa t keewiru doo shishiy aap'ats handr keewo eegor dabraatsne.
GAL 2:7 Ik'o P'et'rossh ayhudiwotssh doo shishi adaro b́ imetsok'on taashor doo shishi adaro Ik'i ash woterawwotssh t shishiyitwok'o b́wooshtsok'o bo t'iwintsdek'rnee,
GAL 2:8 Mansh eshe P'et'rosi ayhudiwotssh wosheetso wotar b́finitwok'o woshtso Izar Izewer taanor Ik' ash woterawwotssh wosheetso wotar t finitwok'o woshre.
GAL 2:9 Irok'o araat be'eyiru jishirwots Yak'obnat P'et'rosu, Yohanswere Ik'i s'aaton k'osh wotts fini gowan taash b́ imtsok'o bodantsosh taanat Bernabasnton ik bowoti milikit wottso bok'ani kisho noosh imrne, shiyeyat no Ik' ash woterawwotsok no ametuwok'o boowere Ayihudiyots maants bo ametuwok'o bok'ali.
GAL 2:10 S'uznmó bo dagotse fa'a tuguretswotsi no baterawok'o noosh oona etrne, hanwere arikon k'alosh t geef keewoniye.
GAL 2:11 P'et'ros Soriyotse fa'a Ans'okiyo maants b́ woor dart b́ teshtsotse b́ shinatsere bín t k'efi,
GAL 2:12 Yak'ob b́ woshts ik ik ashuwots Ans'okiyo maants bowaafetsere shin Ik' ash woteraw ashuwotsitsere amantsuwotsnton towaat mááfetsetni b́ teshi, bo boweyiyakonomó, «Ik' ash woteraw jirwotsitsere amantsuwots gof amo boosh geyife» etiru jirwotsn shatt shuutso maants aanat Ik' ash woterawwotsatse b́ galeyi.
GAL 2:13 K'osh ayhudi jir wotts Krstiyaniwotswor ayhudi woterawwotsnton mish móó gond b́wottsok'o aridek't P'et'roskok'o bok'ali, Barnabasworu dab b́ oreraniyere be'eyi darman maants getseyatniye b́ teshi.
GAL 2:14 Bo k'altsan doo shishi arikeewonton ik wotob́k'azo t bek'tsok'on P'et'rossh, «Nee ayhudi wotefetsat ayhudi nemok'on b́ woterawo Ik' ash woterawwots nemok'one n beefoni. Eshe, Ik' ash woterawwots ayhudoyots nemok'on bobetwok'o eegishe angnon n k'aliri?» etaat jami shinatse bín t k'efi.
GAL 2:15 Arikon no noshuweyon Ayhudi noona bako morretsk wotts Ik' ash woterawwotsnonaliye.
GAL 2:16 Ernmó asho kááw b́ wotit Krstos Iyesusi amanona bako nemo s'eentson b́ woterawok'o danfone, noowere nem s'eentson b́woterawo Krstosi amanon kááw nowotitwok'o Krstos Iyesusi amanerone, konwor asho nemo s'eentsr kááw woteratse.
GAL 2:17 Krstosi amanon kááw wotosh nogeyor no notookon morretswotsi wotar nodatsetka wotiyal eshe, morro no finitwok'o woshirwo Krstosiye eteya? mank'owiyaliye!
GAL 2:18 Taa ttookon t gáákts nemi niwok'owa aani tfiniri wotiyal taa t tookon nemosh alerawo twotok'oniye t kitsiri etee.
GAL 2:19 Ik'osh t beetwok'owa etaat k'irok'o k'aleyon nematse k'alere. Taa Krstosnton jitetsok'o t taawetsotse
GAL 2:20 haniyere okoon Krstosi t gitsotse beeti bako taa t tookon beetk tanliye, and t meets atson t beyir taan shuntsonat taash b́ tooko beshidek't imts Ik' na'o amanon daatsets kashone.
GAL 2:21 Ik' s'aato k'awntsalo oriratse, asho kááw b́ wotit nemo s'eentson b́wotiyal Krstos b́ k'ir datsmec'ra etee.
GAL 3:1 It dárts Gelati dats ashuwotso! kone iten teziyik'ri? Iyesus Krstos it shinatse jitats jiteyat b́teshtsok'on itsh sháánidek't keewere b́teshi.
GAL 3:2 Itoke danosh tgeyirwo han s'uziye, arikon it S'ayin shayiro it dek' nemo s'eentsoneyamó? Doo shishiyosh aap'etso shishat amanoneya?
GAL 3:3 It Ik' shayiron dek' tuwat andmo meetson ishoshe it geyiri, eshe hanok'o dark itne.
GAL 3:4 Doo shishi jangosh it dek'ts gond bek' jamo k'awtsalo wotat orere eteya? Han k'alrte wotiyal arikon k'awtsalko orere etee.
GAL 3:5 Ik'o b́ shayiro itsh bí imirwonat itokere adit fino b́ finir nemok'o it finirwoshemó? Doo shishiyosh aap'etso shishat it amanirwoshe?
GAL 3:6 Hanwere «Abrahamiye Ik'o b́ amani, manwere kááw wotat bísh b́ taaweyi» ett guut'etsok'one.
GAL 3:7 Eshe amanirwots Abraham nanaúwotsi bowotok'o dande'ere.
GAL 3:8 Ik'o Ik' ash woterawwotsi imnetiyon kááw b́ woshitwok'o S'ayin mas'aafo shino be'er «Ash jamwots neen deretúne» ett Abrahamsh shin doo shishi aap'o keewere.
GAL 3:9 Eshe amaniru jamwots amantso Abrahamnton deretune.
GAL 3:10 «Nemi mas'afotsere guut'ets tzaziyi jamon kúp'ar berawonat finats jitsraw jamo c'asheke» ett guut'etsotse «Nemo finats jiitson kááwwotsi wotitwone» etirwots c'ashekne.
GAL 3:11 «Kááw ashonmó imnetiyon kasho daatsitwe» ett guut'etsosh nemi fin s'eentson asho konwor Ik' shinatse kááw b́ woterawok'o daneke.
GAL 3:12 Nemo imnetiyats ned'iyekaliyee, mank'owere «Asho nemon beyo b́ falit nemi tzazi jamwotsi finats b́ jitsiyale» ett guut'ere.
GAL 3:13 «Mitats jitere k'iritu jamo c'asheke» ett guut'etsotse Krstos noosh c'ashets ash wotat nemi dowet c'ashmanitse noon b́ kishi.
GAL 3:14 Hanwere b́ wot Ik'o Abrahamsh b́ imts deero Iyesus Krstos weeron Ik' ash woterawwotsok b́ bodetwok'onat noowere Ik'o itesh imetwe bí etts Shayiri s'ayino imnetiyon nodek'ishe.
GAL 3:15 T eshwotso! aab keewan ashoke daneets keewonton ik woshde'er s'iilone, ash iko b́ kindts taaro kááwar b́ ned'iyakon konwor oriyosh wee dabosh falatse.
GAL 3:16 Ik'o Abrahamnat b́ naarosh jangiyets aap'wotsi b́ im hank'one, jangiyon aap'etso aywotssh b́ wottsok'o woshdek't «Nnaarwotssha» eraatse, ernmó ikosh b́ wottsok'o «Nnaarosha» etfe, «Nnaara» etetsanwere Krstosiye.
GAL 3:17 Eshe taa ti etirwo haniye, awd bale shaash natoniyere il imets nemo shino Ik'okere s'ayntsdek't imets taaro gaahr jangiyets aap'man t'afiyo falratse.
GAL 3:18 Ik keewo naatet nemok'ona wotink'ere jangit imets aap'i weeron b́ woto orere b́ teshi, ernmó Ik'o naato Abrahamsh bí'im jangit b́ aap'tsoshe.
GAL 3:19 Eshe, nemo ime eegoshe? Nemo dabee Abrahamsh jangiyon imets naaro b́ wafetsosh nomrratse tuutsone, nemo melakiyo weeron beshat dagi taalotsi ash ikosh imere.
GAL 3:20 Ernmó dagtalotse bede'er manit asho git jirosha bako ik jiro s'uzosh fineratse, Ik'onmó ike.
GAL 3:21 Eshe nemo Ik' jangits keewo k'efitwa? B́ jamon k'eferatse! kasho daatsit nemo imere wotink'e kááw woto nemi weerone b́ datseyak'oni b́ teshi.
GAL 3:22 Ernmó Iyesusi amanon daatset jangets keewo amantsuwotssh imetwok'o S'ayin mas'aafo b́ etirwok'o dats jamu morrosh kéweyat morron tipetsu woterane.
GAL 3:23 Imnetiyo b́ waftsere shinon nemosh tipetswotsiye noteshi, hanwere imnetiyo b́ be'efetsosh nemo noon kotdek't detsdek'tniye b́ teshi.
GAL 3:24 Hank'on, imnetiyon kááw no wotitwok'o Krstos b́ wááfetsosh nemo noon ditsirwo wotatniye b́ teshi.
GAL 3:25 Andomó imnetiyo b́ waatsosh nemi ditsi shirots nowoto orere.
GAL 3:26 Iyesus Krstosi amanon it jametswor Ik' nanaúwotsi woterte,
GAL 3:27 Gúpeyon Krstosnton ik wotts it únetswots Krstosi tahok'o tahadek'rte.
GAL 3:28 It jametswor Krstos Iyesusn ik it wottsotse ayhudiyonat Girikiyon, gútsonat guuts woterawon, núngushonat máátson dagotse eegoru k'osh k'osheyo aaliye.
GAL 3:29 Eshe Krstosk it wotiyakon Abraham naar itne, jangiyets aap'mank'on naatetwots itne.
GAL 4:1 Andoor tietirwo haniye, naatetwo na'i marmat'o wotar b́ daatsewor dets jamosh doonzo b́wotiyalor guutsoniyere eegonor k'osheratse.
GAL 4:2 Ernmó b́nih bísh b́gedts aawo b́borfetsosh ditsirwotsnat maanzirwots shirootse b́ wotiti.
GAL 4:3 Mank'owere no shayiri keewon nana'i marmat'wotsk'o noteshor datsan niwoosh keewetswotsi wotat gutswotsiye noteshi.
GAL 4:4 Ernmó eteets dúro b́bodtsok'on Ik'o b́naayi noosh b́woshi, bíwere nemi shirots wotat máátsatse b́shuweyi.
GAL 4:5 Hano b́k'al Mesee nemi shirotse teshtswotsi aani kewdek'onat noonowere Ik' nana'úwotskok'o noon woshoshe.
GAL 4:6 Ik' nana'úwotsi it wottsosh Ik'o «Nihono!» ett s'eegiru naayo shayiro no nibots b́woshi.
GAL 4:7 Mansh eshe haniyak na'a neena bako guuts neenaliye, na'a nwotiyalo Ik'atse tuutson naatetwots neene.
GAL 4:8 Haniye shin Ik'o it dartsatse tuutson bo doyon izar izewerotsi woterawwotssh guutso wotatni it kéweefoni.
GAL 4:9 Andmó Ik'o danrte, dabnwor Ik'o itn danre, bere, ekeewots maawtswotsnat k'awntsal datsanatsi nemwotsok awk'oniya it aani? Aawuk'oneya ún aani aanat bo guutswotsi wotosh itgeyiri?
GAL 4:10 K'osh k'osh aawwotsnat shashwotsn woriwoti kaywotsitsnat natwotsitse it atso kotosh k'osh wotts mango it imiri.
GAL 4:11 It dagotse finon t maawts maaw jamo k'awntsalo oritwe etniye t shatiri.
GAL 4:12 T eshwotso! taa itkok'o t wottsosh itwere tikok'o wotoore etaatniye t k'oniri, it taan eegoru daderatste.
GAL 4:13 Shini doo shishiyi aap'o itsh nabosh gowo t daats t shodtsatse tuutson b́wotok'o danfte.
GAL 4:14 T shodo dab itsh fadee b́ wotiyaliru taan gac'eratste wee taan wic'atste, dab melakiyo it dek'iruwok'owe woshdek'at taan it dek'i, Krstos Iyesusi dek'iruwok'o woshat taan it dek'i.
GAL 4:15 Haniyere shini it detsts geneú jamo aawoke b́fa'oni? B́ faleyal it ááwwotsi dab kishde'er it imetwok'o taa t tookon gaw wotitwe.
GAL 4:16 Eshe, and ariko itsh t keewtsosheya it balangaro wotat t daatseyi?
GAL 4:17 K'osh ashuwots it jangosh kic'atniye boshiyaniri, ernmó han bok'alir sheengoshaliye, bo geyirwo it noatse it k'aletwok'owonat boosh kúp'ar it shiyanitwok'owe.
GAL 4:18 Sheeng k'os'osh kúp'o jam gizewon shenge, ernmó it kúp'an taa itnton t beyor s'uzosh wotk'aye.
GAL 4:19 T nana'otso! Krstos it atse sháánon b́ be'efetsosh aani it jangosh na'it'i shambatse t fa'oni.
GAL 4:20 Itsh eeg k'alo taash b́ geyituwok'o itdartsotse dandeyatniye t kic'i, it dagotetsere datseyar k'osh k'osh noon keewon tkeewink'ere aawk'owe t shuni.
GAL 4:21 It nemosh keewetswotsi wotar beyo geyirwots aab taash keewwere, nemo bíetirwo shiyatsteya?
GAL 4:22 S'ayin mas'aafwotsitse «Abraham git nana'úwotsi detsfe b́teshi, iko b́shwee gonuwatse wotat k'oshonu b́shwee mááts gon woteraawwatsna b́teshi» ett guut'ere.
GAL 4:23 Gonu naay b́shuwe meets niwok'on b́wotefere gon woteraw naay b́shuwemó bísh jangit aap'etsok'one b́teshi.
GAL 4:24 Shints taarets taaretsnwere Sin guratstsu b wotor gutsmosh wotit nana'o shuwiruniye, biwere Agariye.
GAL 4:25 Agaar Araawi datsatse fa'a Sin guro ariyetsuniye bteshi, mansh eshe andtsu Iyerusalemntoniye biariri, bi bnanaúwotsnton guutsmotse fa'úniye.
GAL 4:26 Dambe darotsik wottsu Iyerusalemmó goniyaliye, biye no indiye.
GAL 4:27 «Nee nana'a shuraawne gene'úwowe! Nee shuwosh id'r danaawne ‹ílll› eree, Kenih detsts máátsuniyere K'azk'rets máátsu ay nana'o detsfane» ett guut'ere.
GAL 4:28 Tieshwotso! itwere Yisaak'kok'o jangiyets aap'i nana'úwots itne.
GAL 4:29 Ernmó manoor meetson shuwetso Shayiron shuweetsman b́gishtsok'o hambetsoor mank'oyiye.
GAL 4:30 Ernmó S'ayin mas'aafo bíetirwo eebi? S'ayin mas'aafo «Mááts gonu bshuts na'o gon woteraw máátsu bshutsonton towaar b́naarawotse gonu bnaaynton okaan kishwe» etfe.
GAL 4:31 Mansh eshe tieeshwotso, noo s'ayinu nana'úwots noone bako gonu nanaúwots noonaliye.
GAL 5:1 Krstos nas'o noon b́kish nas'on nobeyishe. Mansh eshe kup'arr need'ore, aaninwere guutsmi k'ambariyots tipek'ayere.
GAL 5:2 Hambe! taa P'awlos itsh tietetwo haniye, gofo it amal Krstos itsh eegor k'alratse,
GAL 5:3 Gof ametu jamo «Nem jam s'eentso bín geyife» err aani bísh keewitwe,
GAL 5:4 It nem koton kááw wotosh geyiru jamwots Krstosatse k'alewtserte, b́ s'aatotsnowere keshrtee.
GAL 5:5 Noomó Ik' shayiron kááwi wotosh jángiyetso imnetiyone nokotiri.
GAL 5:6 Iyesus Krstosn beetwosh shunon finitwo imnetiya boko gof amaa wee amk'azo eegoru oot'o imatse.
GAL 5:7 It sha'a sha'o sheenge b́ teshi, eshe and arkeewosh it alerawok'o itn bazitso kone?
GAL 5:8 Hank'o izan itn s'eegts Ik'oke waakaliye.
GAL 5:9 Manwere boot' shash muk'ú boot' jamo b shashitwoshe.
GAL 5:10 Ernmó haniyere k'osho it gawirwo it deshawok'osh arikon wotde'er doonzats amanittwe, konworu it took s'adiitwo b́ beyal angsho dek'etwe.
GAL 5:11 Tí eshwotso! taa andish b́ borfetsosh t nabirwo, «Kashosh gof amo geyife» etirwe wotiyal andish b́ borfetsosh eegishe t gisheyiri? Hank'o b́ wotitka wotiyal Krstos mask'aliyo ashuwotssh t'ug woterawnk'e b́ teshi.
GAL 5:12 Eshe hanots iti dandiru ashaanots bogeyiyal gof amo s'uzi b́ woterawo boatso gato bowoshink'ere shúnfe.
GAL 5:13 Tí eshwotso! it nas'o keshtswotsi it wotish s'egerte, ernmó iko k'oshosh shunon finowa bako nas'o it keshaan meets tewno s'eentsosh wotk'aye.
GAL 5:14 Nem jamo «K'osh asho n tokok'o woshde'er shune» eteets aap' ikon s'eenetwe.
GAL 5:15 Ernmó it atsatseyo shac'eyatni it meeyeyiri wotiyal it atsatseyo it s'uweerawok'oo it atso korde'ere.
GAL 5:16 Eshe haniyak shayiron jisheyar it betka wotiyal, meets tewno s'eentsk'ayere.
GAL 5:17 Meets tewno shayiri tewnontotoniye b́ wed'eyiri, shayiri tewnonu meets tewnontoniye b́wed'eyri, mansh meetsonat shayiron boats atsewo bo wed'eyiri, eshe it geyirwo k'alo falratste.
GAL 5:18 Shayirona it jiisheyiri wotink'eremó nemosh keweyirwotsi woterawnk'te.
GAL 5:19 Meetsi finwots daneknee, boowere wido, kiimwoto, shiraats jintsi woto,
GAL 5:20 Woteraw ik'wotsi ik'iyo, atetsi woto, balangar woto, mooshewo, fayo, okooro, b́took shuno, k'aleyo, weeri gondo,
GAL 5:21 ash een shit'o, másho, weral t'oola, hanotsi artswotsiye, haniyere shin itatso korde'ere tiettsok'on andoor aaniyi it atso korde'ere etirwe, hanotsk'o wotts keewwotsi finit ashuwots Ik'i mengtstu naaratsne.
GAL 5:22 S'ayin shayiri shuwonmó shuno, geneúwo, jeeno, k'amo, sheengo, doowo, amanetso woto,
GAL 5:23 Dingato woto, b́took keewoniye. Hanotsk'o keewwotsi k'efit nemo aaliye,
GAL 5:24 Krstos Iyesusk wotts ashuwots meetso b́gusiyontonat b́tewnonton mesk'eliyats jitk'rerne.
GAL 5:25 Shayirona nobeeyiri wotiyal shayiron jishewone.
GAL 5:26 Iko k'osho gondosh tuuzr noatsatsewo okoorefetsr datsmec'ro it'k'ayone.
GAL 6:1 Ti eshwotso! ash iko morro finar b́daatsetka wotiyal shayiri ash wottswots it han naari asho maac' nefon káátswere, ernmó neewere man naari fadewots ndihrawok'o ntooko korde'e.
GAL 6:2 Ititsi ik ikets k'oshoko kuri mango kurde'e, mank'oon Krstos nemo s'eentsitute.
GAL 6:3 Asho konwor k'oshwotsiyere b́k'ants keewo b́deshawo «Taa k'oshwotsiyere bogfe» err biasabiyal b́ tookoniye b́ ant'elciri.
GAL 6:4 Asho ik ikon b́took fino shu'arr fadbe'e, maniyere il b́ tooko k'oshwotsnton nohiyo b́woterawon b́ tooku s'uz bín b́ it'et keewo daatsitwe.
GAL 6:5 Ik ik asho b́ took kuro kurdek'o bísh geyife.
GAL 6:6 Doo shishyi aap'tso daniru asho bín daniyirwonton sheeng keew jamó kayde'e.
GAL 6:7 It tooko ant'elck'ayere, asho b́k'es'et b́ shooktso b́wottsotse Ik'ats kasho faleratse.
GAL 6:8 B́ meetso gene'úshosh shookirwo b́meetsatse k'iro k'es'etwe, shayiro geneúshosh shooketwo shayiratse dúre dúri kasho k'es'etwe.
GAL 6:9 Maac'o k'ut'dek'o no k'azetka wotiyal b́dúro b́bodor mááy katso nokakwitwotse sheeng fino finosh maawk'ayone.
GAL 6:10 And wotts aawo nodetstsotse ash jamwotssh bítsnor amaniru ashuwotssh sheeng keewo k'alwone.
GAL 6:11 Aawk'o een een fidalwotsn han t kíshoon t guut'tsok'o s'iilere!
GAL 6:12 Gofo itametwok'o iti kic'irwots úratse sheeng araar be'ewo geyiru ashuwotsiye. Han k'alirwotswere Krstos mask'aliyatse tuutson gishewo boats b́boraawok'owa ettniye.
GAL 6:13 Boohe it meetsats it'osha ettni gofo itametwok'owo bogeyiri bako gof amtswotswor dab botokish nemo koratsne.
GAL 6:14 Nodoonz Iyesus Krstos mask'aliyoniyere okoon k'oshon it'o tiatse wokowe, jit hanatse tuutson datso tiatse k'alewtsere, taawere datsatse k'alewtsere.
GAL 6:15 Mansh gof amonu gof amk'azonu eegor k'alratse, k'alitwoniyere azeets handro wotoniye.
GAL 6:16 Memeri shuutso shoyiru jamwotsnat Ik'i jir wotts Isra'el ashuwotssh jeenonat mhretiyon wotowe.
GAL 6:17 Ti atsatse fa'a jot'eetsi shoro Iyesusk twottsok'o b́kitsirwotse haniyak konúwor taan kic'ik'aye.
GAL 6:18 Ti eshwotso! nodoonz Iyesus Krstos s'aato it shayironton wotowe! Amen.
EPH 1:1 Ik' shunon Iyesus Krstossh woshek wottso P'awlosoke, Iyesus Krstosn amanek wottswots, Efesonitse beyiru S'ayinwotssh.
EPH 1:2 No nihi Ik'onat nodoonz Iyesus Krstosokere s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
EPH 1:3 Darotse fa'a shayiri deer jamo Krstosn noon deertso no doonz Iyesus Krstos nihi Ik'o údewe.
EPH 1:4 S'ayinonat eeg eego deshawwotsi wotaarr b́ shinatse nodaatsetwok'o datsu b́ azeftsere Krstos weeron noon gal b́dek'i.
EPH 1:5 Ik'o b́ geetso sheeng keew b́ wottsotse Iyesus Krstos finon b́ nanaúwotskok'o no wotish bale noon marat'b́dek'i.
EPH 1:6 Hanowere b́ k'al b́shune na'o weeron beenon noosh b́ imts mang wotts s'aato b́ úditwok'owe.
EPH 1:7 Ik' s'aati s'eenatse tuutson b́ naay s'atson keeweyat no morrosh orowa eto daatsrone.
EPH 1:8 B́ s'aatono ayidek't noosh kuut're, danonat dani teleefonowere,
EPH 1:9 Ik'o b́ shuntso Krstos weeron bali b́ k'úmtsok'on ááshat teshts b́shunman no danetwok'o woshre.
EPH 1:10 Dúri s'uwi aawo b́ bodor Ik'o finats b́ jitsts b́ k'úmtsman daronat datsatse beyiru azeets jamwots ko'ide'er ik s'uzo Krstos shirots bo wotitwok'o b́ woshiti.
EPH 1:11 Jam keewo b́ took shunok'on finiru Ik'o bali b́ k'úmtsok'on Krstos weeron b́ jirwotsi no wotitwok'o noon marat'b́dek'i.
EPH 1:12 Man b́wotwere Krstosi jángon shintswotsi wottswots noo Ik'o b́mangosh no úditwok'owe.
EPH 1:13 It it kashosh doo shishi aap' wottso ari aap'o it shishor Krstosi it amani, mank'o bí itsh imosh jangit b́ teshts S'ayin shayri matabo itats togk'rere.
EPH 1:14 Shayiranwere b́ mango údosh b́ wotitwok'o Ik'o bík wotts jamwotsi b́ kashifetsosh nodaatsit naatosh dets nodek'tsoniye.
EPH 1:15 Eshe doonzo Iyesusatse it detsts imnetiyonat S'ayin jamwotssh it detsts shuno shishat,
EPH 1:16 itn Ik' k'onon gawfetsat it jangosh Ik'osh údo t'intso need'iratse.
EPH 1:17 Mango bísh wotitwo no doonz Iyesus Krstos nihi Ik'o ayide'er it danetwok'o dani teleefonat bek'i shayiro itsh b́ imetwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
EPH 1:18 Aaw naari jangosh it s'egetsok'onat S'ayinwots bo naatet mang wotts ristiyo aawk'o ayi b́ wotok'o it danetwok'o it nibi ááwo b́ sháánetwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
EPH 1:19 Tatsdeshaw bí angi eeno noosh amanirúwotssh aawk'o een b́ wotok'o it danetwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe,
EPH 1:20 Bí anigi eenano finats b́jiitsi k'irotse tuzdek't darotse b́ k'ano maants b́ beeztso Krstosne.
EPH 1:21 Ik'o niho Krstosi darotse b́ k'ano maants b́ beez aaw naari alguroniyre, aloniyere, naashoniyere, angoniyere, doonzwottsonat shúúts jamoniyere damb aaninwere datsan s'uzats b́ woterawo weet datswatsnorniye.
EPH 1:22 Jam keewo b́ aali shirots woshdek't bísh b́keewiyi, Ik' maatsnowere jamoniyere damb b́ wotitwok'o tooko bín b́ woshi.
EPH 1:23 Ik' moowniye bí atsuniye, jamó b́ jamon s'eentsitwo bín s'eenon kiitsitwaniye.
EPH 2:1 It it daadonat it morri jangosh it shayiri beyon k'irk itne it teshi,
EPH 2:2 Manoor datsanatsi gond sha'ok'owa it sha'efoni, aaninwere jongatse fa'a shayiri angwotsi keewirwosha it alefoni, bíwere and azazeraw ashuwotsatse finiru kim shayironiye.
EPH 2:3 Nó jametswere haniye shinon bo dagotse no meets shunok'onat no maac' gawirwo shoydek'at sha'at no meets tewnok'o beyaatniye no teshi, k'oshwotskok'o no azeewon Ik' fayi shirotsne noteshi.
EPH 2:4 Ernmó Ik' maac' k'ewo ay b́ wottsonat noosh b́ detsts shuno een b́ wottsatse tuutson,
EPH 2:5 No morron k'irk nowotiyaloru Ik'o Krstosnton kashetswotsi no wotitwok'o woshre, it kashwere b́ s'aatone.
EPH 2:6 Ik'o Iyesus Krstosnton k'irotse tuuzt daritsi beyokoke bínton noon b́beezi.
EPH 2:7 Han b́k'alwere Krstos Iyesusn noosh k'eshdek't b́kiitsts doowonat bínton nutsiyetwo deshawo s'aati gaalo weet dúrwotsitse noosh kitsosha etniye.
EPH 2:8 It it kash imneti weeron wotts s'aatone, manwere Ik' ima bako itokikaliye.
EPH 2:9 Konwor asho b́ id'aawok'owa, kashiyit s'aato b́daatse finonaliye,
EPH 2:10 Noo Ik'o bal b́k'anits sheengo finefetsr nobetuwok'o Krstos Iyesus weeron aaniyi azeets Ik'i aztswots noone.
EPH 2:11 Mansh eshe, bal it shwewon Ik'i ash woterawwotsi it teshtsok'o, Ayhdiwots ash kishon gofo boamtsosh it'fetst itsh gof amawwotsi ett boc'ashfok'o,
EPH 2:12 it Israe'el ashuwotsnton gonke deshawwots, Ik'o bí ashuwotssh b́jangitswtsats need'iyets aap'i taarwotssho ib wottswots, datsanatsnowere it jangiru ik keewalonat Ik'alon beyirwots, manorowere Krstosatse wokat it teshtsok'o gawde'ere.
EPH 2:13 Andmó it haniyere shin wokat teshtswots Krstos Iyesusn wotdek'at b́s'atson t'inrte.
EPH 2:14 Noon k'ált teshtso fayi girgido b́meetson gáákt Ayhdiwotsnat Ik'i ash woterawwotsn ik woshtso nojeeno Krstosiye.
EPH 2:15 Git jirmanotsitse bínton ikwotitwo ik handr asho azosh Muse nemi tzaziyonat b́ niwwotsi gaakt jeeno b́woshi.
EPH 2:16 Mask'aliyatse k'irtnwere s'aaleyar beyo k'aaúbazre, gitetswtsnowere ik atso woshdek't Ik'onton maniree.
EPH 2:17 Waatnwere, wokat teshtswotssh itnat karnt teshts ayhudiwotsshowere jeen dooshiy aap'o nabre.
EPH 2:18 Bíyatse tuutson no gitetswor ik shayiron jisheyr nihok t'inetwone.
EPH 2:19 Mansh eshe it S'ayinwotsnton ik datsi ashuwotsnat Ik'i maa ashuwots itna bako haniyere okoon ibonat ashdatsi ashuwots itnaliye.
EPH 2:20 Woshetswotsnat nebiywotsn need'itsats agerte, ageyiru maamansh tungúshatse shutswotse kaatsde detset shúts kup'o Iyesus Krstosiye.
EPH 2:21 Maa eenmanu b́ jamon bín ikok desheyarr doonzo S'ayin Ik' moo wotarr eenetwe.
EPH 2:22 Ik'o b́ shayiron bíts b́ beet moo wotosh itwere Krstosn tohaar ageetute.
EPH 3:1 Itsh Ik' ash wotserawwotssha etaatni taa P'awlos Krstos Iyesussh tipetso t woti.
EPH 3:2 Itsh t sheengshitwok'o Ik'o b́ s'aaton fini gowo taash b́ imtsok'o arikon shishrte.
EPH 3:3 Bal k'awnon itsh t guut'etsok'o Ik'o ááshts man taash k'eshdek't kitsre.
EPH 3:4 Itsh t guut'tsan it nababor Krstosko ááshts keewo taa t t'iwintstsok'o danosh falfte.
EPH 3:5 Ááshts keewanwere Ik' shayiron S'ayin woshetswotsnat nebiyiwotssh and b́ be'etsok'on beshts dúrwotsatse teshts ashuwotssh be'eratse.
EPH 3:6 Manwere b́ kitsir Ik' ash woterawwots ayhudiyotsnton b́ rstiyo naatetuwotsnat ik atsi kaywotsi wotar Ik'o b́ imts jangosh dooshishi weeron Krstos Iyesusnton kayitwotsi bo wottsoniye.
EPH 3:7 Ik'o b́ angi finon taash b́ imts s'aaton taawere doo shishiyansh finru guutso wotere.
EPH 3:8 Taa S'ayin wotts jamwotsiyere t múk'iyaloru dab́ daar deshaw Krstos gaalo manwere doo shishiyo Ik' ash woterawwotssh t shishiish Ik' s'aato taash b́ imi.
EPH 3:9 Mank'o beshts dur jamwotsatse jam azts Ik'on ááshat teshts Ik'o b́ beeztso eeg b́ wotok'o jamosh t kitsitwok'o s'aato taash imere.
EPH 3:10 Manwere b́ wot and dúranatse Ik' maa weeron daaratse fa'a alirwotsnat naashwotsn Ik' dan teleefo bí ar arok'on bo danetwok'owe.
EPH 3:11 Ik'o no doonz Krstos Iyesusn han findek't b́s'eents dúre dúrosh b́ k'úmtsok'one.
EPH 3:12 Krstosk no wottsonat bín no amantsosh Ik' shinatse ááwu shúk'onat imneityon t'inosh falfone.
EPH 3:13 Taa it jangosh t dek'iru gond bek'o it mangoshee b́ wotiti, mansh t gond bek'i jangatse tuutson it ango b́neferawok'owa etaat itn k'onirwe.
EPH 3:14 Eshe Ik'o Niho shinats t gubron tuk'umalde'k'aat Ik'o t k'onir han jangoshe.
EPH 3:15 Daronat datsatse fa'a ik ik maa asho koni b́ wottsok'o b́ daatsit Ik'okne.
EPH 3:16 Ik'o it gitsitsi atso kúp'shit ango b́ shayiri weeron b́ mangi gaalon b́ imetwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
EPH 3:17 Mank'owere Krstos imnetiyon it nibots b́ betwok'onat itwere s'ap'ar shunon kúp' it wotitwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
EPH 3:18 Ando aani Krstos shuno b́ gaawnonat b́ genzon, danmban b́ tuwonat dashan b́ gop'on, awúk'o b́ wotok'o S'ayin jamwotsnton s'eenon t'iwintso falr,
EPH 3:19 ash danoniyere bog wotts Krstos shuno it danetwok'o Ik'o b́ s'een jamon s'eenosh it bodetwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
EPH 3:20 Eshe mansh noyitse finirwo bí'angi weeron nok'onirwonat nogawirwoniyere danmb ayide'er bogshde k'alo falitwo Ik'o Izar Izewer,
EPH 3:21 bísh Ik'i moonat Krstos Iyesusn dúr jamon dúre dúrosh mango wotowe!, Amen.
EPH 4:1 Eshe doonzosh t fintsosh tipeets wottso taa, it s'eegets s'eegosh geyik wotts beewon it beetwok'o itn k'onirwe.
EPH 4:2 Shunon it took tookon k'amefetsr tooko dashan detson maac' nefonat faleyon beewere,.
EPH 4:3 Jeenon it atsatseyo deshede'er Ik' shayirotse daatseyiru ik woto kotosh kúp'owere.
EPH 4:4 It s'eegeyor ik jángosh it s'eegetsok'o ik atsonat ik shayiro fa'ee.
EPH 4:5 Aaninuwere doonz iko, imneti ikonat gup iko fa'ee.
EPH 4:6 Dabnwere jamoniyere damb wottso, jamotse wotde finitwo, jamotse beetwo, jamosh nih wottso ik Ik'o Izar Izewer fa'ee.
EPH 4:7 Ernmó Krstos imosh bí ettsok'o bodtso no took tookosh s'aati imo noosh imere.
EPH 4:8 Mansh S'ayin mas'afotsere, «Damb b́keshor mus'o mus'dek'tni bí'ami, Ashuwotsshowere imuwotsi b́ imi» eteetsok'owiye.
EPH 4:9 Beree «Dambaan b́ keshi» etiru aap'an shini shin datso maants, datsotsnoru ayidek't dashan wotts beyok b́ ot'tsoni bako k'osho eebi b́ kitsiri?
EPH 4:10 Dashan ot'tsanwere bí jamo s'eenosh dar jamoniyere damb keshtsoniye.
EPH 4:11 Bíwere ik ikwotsi wosheetso, ik ikwotsi bek'etswotsi, ik ikwotsi doo shishiyo nabitwotsi, ik ikwotsi amantsuwotsi jinetwotsi, ik ikwots danitwotsi bowotitwok'o imuwotsi boosh b́ imi.
EPH 4:12 Hanowere b́ k'al amantswotsi kirstani finosh k'anir Krstos ats wotts Ik' moowu bi agetuwok'owe.
EPH 4:13 Ando Ik' na'o danon imnetiyon daatseyiru ik wotok bodroone, Krstos s'ayinonat s'een b́ wottsok'o noowere ik wotde s'een asho no wotitwok'owe.
EPH 4:14 Haniyere okoon ashuwots gondonat ant'elcosh k'andek'ts dani jongonat aats fundon hake bako gifnide'er daamet nanaúwotskok'o woteratsone.
EPH 4:15 Dab maniyere aro shunon keewfetsr jam keewon took wottso Krstos maants eenetwone.
EPH 4:16 K'osh k'osh atsi kaywots bodesh Krstosne, ats jamonwere ikok b́ deshee shas'wotsne, eshe ik ik atsi kayo bísh eteets fin sheengshde'er b́ finor ats jamo bí eneti, shunonowere b́ kup'iti.
EPH 4:17 Haniyakon, k'awntsalkeew gawirw Ik' ash woterawwotskok'o beek'ayere etaat doonzo shútson it tooko kor it dek'etwok'o itsh keewre,
EPH 4:18 Bo asaabiyo t'aluwtskee, bodaronat bo k'elikúp'i jangosh Ik'o boosh bí imts beyatse k'alernee.
EPH 4:19 Jitso bot'ut'tsosh kim jamo k'alosh bo tewnirwotse botoko meets tewunosh beshidek't imrne.
EPH 4:20 Itmó Krstos jango hank'owaliye it dani,
EPH 4:21 Arikon b́ jango shishrte, aronwere Iyesusitse b́ fa'ok'o bín danrte,
EPH 4:22 Mansh antelchde'er morro maants jishit Woteraw tewno shini bín it beyiru nat wotts it azeets doyo okaan juu bayere.
EPH 4:23 It nibonat asaabiyon b́ jamon handr wotowe,
EPH 4:24 Arik wotts kááwonat S'ayinon Ik' arok'on azeetso handr atso tahade'ere.
EPH 4:25 Eshe kooto keewk'ayere, no jamets ik atsi kaywotsi no wottsotse no ats atsewo ari keewo keewwone.
EPH 4:26 Fayore! it fayonomo morro fink'ayere, it fayetsok'on it befere aawo ilk'aye.
EPH 4:27 Dablossh b́ kindit fúro imk'ayere.
EPH 4:28 Ump'irwo haniyak úmp'k'aye, dab kic'tswotssh b́ imish gizo b́ daatsitwok'o b́ kishon sheeng fino finowe.
EPH 4:29 B́ jamon it nonotse woteraw keewo keshk'aye, maniyere dab shishetwotsi geneúshitwonat kup'shosh wotitu keewo ashuwotssh keewwere.
EPH 4:30 It kashts aawo b́ kiitstwok'o wotitwo it ats jot'ets Ik' S'ayin Shayiro shiyanik'ayere.
EPH 4:31 S'aam woto, nib k'úno, fayo, kúúho, c'ashonat kon naari gond jamo it atsere okaan wokowe.
EPH 4:32 Maniyere it ats atseyosh doowwotsnat maac' nefwotsn, shiyanitwotsnat imetwotsi wotoore, Ik'o Krstosn it morro itsh orowe bí ettsok'o it were it atsatsewosh orowe erre.
EPH 5:1 Haniyere okoon shuneets nanaúotskok'o itwere Ik' shuuts sha'irwotsi wotoore,
EPH 5:2 Krstos noon b́ shuntsok'onat Ik'o geneúshit sheeng sháák' detsts imonat wosho woshdek't b́ kasho noosh beshidek't b́ imtsok'o itwere shunon beewere,.
EPH 5:3 Han naari keewan Krstiyaniyosh b́ geyirawotse wido wee kon naari kiimo wee jaalo itokere shishek'aye.
EPH 5:4 Maniyere dab Ik'osh udo t'intswere bako iritwonat dárts ash keewo, wee aatsni keewu keewo itesh woteratse, hank'o keewan itsh geyiratse.
EPH 5:5 Gobetso b́ witiyal, kon naari kim fin finiruwo b́ wotiyal, wee woteraw Ik'o ik'iyok'o wotts jaalo b́ wotiyal, Krstosnat Ik' mengstotse bano b́ dashawok'o dande'ere.
EPH 5:6 Keewanotsatse tuutson aleraw ashuwotsats Ik' fayo b́ wetwotse konwor woteraw keewon itn ant'elck'aye.
EPH 5:7 Mansh aleraw ashuwotsnton ik wotk'ayere,
EPH 5:8 Yoots it t'alwwotsiye it teshi, andomo doonzok it wotsosh sháán itne mansh sháánon beyiru ashuwotskok'o sha'ore.
EPH 5:9 Doo jamo, kááwonat ari shuwo b́ daatset shááanokne.
EPH 5:10 Mansh doonzo geneúshit keewo eeg b́ wotok'o p'ec'ar s'iilere.
EPH 5:11 Shuu deshaw t'alwi finonton ik wotk'ayere maniyere shááno maants kishde'er kitswere.
EPH 5:12 T'alwotse beyiru ashuwots ááshon bok'aliru keewo keewonwor dab jiitsike.
EPH 5:13 Jam keewo shááno maants b́ woor eeg b́ arok'o shiratsne b́ be'eti.
EPH 5:14 Shiratse be'eyiru jamo shááne, mansh, «Nee tokrirwono tuuwe! k'irtswotsitse galeyar tuuwe! Krstoswere neesh c'eeshitwe» eteere.
EPH 5:15 Eshe aawk'o it beyirwok'o t'iwintsde'ere dan teleef danetswotsk'owa bako danteleef deshawwotskok'o beek'ayere.
EPH 5:16 Dúran gond b́ wottsotse itsh imets aawo b́ besheraniyere bín finore.
EPH 5:17 Mansh doonzo shuno eeg b́ wotok'o t'iwintswere bako dartswotsi wotk'ayere.
EPH 5:18 T'afiyo maants itn b́ dametwotse woyiniyon dutsets bíron mashk'ayere, maniyere S'ayin Shayiron s'eenere.
EPH 5:19 Duubonat udon, Shayiri jááwonowere it ats atsewo keewewere, it maac'otse kishde jááwar duwr doonzo udoore.
EPH 5:20 Jam keewosh no doonzo Iyesus Krstos shútson jam aawo Ik'o Niho udoore.
EPH 5:21 Krstos mangosha err ititsere iko ikosh alewee.
EPH 5:22 Máátswotso! doonzo Iyesussh it aleyrwok'o it kenih kenihosh alewere,
EPH 5:23 Krstos bí ats wotts Ik' mowush took'onat bin kashitwo b́wottsok'o kenihonwere b́ máátsush tooke.
EPH 5:24 Ik' moow Krstossh bi aleyirwok'o máátswots jam keewon bo kenihosh alewne.
EPH 5:25 Kenihwotso! Krstos Ik' moowu b́ shuntsok'onat b́ tooko bish beshidek't b́ imtsok'o itwere it máátswotsi shunere,
EPH 5:26 Krstos han b́ k'al Ik' moow S'ayintsosh geeyatniye, b́ S'ayintswere b́ aap'iweeron aatson mashdek'tniye.
EPH 5:27 Hank'on kiimo wee shiits aak'o wee han arts k'osh gond keewo biyatse b́ datserawo S'ayinat biyatse eeg eeg deshaw sheeng woshdek'tniye b́ maants b́ t'intsi.
EPH 5:28 Eshe kenihwots bo tooko boshunirwok'o bo mááts máátso shunne, b́ máátsu shunirwo b́ tooke b́ shuniri.
EPH 5:29 B́ took atso shit'etwo konwor aaliye, dab Krstos Ik' moosh b́ k'alirwok'o b́ manziti, b́ dugniti.
EPH 5:30 Noowere Krstos atsi kaywots noone,
EPH 5:31 «Hank'on asho b́ nihinat bíndn k'ayir b́ máátswats b́ deeshiti, gitetswotswere ik atse bowotiti» eteere.
EPH 5:32 Ááshts keewanwere eene, hanowere t etir Krstosnat Ik' maats aridek'atniye.
EPH 5:33 Ernmó keewan itne b́ s'iliri, mansh keniho b́ máátsu b́ tookok'o woshde'er shune, máátsunwere b kenihi mangiwye.
EPH 6:1 Nana'úwotso! doonzo shinatse geyitk b́wottsotse it ind nihosh alewere.
EPH 6:2 «Nnihnat nindn mangiwe» etiru alo jangiyets aap'o bítse detsts shints tzaziyo haniye,
EPH 6:3 Han nk'aliyalowere «Jam keewo neesh kááwitwe, datsanatsnowere nkasho genzitwe.»
EPH 6:4 Itwere nihwotso! doonzo Iyesusn boosh niwo danifetsr, kiitsfetsr fayefetsr ditswere bako itnana'i nibo k'úni k'ayere.
EPH 6:5 Guutswotso! meetson itsh doonz wottswotssh shatonat k'ewon kéwewere, Krstossh it aleyirwok'o itnibi kááwon boosh alewere.
EPH 6:6 It aletwere Ik'i shuntso it nibon finiru Krstos guutswotskok'o wotde'erni bako asho geneúshosh be'ewosha err wotk'aye.
EPH 6:7 Ashosh b́woterawo doonzosh finirwotskok'o wotde'er it shunon shengshde'er finore.
EPH 6:8 Guutso wotowa nas' wotowa b́took tookon b́fiints sheeng finosh doonzoke b́ k'awntso dek'etk b́wottsok'o danfte.
EPH 6:9 Itwere doonzwotso! ash shiitso s'iilr boga bogshrawo itnat boonsh doonzo darotse b́beyirwok'o gawfetsr sheefo k'ayk'rar it guutswotssh sheengo k'alwere.
EPH 6:10 Eshe haniyere okoon doonzonat bí angi eenmann kup'ore,
EPH 6:11 Dabilos shoobi fino k'efo itfalitwok'o Ik' kes'i k'ac' jamo tahde'ere.
EPH 6:12 No kaareyo ashuwotsnton b́woterawo t'aluts dúranatse kewirwotsnton, naashwotsnat datsatsi angwotsnton man etonwere darwotsitse fa'a kim shayirwotsntoniye.
EPH 6:13 Eshe gond aawots t'alati ango k'efo it falitwok'onat jametswotsi b́jamon ishr kup'ar need'o it falitwok'o Ik'o kes'i k'ac' jamó k'aa'úde'ere!
EPH 6:14 Eshe haniyak arikeewo znaarok'o it gebaats edde'er, kááw wotono t'ururiyok'o tahade'er,
EPH 6:15 C'aamo geddek'ts wotadarok' jeeni doo shishiyo itdek'tso nabosh k'ande'er need'ore.
EPH 6:16 Jamaniyre danbono taw lalwok'o aat'efre sha'iru diyablos gin jamwotsi bín t'afiyosh it falitwo imnetiyo geepok'o k'aa'úde'ere.
EPH 6:17 Kash daatsonowere tookats gerdek'ef k'uriya eteetsok'o it tookats gup'sh de'ere, iknwere S'ayin shayiratse daatset shiki gorado bíwere Ik'o aap'etso deshde'ere.
EPH 6:18 Uni aawo S'ayin shayiron jishefetsr Ik' k'onon t'intswere. Mank'oon Ik'o S'ayints b́ dek'ts ashuwotssh it baterawon kup'ar Ik'o k'onwere.
EPH 6:19 Dooshishiko ááshts keewo shatalon kishde'er t keewor geyit aap'o keewosh t falituwok'o taashowere Ik'o k'onwere.
EPH 6:20 Andoor habiliyon tipeyat dooshiyansh woshek taane, mansh ááw shuk'on tkeewitwok'o taash Ik'o k'onwere.
EPH 6:21 Shuneets eshwonat doonzo Iyesus finatsnowere amanets guutso wottso Tikik'os t jango aawk'o b́wottsok'onat eeg t finirwok'o jam keewo itdanetwok'o itsh keewitwe.
EPH 6:22 Mansh noo aawk'o nowottsok'o itdanetwok'o aaninwere itnoor b́kup'shitwok'owa etaat bín it maants woshere.
EPH 6:23 Ik'o nihonat doonzo Iyesus Krstos jeenonat shunon imnetiyonton eshwotssh wotowe.
EPH 6:24 K'ut'eraw shunon no doonz Iyesus Krstosi shunts jamwotssh s'aato wotowe.
PHI 1:1 Krstos Iyesus guuts wottsuwots P'awlosnat T'imitiyosoke, Flp'isyos kitotse beyiru Krstos Iyesusn S'ayn wotts jamwotssh, Ik' maa eenashwotsnat diyak'oniyotsnsh.
PHI 1:2 Nonih Ik'oknat no doonzo Krstos Iyesusoki s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
PHI 1:3 Iti tgawi taawo jam aawo Izar Izeweri udirwe,
PHI 1:4 It jamets jangoshowere Ik'o tk'oni taawu jamo Ik' tk'ono gene'on s'eenke.
PHI 1:5 Shints aawortson dek't b́tutson andish b́borfetsosh dooshishiyo nabfetsr t fino tep'iruwotsi it wottsotse Ik'o udiruwe,
PHI 1:6 Fini sheengo ititse dek't tuutso Izar Izewer, Krstos Iyesus angshosh aanar b́ weet aawots s'uwomaants b́betsituwok'osh arikon danfee.
PHI 1:7 And tipimootse tbeyanoronat ttpeftsere shin doo shishi fini aroosh mooyr bínowere kup'iyosh Ik'o b́ s'aaton b́imts gowosh it únetswor biyatse kayituwotsi it wottsotse it jam aawo t nibots itne. Manshowere it jangosh taash shiyeyiruwo arikee.
PHI 1:8 Krstos Iyesus shunon it únetsnoor awuk'o tgawiruwok'owosh tgawo Ik'oniye.
PHI 1:9 It shuno danonat t'iwintson s'eenk wotarr eenfere bíametwok'o Ik'o k'oniruwe.
PHI 1:10 Manuwere k'ants keewo p'ec'ar danr Krstos aanar b́weet aawots s'ayinwotsnat eeg eego boatse daatserawuwotsi wotarr it datsetuwok'oye.
PHI 1:11 Mank'oon it beyon Iyesus Krstosoke daatset kaawi shuwon s'eentso wotaarr Ik'osh mangonat udon datsiyituwotsi wotitute.
PHI 1:12 Tieshuwotso! tiats bodts keewu jamo dooshishiyo iki b́gawnetwok'o b́wooshtsok'o danitdek'o shunfee.
PHI 1:13 Taa ttipe Krstos jangosh b́wottsok'owo Ron datsi nugúsi maa kotiruwotsnat manoke fa'a ash jametswots danfnee.
PHI 1:14 Taa ttipetsatse tuutson amants eshu eshwotsitse ayuwots iki bogshdek't doonozo amantsuwotsi woternee, mansh Ik'o aap'tso shatalon shishiyosh shintsoniyere iki bogts ááwu shuuk'o daatsrne.
PHI 1:15 Wotówa eré ik ikuwots Krstosi bo nabír okooronat nokoreyi shayirone, k'oshuwotsmó Krstosi bo nabir níb s'aayinone.
PHI 1:16 Hanots Krstosi bo nabir bo took shunatse tuutsone, boowere taa doo shishiyosh tdetsts mooshatse tuutson hanoke juwetso twottsok'o bodantsoshe.
PHI 1:17 Ekewotsmó Krstos jango k'uuridek't nabiruwots maac' s'ayinon b́woterawon botook shunonat ttipeyatse iki bogts kic'o tiats doosh gawttiniye.
PHI 1:18 Han wotowa ekeewi wotowa taa geneeúwe tgeeneúwiti, ariyon wotowa arikon wotowa jam werindon Krstosi nabetuwe.
PHI 1:19 K'osho taan gene'úshiruwo it Ik'o itk'onirwonat Iyesus Krstos shayiri tep'oon s'ayinr tkeshetwok'o tdantsotsne.
PHI 1:20 B́ jamon tjitserawok'o jangatniye tkotiri, ernmó úni aawo tk'aliruwok'onat hambets kashon t beyal wee t k'iriyal Krstos tiatsotse mangituwe etaat ááwushuk'on keewiruwe.
PHI 1:21 Mansha taash beya eto Krstosn beewoniye, k'ira etoonwere oot'o biitse daatset keewe.
PHI 1:22 Ernmó t atsi metsanaton dabr t beyetka wotink'e shuu daatsitfino finere etee, b́wotiyaloru dabr beyonat k'irotse ááwi galtdek'etwok'owo danatse.
PHI 1:23 Git hasabiyanots dagots detsewtsere, hank'o beyanitse k'aleyar Krstosnton woto geefe, manuwere Krstosnton beyo taash ayidek't k'ank b́wottsotsne.
PHI 1:24 K'osh weeron kashon t beyo itsh ayidek't geyike.
PHI 1:25 Mansh arikeewetsk taane, taa k'irraniye oorar it imnetiyo eenr bíere imnetiyon geneúo it daatsish it jametsnton t teshetwok'o danfee.
PHI 1:26 Taa aani itok twoor t jangosh it detsts it'o Iyesus Krstosn ayituwe.
PHI 1:27 Eshe jamoniyere bogo it beyotse Krstos doo shishiyo bíetirwok'on beewere,, hanuwere taa wáár itn t s'ilalo wee itoke twokiyal ik níbon kup'at it ned'tsonat doo shishiyo ik wotat betsosh it kaartsok'o shishirwe.
PHI 1:28 Itn k'efiruwotsi ik keewonoru shatk'ayere, it ááwu shuk'anwere boosh bot'afit milkt b́ wottsotse itshomó Ik'oke wotts it kashtsi milkte.
PHI 1:29 Krstosi aman mec'rosh b́ woterawo b́ jangoshowere gond bek'o it datsitwok'owe.
PHI 1:30 Eshe and itats bodiru gondbek'aan bali tiyats bodt teshtsoniye, andoor tiyats b́bodiru gond bek'o itshishirwoniye.
PHI 2:1 Krstosn itatso kup'idek'o itdetsal, b́shunoonowere t'eng dek'tsuwotsi it wotiyal, S'ayin shayironontonuwere ik woto detsfte wotiyal, it atsatsewoshowere doowonat maac'k'ewon kitsirute wotiyal,
PHI 2:2 eshe ik hasabyon, ik shunon, ik Shayiron, ik finosh towaar need'on tgeneeúo s'eenk b́wotituwok'o k'aluwere.
PHI 2:3 Tooko dashan detson s'eenr k'osh ashuwots ityere bok'antsok'o taawwere bako took shunon wee «Taayere oko kone fa'oni» err it'on eegonor ik keewo k'alk'ayere.
PHI 2:4 Mank'owere ik iko b́ tookosh wotit keewu mec'ro b́woterawo k'osh ashosh wotit keewo shiyanowe.
PHI 2:5 Mank'oon it s'iil s'iilo Krstos Iyesuskonton ik woto geyife.
PHI 2:6 Bí jam aawo Ik' doyo detsfe. Ernmó Ik'onton bín taal woshituwo Ik'onton taal woto angnon deshde tesho geeratse.
PHI 2:7 Dab b́ detsts mang jamo k'azt Guuts areyat be'ere Ash aronowere daatsere, asho aratnuwere be'ere,
PHI 2:8 Bí b́ tooko dashane b́ detsi, K'irosh b́ borfetso Manúwor dab mask'aliyatse jiteyar b́ k'irfetso aletso b́ woti.
PHI 2:9 Hanatse tuutson Ik'o jamoniyere dambe fa'a Mang beyok dambaan bín b́ woshi Shúts jamoniyere bog shútso bísh b́ imi.
PHI 2:10 Mansh Iyesus shútsosh, Daronat datsatse, datsoniyere dashe fa'a jamo b́ gúbron tuk'umalitúne.
PHI 2:11 Bo alberonowere «Iyesus Krstos doonze» err gawar Ik'o nihosh mango imetune.
PHI 2:12 T mashotso! taa itnton t beyor jam aawo aleyirwotsi it teshtsok'o, ando itatse t wokor iki bogshdek't aleyirwotsi it wotituwok'o itsh gawituwe, mansh it ik ikets it kashtsok'o s'ayintsde'er kitsosh shatonat mangon kup'arr finore.
PHI 2:13 Bín ge'eúshosh it shashwitok'o k'alr bísh it aletwok'o ititse bede finitwo Ik'oniye.
PHI 2:14 Kon naari fino it finor mumudk'ayere weyinmó weed'ek'ayere.
PHI 2:15 Han b́wotiyalo k'uuronat gond s'oot'anots dagotse jitsitsonnat k'efoon boatse deshaw s'ayin wotts Ik'i nana'úwotsi wotaarr datsanatse k'eenwotskok'o c'eeshitute.
PHI 2:16 Hanuwere b́ wotit kash daatsit aap'man it need'iraniyere t'engider deshdek'one, mank'oon t wos'onu wotowa t fino k'awuntsalo b́ orerawotse Krstos aanar b́ woor bín t it'et keewo detsfe etee.
PHI 2:17 Ik'osh imnetiyon it t'intsiru woshonat finats tkasho dabeyar wosho wotar b́kuud'ink'ere taash genee'ue, it unetsntonwere geneeúiyank'ee.
PHI 2:18 Mank'o it geneúar itere taawere itgene'o kaytdek'etwok'o woshituute.
PHI 2:19 Taa it jango shiyir tkup'itwok'o T'imotiwosi kááron it maants woshosh taan b́faliyituwok'o doonzo Iyesusn jangirwe.
PHI 2:20 It jango b́ nibon gawiruwo T'imotiwosiyere oko k'osh asho deshatse.
PHI 2:21 K'oshuwotsmó botook oot' mec'ree bogishiri bako Iyesus Krstos finosh kis'o deshatsne.
PHI 2:22 T'imotiwos, amanek b́woto fadbek't bísh gawetso b́wotonat taantonuwere na'o nihonton b́fiinefok'o ikwotdek' dooshishiyo bífinefok'o it it tookon danfte.
PHI 2:23 Mansha t jango eewk b́bodetwok'owo dantdek'iyakon T'imotiyosi kááron it maants woshosh jangirwe.
PHI 2:24 Dabnwor taa ttookon káári it maants wosh tfalituwok'o doonzo taan tep'etwe etaat amaniruwe.
PHI 2:25 Mank'owere taan geyit keewujamoon b́tep'etuwok'o woshaat it teshtso tieeshuwi Ep'afroditusi itok wosho geyik bíwotok'o daatsre. Bí taanton matsedk'ts kes'i ashonat fini tooh wotat finefetst teshke.
PHI 2:26 Bínowere itok twoshir it jametsi bek'osh b́ tewuntsok'onat it were b́ shodo it shishtsatse tuutson bí b́ kic'iruwoshe.
PHI 2:27 Arikon bíye ayidek't shodt k'irosh bodre b́ teshi, ernmó Ik'o bísh maac'o k'ewere, b́ s'uzsh b́ woterawo shiyanats aani shiyano b́ daberawok'o taashowere maac'o k'ewere.
PHI 2:28 Mansh it bín be'er it geneúwituwok'onat tshiyanonuwere b́ keetituwok'o bín itok woshosh ayidek'at tgeyi.
PHI 2:29 Eshe doonzon amants b́ wottsosh gene'on bín de'ere, bínk'o wotts ash jamwotsno mangiwere.
PHI 2:30 It karnoke datseyar taash k'alosh it falawu tep'o bí s'entsosha ett Krstos fino s'eentsosh dab b́ kasho b́oorerawo k'irosh t'inre b́ teshi.
PHI 3:1 S'uwaatsnowere t eshuwotso! doonzon gene'ore, haniyere shini itsh t guut'tsman aani gitlo tguut'al taan taahiratse, itnomó it sheelawok' kotosh falituwe.
PHI 3:2 Kankok'o hano hano kanzon gond finiruwotsatse it atso korde'ere, meets k'út'iruwotsatse (gof damiruwotsatse) it atso korde'ere.
PHI 3:3 Noo Ik'o Shayiro ik'iyirwotsnat uratse beyiru niwon b́ woterawo Krstos Iyesus s'uzn noit'irwosh arikon gofo amrone.
PHI 3:4 It'o taash b́geyink'ere taa bín ti it'et ay keewo fa'e b́shi, uratse be'eyiru niwon it'et asho fa'e wotiyal taa bíyere bogo bín ti it'et keewo detsfe.
PHI 3:5 Taa t shuwetsi shmtl aawone gofo ti ami, t shuweyono Bniyam naar wotts Esra'el ash taane, hanatse tuutson s'ayin wottso Ibrawi ash taane, Ayhudi nemo kotonowere feresawi taane.
PHI 3:6 Eshe yoots nemosha etaat okooronowere Ik'i mootse amantsuwotsi t giishatniye tteshi. Nemo koton kááwonowere ik jago tiatse datserawona tbeefo b́tesh.
PHI 3:7 Eshe haniyere shin ot'etske etaat boats tiamaniru keewu jamwotsi Krstos jangosha etaat k'awunts deshaw Woteraw keewok'o woshdek'at boon taawirwe.
PHI 3:8 Maniyere okoon t doonz Krstos Iyesusi danoniyere bogo k'osho ik keewonwor bíaalok'owo tiamantsotse jam keewo oot'o b́ deshawok'o woshdek' taawirwe, b́ jangatse tuutson jam keewo t'ut're. Krstosnowere datsosha etaat jamkeewo maa fokets shotok'o taawuree.
PHI 3:9 Mantk'alir eegishe eteyal nemats need'iyetso t took kááwo k'ayk'rar imnetiyats need'iyetso Ik'iko kááwo Krstosi amanon daatsr bíntonuwere wotooshe.
PHI 3:10 K'oshonuwere eegishe Krstosnat Krstos k'irotse b́tuwi ango danoshe, b́ gondbek'o kaytsi wotaarr b́ k'iroonowere bín arooshe.
PHI 3:11 Mank'onowore t k'iriyakon tuur dúre dúrosh kashon t beetuewk'o amanirwe.
PHI 3:12 Jaman and daatsafa'ee, weemó jamann s'eenre eto falratse, wotowa eree shlmatiyo dek'osh shinomaants wos'on kup'irwe, manshe Krstos Iyesus taan detsb́dek'i.
PHI 3:13 T eshuwotso! hniya biyok t bodtsok'o woshde'er taawatse, ernmó ik keewo k'alituwe, bíwere t shuutsmaande beyiruwo bataar t shinatse beyiruwo detsosh kup'ituwe.
PHI 3:14 Shlmatiyo daatsosh t shinatse beyiru k'os'ok bodosh wos'etuwe, shlmatiyanowere Ik'o Krstos Iyesus weeron dambaan s'ede'r b́ imet kashoniye.
PHI 3:15 Eshe shayiri beyon katsts jamwots han arts asaabiyo detso noosh geyituwe, it k'osh k'oshi hasabiyo it dagotse b́ beyal hasabiyan Ik'o itsh kishde'er kitsituwe.
PHI 3:16 Han wotowa ekeewi wotowa and no bodts shayiri beyonton manuts wotowe.
PHI 3:17 Ti eshuwotso! taan araar tshuutso sha'on ikwotore, noon aroosh no shuuts shairwotsi nibnde'er s'iilere.
PHI 3:18 Haniyere shin ayoto itsh tkeewtsok'onat andoru ti aac'uwo kuut'fetsat itsh tkeewiru jamok'o ayuwots bosha'a sha'on Krstos jitewosh balangarwotsi woterne.
PHI 3:19 Bosh bo Ik'o bomaac'oniye, bíyats tuutson boon jitsit keewone boi'it'iri, botewnonwere datsatsi keewe, mansh bokeewi s'uwo t'afe.
PHI 3:20 Noomó dari mengsit ash noone, manoknowere waar kashituwo no doonz Iyesus Krstosi tewunon kotirwone.
PHI 3:21 Bíwere ketts no atsan woniyiri b́ mangi atso bíarituwok'o woshituwe, hanuwere b́ k'alit jamo b́ ali shirots woshosh faliyit angone.
PHI 4:1 It tshuniirwotsnat tmiraac'iruwotso tgene'eúwonat tfiini mangi akliliwotsi wotts tieshuwotso! doonzo ats kup'de'er beewere.
PHI 4:2 Ewodiyanat Sent'ikin boatsatsewo doonzoton ik wotde'er bobetwok'o boon k'onirwe.
PHI 4:3 Neewere manoke fa'o amanets taanton finiruwo ttohono, máátsanotsi n tep'etwok'o neen k'onirwe, máátsanots taanton K'elemnt'osnat bo shútso kashi mas'aafats guut'ets k'osh k'osh bo fini tohuwotsnton wotat doo shishiyo jamok betsosh kaarerne.
PHI 4:4 Jam aawo doonzon gene'owere, ando aani «Gene'owere!» etirwe.
PHI 4:5 Sheeng ash it woto ash jamoke daneek wotowe, doonzo karnee,
PHI 4:6 mansh jam keewo Ik' k'onon, k'oonat udon Ik'osh t'intsuwere bako egoshoru kic'k'ayere.
PHI 4:7 Asho gaw b́ falitwoniyere bog wotts Ik' jeeno it nibonat it asaabiyon Iyesus Krstosn koteetuwe.
PHI 4:8 S'uwaatsnowere t eshuwotso! arikon, mango, kááwo, s'ayino, geneushituwonat udituu wotts keewu jamwotsi gawwere. It asaabiyo jamanotsiyere bogtsonat udiyit keewwotsn s'eenk wotowe.
PHI 4:9 Tiyokere it dantsonat it dek'tso, it shishtsonat it bek'ts jamo k'aluwere, jeenik wottso Izar Izewer itnton wotituwe.
PHI 4:10 It ja'iyak ando aani tkic'osh shiyano dek'at it tuutsotse doonzon ayidek'atniye t gene'úwi, han tietirwere itmaac' gawiruwo finats jiitsosh wotit gowo datsrafa'ate eta bako tkic'o gawo k'azrte etishaliye.
PHI 4:11 Aaninuwere hantietir t beyosh wotit keewo tt'ut'tsoshaliye, taahe «Tdetstso taash bodfe» eto dandek're.
PHI 4:12 Mansh daatsonowere wotowa t'ut'ono danfee, konoki beyokna wotowa jam gizeyon woronat k'ak'on, daatsonat t'ut'on aashts keewo dandek're.
PHI 4:13 Ang taash imetuwo Krstosn jam keewo k'alo falituwe.
PHI 4:14 Wotowa eree it t kic'o kayitsuwotsi wotat it daatsetsotse sheenge it k'ali.
PHI 4:15 Haniyere okoon dooshishiyo nabosh dek' tuuts gizewon Mek'odoniyon t woor it Filp'syusn fa'a amantsuwotsiyere okoon imon wotowa dek'on taanton ik wottso k'osh Ik' moo bí altsok'o it it tookon danfte.
PHI 4:16 Tesolok'en k'ic'o tiyats b́ bodtsok'o dandek'at aani taash geyituwo it deyiyi.
PHI 4:17 Hanowere ti eton it imo daatsosh k'awutatni b́ woterawo it imi shuwo itsh b́ ayituwok'o tewunatniye.
PHI 4:18 Taash b́ geyitsok'onat taash b́ geyitsoniyere bogshdek'at taash it deyits imo Ep'afroditus kishatse dek're, it imanuwere sheeng shaak'o detsts woshok'o Ik'o b́ dek'etuwonat bín b́ geneúwitwoniye.
PHI 4:19 Mansh tiko Izar Izewer b́ mangi gaalon Krstos Iyesus weeron itsh geyts jamo ime.
PHI 4:20 No nihinat noko Izar Izewersh dúre dúrosh mango wotowe, Amen.
PHI 4:21 Amants jamwotssh Krstos Iyesusn jamo t'intsuwere, taanton beyiru eshuwotswere jamo itsh deyirne.
PHI 4:22 K'osh amants jamwots bitsnowere Rom naashi naasho miyitsi ash wottsuwots jamo itsh t'intsune.
PHI 4:23 Doonzo Iyesus Krstos s'aato it shayironton wotowe.
COL 1:1 Ik' shunon Krstos Iyesush wosheets wottso P'awlosn at no eshu T'imotiyosoke.
COL 1:2 K'olasayasn beyiru Krstosn S'ayinonat amanek wotts amantsuwotssh. Ik'o no nihokere deeronat jeenon itsh wotowe.
COL 1:3 It jangosh Ik'o t k'onor nodoonz Iyesus Krstos nih Ik'o úni aawo údirwone.
COL 1:4 Krstos Iyesusn it detsts imnetiyonat amants jamwotssh it detsts shuno shishrone.
COL 1:5 Ari aap' wottso doo shishiyo shin shino itok b́bodor bítse fa'a jangeyirwo shishirute, mansh it imnetiyonat it shunon b́need' darotse k'aniyere itn kotirwo jangiyetsmanatsne.
COL 1:6 Dooshishiyan dats jamatse shwonat eenoke b́fa'oni mank'o it doo shishyo itk'ebiyakonat Ik'i s'aato arik b́wottsok'owo t'iwints itdek'iyak aawotstson it dagots finoke b́faoni.
COL 1:7 Hanowere no shegro Krstos guuts amanetso wottsonat noontonuwere towaat finirwo shuneetso Ep'afray itsh keewre.
COL 1:8 Mank'owere Ik'i Shayiron it atsatseyo it shunewo bí noosh keewre.
COL 1:9 Mansh han noshishts aawotstson tuwat Shayiri dani teleefon t'iwints jamo Ik'i shunon t'iwints itdek'etu s'eents dano it detsetwok'o itsh Ik' k'ono ned'iratsone.
COL 1:10 Mank'owere doonzosh wotts weeron beyarr b́ jamon bín it gene'ushitwok'o kon naari sheeng fino finon shuwo it shwitwok'onat Ik' danon eenfere it ametuwok'o Ik'o k'onituwe.
COL 1:11 Doonzo aydek' een wotts b́ kup'on itsh ang jamo ime, k'amoon jam keewo falon k'andek'tswotsi it wotitwok'o itn woshwe,
COL 1:12 dabnuere shááni mengstutse S'ayinwotsnton rstiyo it kayitwok'o itn betsts Ik'o niho gene'on údooere.
COL 1:13 Bíwere t'alwi angotse noon kashit shuneets naayo mengstots no kinditwok'o woshre.
COL 1:14 Bíínowere noo aaniyi keeweyat no morrosh orowe eto daatsrone.
COL 1:15 Krstos be'eraw Ik'osh bíariyoniye. Bí azeets jamoniyere k'aabe.
COL 1:16 Daronat datsatse fa'awots, be'eyirwonat be'eraw, daratsi angwotsnat keewirwotsno, naashwotsnat aliru jamwots bo azee bíne. Ik'o jam keewo bí az bín bíshe.
COL 1:17 Bí jam keewoniyere shine b́ teshi, jam keewo desheyat b́ need' bíne.
COL 1:18 Bí bí ats wotts Ik' moosh b tooke, jam keewon shntso b́ wotitwok'o, k'irotse tuwon shintsonat k'aaboniye.
COL 1:19 Han b́wotwere Ik'o Ik' b́woti s'eeno b́ naayn b́wotish Ik'o niho shuntso b́wottsotsne.
COL 1:20 Bínowere daron wotowa datsatse fa'a keewu jamwotsi b́ tookonton maniyo shunre, jitatse kud'ts b́naay s'atson jeeno b́woshi.
COL 1:21 Shin Ik'atse wokaatni it beefoni, it asaabiyona it gond finatse tuutson balangarwotsiye it teshi.
COL 1:22 Andmó S'ayinwotsnat eegonor s'amiyerawotsi, boatse eeg eeg daatserawotsi woshdek't b́shinats itn t'intsosh, b́ naay meetson b́ k'irtsosh, Ik'o b́tookonton itin b́ maniyi.
COL 1:23 Han b́ wotitwere bíyats need'dek'at matseyat bíko dooshishiyatse daatsosh jangiyets keewatse it giwrawo amanon kup'arr it beewor s'uziye, dooshishiyanwere it it shishtsonat datsatsere fa'a ashuwotssh nabetsoniye, taa P'awlos guutso twot dooshishiyanshe.
COL 1:24 And it jangatse tdek'iru gond bek'osh geneeúwirwe, bíats wotts Ik'i moowshowere Krstos gondbek'o kaydek'oonton taash shapitwo tmeetson s'eentsitwe.
COL 1:25 Ik'i aap'o s'eenon itsh kitsosh Ik'oke taash imets alok'oon Ik'i moosh fintso wotere.
COL 1:26 Ik'i aap'onwere beshts dúron shweets ash na'úwotssh ááshat teshtsonat andmó Ik'o bík S'ayinwotts jamwotssh b́kiitsts ááshat teshtsoniye.
COL 1:27 Ik'onwere bík S'ayinwotssh kitsosh b́geeyir hanoke fa'o ááshts mangi gaalo ititse Ik'i ashwoterawwots dagotse awuk'o bodts een b́wottsok'oniye, ááshtsanwere jangat nokotiru mang bín datsetu Krstos ititse b́ wotoniye.
COL 1:28 Asho ik ikon Krstosn bodtso b́wotitwok'o kaldek'at t'intsosh ash jamosh dani teleef jamon daniyat izon Krstos jango nabirwone.
COL 1:29 Ik'o bíeen angon tgitsotse b́ finirwotse angaann no keewtsán b́finetwok'o kup'dek'at maak'orefetsat shaatsirwe.
COL 2:1 It jangonat Lodok'itse fa'a ashuwots aaninwere t shiitso dab be'e danaw ash jamwotssh awuk'o bodts kup'ts kaaro t kariruwok'o itdanetwok'o shunfee.
COL 2:2 Mank'o tk'alirwere it nibo kup'de'er shunon desheyarr, s'eents t'iwints jamo oorshde'er Ik'oko ááshts keewo wottso Krstosi bodanetwok'owe.
COL 2:3 Dani teleefonat dani gaalon ááshat b́fa'o Krstosoke.
COL 2:4 Itsh han tietirwere konwor itn kooton b́dashrawok'owa etaatniye,
COL 2:5 Dab meetson it atse twokiyalor Shayiron itntoniye, sheeng niwon itbeyiruwok'on Krstosatse it detsts kup'ts imnetiyo bek'onowere geneúwiruwone.
COL 2:6 Doonzo Krstos Iyesusi it dek'tsok'on bín beewere,,
COL 2:7 Bíyats s'ap'arr ageyarr, dan itdek'tsok'on imnetiyon kup'ar beewere,, s'eenr orit údo t'intswere.
COL 2:8 Krstosats need'iyek b́woterawo datsanatsi daneets niwwats, k'awntsal kooton konworu itn deshb́de'awok'o it tooko korde'ere.
COL 2:9 Ik'o Ik' b́woti s'eeno atson be'eyat b́beyir s'eenon Krstosne.
COL 2:10 Itwere s'een kasho it daats alguronat aljami took wottso Krstosne.
COL 2:11 Bín it amantsosh gofo amrte, it gof amanwere morrets it meets doyo baziyosh Krstosn fiineka bako ash kishon fiinekaliye.
COL 2:12 It gupewor Krstosntoniye itdukeyi, bíntonowere k'irotse turte, k'irotse it tuwwere Krstosi k'irotse tuzts Ik'o angon it amantsotsne.
COL 2:13 Morro itfintsonat itmeetsi doyo gof am b́k'aztsatse tuutson k'irkitne it teshi, andmó Ik'o Krstosnton k'irrawwotsi iti woshre, no morr únoshowere oorowe etre.
COL 2:14 Bí noon k'efefetst noon s'aamifets teshets nemotse fa'a k'awntso guut'etso t'afibazre, jitats mismaron togdek't noatse k'aaúbazre.
COL 2:15 Kup'uwotsnat aletswotsn jitatse da'at bo edo b́ bítsiyakon da'etsuwotsi wotar sháánatse bo be'etuwok'o b́ woshi.
COL 2:16 Eshe móón wee ushon, Ik' aawu koton wee shaash taawur koton, wee sanbati aawu mangiy jangon konuworu itats angshk'aye.
COL 2:17 Jamanots shino maants weet keewwotssh c'ishok'one, aronmo b́ daatset Krstosne.
