COL 2:18 Woteraw b́ took dash detson melakiwtsi ik'iyon bogtaana etiru asho konworu k'awntsalo itn b́ orirawok'o it atso korde'ere, hank'o ashaan b́ bek'iru bek'osh kááwu taana eton woteraw meetsi asaabiyone b́ it'iri.
COL 2:19 Hank'o ashaan took wottso Krstosnton eegonoru gonkewo falratse, ats jamo gonkidek't shas'on deshit manzirwo tooke. Ik'o ats jamo b́ ditsir hank'one.
COL 2:20 Krstosnton k'irr datsanatsi daneets niwwotsatse b́ jamon galek it wotiyakon beré and datsanatse it galeraawok'o wotat eegishe hank'o tzaziyosh it keeweyir,
COL 2:21 tzaziyotswere «Detsk'aye, fadk'aye, t'awik'aye» etirwotsiye.
COL 2:22 Jamanots ash fints tzaziyonat danatse tuutson b́ wottsosh finats bojiniyakon t'afosh k'andek'́kne.
COL 2:23 Tzaziyanots bo took shunotse t'úp'keshts ik'iyonat woteraw b́ took dash detso, ats juwats b́ bogshituwotse dan telefetswotsiye boariri, ernmó bo meets tewuno kórdek'atse k'awntso deshawwotsiye.
COL 3:1 Krstosnton k'irotse it tuwiyakon eshe Krstos Ik'o k'ani aaromantse b́beeyirwoke dambe fa'a keewwotsi geyore.
COL 3:2 Uni aawo dambe fa'a keewwotsi gawwore bako datsatse fa'a keewwots jangosh shiyank'ayere.
COL 3:3 It k'iron k'alewok'ó k'alewon datsanatse k'alewtserte, it beyonwere Krstosnton Ik'ots aashwtsere.
COL 3:4 It kash wottso Krstos b́be'ewor itwere bínton mangon be'etute.
COL 3:5 Eshe mansh it gitsotse datsatsi beyi tewun jamo ud'uwere, boowere «Widona, kiimo, gusiyo, gond tewuno, Woteraw ik'uwotsi ik'iyok'o wotts tewno» manootsiye.
COL 3:6 Keewanotsatse tuutson aleraw ashuwotsats Ik'i fayo weetuwe.
COL 3:7 It woor haniyere shin it beyor keewanotsi finefetsatniye it teshi.
COL 3:8 Andmó fayo, nibk'úno, nemigondo, ash shúts t'afiyo, itatse wokiwere, jitsit keewonwere it nonotse keshk'aye.
COL 3:9 Natts doyo b́fiinonton kishde'k'at juu it k'rtsotse itatsatseyo kooto keewek'ayere.
COL 3:10 Aztso aro aron dano daatsosh andrefere ameetwo handr doyo tahdek'rtee.
COL 3:11 Hank'on Girik ashonat Ayhudi ashon, gof amtsonat gof amawon, ash dats ashwotowa, salat'ank wotowa salat'anera ash wotowa, guutsonat guutswoteraw ash dagotse k'osh k'oshewo aaliye, Krstos jamoniye, jamotsnowere bíne.
COL 3:12 Eshe Ik'o galb́dek'tsanotsnat S'ayin shunetswots it wottsosh maac'k'ewo, doo, b́took dashan detso, t'at'deshawo, k'amo tahde'ere.
COL 3:13 It atsa atsewo k'amewere, ititsere iko ikats b́ iirits keewo fa'e wotiyal orowa erere, Krstos itsh orowa b́ ettsok'o itwere orowa erere.
COL 3:14 Jamánatsere bogshde'er jamo ikok koide tifde'er b́ jamon ik wot daatsit shuno tahde'ere.
COL 3:15 Ik atsikaywotsi wotat arikon s'eegetswots jeen wotts Krstosko jeeno itnibats naashowe, bín údirwotsnowere wotoore.
COL 3:16 Krstos aap'tso ititse s'eenon it nibots beewe, dani teleef jamonowere it atsatsewo daniwere, shiyewere, duubonat údi dubonowere, Shayiri jááwi dubonowere it nibotse Ik'o údfetsr duuwere.
COL 3:17 Iyesus weeron Ik'o niho údfetsr it keewirwonowere it k'aliru jamo doonzo shútson k'aluwere, bínowere Ik'o niho údoore.
COL 3:18 Máátsuwotso! doonzo shinatse sheeng b́wottsotse it kenihsh alewere.
COL 3:19 Kenihuwotso! it máátswotsi shunere, boosh maac' kup'wotsi wotk'ayere.
COL 3:20 Nana'uwotso! han doonzo geneúshitk b́wottsotse jamkeewon it ind nihosh alewere.
COL 3:21 Nihwotso! bo maac'o bok'ut'rawok'o it nana'o fayon nibo k'únik'ayere.
COL 3:22 Guuts guutsuwotso! datsatsi it doonzotssh jamkeewon alewere, it aletwere bo iti bobek'iruwonat ash maac'o k'eezon be'ewosh b́woterawon doonzo shatonat nib s'ayinon wotowe.
COL 3:23 It k'aliru jamo ashosh b́woterawon doonzo Iyesussh it k'aliruwok'o it nibon k'aluwere.
COL 3:24 Hanshowere doonzo dari ristiyo k'awnts woshde'er itsh b́imetwok'o danfte, bísh itfinirwonwere doonzo Krstosiye,
COL 3:25 Ik'oke bogabogsho bíaaltsotse gond finitwonwere b́gondfinosh fayo dek'etwe.
COL 4:1 Doonzwotso! itwere daaratse doonzo it detstsok'o danr it guutswotsi kááwonat taalon boon k'eezwere.
COL 4:2 Kup'ar Ik' údon it k'ut'rawo Ik'o k'onuwere,
COL 4:3 hantonwere Ik'o b́ aap'osh fengesho noosh b́ k'eshitwok'onat taawere b́ jangosh tipeyat t beyirwo Krstosk ááshtso keewo keewosh no falituwok' nooshowere Ik'o k'onwere.
COL 4:4 Taawere shengshde'er b́ aap'o kishde'er t keewituwok'o taash Ik'o k'onuwere.
COL 4:5 Dúro kewude'fetsr amaneraw ashuwotsoke dani teleefon beewere.
COL 4:6 Ik ik ashosh wotit keewo aaniyosh it falituwok'o jam aawo it keewo nefonat aamb shaawon wotowe.
COL 4:7 Tikik'os t jangosh jam keewo itsh keewituwe, bíhe shuneets eshwe, amanek guutsonat doonzo finoshowere taanton fini toohe.
COL 4:8 Bín itok twoshwere t jangosh itsh b́ keewituwok'onat it nibo b́ kup'shishe.
COL 4:9 Bínton it jir wottso amanetsonat shuneets eshwo Onesimos it maants weetwe, boowere hanoke fa'a keewu jamo itsh daniitwne.
COL 4:10 Taanton tipetso Arst'rokoswere jamo itsh t'intsirwe, iknoto, «Itok b́ woor it dek'etwok'owa» etaat itsh gawiyat t teshtso Barnabasiy naayi Mark'oswere jamo itsh t'intsirwe.
COL 4:11 Iyost'osi ett s'egeyirwo Iyasu jamo itsh t'intsitwe, Ik' mengst jangosh taanton tohaat finiru ashuwotsitse ayhudiwotsitse amantsanots s'uziye taan kup'iyri.
COL 4:12 It jir wottso Iyesus Krstos guutso Ep'afrawwere jamo itsh t'intsirwe, shayiri beyon eenr kup'ar it ned'itwok'onat Ik' shunonowere jamon it s'eentsitwok'o bí itsh jam aawo Ik'o k'onirwe.
COL 4:13 It jangosh Lodok'iyonat Hirapolis kittwotsitse fa'a ashuwotssh ayidek't b́ mawirwok'osh taa t tookon gawu taane.
COL 4:14 Shuneets hakimiyo Luk'asnat Demasn jamo itsh t'intsirune.
COL 4:15 Lodok'iyon fa'a eeshuwotsna Nimfnnat b meyitse fa'a Ik' moowushowere jamo t'intsuwere.
COL 4:16 Woshani it nababiyakon Lodok'iy ashuwotsoke fa'a Ik' mootse b nababeetuwok'o woshuwere, itwere Lodok'iyon itsh woshet wosho nababoore.
COL 4:17 Arkip'asshowere «Doonzo finosh neesh imets fino sheengshde'er n s'eentsitwok'o» err keewuwere.
COL 4:18 S'uwaatsi jaman t kishon guut' taane P'awlosiye, Habiliyon tipeyat t beyiruwok'o gawwere. Ik' s'aato itnton wotowe.
1TH 1:1 Ik'o nihonat doonzo Iyesus Krstos jirwotsi wottsuwots Teselonk'e Ik'i maa ashuwotssh, P'awulosoke, Silasnat T'imotiwosoke wosheets woshoniye, s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
1TH 1:2 Noo úni aawo Ik'o nok'onoor itn gawufetsat Ik'osh údo t'intsiruwone.
1TH 1:3 Noo Ik'o Izar Izewernat nonih shinatse it imnetiyo b́ finiruwo, shunosh it k'aliruwonat nodoonz Iyesus Krstosn it detstso jangat k'amoon it kotiruwo no need'irawon gawiruwone.
1TH 1:4 Shuneets eshuwwotso! Ik'o iti galb́dek'tsok'owo danfone.
1TH 1:5 Doo shishiyo itsh noshishiy noon keewu mec'ron b́woterawon angonat shayiri S'ayinone, dooshishiyo ariko b́wottsok'owo danfetsatniye, itnton noteshor itsha etaat awuk'o nobeetsok'o danfte.
1TH 1:6 Ay gond bek'o itats b́ bodaloru dab S'ayin shayironton daatseyiru gene'onton b́ aap'o dek'at noonat no doonz Iyesusi sheengon artswotsi woterte.
1TH 1:7 Mansh Mek'odoniyonat Akayiyon beyiru amants jamwotssh sheengon ariyetswotsi wotertee.
1TH 1:8 It nabts doonzo aap'o b́ shishe Mek'odoniyonat Akayiy mec'ron b́ woterawo Ik'atse it detsts imnetiyo jam beyok danere b́ teshi, han jangosh noo eegoru keewo noon geyiratse.
1TH 1:9 Itok nowoor awuk'o noon it dek'tsok'o arikon beyat beyirwo Izar Izewersh finosh woteraw ik'atsere galeyat awuk'on Ik'o maants it aantsok'o ashmanots botookon gawitune.
1TH 1:10 Mank'o Krstosi k'irotse tiztso, weet fayotse noon fariyituwo, b́ naayi Iyesusi daaratse b́woo awuk'on it kotetuwok'o gawitune.
1TH 2:1 Ti eshuwotso! no it maants nowoo shuwalo b́teyawok'o it it tookon danfte.
1TH 2:2 It itdantsok'o haniyereshin Filipisyositse no teshor gond bek'onat c'ashon noats bodre, ernmó een wotts k'efo noats b́ bodaloru dab Ik'i dooshishiyo itsh nobetsitwok'o Izar Izewer noosh ááwu shuuk'o imre.
1TH 2:3 Noo iti noiztso dáron wee kim keewon jiisheyatniyaaliye, iti dariyosh nok'alts keewo eegonwor aaliye.
1TH 2:4 Maniyere dab Ik'o noosh dooshishiyan adaron noon amanat b́imtsotse keewituwone, manowere nok'alir nonib s'iliru Ik'o gene'ushosha bako asho gene'ushosh etniyaliye.
1TH 2:5 Iknotunoru dáshon wee gizi shunon detsetwo no keewawok'o b́ jamon it it tookon danfte, Ik'onu noosh gawe.
1TH 2:6 Itoke wotowa k'osh asho konoknoru mango geeratsone.
1TH 2:7 Krstossh woshetswotsi no wottsok'on noosh geyitwo itoke aatosh falfone b́ teshi, ernmó indu b nana'o b maants bdetsfok'on maac' nefon it dagotse no anaani.
1TH 2:8 Eshe ayidek'at itn noshuntsatse tuutson doo shishiyo itsh ím mec'ro b́ woterawo nokashonoru dab itsh no shunon imosh k'andek'k noone.
1TH 2:9 Ti eshuwotso! awuk'o no fintsok'onat shaatstsok'o gawo falfte, Ik' doo shishiyo itsh no nabor ik doonzatsoru kuro nowoterawok'owa etaat t'uwe aawo finone nomawufoni.
1TH 2:10 Amantsuwots dagots itnton nobeyor awuk'o s'ayinonat aawk'o kááw eeg eeg deshaw beyon nobefok'osh it noosh gaw itne, Ik'onuwere noosh gawe,
1TH 2:11 niho b́ nana'uwotssh b́ k'alfok'o noowere itsh ik ikon nok'altsok'o danfte,
1TH 2:12 jam aawo itn izon kup'efetsat b́ mengstonat b́ mango it kayituwok'o itn s'eegtso Izar Izewer b́ geene'úituwok'o it beyish oona itsha, no ettsok'o danfte.
1TH 2:13 Dabnu it jangosh noneed'rawo Ik'o no udiru weero detsfone, bíwere nooke it shishtso Ik' aap'o it dek'tsok'on itoke amantsuwotsoke finit aap'an it dek' ash aap'tsok'o b́ woterawo ari Ik' aaop'tsok'o woshdek'atniye, arikon Ik' aap'e.
1TH 2:14 Ti eshuwotso, it Yhud datsatse faúwots Krstos Iyesusn Ik' maa wottsuwotsitse sheengwotsi wottsuwots jafro shoyerte, boowere ayhudiyotsn gond bek'o boats b́ bodtsok'o jamon itwere it took jirwotsoke gond bek'o itats bodre.
1TH 2:15 ayhudiyots doonzo Iyesusnat nebiyatiyotsi bo úd'tsok'o nonowere giishdek't datsatsere noon kishtsuwotsiye, boowere Ik' shiyanirwotsnat ash jamo shit'irwotsiye,
1TH 2:16 Ik' ash woterawwots bín bokashit aap'o t keewawok'o dab bobaziyiri, hank'on morro morrats dabfere boamiri, mansh s'uwatsere Ik' fayo boats waare.
1TH 2:17 Ernmó ti eshuwotso! shayiron b́ woterawo meetson múk' gizewosh itatsere no k'aletsosh itsh t detsts mirac'o ay b́ wottsotse ti ááwon itn bek'osh ayidek'at geere b́ teshi.
1TH 2:18 Mansh it maants wosh geyatni notesh, bítsnowere taa P'awlos it maants wosh anaani geyere b́teshi, ernmó Shed'ano noon b́baziyi.
1TH 2:19 Bere, nojangiruwo wee nogeneeúwo wee nodoonz Iyesus b́woor b́shinaatse no it'etuwo no da'atsi mangi jip'uwots (akliliwots) itna bako kone?
1TH 2:20 Arikon nomanguwotsnat nogeneeúwotsuwots itne.
1TH 3:1 Mansh eshe haniyere okoon k'amdek'o nomaawtsotse Ateni eteets kitots noaali ooro noosh sheeng araatniye b́ be'eyi.
1TH 3:2 No eshu Ik'i guuts wottso, Krstosko sheeng doo shishiyon finon no tooho T'imotiyosi itsh wosherone, itsh no woshuwere iti b́kup'shr imnetiyon it kup'ituwok'o itn b́ izituwok'owe,
1TH 3:3 Hanuwere it ats bodts gond bek'atse tuutson it shek'eerawok'o iti woshituwe, gond bek'an noosh beezets gowo b́wottsok'owo it it tookon danfte.
1TH 3:4 Dabnwor itnton noteshor gondbek'o no ats b́bodetuwok'o shin shino keewfoone b́teshi, it dantsok'onowere gond bek'o noats bodre,
1TH 3:5 manatse tuutson k'amoon koto tmaawtsotse it amano danosh geeyat T'imotiwosi itok woshere, bín twoshwere daneraka fadfo iti ik weeron fadrek'úwa etaat, nofinonwere datsmec'ro wotat oorwtsere k'úwa etaat shatatniye.
1TH 3:6 Andmó T'imotiwos itoke nomaants waat it imnetiyi jangonat it shuni jangosh gene'úshit keewo noosh keewre, mank'owere úni aawo sheeng keewon noon it gawitwok'onat no iti bek'osh nomiraac'irwok'o itwere noon bek'osh it mirac'rwok'owo noosh b́keewi.
1TH 3:7 Eshe mansh eshuwotso, noo nodaatseyir kic'oonat gondbek'otse b́wotiyalor it imnetiyatse tuutson no ango kup'ere.
1TH 3:8 It doonzo Iyesusats kup'de'er itbeyo nooshowere man nok'alo noosh nobee.
1TH 3:9 Eshe and it jangosh udo t'intsirwone, it jangatse b́ shinatse nodetsts geneeúwosh Ik'o úditwone.
1TH 3:10 T'uwe aawo kup'sh dek'at Ik'o nok'onir nomeets ááwon iti be'er it amantsotse shaptso s'eentsosh tfalituwok'owe.
1TH 3:11 Andoor Izar Izewernat nonih b́tookon Iyesuswor it maants noweetwok'o noweero noosh kaatswe.
1TH 3:12 Noo iti noshunirwok'o doonzo it atsatseyonat jamoshor it detsts shuno eenr bí'ayituwok'o itsh woshuwe.
1TH 3:13 Mank'oon nodoonz Iyesus bik S'ayin jamwotsnton b́woor noko Izar Izewernat nonih shinatse it nibo eeg eeg deshawonat S'ayin b́wotituwok'o doonzo iti kup'shwe.
1TH 4:1 S'uwaatsnowere tí eshuwotso! Ik'o geneúshosh awuk'o beyo itsh b́geyituwok'owo no atse dandek'rte, andoor it beyir mank'owe, doonzo Iyesus shúútson iti nok'onirwonat iti noizirwere haniyere shini it k'aliruwoniyere bogo it finishe.
1TH 4:2 Doonzo Iyesus shúútson eeg arts bínjííshetso itsh no imtsok'o danfte.
1TH 4:3 Ik'i shuno it it s'ayinetwok'onat widatse it wokitwok'owe.
1TH 4:4 Ititse ik iketso b́máátsu S'ayinonat mangon korde'er detso dande'e.
1TH 4:5 Ik'o danawu Ik'i ash woteerawwotskok'o gusiyi tewuno b́deshawok'owa.
1TH 4:6 Keewanatse asho konuworu beshk'aye, amants k'oshono daadk'aye, haniyere shin itsh t keewutsok'onat tgawtsok'on keewanotsi k'alituwotsats doonzo boon sezituwe.
1TH 4:7 Ik'o noon b́ s'eeg s'ayinon nobetuwok'owa bako kimon no beyishaliye.
1TH 4:8 Eshe izets izan gac'ituwo, b́ gac'irwo S'ayin shayiro itsh imts Ik'oni bako ashaaliye.
1TH 4:9 It atsatsewo shuneyi jango it it tookon Ik'oke it dantsotse manjangosh konuwor itsh b́ guut'o geyiratse.
1TH 4:10 Mek'odoniyi s'eenotse fa'a eshú jamwotsi shunfte, b́ woteferoru ti eshuwotso, and itsh no izituwo bogshde'er it shuneetwok'o,
1TH 4:11 s'ker beyosh it kúp'ituwok'onat it took jangosh it gawitwok'o, haniyere shin itsh no azaztsok'o it kishon it finituwok'owe.
1TH 4:12 Mank'oon amaneraw ashuwotsoke sheeng beyo beetute, konatsoru te'etswotsi woteratste.
1TH 4:13 Ti eshúwotso! bo jangts deshaw ashuwotskok'o k'irts ashuwotssh it shiyanerawok'o aro it danetuwok'o shunfone.
1TH 4:14 Iyesus b́ k'irtsok'onat k'irotse b́ tuwtsok'o amanituwone, mansh Iyesusi amanat k'irtswots Ik'o bínton boon de'er weetuwe.
1TH 4:15 Doonzoke no dek'ts aap'ok'on itsh no keewitwo haniye, doonzo b́ wafetsosh kashon beyirwots k'irtsuwots shinats besheratsone.
1TH 4:16 Azazit k'ááro, melaki náásho k'ááro, Ik'i gááti k'aronuwere shishetuwe, doonzo b́tookonowere hanootsn jisheyar darotse oot'etwe, Krstosn amanat k'irtswotswere shin shino tuwitune.
1TH 4:17 Maniyere il noo kashon fa'úwots doonzonton jongats gonkewosh bonton daawnon dambaan k'awu'etuwe, dúre dúrosh doonzonton wotitwone.
1TH 4:18 Mansh eshe aap'ets aap'an it atsatseyo iko iko kup'shwere.
1TH 5:1 Ti eshuwotso! keewan b́ wotit́ dúronat b́ gizewosh eegoru itsh guut'o geyiratse.
1TH 5:2 Doonzo b́ weet aawo úmp'etso t'úwon b́ wafok'o b́ wottsotse it it tookon sheengshde'k'at danfte.
1TH 5:3 Ashuwots «Keew jamó jeenonat s'k erkee» bo etor na'a maac'ts máátsuwats na'a shuwi shambo bin b́detsfok'o t'afo danerawo boats b́ weeti, eegi weeronoru bítse keshosh falatsne.
1TH 5:4 Ti eshuwotso itmó, t'aluwots itnaliye, mansh aaw man ump'etsok'o itats waratse.
1TH 5:5 It it únets shááni ashuwots, aawi ashuwots itne, nooye wee t'úwi wee t'alwi ashuwots noonaliye.
1TH 5:6 Mansh eshe no tooko kewde beewone bako k'oshwotskok'o tokrk'ayone.
1TH 5:7 Tokriru ashuwots t'úwone botokriri, mashiruwotswere t'úwone bomashiri.
1TH 5:8 Noomó aawi ashuwotsi nowottsotse notooko keewon no angok'on beewone, imnetiyonat shunon t'ururiyok'o nogerats tahde'oone, kashosh jangetso kes'tswots boatse baziyosh bogúúfef k'obiyok'o tookats guufde'one,
1TH 5:9 Ik'o noon b́ s'eeg fayosh b́woterawon nodoonz Iyesus Krstos weeron no kashishee.
1TH 5:10 Krstos no jangosh b́k'ir kashon nobeyal wee nok'iriyal bínton nobeyishe.
1TH 5:11 Mansh and it k'alirwok'on iko iko kup'shon t'engde'e.
1TH 5:12 Eshuwotso! ititse finon shaatsirwotsi, doonzon it naashwotsnat iti iziruwotsi it mangiyituwok'o itn k'oniruwoone,
1TH 5:13 Bo finatse tuutson boosh eents manogonat shunon it detsetwok'owa, itwere it atsatsewo jeenon beewere.
1TH 5:14 Eshuwotso! «Wihuwotsi fayore, aaw shuuk' deshawwotsi kúp'shwere, maawtswotsi te'uere, ash jamosh k'amoore» etaat gawiruwone.
1TH 5:15 Asho konworu gondi shegrosh gndon bí anirawok'o it atso korde'er, dab jam aawo it it took tookosh wotowa mank'o k'osh ashuwotssh k'osh ash jamwotssh sheeng finosh kup'ore.
1TH 5:16 Jam aawo gene'owere,
1TH 5:17 it eed'irawo Ik'o k'onwere,
1TH 5:18 jam keewon Ik'o udoore, Krstos Iyesusn it detsts beyon Ik'o itatse b́ geyirwo maniye.
1TH 5:19 S'ayin shayiri fino úp'k'ayere,
1TH 5:20 bek'o gac'k'ayere.
1TH 5:21 Jam keewo faduwere, sheeng wottso deshde'ere.
1TH 5:22 Gond fin jamatse wokoore.
1TH 5:23 B́ tookon jeeni Ik'o Izar Izewer jam keewon iti S'ayintsuwe, it Shayiro, it kasho, it ats jamo no doonz Iyesus Krstos b́ weet aawosh ik jagalo koteyar beewe.
1TH 5:24 Iti s'egtsmań amanek b́ wottsosh han k'alituwe.
1TH 5:25 Ti eshuwotso! nooshowere Ik'o k'onwere.
1TH 5:26 Eshúw jamwotsi S'ayints jobon jamo aatewere.
1TH 5:27 Woshan amants jamwotssh b́ nababetwok'o doonzo shútson oona itsh etetuwe.
1TH 5:28 No doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aato itnton wotowe.
2TH 1:1 Ik'o no nihinat no doonz Iyesus Krstosok wotts Teselonk'e Ik' meyitsi amantsuwotssh P'awulosoke, Silasnat Timotiyosoke guut'dek't wosheets wosho.
2TH 1:2 Ik'o nihoke no doonz Iyesus Krstosoke s'aatonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
2TH 1:3 Tí eshuwotso! it jangosh Ik'o jam aawo udiruwone, udonwere noosh geyike, no udiruwere it aman amano iki bogt bí eniruwnat it it atsatse shuneyo dabfere b́ amiruwotsne.
2TH 1:4 Mansh eshe gishewonat gond bek'on dab itats b́ bodalor it aawk'o it k'amtsok'onat it imnetiyatse kúp' it wottsok'o keewon noo k'osh Ik' moowwots dagotse wotdekat itn it'irwone.
2TH 1:5 Jam keewan b́ kitsir Ik' angsho arik b́ wotok'onat itwere bísha etaat gond bek'o it dek'ts mengst mansh bodk it wotitwok'oniye.
2TH 1:6 Kááw keew k'alitwo Ik'o b́wottsotse it ats gondbek'o dowirwotsats gond bek'o dowon bok'awntso boosh dashetwe.
2TH 1:7 And gond bek'o daatsirwotswere noonton kashdek'o itsh imetwe. Han b́wotitwere doonzo Iyesus b́melaki kúp'wotsnton darotse b́ oot'oore,
2TH 1:8 bí darootse be'et aat'iru tawone, manoor Ik'o danawwotsnat nondoozo Iyesusko dooshishyosh alerawwotsi sezitwe.
2TH 1:9 Bo doonz shinatsnat bí een mangatse k'aleyaarr dúre dúri t'afon bo sezeti.
2TH 1:10 Bo bo sezitwere manots aawots bík s'ayinwotsoke mangr bín amanir jamwotsoknowere adewosh b́wooree. Itwere noo gawuts gawo dek'at it amantsotse bonton taawetute.
2TH 1:11 Han gawon itsh no eed'irawo nó Ik'o no k'onir b́ s'egots s'eegosh bodtswotsi iti woshr sheeng finosh it detsts shunonat imneti fin jamo bí angon finde itsh b́s'eentsitwok'owe.
2TH 1:12 Mank'o no doonz Iyesus shútso ititsere mangr itwere noko Izar Izewernat no doonz Iyesus s'aatok'on bín it mangitwok'o Ik'o k'onirwone.
2TH 2:1 Ti eshuwotso! no doonz Iyesus Krstos woonat noowere bínton wotosh nokakweyi jangosh itn nok'onirwo haniye,
2TH 2:2 Wee shayiron wee aap'on keewetsok'on wee noyitse woshoon guut'etsok'on woshde'er «Doonzo aawo waare» eton kááron it nibo shek'eek'aye, kic'ono kic'k'ayere.
2TH 2:3 Asho ik keewonor itn b́ant'elcerawok'k'owa, shin shino haalo b́warawon, Ik'o bín b́t'afit weeri gond asho b́be'erawo, aawman waratse.
2TH 2:4 Weerr gond ashaan Izar Izewerotsiye ett ik'iyeyiru jam keewotsiyere damb b́tooko een b́wooshfoni, «Ik'o taane» erfetsrnwere dab Ik'i mootse bewosh ááw shuk'on b́ned'iti.
2TH 2:5 Itnton tteshor keewanotsi itsh keewat tteshtsok'o gawraatsteya?
2TH 2:6 Bísh beezets sa'aton b́be'efetsosh and b́be'erawok'o bín baziyiruwo eeg b́wottsok'owo danfte.
2TH 2:7 Aashts weer gondi angman fino dek'tuure, b́wotefere andoor baziyirwo fa'e, han b́wotwere baziyiru ekeew b́t'affetsoniye.
2TH 2:8 Maniyere ilowere nemalon beyiruman be'etwe, doonzo Iyesus b́ nonotsi kash jongon bín úditwe, be'eyi eenon aanar b́ woor b́beyoko t'afibazetwe.
2TH 2:9 Mor gond asho b́weet shed'ani angon kootets aditswotsnat milikituwotsn ayi adits keewwotsnowere k'alone,
2TH 2:10 Mank'owere t'afit ashuwotsi bín bo dashit eeg naari gond keewwotsi k'alone. Ashaanots bot'afitwere kashosh boon betsitwo ariko shunt dek'o bo k'aztsotsne.
2TH 2:11 Man jangosh kooton boamanituwok'o Ik'o boon ant'elcit ango boats woshitwe.
2TH 2:12 Hanwere b́ wotit aro amaneratsone et morrats geneúwiru jamwotsats angshetwok'owe.
2TH 2:13 Doonzon shuneets eshuwotso! noomó it jangosh Ik'o jam aawo udo noosh geyife, no uditwere it shayiri S'ayinon it s'ayinontsonat arono it amanon it kashitwok'o Ik'o shini itn galb́dek'tsoshe.
2TH 2:14 Ik'o no itsh no nabts doo shishiyann itn s'eegts doonzo Iyesus Krstos mango it kayitwok'owe.
2TH 2:15 Mansh t eshuwotso, kúp'arr need'ore, it aap'ona wotowa guut'ets woshon nooke itsh beshts dano kúp'ide'er deshere.
2TH 2:16 B́ tookon no doonz Iyesus Krstosnat, noon shuntso, b́ s'aaton dúre dúri kúp'iyo, sheeng jangóno noosh imtso Ik'o no nihiye.
2TH 2:17 Bí it maac'o kúp'shwe, sheeng finonat sheeng noon keew jamon itn kup'shwe.
2TH 3:1 S'uwatsno ti eshwotso! itokere wottsok'o doonzo aap'tso káári jamok borr b́ mangitwok'o noosh Ik'o k'onuwere.
2TH 3:2 Mank'owere jam asho amankaaliye, mansh weri gondetswotsnat gond ashuwotsatse no faritwok'o noosh Ik'o k'onuwere.
2TH 3:3 Doonzonmó amaneke, bí itn kup'shitwe, gondatsnowere itn kotetwe.
2TH 3:4 Itn no azazitwo and wotowa shino maants it k'alitwok'o it jangosh doonzo ats amanatniye.
2TH 3:5 Doonzonú it nibo Ik' shúnonat Krstos k'amo maants jishwe.
2TH 3:6 Tí eshúwotso! fin bitstsk wottsonat nookere itsh beeshiyets danok'on beeraw krstiyani jamatse it galetwok'o doonzo Iyesus Krstos shútson itn azazerone.
2TH 3:7 Noon aro itsh b́k'anitwok'o it it tookonor danfte, noo itnton noteshor fino biitstswotsi teyatsone,
2TH 3:8 Kon mishonor datsmec'ron mááratsone, dabnwor ititse konatsor kuro nowoterawok'owa etaat t'uwe aawo no maawfetsosha nofinefoni.
2TH 3:9 Mank'o nok'alwere it noon araar no jafrats it sha'iitwok'owa etaatni bako itkooke tep'o dek'o noosh b́ faletwok'o daratniyaliye.
2TH 3:10 Itnton noteshor «Fin finosh geerawo maak'aye» etts niwo itsh imrone b́ teshi.
2TH 3:11 Han noo etwere ititsere ik ik fin biitstswots bo fa'ok'o t shishtsotsne, ashaanots boon geraw keewots kinda bako botookon eegor fineratsne.
2TH 3:12 Hank'o ashuwots s'ker beyar bo finitwok'o bín bo beetwo bodaatsitwok'o doonzo Iyesus Krstos shútson hanotsk'o ashuwotsi azazerone, izitwone.
2TH 3:13 Itmó ti eshúwotso! shaatsrone err sheeng fin finosh nefk'ayere.
2TH 3:14 Woshanitse itsh nobeshits izo de'aw asho b́ beyal hank'o ashaan t'iwintswere, b́ jitsitwok'owere bínton gonkek'ayere.
2TH 3:15 B́ wotefere eshúwok'o izwere bako t'alatok'o taawk'ayere.
2TH 3:16 Jeeni doonzo b́ tookon jam aawo jam keewon jeeno itsh ime, doonzo it únetsnton wotowe.
2TH 3:17 Jamán t kishon itsh guut'tso taane P'awlosiye, t wosh jamotse daatset wosho tik b́wti milikito haniye. T guut'etwere hank'owe.
2TH 3:18 No doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aato it únetsnton wotowe.
1TI 1:1 Ik'o no atoke no nojangtso Iyesus Krstos tzaziyon woshek wottso P'awlosoke.
1TI 1:2 Imnetiyon ari t naayi wottso T'imotiyossh, Ik'o nonihokere, nodoonz Iyesus Krstosoke s'aatonat mihretiyonu, jenonu neesh wotowe.
1TI 1:3 Mek'edoniy maants tiamor neesh oona ti ettsok'on, manoke fa'a ash ik ikuwots kooti dano bodanirawok'o nwoshish Efesonitse beewe.
1TI 1:4 Tururonat s'uu deshaw naar taawo maants k'ayr boanerawok'o boon azazowe, keewanots moosha bodoweti bako amanon fineyiru Ik'i finosh t'ak'ameratsnee.
1TI 1:5 Tzaziyanmó nib s'ayinotse, asaabi s'ayinon, arik wotts amanon daatsets shunoniye.
1TI 1:6 Ik ik ashuwots keewanotsatse k'aleyat k'awunts deshaw moosho maants k'az anernee.
1TI 1:7 Man bok'aluwere nemo daniyruwotsi woto geeyatniye, wotowabako bokeewiruwo danatsne, arkeewetsnone boetirwono t'iwintsratsne.
1TI 1:8 Asho geyitsok'on bín b́finiyal nemo sheeng b́wottsok'o danfone.
1TI 1:9 Mank'owa nemo ned'iye ash kááwuwots b́woterawk'o danfone, nemo beeze mishetswotsnat k'uur finetsuwotsshe, Ik'osh k'erawwotsnat morr finetsuwotsshe, s'ayin woterawwotsnat kash keewo gac'iruwotsshe, bonihonat bo indon úd'iru kash úd'iruwots,
1TI 1:10 Widetswotsna, g'ad'wotsnat, asho up'dek'amt kemiru jaktswotsnat kootetswotsi, kooton taarirwotsnat arik wotts dano k'uriru keew jamo finiruwotsshe.
1TI 1:11 Arik wotts danonmó b́ daatset mangiyets Ik'o b́ shishits mangts doo shishiyone, doo shishiyanwere taash adar imetsoniyee.
1TI 1:12 Finosh taan amanetso woshde naashiyosh taawdek't imtso nodoonz Iyesus Krstosi udirwe.
1TI 1:13 Dab haniyere shin Krstosi c'ashtsonat gishtso, ketitso twotiyalor, bí taash mhretiyo b́woshi, bíwere taash mhretiyan b́wosh taa jaman t k'al daronat aman tk'aztsatse tuutson b́ teshtsotsne.
1TI 1:14 Noo Ik'o s'aato Iyesus Krstosn nok wotts imnetiyonat t shunonton s'eent ooytso taash imere.
1TI 1:15 «Iyesus Krstos morr finetswotsi kashiwosh datsats waare» etiru aap'o arikonat ash jamo dek'o bin b́ geyit keewe, morrets jamuwotsitsnor bítsi bog morretso taane.
1TI 1:16 Ernmó taash mihretiyow oshere, taash mhretiyo woshere Iyesus Krstos ayidek't ayts b́ k'amoon ashe dash morretso wottsosh tiatse kitsosh bín amanitsuwotsnat dúre dúri kash datsituwotssh sheeng artso t wotishee.
1TI 1:17 Mansh dúre dúri Nugúsosh, k'irrawosh, be'erawosh, Ik'o Izar Izewersh mangonat udon bísh dúre dúrosh wotowe! Amen.
1TI 1:18 T naayi T'imotiwoso! haniyere shin njangosh bek'on keewetsok'on azazets adaranotsi neesh imetuwe, bek'mann jisheyar kes'i sheengo kec'ee,
1TI 1:19 Amanonat maac' s'ayinetso wotowe, ash ik ikuwots bonibo bojuutsatse tuutson markabo jongon b́t'ffok'o bo imnetiyo t'afs'uure.
1TI 1:20 Boyitse Hemenewosnat t Iskndrn fa'enee, boowere Ik' c'ash aap'o keewo k'azo bo danetwok'o Shed'anosh beshidek'at imik'rere.
1TI 2:1 Jamoniyere shino Ik'o ik'iyonat mangon s'eents beyi k'onon, sagadon, koshuwotssh Ik' k'ononat udona ash jamosh k'aletwok'owe ti iziri.
1TI 2:2 Ik' shatonat sheeng amalon jisheyar jeenonat s'k err no beetwok'o jamotsere nugúsuwotsnat een een dats k'eeziru naash jamwotssh Ik'o k'onwere.
1TI 2:3 Hanuwere noon kashitso Ik'o shinatse shengwonat bín geneúshit keewe.
1TI 2:4 Ik' shuno ash jamwots kasharr aronowere bo danetwok'owe.
1TI 2:5 Ik'o ike, dagotse wotde'e Ik'onat ashon manituwonu ike, bíwere ash wottso Iyesus Krstosiye.
1TI 2:6 Ash jamo morrotse kishosh b́ tooko beshidek't imtso bíne, hanuwere aron bí aaw man b́ bodor Ik'o kashiy fino noosh kitsit gawoniye.
1TI 2:7 Taa imnetiyonat aron doo shishiyosh wosheetsonat danifon wotat Ik' danaw ashuwotsok t woshe man jangoshe, han tietor ara tkeewiri bako kooratse.
1TI 2:8 Eshe b́ be beyoke fa'a nungshwots fayonat shit'on k'ayr bo kishi s'aynman dambaan k'aúde Ik'o bo k'onitwok'owe t geyiri.
1TI 2:9 Máátswotswere took s'iir wozewon wee awnts wee ink'uwon wee shawu gizon keewets tahon baatso b́woterawo jiitsonat botoko dashan detson wotts ash na'i taho tahde'ene.
1TI 2:10 Ik'o mangiyirwone etts máátswots k'alo boosh b́ geyit sheeng finon baatsunee.
1TI 2:11 Máátsu s'ik etonat azazewo daniye.
1TI 2:12 Máátsu nungusho b daniyituwok'o wee nungushatse bialituwok'owa eraatse, biye s'ik eto bish geyife.
1TI 2:13 Shino azeetso Adamiye, ilowere azetsu Hewaniyee.
1TI 2:14 Ando ant'elcetsunat Ik'i nemo gaktsunu máátsuni bako ant'elcetso Adamiyaliye.
1TI 2:15 Ernmó máátsu amanonat shunon s'ayinonowere kup'arr biatso koton bbetkawotyal na'a shuwon kashituwaniye.
1TI 3:1 Ash iko ep'is k'op'isiyo «woto b́ geyyale sheeng fine b́ tewni» etiru aap'o arikee
1TI 3:2 Eshe Ep'is k'op'isi iko, bí atse k'efetuwo deshawo, mááts ik s'uzu dek'tso, bí angok'on betuwo, b́ took keewiruwo, teron finituwo, ib dek'etwo, daniyosh faltuwo,
1TI 3:3 Másherawo, moosho shunawo, maac' nef wottso, fayetsi woterawo, giz shunawo,
1TI 3:4 B́ took moowo k'ezdek'o falituwo, b́ nanauwots mangon bísh aleyirwotsi woto geyituwe.
1TI 3:5 B́ took moo k'ezdek'o falatse wotiyal asho Ik' mootsi ashuwotsi ak'aldeniya k'eezo b́ faliti?
1TI 3:6 Dayablos bog taana eton fugeyat bí ats angshetsok'o karnon amantso bí ats angsherawok'o Ep'is k'opisiyo wotk'aye.
1TI 3:7 B́ shútso b́ t'afre Shed'ani kamboots kindr b́ dihirawok'o amaneraw ashuwotsoke sheeng shútso detstso woto bín geyiyituwe.
1TI 3:8 Diyak'oniwotswere mank'o mangiyetswotsnat ik alberets wottsuwotsi, weyiniyon dutsets biro ay uyawwotsi, gizoshowere ayide'er k'awntirwotsi woto geyiratse,
1TI 3:9 Ando imnetiy mist'iryo nib s'ayinon koto boosh geyituwe,
1TI 3:10 Bowere shino fadewne, maniyakonowere boatse s'iilr eegonor bo atse datserawwotsi wotarr bodatseyal diyak'oni fino finone.
1TI 3:11 Aaninuwere bomáátswotswor mangiyetswotsi, ash oonerawwotsi, bo angok'on beyirwotsi, jam keewon amanetswotsi woto boosh geyife.
1TI 3:12 Diyak'oniwots botook tookosh mááts iku kenih woto boosh geyife, bo nana'onat bo maa asho sheengsh detsonat k'eezo boon geyfe.
1TI 3:13 Diyak'oni fino sheengeshde finitwots een ma'aregiyo daatsitune, Iyesus Krstosn wotts imnetiyo ááwu shuk'on keewo falituee.
1TI 3:14 Karn aawotse weetuwe tietalorni, daneraka wook'ayr t teshetkawotiyala dure duron beyiruwo Ik'o moonat aron k'ons'ets irok'o Ik'i mootse asho awuk'o k'alo bín b́ geyituwok'o n danetuwok'o neen jishituwo neesh guut'etuwe.
1TI 3:16 Noo haymanoti mist'iriyo hake baka eterawok'on eene, bíwere Ik'o «Ash wotat be'ere, ar b́ wottsok'o shayiron b́dani, Melakiwotssho b́ be'eyi Ash jamosh nabere, datsatsi ash jamo bín boamani, mangon daro maantsan b́ dek'eyi» etke.
1TI 4:1 S'ayn shayironmo kishidek't hank'o bí eti, «Dúr s'uwatsere ik ik ashuwots shelit shairwootsnat fo'erawwots danits dani jafrats sha'ar bo haymanotiyo haalitwune.»
1TI 4:2 Han naari danan b́ t'up'ir bo ats danawwotsoknee, koto bokeworo biri k'ees'on mitsetsok'o wotat dungwtsts bo nibotse boosh shiyeraw ashuwotsokne.
1TI 4:3 Hannk'o ashuwtswere de'ewo bo baziri, amantsuwotsnat ar dants ashuwots Ik'o mangifetsre bometuwok'o Ik'o boosh bí imts misho «Maak'ayere» ett bo baziyiri.
1TI 4:4 Ik' azts jamo sheenge, udon deek'etkaa wotiyal eegoru juwet keewo aaliye.
1TI 4:5 Ik' aap'onat Ik' k'onon s'aynk wotituwe.
1TI 4:6 Daniyan amantsuwotssh n danetka wotiyal imnetiyi aap'onat b́ shuuts n shairu sheeng danman danfetsat eentso, Iyesus Krstossh guuts sheengo wotitune.
1TI 4:7 Ik' mangiyo bíyitse aalts datsanatsi turur keewatse wokowe Ik' ik'iyosh n tooko daniwe.
1TI 4:8 Nmets atson n atso kup'iyosh ntook k'aniyo muk' keewoshe neesh b́ t'ak'amiti, ernmó Ik' mangiyosh ntooko k'aniyonmo andonat shino maantsi weet kashosh nojangiruwo b́ wottsosh jamosh noosh t'ak'amituwe.
1TI 4:9 Eteets etanuwere ash jamo b́ dek'et arik wotts keewoniye.
1TI 4:10 Noowere ash jamo kashituwon bítsnowere amants jamwotsi kashiti jamaawo beet Ik'on no jangirwosh finon no mawiri, nomak'oriri.
1TI 4:11 Keewanotsno azazowe, daniwe,
1TI 4:12 Jawets n wottsosh konuworu neen gac'k'aye, maniyere n keewon, n beyon, n shunon, n imnetiyonat s'ayn n woton amants jamwotssh sheengon ariyetso wotowe.
1TI 4:13 Taa t wafetsosh s'ayn mas'aafwotsi ash ashuwotssh nababon, nabonat daniyon kup'owe.
1TI 4:14 Bek'on nesh keeweworat Ik' máá eenashuwots bokisho niats bogedori kash s'aynon neesh imets im man batk'aye.
1TI 4:15 Eenfere niamok'o ash jamo b bek'etwok'o keewu jamanotsats kup'owe, keewu jamanotsi finats jitsr n jamon keewon boosh ime.
1TI 4:16 N tokonat n daniru finonsh niatso korde'e, keewanotsatso kup'owe, hank'o k'alon n tokonat neen k'ebiruwotsi kashitune.
1TI 5:1 Ash eeno nihok'o woshde izuwe bako fayk'aye, jawetsono eshuwotskok'owa,
1TI 5:2 Gaawer máátsuwotsno indok'o woshde s'iile, baruwotsno mish mishuwotsk'o woshde s'aynon boon s'iile.
1TI 5:3 Arikon bo keniho bo atse k'irts máátswotsi mangiwe
1TI 5:4 B keniho bí'atse k'irts mááatsu nana'otsi wee b na'i na'o b detsal nana'a manots shino bo maa ashuwotssh k'alo b́ geyituwo k'alune, bo indonat nihon bo indowonat aboowonsh gusho aaniwosh kash weeron fin boon gyituwo danne, manuwere Ik' gene'ushit keewe.
1TI 5:5 Bi aal beyiru t'owu mááts wottsu, b tewuno Ik'ats woshde t'uwe aawo Ik'o bin b́ tep'etuwok'o Ik' k'onon kup'arr betuwaniye.
1TI 5:6 Datsanatsi gene'ú mec'ro shunts t'oow máátsunmó bihe need'on k'irkiye.
1TI 5:7 Bo atse gondo daatseraniyere bo beetuewk'o dananotsi boosh daniwe.
1TI 5:8 B́ took jaguwotssh, bítsnor bomeyitsi ashuwotsi gawrawo bí b́ imnetiyo k'azkee, dab́ amaneraw ashuwotsiyeror iki gondefe.
1TI 5:9 Keez ub natoniyere dash wotts bkenih k'irts máátsu t'oowo máátsuwots shúúts guut'eyru mezgebiyats guut'k'aye, dabnwor ik kenihosh amts máátsu woto bin geytuwe.
1TI 5:10 Dabrnu nana'uwotsi shengshde ditson, ib dek'on, s'aynwots tufo mashon, kic'tswotsi tepon sheeng fin jamo k'alosh sheeng fin jamo finosh kup'tsu woto bish geytuwe.
1TI 5:11 Bo kenih k'irts máatswotsitse enasherafa'úwots bo mets tewuno boon da'a b́de'e, Krstossh bo detsts shuno b́shapre mááts amo bo geyituwotse boon t'owu máátsuwotsi mazgabets mazabiyats guut'k'aye.
1TI 5:12 Máátsanots shin Krstossh bokindts taareo bogaktsotsnowere botokats angshe bodowiri.
1TI 5:13 Ando aani final beyo bodaneti, finl be mec'ro b́ woteftsere ash maa moots gúrar asho bo oniti, ash keewots bo kiniditi, keewosh boon geyira keewo bokeewiti.
1TI 5:14 Hanshowere enasheraw t'owu máátswots máátso amr na'o bo shuwitwok'o, bo moono shengshde bo k'ezituwok'o, izituwe, hank'on t'elato boshútso t'afiyosh weerindo datsatse.
1TI 5:15 Haniyere shinoru bo kenihi k'irts t'owu mááts ik ikuwots imneti weratse tuut Shed'ani shuutso sha'erne.
1TI 5:16 Amants mááts iku meyitsere bo kenihi k'irts máátsuwots fa'ane wotiyal Ik' meyitsi ashuwotssh kur bowoterawok'o bíwere boon teúwiye, hank'onowere Ik' moow eegoru boon tep'etu deshaw bokenihi k'irts t'owu máátsuwotsi tep'o falfane.
1TI 5:17 Ik' mootsi fino sheengshdek't jishiruwotsi, dabnu nabonat daniyonmawiru een ashuwotssh git kish wotts mango boosh geyife,
1TI 5:18 S'ayn mas'aafotse «Mááyo sirbiru minzi beero b́ no no tipk'aye,» mank'o «fintsosh damozo daats bísh geyiyfe» etre.
1TI 5:19 Wee gito wee keez asho b́ gawiyala bako Ik' meyitsi ashuwotsi jishiru eenashats t'intseyiru s'aamiyo dek'k'aye.
1TI 5:20 K'osh k'osh ashuwots boshatetwok'o morro finiru ashuwotsi ash jamwots shinatse giishowe.
1TI 5:21 N finiru keew jamon iko ikoniyere n bogshrawo t iztsank'on jamo ik aawon ns'iletwok'o Ik'onat Iyesus Krstosn marat'ets melakiwots shinatse adaran neesh imre
1TI 5:22 N kisho ashuwotsats gerde boosh k'onr naashiwosh kark'aye, k'osh ashuwots morro nkayerawok'o n tooko s'aynon kord'e.
1TI 5:23 N maac' weeshonat jam aawo n shodiruwi jangosh múk'shde weyiniyon dutsets biro úyee bako haniye okoon aats mec'ro ushk'aye.
1TI 5:24 Ik ik ashuwots mrro be'ek b́ woto shin angshoniye b́kitsiri, k'osh ashuwots morro b́ be'et ja'arniye.
1TI 5:25 Sheeng fino jamoshe b́ be'eti, aashat beyirwonwor be'eraniyere ooreratse.
1TI 6:1 Ik' shútsonat b́ danits danon b́ c'asherawok'o guuts guuts jamwots bo doonzotsi mangiyo boosh b́ geyituwok'owo dande'ene.
1TI 6:2 Bodoonzots amank wotts doonz detsts guuts jamwots Iyesus Krstosn bo eshuwotsi bo wottsotse boon gac'k'ayine, bo fin manatse oot' datsituwots bo doonz doonzuwots amantsonat shuneets eshuu bowottsosh baltsoniye bogshide' boosh finone. Neewere daniyonat izon neen b́geyit haniye.
1TI 6:3 Arikon Ik' k'eyi jango daniru danmanton ik wottso no doonz Iyesus Krstos aap'oman k'azt k'osh dan danyiru asho b́ beyal,
1TI 6:4 man kofangirwonat b́jamon danawoniye, wotowabako mooshonat wed'eyon bíatsots gond tewuno s'eenb́gutsi, man b́ dowetwere okoora, faya, c'asha, amank'aza,
1TI 6:5 Botooko kimt arikeewo boyitse t'afts ashuwots bofinefo k'ut'eraw mooshoniye, hank'o ashuwotssh Ik'osh k'ewo gizdatsi malee bí arefoni.
1TI 6:6 «T detstso taash bodfe» etiru ashosh Ik' ik'iyoash woto ay oot'o daatsituwe.
1TI 6:7 Datsanats dek'nowaatso eegor aaliye, datsatsnowere eegoru de'e no amet keewo aaliye.
1TI 6:8 No meetuwonat no tahituwon nodatsitkawotiyal noosh bodfe.
1TI 6:9 Gaaletsi wotosh geyiruwotsmó fadewon dihitúne, ash ashuwotsi awaashituwonat t'afiytu k'awuntsdeshaw gond keewon ay tewuni kambon deshetunee.
1TI 6:10 Han b́ wotitwonwere gizi shuno gond jamwotssh t'up' b́ wottsi jangoshe.
1TI 6:11 Ik' ashono! Neho jamanotsatse k'ayi woc'e, kááwon, Shayiri ash woton, imnetiyon, shunon, k'amonowere kup'ar, maac' nefon sha'owe.
1TI 6:12 Imnetiyon sheeng kaaro kaarowe, neen b́ maantsan b́ s'eegor ay wotts gawuwots shinatse ar wotts gawo ni imtso dúre dúri kasho deshde'e.
1TI 6:13 Jam keewon kash imiru Ik'onat P'ent'eniya eteets P'ilat'os shinatse sheeng amaneyon gawutso Iyesus Krstos shinatse neesh keewiruwe.
1TI 6:14 Nodoonz Iyesus Krstos b́ be'efetsosh t tzaziyan n shelawo shúúts s'ayinon korde'e.
1TI 6:15 Krstos be'ewonwere, deretsonat b́s'uz altso, naashuwotsatsi naasho, doonzuwotsatsi doonzo bí etts aawotse b́ wotiti,
1TI 6:16 Bíwere bíyal k'irawoniye, konuworu bíyok t'inosh b́ falawu shanotse b́ beyiri, bínowere konuworu be'atse, konuworu bek'osh falatse, mangonat dúre dúr angon bísh wotowe, amen.
1TI 6:17 Datsanatsi gaaletsuwots bognona bo erawok'o wee bogaal amanek woterawmanats bo te'erawok'o boon azazowe, mank'o bo tewunon noo nogene'uwituwok'o jam keewo bogshede'er noosh imetuwo Ik'o atsats b́wotituwok'o azazowe.
1TI 6:18 Aaninuwere sheeng fino bofinituwok'o, sheeng finonowere gaaletsi bowotitwok'o, tewud doonat bodetstso kayiyosh k'andek'tswotsi bowotituwok'o azazowe.
1TI 6:19 Mank'oon arik wotts kasho daatsosh s'ap'dek'k wotts gaalo weyiru duratse botokish kakudek'etunee.
1TI 6:20 T'imotiwoso! adaron neesh imetso korde'e, dan woterawo «Dan» ariru koton ooshiyatse wokowe.
1TI 6:21 Ik ikuwots mannaari dano detsfone ett boamants weeratse k'aztuurne. Ik'i s'aatoniye itnton wotowe.
2TI 1:1 Iyesus Krstos weeron daatsets jangets kashi keewo keewetsok'on, Ik'o bí ettso Iyesus Krstossh wosheetso wottso P'awlosoke woshetsoniye.
2TI 1:2 Boree, shune na'o t naay T'imotiwossha, Niho Ik'oktsonat nodoonz Iyesus Krstosoki s'aatonat mhretiyo, jeenon neesh wotowe.
2TI 1:3 T'uwe aawon uni'aawo neesh Ik'o t k'onor neen gawat t nihots bok'altsok'o taawere maac' s'ayinon bísh tfiniru Ik'o udirwe.
2TI 1:4 Ni aac'uwo bateratse, neen be'er ayide'er gene'uwosh neen bek'o tewunirwe.
2TI 1:5 Niyoke fa'a arik wotts imnetiyo gawiruwee, mannaari imnetiman shinowere ni'indo Loyidaanat ni'ind Ewunk'eyoke teshke, niyoknowere b́beyok'o t'iwintsree.
2TI 1:6 Man jangosh t kisho ni'ats t gedor neesh imetsonat niatsotse taawok'o wotat beyiru Ik' imtso aaniy n deshiyitwok'o neesh gawirwe.
2TI 1:7 Ik'o noosh b́ imiye angonat shunikon, b́ took keewi shayira bako shati shayiraliye.
2TI 1:8 Eshe nodoonz jango gawosh jitsk'aye, b́ jangosh tipetso taan jitsk'aye, ernmó Ik'o neesh b́'imet angon doo shishiy jangosh taanton gond bek'o de'e.
2TI 1:9 Bí noo nofints sheeng finosh b́woterawo b́ took shunon b́ s'aatone noon b́ kashiy, s'ayinoshowere noon s'eegree, s'aatanowere ay duroniyere shino Iyesus Krstosn noosh imre.
2TI 1:10 Deeranwere noon woritso Iyesus Krstosn b́ waatsotse and be'ere. Bí k'iri ango tiitst dooshishiyon k'ir desha dúre dúre beyo noosh b́k'iitsi.
2TI 1:11 Taawere doo shishiyan nabituwo, wosheetso, danifo wotat naashere.
2TI 1:12 Gond bek'anowere tiats b́bodir man jangoshe, eree koni ti'amantsk'o tdantsosh jitseratse, taash imets adar man aawu man b́ borfetso t kotetwok'o danre.
2TI 1:13 Tiyoke n shishts ar wotts aap'man ariyok'o woshde Iyesus Krstosn n detsts imnetiyonat shunon kore.
2TI 1:14 Neesh imets sheeng adarman noyitse beyiru Shayiri s'ayinon korde'e.
2TI 1:15 Isiya eteets datsatse beyiru jamwots taan k'az boamtsok'owo danfnee, hanotsisnwere Fegelosnat Hermogenesitse fa'ane.
2TI 1:16 Ik'o Onesifor meyitsi ashuwotssh mhretiyo ime, bíwere ayoto taan kup'shre, t tipetsatsnowere jitseratse.
2TI 1:17 Dab́ Romi eteets datsumadan b́ waatsok'on kup'dek' geeyat taan b́ daatsi,
2TI 1:18 Dúr s'uwi aawu manotso Ik'o bísh mhretiyo ime, Efesonn t beemanor awuk'o taash b́ fintsok'o nee n tookon sheengsh dek'at danfnee.
2TI 2:1 Eshe t naayo! Iyesus Krstosoke daatseyiru s'aatatson kup'owe.
2TI 2:2 Ay gawwots shinatse tiyooke n dants dano, koshwotsi daniyosh falitwotsnat amanets ashuwotssh adaro ime.
2TI 2:3 Neewere Iyesus Krstossh kes'ts sheengo wotarr taanton gond bek'o be'e.
2TI 2:4 Kes' kes'iru asho bín kes'omants azaziruman gene'ushosh k'an dek'tso woto bín geyituwe bako kes' fin woteraw finats jinatse.
2TI 2:5 Mank'o wos'on bogosh wos'iru asho b́ nemok'on nohewo b́ k'azal da'er dek'et akliliyo daatsratse.
2TI 2:6 Finon maawiru goshtso b́finiruwotse daatset shuwatse shin daatsetso dek'o bísh geyife.
2TI 2:7 Doonzo jam keewatse t'iwintsdek'o neesh b́ ímetuwotse taa neesh tíetirwo n nibotse gawude'ee.
2TI 2:8 K'irotse tuuts Dawit naar wottso Iyesus Krstosi batk'aye, taawere t keewiru doo shishiyo maniye.
2TI 2:9 Doo shishiyan jangosh, gond fintsok'o muk'on tipeyat gondo t bek'iri, Ik' aap'onmó tiperatse.
2TI 2:10 Mansh boowere Iyesus Krstos weeron daatseyiru kashonat dúre dúri mangon bo daatsituwok'o, Ik'o boon marat'tswotssha er jam keewo taa k'amitwe.
2TI 2:11 Hank'o ett aap'man amaneke, «Bínton no k'iriyal, Bínton dab́ kashon nobetiye.
2TI 2:12 K'amoon kup'ar nodatseyal Bínton naashituwone. Noo bín nohaaliyalmó bíwere noon haalitwe.
2TI 2:13 Noo amanetsuwotsi wotonok'azal Bímo b́tooko b́ haalerawotse jam aawo amanetso wotar beetuwe.»
2TI 2:14 Keewan boosh gawiwe, aap'wots jangatse moosherawok'o Ik' shinatse boosh keewwe, aap'wotsn moshanuwere shishiru ashuwotsi b́ t'afiti bako egoshor woteratse.
2TI 2:15 Ari aap'man kááwon betsirwok'owonat b́ finon jitseraw fintso wotarr, Ik' shinatse n tooko n t'intsitwok'onat n keewre k'ebet asho nwotitwok'o k'aluwe.
2TI 2:16 Datsaatsikonat woteraw ooshiruwotsoke wokowe, man naari ooshiyo ashuwotsi iki bogshde'e Ik'atse bowokituwok'o b́woshiti,
2TI 2:17 Bo noon keew keewonere kasheraw gawok'o boon b́ bodeti, boyitsnowere Hemenewosnat Filit'osn fa'ane.
2TI 2:18 Ashaanotswere «K'irotse tuwo yoots shin shin wotere» ett mosht aratse wokwtserne, ik ik ashuwots imnetiyonowere giwshirune.
2TI 2:19 Ernmó «Doonzo bík wottsuwotsi danfee,» eshe «Doonzo shúts s'eegiru jamo gondatse wokowa» eteets mahatebiyo bíatse fa'o giwraw Ik'i ned'okoniye kup'arniye b́ beeti.
2TI 2:20 Een mootse awntsonat ambaron finets k'ac' mec'ro b́ woterawo mitonat shalon wozets k'ac'uwotswere daatsefnee, boowere ik ikuwots mang finosh ik ikuwots mang deshaw finats bojineti.
2TI 2:21 Mangosh woteraw keewanotsatse galeyat s'ayinon beyiru asho, mang finats jinet k'ac'ok'o wotituwe, sheeng finosh k'ants jamonat b́ doonzsh s'ayintsonat sheeng finats jinetwo wotituwe.
2TI 2:22 Jawetsori gond tewunatse wokowe, s'ayin nibon Ik' s'eegiru ashuwotsnton wotarr kááw finon, imnetiyon, shunon, jeeni jafrats sha'owe.
2TI 2:23 Fayeyo b́ dowetwok'o danr, daronot k'awnts desha mooshatse wokowe.
2TI 2:24 Doonzo Iyesussh guuts wottso, ash jamoke maac' nefo, daniyosh falituwonat k'amtso woto bín geyituwe bako fayeyo bín geyiratse.
2TI 2:25 Bín k'efiru ashuwotsi maac' nefon izitk woto bín geyife, daneraka bo ari keewo bo danal Ik'o danr boanituwok'o woshituwe.
2TI 2:26 Mank'owon bo nibo maantsan bo aaniyal Dablos shuno bok'alituwok'o boon b́ detsts kambotse keshutúnee.
2TI 3:1 Dúr s'uwi aawots kic'it aawo b́ weetuwok'o dande'e,
2TI 3:2 Ashuwots bo tooko shuntso, gizosh k'awuntirwotsi, t'a'irwotsi, míshetswotsi, c'ashiruwotsi, ind nihosh alerawwotsi, boosh k'alere uderawotsi, S'ayin woterawotsi,
2TI 3:3 Shun deshawwotsi, orowa erawwotsi, ash shútso t'afirwotsi, botook keewde'awwotsi, maac' kup'wotsi, sheeng wotts keewo shit'irwotsi,
2TI 3:4 Ash beshide imetuwotsi boatso korde'awuwotsi bog taana etiru mishetswotsi, Ik' shunoniye bogshdek't bo meets gene'úwo shunetuwotsi wotitune.
2TI 3:5 Ik'o ik'iruwotsi arefetsrne bobe'eti, wotowa bako Ik' ik'iy angonmó bohaaliti, hanotsk'o ashuwotsatse wokowe.
2TI 3:6 Hank'o ashmanots maa mootse mut'aarr kindfets morro boats b́ dakere k'osh k'osh tewunon sha'iru, kash weratse maawk wotts máátsuwotsi widon detset ashuwotsiye.
2TI 3:7 Mannaari máátsuwotsu jam aawe bo daniri, erenmó arik wotts danook bodosh falratsne.
2TI 3:8 Iyanesnat Iyanberesn Museyi bo k'eftsok'o ashaanots bo tokoono awaashtswotsnat bo imnetiyon diho boats b́ bodtsotse ari keewo k'efe bok'efiriye.
2TI 3:9 Iyanesnat Iyanberesn dark bowoto b́ be'etsok'o ashaanots dark bowotonuwe ash jami shinatse b́ be'etuwosh boosh kááweratse.
2TI 3:10 Neemó t daniyo, t beyo, t jangirwo, t imnetiyo, t k'amo, t shuno, t detsats t kup'tsok'o neewere tijafarats sha'erne,
2TI 3:11 Mank'owere t gishewonat tkic'o danfnee, Ans'okiyanat Ik'oniyonn Lst'ronnowere ti'ats bodts keewonat k'amoon t dek'ts gishewonowere danfnee, doonzonmó jamotse taan b́ faryi.
2TI 3:12 Iyesus Krstos jir wotar shayri beyon beyosh geyiru jamwotsats gishewo bodetuwe.
2TI 3:13 Ernmó gond ashuwotsnat ariyirwotsmó ash ashuwotsno darifetsŕ bo tokishowere shelfetsr, gondats gondo dabfera boameti,
2TI 3:14 Neemó konok danndek'tsok'o ndantsotse, n dantsotsok'onat ariko t'iwints ndek'tsatso kup'arr ned'owee.
2TI 3:15 Manshowere n na'ortson dek'at n tuutso Iyesus Krstosi amanon daatset kasho b́ daatset danitelefo dano neesh imet s'ayin mas'aafwotsi danrnee.
2TI 3:16 S'ayin mas'aaf jamo Ik'i shayiri S'ayinon jisheyat guut'eke, bíwere ariko daniyosh, sheeltswotsi fayosh, daronowere káátsootsnat kááwu beyoshowere k'antsomants jishituwo imosh t'ak'amitke.
2TI 3:17 Ik' asho s'ayin bowotituwok'onat jam keewu sheeng fino finosh falr b́ beetuewk'o betsoshe.
2TI 4:1 Ik'onat b́ mangsto b́ need'iwor kashon beyiruwotsnat k'irtsuwotsats angshituwo b́be'eoon Iyesus shinatse oona neen k'oniruwe,
2TI 4:2 Bí aap'ono naabúwee, b́ k'anoroo, k'ano b́ k'azoro jam aawo kup'de'er finowe, danifetsr, hadefetsr, izfetsr, k'amefetsr daniyon kup'owe.
2TI 4:3 Ashuwotssh kash daatsit danman shishosh geyo bok'azet aawo weetuwe, ernmó worewosh mirac'ar bo botookon boshunts keewo boosh keewr daniyituwotsi ko'idek'etunee.
2TI 4:4 Mansh ariko k'ebo k'ayr turur k'ebo shunetunee.
2TI 4:5 Neemó jam keewatse ni'atso korde, gond bek'orowere k'amdek'on kup'owe, doo shishiyo nabi keewono fin ishuwe, ni fin jamono s'eentswe.
2TI 4:6 Taayelee shukewosh t'iiniruwe, datsanatse tuur tiamet aawo bodre,
2TI 4:7 Kes'onere sheengsh dek'at kes'ree, wos'onowere nohewon b́ s'uufetsosh wos'ree, t imnetiyono kotre.
2TI 4:8 Eshe haniyak kááwi akliliyo taash k'anatniye taan b́ kotiri, aklilymanowere kááw angshiru doonzman manots taash imetuwe, b́ imetuwere t s'uzsh b́woterawo b́ be'ewo shuniru jamwotsshe.
2TI 4:9 Káári tiyok nweetwok'o wotowe,
2TI 4:10 Demas datsani shunt tiatse k'alewtsere, Teselonk'e maantsowere k'azamree, K'erk'is Gelatiy maants, Titowere Dlmat'i eteets datsomants amree.
2TI 4:11 Taanton fa'o Luk'as s'uziye, Mark'os Ik'i finosh taash b́dabish geede'er wowe.
2TI 4:12 Tikik'osi Efeson maants woshk'rere.
2TI 4:13 Nwoor T'iro'ad datsatse Karpusokee k'aztwaats kaaboo taash de'ewowe, b́ mas'aafwotsi bítsnor Branikuwotsi taash de'ewowe.
2TI 4:14 K'aaz k'is'fo Eskndr ayidek'tniye tiats gondo b́ betsi, doonzo b́ finok'o bísh dashetwe.
2TI 4:15 Bí noo nok'alirwo kup'sh dek't b́ k'efiruwotse neewor ntokish bí'atse n tooko korde'e.
2TI 4:16 Boon s'amiyets keewatse shino moosho dek'at tt'iintstsok'on jametsuwots tiatsna k'az bok'aleyi bako taanton wotdek't mooshtso konuwor aaliye b́teshi, keewmanor Ik'o naandok'o woshde boats taawk'aye.
2TI 4:17 Ernmó woshman t weeron s'eenon keeweyarr Ik' danaw ash jamó b́o k'ebetuwok'o doonzo taanton wotat́ taan kup'shre, Eeshi noonotsnowere taan ooriree.
2TI 4:18 Doonzo taan gond keew jamotse farire, darotse fa'o b́ mengstosh taan betsituwe, dúre dúron mango bísh wotowa! Amen.
2TI 4:19 P'rsk'lonat Ak'ilnsh, Onesiforum maa ashuwotssh t jamó t'intsuwe.
2TI 4:20 Erast'ros K'orontositse ooruwtsere, Profimos shodt Milit'itse k'azwaaree.
2TI 4:21 Joosho b́ kindfetsere tiyok nweetwok'o wotowe. Ewubulos, P'udes, Linos, K'lawiyanat amants jamwotswor jamo neesh t'intsirune.
2TI 4:22 Doonzo it shayironton wotowe. Ik'i s'aato itnton wotowe.
TIT 1:1 Ik'i guutsonat Iyesus Krstos wosheets wottso P'awulosoke, Ik'o galbdek'ts ashuwotsi bo imnetiyon kup'shr, Ik'i ash beyo maants jishit aro bodanetwok'o wosheetso,
TIT 1:2 Imnetiyanúwere Ik'o dúre dúri beyo imosh noosh b́jangitsatse need'ke, koorawo Izar Izewer kashan noosh imosh jam dúroniyere shin noosh taarre.
TIT 1:3 Ari b́ gizewo b́ bodtsok'on noon worits Ik'o azaztsok'on taa t shishiyitwok'o taash imets adarok'on Ik'o bí aap'tso b́ jangi.
TIT 1:4 Noshir wotts imnetiyon arikon t naayi wottsosh neesh Titosh, Ik'o nihoknat noon kashitso Krstos Iyesusokere s'aatonat jeenon neesh wotowe.
TIT 1:5 Neen K'ert'esitse k'aztk'rtso eegoshe manutseraawo manutsir, neen tiazaztsok'on Ik'i máá eenashwotsi kit kitotse nnaashitwok'owe.
TIT 1:6 Ik'i máá eenasho eeg eeg bíatse deshawonat mááts iku kenihi wottsoni, shiraats jintsi wotonat bo alek'azeyatse tuutson k'ooreraw amants nana'úwotsi detsts asho woto bín geyife.
TIT 1:7 Ik'i maa jishirwo Ik'i fino adaron b́ dek'tsotse bíyatse eeg eeg deshaw s'ayino woto bín geyife, mank'owore bika bako shiyawo, káári fayerawo, masherawo, fayetsi woterawo, gizosh k'awntrawo woto bín geyife.
TIT 1:8 Maniyere ib dek'fo, sheeng keewo shuntso, káts wottso, kááwo, Ik'i finosh gaaletso, bítook kewdek'faltso wotowe.
TIT 1:9 Arik wotts dano daniwon izosh k'efirwotsshowere aani dek'o b́falitwok'o danb́dek'ts amanets aap'ats kup'de'e.
TIT 1:10 Ay ashuwots, bítsnor Ayhudi jirwotsi wottswots gofami niwo shoyirwots, alerawwots, datsmec'ron ooshirwotsnat dashirwots fa'ane.
TIT 1:11 Ashaanotsi s'k boetetuwok'o wosho geyife, bo jitsit oot'o daatsosh woteraw keewo danifetst maa ash asho boshek'iri.
TIT 1:12 Boyitse iko, botook nebiyiwo «K'ert'es ashuwots jam aawo kootetswotsi, gond s'ootswotsi, fin biitsts maac' geenzwotsiye» etre.
TIT 1:13 Gawets gawanúwere arikee, mansh eshe shod deshaw imnetiyo bodetsetwok'o ashaanotsi ayide hadowe.
TIT 1:14 Ayhudi tururi shuutso bo sha'irwok'o, ariko k'efiru ashuwots tzaziwotsno bok'ewawok'o kup'shde'e hadowe.
TIT 1:15 S'ayn nib detstswotssh, jam keewo s'ayine, kiimwotsnat amaneraw ashuwotsshmó s'ayin wottso eegonwor aaliye, dabnwor bonibo wotowa bomaac'o kiimwtske.
TIT 1:16 «Ik'o danfone» etirune, bofiinonmó jamere etetune bísha, bo wic'iknee, alerawwotsna sheeng keewo iko k'alo falawwotsiye.
TIT 2:1 Neemó kááw danonton ik wotts dano daniwe,
TIT 2:2 Eenash wotts nungshwots, bo detsts detsok'on beetwotsi, bo mango kotdek'tswotsi, bo atso kotdek'tswotsi, imnetiyonat shunon, k'amonowere jeenwotsi bowotitwok'o izwe.
TIT 2:3 Mank'owere eenash wotts máátswots bo Ik' shatirwotsi bowotitwokowa bako oonetswotsnat, úsho shuntsowotsi bowoterawok'onat sheeng daniyo bodaniyituwok'o izuwe.
TIT 2:4 Hank'owere guuy máátswots bo kenihotsnat bo nana'on bo shuneetwok'o,
TIT 2:5 botook kewdek'tswotsnat s'ayinwotsn, mootse sheengon finirwotsi, bo kenihotsshowere keweyirwotsi bo wotitwok'o daniwne. Han bok'alitwere Ik' aap'o b́ k'eferawok'owe.
TIT 2:6 Hank'owere jawetswots botoko korde'er bo beetwok'o izwe.
TIT 2:7 Neewere sheeng wottso finefetsr jamkeewon boosh sheengon arewe, n danon kááw nwoto, ari keew kewetsi n woto kitswe,
TIT 2:8 K'oorerawo jeeni noon keewo boosh kitswe, hank'on k'efirwots no ats bo keewit gond keewo bo t'ut'or jiitsitune.
TIT 2:9 Guutswotswere bodoonzotssh bo kewetwok'o, jam keewonowere boon bogene'úshitwok'o, boosh bok'ayawok'o,
TIT 2:10 bo gizonowere boatse boúmp'erawok'o izwe, maniyere dab noon kashit Ik' dano jam keewon b́ mangitwok'o jam aawo b́ jamon amanek nwoto kitsitne.
TIT 2:11 Ik'o asho bín b́kashiyit b́s'aato jam ashosh kish kitsre,
TIT 2:12 deeranuwere jamere etonat meets tewunon k'ayk'rar b́ tooko korde'er, kááwonat shayiri beewon datsanatse no beetwok'owe noon b́ daniyiri.
TIT 2:13 Hank'on no jangirw deeretso, hank'owere noko eeno Izar Izewer, noon kashiyitwo Iyesus Krstos mangon b́ be'ewo kotirwone.
TIT 2:14 Krstos weeri god jamatse noon kashiyir sheeng fino finosh maawirwotsnat bísh gaalets s'ayin ashuwotsi nowotitwok'o noon s'ayintsosh no shegro b́ tooko beshidek't b́ími.
TIT 2:15 Eshe keewanotsi daniwe, ali s'eenonowere izwe, fayono fayowe, konwor neen b́ gac'eraawok'owa.
TIT 3:1 Ash jametso kéwirwotsnat naashwotsnsh b́tooko dashan detson bo aletwok'o, sheeng keew jamo finosh k'andek'tswotsi bowotitwok'o,
TIT 3:2 konatsor gond keewo bo keewrawok'o boosh gawiwe, dab maniyere ashonton fayerawwotsnat maac'nefwotsi, b́ jamon ash jamosh bo tooko dashan detso kitsitwotsi wotoone,
TIT 3:3 Noowere haniyere shin danawwotsi, azazerawwotsi morrgondwotsi, noweeronowere sheelk'rts woterawwotsi, k'osh k'osh naari gusiyonat meetso geneúwoshosh kewetswots, weerigondonat nemi gondon beefwots, shit'eetswotsnat no atsatseyo fayefwotsiye noteshi.
TIT 3:4 Ernmó no ato Ik'o doo wotonat ash shunon b́ be'ewor,
TIT 3:5 noo nofints S'ayin finon b́ woterawo b́ took maac' k'ewon noon kashire, noon b́ kashiyiwere handr shweyon mashonat S'ayin shayiri weeron daatsets handrone.
TIT 3:6 Ik'o noon kashitwo Iyesus Krstosn b́ shayiro ayidek't noosh kuut're.
TIT 3:7 Hanowere b́k'al b́ s'aaton kááwar jangat nokotir dúre dúri kasho nonaatetwok'owe.
TIT 3:8 Etetsanwere amaneke. Ik'on amants ashuwots sheeng finosh bokup'itwok'o keew jamahan kup'shde'er ngawiitwok'o geefe, keewanwere sheengonat ashosh ik ikon ot'etske.
TIT 3:9 Ernmó dartswots mooshatse, naar taawotse, fayotse, nematse tuutson twit fayatse wokowe, keewanots eegor oot'deshawonat k'awntsalwotsiye.
TIT 3:10 K'alewo dowet asho iknoto wee gitoto bín ni iziyakon bíyatse wokowe.
TIT 3:11 Hank'o wotst asho k'uuronat morretske, bí b́ tookats angshtso b́wottsok'o dande'e.
TIT 3:12 Art'emasi wee Tikik'osi itmaants twoshoor nee Nik'olyonits t maants wosh káárwe, taa joosho biyoke beshiyosh k'ut'dek're.
TIT 3:13 Nem dantso Zenasnat Ap'losn bo sha'o de'er botwitwok'o woshwe, boosh geyit keew jamonowere boon tewu'e.
TIT 3:14 Noo ashuwotsuwere aani shwalo bo'orerawok'o err beyi kic'o ketiyo bofalitwok'o sheeng fino finosh dande'ene.
TIT 3:15 Taanton fa'a jamwots jamó neesh t'intsirune, imnetiyon noonton kayitwotsi wotts no mashots bojamets jamo neesh t'intsirune. Ik'oko s'aato it únetsnton wotowe.
PHM 1:1 Krstos Iyesus jangosh tipetso tiyoke P'awlosnat no eshu T'imotiyosokere, shunetso no eshuu no fini tooh wottsosh Filimonsh,
PHM 1:2 no mish Afbyash noonton Krstossh kaarts wottsosh Arikip'assh, mank'owere n meyits ko'eyiru amantsuwotssh,
PHM 1:3 No nihi Ik'oke, no doonz Iyesus Krstos s'aatetonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
PHM 1:4 Ik'o tk'onor itn gawfetsat jam aawo Izar Izeweri udirwe,
PHM 1:5 Doonzo Iyesussh n detsts shunonat imnetiyon ando amantsuwotssh shuno n detstsok'o shishre,
PHM 1:6 Krstosk no wottsosh no detsts sheeng keew jamo keer b́ danetwok'o n imnetiyo k'oshwotssh kayiyosh n kúp'itwok'o Ik'o k'onitwe.
PHM 1:7 Ti eshuwo! niatse tuutson amantsuwots nibo b́ handrtsosh n shuno een wotts gene'onat kúp'o taash imre.
PHM 1:8 K'alo neesh b́geyitwo k'alwe err neen azazosh Krstosn ááw shuuk'o tdetsalor,
PHM 1:9 mank'o k'aloniyere Krstos Iyesus jangosh tipetso taa eenasho P'awlos shunon k'ono marat'itwe.
PHM 1:10 taa tipi mootse t beyor Shayiron t naayi wottso Onesimos jangosh neen k'onre.
PHM 1:11 Onasimos haniyere shin k'awntsalke b́ teshi, andomo taash wotowa neeshor t'ak'amitke.
PHM 1:12 Hambe bín niyok aanidek' woshere, bín niyok twoshoor t took níbo twoshtsok'o woshde'er taawitwe.
PHM 1:13 Doo shishi jangosh hanokere tipeyat t beyor n shegro wotar taash b́ finish bí taanton b́wotink'e geneúyank'ee b́ teshi,
PHM 1:14 Ernmó n sheeng fino angnon b́ woterawo shunon b́ wotituwok'owa etaat nee niekeraniyere eegoru k'alo geeratse.
PHM 1:15 Onesimos andish b́ borfetso múk' gizewosh niyatse b́k'ale daneraka haniyere hakon jam gizeyosh neenton beyosh wotituwe.
PHM 1:16 Haniyak guutsok'o b́ woterawo guutsoniyere bog wotar shuneets eshúwok'owiye, bí taash shuneets eeshúwe, neeshmó iki bogo aaw aawi b́ beyonat doonzon shune eshwok'oyiye.
PHM 1:17 Eshe taanton tohaat finef tohok'o woshdek'at tawurne wotiyal arikon taank'o woshde'er bín de'e.
PHM 1:18 Neen b́ dadtso fa'e wotiyal wee k'awntso biyatse fa'e wotiyal b́ k'awntsman tiyats woshuwe.
PHM 1:19 Eshe taa P'awlos «Bíyatse fa'a k'awntso dashetwe» etaat t took kishon t guut'tsok'o danire, ernmó n kashosh nee n tookon dab taash k'awnts n wottsok'o taa neesh t gawiyo geyiratse.
PHM 1:20 Eshe tí eshwo! sheeng keewan taash n k'alitwok'o doozon neen k'onirwe oona neesha t nibo Krstosn taash handriwe.
PHM 1:21 Neesh t guut'tsansh taash ni'alletwok'o amanere, monk'owere taa ti aattsoniyere bogo n k'alituwok'o danfee.
PHM 1:22 Mannowere Ik'o it k'ono shiyir itok t weetwok'o b́ woshitwok'o t tewnirwotse bíts t kashit moo taash k'aniwe.
PHM 1:23 Krstos Iyesus jangosh taanton tipetso Ep'afra jamo itsh t'intsirwe,
PHM 1:24 Mank'owere t fini tooh wottswots Mark'os, Arst'rokos, Demas, Luk'aswere jamo neesh t'intsirune.
PHM 1:25 Doonzo Iyesus Krstos s'aato it Shayironton wotowe.
HEB 1:1 Ik'o yoots dúr ay weerindon, nebiyiwots weeron nonih nih wotssh ayoto keewtni b́ teshi,
HEB 1:2 Andomó dúr s'uwanatse jam keewo b́ naatetwok'o b́ woshtson b́ naay weeron noosh keewre, dats jamonowere bíne bí'azi.
HEB 1:3 Ik'i mango golr b́be'et bíyatsne, bí b́ doyon b́ s'eenon Ik'onton ike. B́ kúp' aap'on azeets jamo tep'dek't kurirwee, ash ashuwots morro b́ s'ayintsiyakon darotse Ik' kup'o k'ani aaromants beewtsere.
HEB 1:4 Eshe bísh imets shúútso melakiwotssh imets shúútsoniyere bogtso b́ wottsok'oon Ik'o naay, melakiwotsiyere ayidek't boge.
HEB 1:5 B́ jamon melakiwotsitse, «Neehe t naay neene, hambets taa neen shuure,» Wee «Taa bísh nih wotitwe, bíwere t naayi wotituwe» bí ettso konshe?
HEB 1:6 Ik'o b́ naay k'aabo datsanats b́woshor «Melaki jamwots bísh sagadone» etre.
HEB 1:7 B́ melakiwots jangoshmó «B́ melakiwotsi shayirwotsi B́ gutswotsno taw laluwo woshitwee» bí eti.
HEB 1:8 B́ naayi jangoshmó, «Ik'ono! n naashi jooro dúre dúroshe b́ beeti, N mengsti gumbonu kááwon bín nk'eezit gumbee,
HEB 1:9 Kááwu finono n shuni, morri gondo n shit'i, Manatse tuutson Ik'o neen, n tohwotsiyere bog gene'úwo neesh imet fuuto níats b́ fuuti» etfe.
HEB 1:10 Andowere aani, «Doonzono! nee shin shino datsu nk'oons'i, Darwotswere nkishi finnee,
HEB 1:11 Bo jametswere t'afitkne, Neemó beetune, Bo jametswere tahok'o s'uwitkne
HEB 1:12 Shemok'o boon k'odetune, Bowere tahok'o wonetúnee, Nemó jam aawo woneratsnee, N dúronwere s'uwo deshatse» bíeti
HEB 1:13 Ik'o b́ melakiwotsitse, «N balangarwotsi n tufi shirots t gedfetso t k'ano maantsan beewe» bí et konshe?
HEB 1:14 Bere, melaki jamwots kashit ash ashuwotssh finosh wosheets Ik'i guuts wotts shayirwotsi woteratsnowa?
HEB 2:1 Eshe no shishts keewatse shortarr no dihirawok'o no shishits keew man jango sheengsh kordek'o noosh geyitwe.
HEB 2:2 Melakiwots weeron keewets aap'o arik wotwtsere, keewan finats jiitsrawonat keewmansho alerawo bísh wotit fayo daatsre,
HEB 2:3 Eshe, no kashts kash een wotts keewan no aatsnitka wotiyal aawk'oneya b́ shirotse keshosh nofaliti? Kashaanowere shin shin shishiyo dek'tuutso b́ tookon doonzoniye, bíyoke shishts ashuwotswere ar b́wottsok'o danirne.
HEB 2:4 Ik'onwere dabt milkiton, adits keewon, k'osh k'osh aditswotsi woshonat b́ shunok'o b́ imts shayiri S'ayin weeron bo gawts gawo kup'shre.
HEB 2:5 Ik'o shinomaants weet datsu, no bjango nokeweyiru melakiwots bin boosh kewiratse
HEB 2:6 Dab́ S'ayin mas'aafwotsitse ikoke hank'o eteere, «Nee bín n gawitwok'osh asho eebi? Bo kis'o n detsetwok'o ash na'o eebi?
HEB 2:7 Melakiwotsiyere muk'i ndashiyi Mangonat údi zewdiyo b́ tookats n gedi
HEB 2:8 Jam keewo bí ali shirots n woshi.» Jam keewo bí ali shirots b́ woshor, bí ali shirots woshraniyere b́ ooritso eegonwor aaliye. Ernmó and jam keewo b́ fa'ok'on bí ali shirotse b́ beyirwok'o andish b́borfetso be'afa'one.
HEB 2:9 Andomó muk' aawush melakiwotsiyere muk'i dashan teshts k'iri gond bek'o b́daatstsosh mangonat údi zewdiyo kurdek'tso Iyesusi bek'etwone, bí Ik'i s'aaton no únetssh k'irre.
HEB 2:10 Jam keewo bínat b́tookish azdek'ts Ik'o ay nana'úwotsi mangomants dowosh bo kashit weero jishitwo Iyesusi gond bek'on s'een b́ wotitwok'o b́woshi.
HEB 2:11 Ashuwotsi S'ayin woshitwonat b́weeron S'ayin wotts ashuwotswere nih iko nana'úwotsiye, manatse tuwtson Iyesus bonowere «T eshwotsiye» err s'eegosh jitseratse.
HEB 2:12 Mansh S'ayin mas'aafwotsitse «N shúútso tieeshwotssh keewitwe, Ashuwots bokakwetsokee botaalotse dubon neen uditwe» etre.
HEB 2:13 Mank'o «Taa bí ats t imneitiyo juwitwe» etre, Ando aani «Hamb eshe taanat Ik'o taash b́imts nana'awotsn hanok noone» etre.
HEB 2:14 Mansh nana'anots meetsonat s'atson detsk ash bowottsotse Iyesuswere bokok'o ash b́wotiye, man b́ k'alwere b́ k'irtsatse tuutson k'iratse al detstso dablosi t'afiyoshee.
HEB 2:15 Mank'o k'ir shati jangosh bo dúr jamo guuts wotat kéweyat beyirwotsi aaniy kewdek'oshee.
HEB 2:16 Iyesus shuno, melakiwotsi b́ woterawo, Abraham naaro tep'oshee.
HEB 2:17 Mansh jam keewo bí eshwots kok'o woto bísh geyife b́teshi, mank'oon ashuwots morro orowa etosh Ik'osh finosh amanetsonat maarts kahni naashwotsatsi k'aabo b́wotiye.
HEB 2:18 Bí b́ tookosh fadeyat gondo b́bek'tsotse fadeyrwotsi tep'o falitwe.
HEB 3:1 Darotse iti s'eegetsman kayitu wotts S'ayin amantsuwotso! no imneti kahni naashwots k'aab'onat Ik'o woshtso Iyesusats it aawo gerde'ere.
HEB 3:2 Muse Ik' maa jamatse amanek b́ teshtsok'o Iyesuswere bín naashits Ik'osh amaneke b́ teshi.
HEB 3:3 Maa agtso mooniyere bog mango b́detstsok'owa Iyesus Museyiyere bogts mango daatso bísh geyife.
HEB 3:4 Maa ik iko bín agts asho detsfe, jam keewo agtsonmó Ik'oniye.
HEB 3:5 Shinomaants keewu geyit keewosh gaw b́wotitwok'o Muse Ik'i maa jamatse amanek guutse b́teshi.
HEB 3:6 Krstosmó Ik'o maantse amanetso b́wot na'ok'o wotatniye, b́moonwere noone, b́ moo nowotitwere bí'ats no amanit keewonat arikon bín detsfone err bín noit'irwo nojangtso kup'ide desh nodek'oree.
HEB 3:7 Eshe S'ayin shayiro bí'etirwok'on «Hambets b́ k'ááro it shishor
HEB 3:8 Worwotse taan it fador ti'ats it tuutsok'o It nibo k'aztsi woshk'ayere,
HEB 3:9 Hansh it nihots taan bo fadi taanton bo weed'eyi Hab natosh tk'altsonowere bobek'i» etfe Ik'oni.
HEB 3:10 «Mansh man dúri s'ootwotsi t fayere, ‹Bonibo jam aawo b́sheliri, T weerindonowere danatsne› ti eti.»
HEB 3:11 Aaninwere, « ‹Taa boosh ti imet kashdek'et beyok b́ jamon kindratsnee!› etaat Fayat taarre.»
HEB 3:12 Ti eshwotso! ititse beyat beyiru Ik'atse wokit gondonat amaneraw nibo b́ deshawok'o it atso korde'ere.
HEB 3:13 Eshe, ititse morron dasheyar b́ nibo k'aztsi b́ woshrawok'o «Hambetsa» et s'eegets aawo b́ befetsosh aaw aawon it atsatsewo izewere.
HEB 3:14 Shin shin no detstso no imnetiyo b́s'uwi aawo b́borfetsosh kup'de deshnodek'etka wotiyal Krstosnton bano kayitwotsi wotitwone.
HEB 3:15 Manwere «Hambets b́ k'ááro it shishor Weri gondi dúrmanor it k'altsinaaro it nibo k'aztsi woshk'ayere» et keewetsok'one.
HEB 3:16 Wotowa bako b́ k'ááro boshishyakon gondat k'aztsmanots konotsne boteshi? Boon Muse jishdek't Gbs'itse dek' b́keshtswotsiwoshná?
HEB 3:17 Ik'o nibo hab nati s'eeno k'úúnit teshtswots konotsne? Morro finat boere boduuno worwotse dihit oortswotsiwoshna?
HEB 3:18 Eshe bísh aleratse eteets manotsi b́ wotiyalabako «T kashdek'i beyok kindratste» et boats b́ taartswots konotsne bo teshi?
HEB 3:19 Eshe kindo bomaaw amano bok'aztsatse tuutson b́ woto bek'rone.
HEB 4:1 Eshe, bí noosh b́ imetu kashdek'i beyokok kindosh noosh jangiyetso andoor b́besherafa'otse ititse konúwor kashdek'i beyok manok kindo b́ datsrawo b́ oorerawok'o nounetswor no'atso korde'one.
HEB 4:2 Sheeng doo shishi keewo bo boshishtsok'o noowere shishrone, ernmó bo boshishts aap'o amanat dek'o bok'aztsotse boosh eegor k'alratse.
HEB 4:3 B́ fino, shin datsu bí azor tuut s'uuk b́wotiyalor, «Taa boosh ti imet kashdek'okok b́jamon kindratsno etaat fayat taarre» bí ettsok'on andoor no bín amanirwots Ik'o noosh b́ imet kash dek'i beyokmanits kinditwone.
HEB 4:4 Beyok ikoke shawatl aaw jangosh, «Ik'o b́ fin jamáátse shawatl aawotse kashb́dek'i» ett guut'ere.
HEB 4:5 Mank'owere hanoke aani «Taa ti imts kashdek'okok b́ jamon kindratsnee» etfe.
HEB 4:6 Doo shishiyets keewman shin shin shishtswots bísh alewo bok'aztsotse boosh imet kashdek'ok manok kindratsnee, b́wotefermó manits bokinditwok'owa eteets ik ikwots fa'ane.
HEB 4:7 Manwere shin shin eteetsok'on «Hambets b́ k'ááro it shishor, it nibo k'aztso k'ayere.» et Ik'o ay dúroniye il Dawit weeron b́ keewts aap'o «Hambetsa» ett s'eegts aawo k'osh aawo Ik'o beezree.
HEB 4:8 Iyasu boosh kashdek'o imre wotink'e, Ik'o ando aaniy «Hambetsa» err k'osh aawi jango keewrawnk'ee b́ teshi.
HEB 4:9 Eshe Ik'i ashuwotssh sanbat aawi kashdek'o oor fa'ee.
HEB 4:10 Ik'o b́ finatse kashb́dek'tsok'o mank'o Ik'o b́ imet kashdek'ok kinditwo b́ finatse kashdek'etwee.
HEB 4:11 Mansh konwor ashmanots ale k'azi areyo shoyde b́ dihrawok'o, Ik'oki kashdek'ok kindosh kup'de'oone.
HEB 4:12 Ik'i aap'otso beyat beek wotat aaninwere finkee, git weeron shash detsts shikoniyere bogts shashe, kashonat shayiron, shas'onat jeemplon b́ galeefetsosh k'ut'itkee, nibi gitsotse ááshts hasabinat tewnon p'ec'de'er angshitkee
HEB 4:13 Ik'o shinatse ááshit azeetso eegonwor aaliye, bí ááwatse jam keewo sháánonat araats wotarr be'etke, noowere no aatet b́ shinaatsne.
HEB 4:14 Eshe daarwotsits k'ut'beshat dambaan daromaants amkindts eeno kahni naashwotsatsi k'aabo nodetstsotse no imnetiyo kup'ide'er deshde'one, kahniwotsatsi naashi k'aabonwere Ik'i na'o Iyesusiye.
HEB 4:15 No nodetsts kahni naashwotsatsi k'aabo noo angi maawatse noosh maac' k'ew falitke, bí jamkeewon nokok'oye b́ fadeyi, wotowaere iku morro fineratse.
HEB 4:16 Eshe mhreto daatsr tep'o noosh b́geyit aawon s'aato nodaatsitwok'o s'aato b́daatsetwok Ik' be joorok ik shatalon t'iinone.
HEB 5:1 Kahniwotsatsi naash ik iko ashuwotsitse galeyar Ik'onton gonkit kis'aatse ashuwots shegro wotaarr mebonat wosho t'intsosh b́ naashiyefoni.
HEB 5:2 Bí b́tookon maawk b́detstsotse dartswotsnat sheeltswotsi maac' k'ewon s'iilo falitwe.
HEB 5:3 Bí b́ tokooshor maaw ash b́wottsatse tuutson morrosh oorowe eto daatsitwosho t'intso bín b́ geyit ashuwts s'uzsh b́woterawo b́ tookishorniyee.
HEB 5:4 Aronkok'o Ik'on s'eegetso b́ wotiyala bako konwor manghan b́tookon daatsratse.
HEB 5:5 Krstoswor mank'o b́ tookon kahniwotsatse naash k'aabo woti mango de'atse, ernmó bí kahni naashi k'aab wotimango b́ datsi, «Neehe t na'o neene, Taa hambets neen shuure» etts Ik'okne.
HEB 5:6 K'osh beyokoknowere Ik'o, «Melkes'edik' naashtsok'o Neehe dúre dúrosh kahni neene» etfe.
HEB 5:7 Ash wotat datsnatse b́ beyor, Iyesus k'irotse bín kashiyosh falit Ik'o maants een k'aaronat ay aac'uwo kuut'fetst Ik'o b́ k'oni, Ik'o b́shattsosh b́ k'ontso Ik'o b́ k'ebiye.
HEB 5:8 Ik'o naayi wotk'ay b́wotiyalor b́ bek'ts gond bek'atse aleyo danb́dek'i.
HEB 5:9 S'een wotat b́datseyakon aleyiru jamwots dúre dúron b́weeron kashitune.
HEB 5:10 Manwere Ik'o Melkes'edik' kahani naashok'o naashi k'aab woshdek't bín b́ naashiy.
HEB 5:11 Keewan jangosh tkeewit keewo ay fa'ee, ernmó t'iwintsdek'osh falitk woto it k'aztsosh itsh daniyosh mange.
HEB 5:12 Andish b́ borfetsosh it danifwotsi woto faliyank'te b́ teshi, ernmó Ik'i aap'o shints dano itsh aani danitwo k'osh asho geyife, mansh mank'oon eshe itsh geyitwo ez goora bako kup' mishaliye,
HEB 5:13 Ez goor mec'ron beyiru jamo na'i marmat' b́ wottsotse sheeng keewonat gond keewon galdek'i dano dande'afa'e.
HEB 5:14 Kup' misho boosh b́geyitswotsmó sheegonat gondon galdek'i doy detsts ash een eenwotsiye.
HEB 6:1 Eshe Krstos jangosh shin shin noosh imets danman shuutsomaants k'ayik'rar, s'een wottso maants beshone, k'irts finatse naandrone err Ik'o amnon neediyetsatsere tuur aani need'ik'ayone,
HEB 6:2 Ikinwere aatsots gupi jango, ashaats kish gedo, k'irotse tuwi jango, dúre dúr angshi jangosh wotit dano aani need'ik'ayone.
HEB 6:3 Doonzon tooh han k'alitwone.
HEB 6:4 Bo imnetiyo k'az k'rts ashuwotsi Ik'o mandan aaniyosh faleratse. Ashaanots haniye shin shááno bek'rne, daratsnowere imeyiru imo shawshdek'rne, S'ayin shayratse kaydek'tswotsi woterne boteshi.
HEB 6:5 Ik' sheeng aap'onat weet dúri angon shawshdek'rne boteshi,
HEB 6:6 Jamaniyere il bo imnetiyatse shuutso maants boaanitka wotiyal bo botookon Ik'o Na'o aani jitetwotsnat ash shinatse bín bo ketitwotse boon naandre etomnadan aainyo faleratse.
HEB 6:7 Ayoto bi'atsats oot'iru awsho ushiru datsu, bí'ats maay shookts ashuwotssh k'awnts detstso imiru datsu deero Ik'oke daatsitwaniye.
HEB 6:8 Angitsonat daaz angitson b bos'itka wotiyalmó k'awnts deshake bwotiti, kárn aawotsnowere c'asheetwane, b s'uwonwere tawon mis'e b́ wotiti.
HEB 6:9 Shuneets eshwotso! dab mank'o tkeewiyalorni, it itkashit kasho dowet k'ants keewo it detsdek'tso arik b́wottsok'oniye no dankee.
HEB 6:10 Ik'o kááwon angshkee, mansh it fintsonat shinowere andowere s'ayinwotsi tep'osh b́shúútsosha etaat it kitsts shuno bateratse.
HEB 6:11 It unetswor jangdek'at it kotiru keewo desh itdek'fetsosh kup'arr b́ s'uwi aawo b́ borfetsosh it kup'o it kitsitwok'owe noteewniri,
HEB 6:12 No tewnirwere bo imnetiyonat k'amoon kup'arr boosh jangiyets keewo naatet ashuwotsi it aritwok'owa bako jik' mangwotsi it wotitwok'owaliye.
HEB 6:13 Ik'o Abrahamsh b́ jangiwor bín b́ taaritwo b́ tookoniyere bogo k'osho konwor bí altsotse hank'o ett b́tookon b́ taari,
HEB 6:14 «Arikon neen deritwe, nnaronowere ayituwe.»
HEB 6:15 Abraham k'amoon kott bísh jangiyets keewo daatsre.
HEB 6:16 Ash ashuwots bo taaror boyere bogts shúútsone bo taarfoniye, bo keewonowere taaron kup'irr bo dagotse fa'a moosh jamonowere bo ishfooni.
HEB 6:17 Eshe mank'oon Ik'o b́ keewts keewo wonerak b́wottsok'o kitsosh geeyat b́ jangitso naatetwots b́ jangits taaro boosh b́ kup'iyi.
HEB 6:18 Ik'o hank'on wonerawotsnat bo jangosh b́ kooraw git keewwotsi, manotswere jangiyonat taaron noosh imre, git keewanotsatse tuutso no shinatse fa'o noosh b́ jangitso kup'shr desh dek'o nofalitwok'o, ááshoko daatsosh b́ maants wos'tswots no een angikup'o daatsitwone.
HEB 6:19 Jangeyirwan no kashosh shek'eraw kup' wotts mehlik'iya eteetsok'oyiye, Iyesusn no jangts jango Ik' meyitsi degoniyere beshar gitsots kinditwe.
HEB 6:20 Beyok manokowere kahni naasho Iyesus Melkes'edik'kok'o dúre dúrosh kahaniwotsats naashi k'aabok'o wotat no shegro shino kindre.
HEB 7:1 Melkes'edek'hanwere Salem nugúsonat jamoniyere bog wotts Ik'osh kahniye b́ teshi, Melkes'edek'uwere Abraham naash naashwotsi da'at bí aanor weerindatse bín gonkat b́deeri.
HEB 7:2 Abrahamwere b́detsts jamotse tatslo kishdek't bísh b́ ími, Melkes'edek' shúútsi bits shintso «kááw Nugúsa» etee. Bíwere «Salem Nugúsee» han etonu «Jeeni Nugúsa» etee.
HEB 7:3 Melkes'edik' daneets nihonat indun b́detstsok'o guut'etsotse daneets shuweyi s'ap'o deshatse, b́ dúri tuwokonat b́ kashi geenzo s'uwoko deshatse, Melkes'edik'an Ik'o Naaykok'o ariyetso dúre dúrosh kahni wotatniye b́beeyi.
HEB 7:4 Ashaan aawk'o een b́wottsok'o s'iilere, shints nihwotssh nih wottso Abraham woor dab kes'oke biik'b́dots keewatse tatslo kishdek'tniye b́ imiye.
HEB 7:5 Kahni finats beezeyiru Lewi naarotse ash ashuwotsitse, Abraham naaratse, man etonwere bo eshwotsatse tatslo bodek'etwok'o nemo azazere.
HEB 7:6 Melkes'edik'man dab Lewiwwots naar woto b́ k'azalor Abrahamoke tatslo dek're, bísh jangiyetso Abrahamnor derree.
HEB 7:7 Muk'efo biyere eeno kishatse deero b́ dek'etwok'owo aato deshatse.
HEB 7:8 Tatsl dek'irwots ik weeron k'irtke wotkne, k'oshweeronmó tatsl dek'irwo kashon b́ beetwok'o bísh gawetso Melkes'edik'iye.
HEB 7:9 Melkes'edek' Abrahamnton b́gonkeyor Lewi b́nih Abrahamatse b́ shwerafa'otse tatsl dek'o bísh b́geyitso Lewi b́ tookosh Abraham weeron tatslo dashre etee.
HEB 7:11 Ashuwotssh nemo ime Lewi kahaniyo weerone, Lewawino etefanoots kahni weeran s'een woto daatsere wotink'ere Aron kahny naasho b́woterawon Melkes'edik' naash detstso k'osh kahniyo b́woo geyirawnk'ee b́teshi,
HEB 7:12 kahani fino b́ woneewor nemonwere bínton towaar wonewo geyife.
HEB 7:13 Jaman b́ jangosh keewets kahniyo k'osh naare, han naarotse konwor wosht'intseyiru t'arap'ezoke t'int fintso aaliye.
HEB 7:14 No doonz Yhud naar b́ wottsok'o daneke, b́ wotefere Muse kahniwots jango b́ keewor Yhud naaro s'iilt b́ keewtso eegor aaliye.
HEB 7:15 Keewan ayide sháánr b́datsetiye k'osho Melkes'edik'kok'o kahniyo b́ tuworee,
HEB 7:16 Bí kahni woti naasho b́ dek', b́kash genzi s'uwoko deshawona bako naaron waats nemonaliye.
HEB 7:17 «Melkes'edik' kahani b́wottsok'o nee dúre dúrosh kahni neene» et bísh gawere.
HEB 7:18 Shin eteets tzaziyo nef wotat k'awntsalk b́ wottsotse bín shaark'reree.
HEB 7:19 Muse nemon ik keewonwor s'een wotofalratse, andmó Ik'ok b́ weeron t'inosh nofalitwo k'antso nojángtso noosh imere.
HEB 7:20 Haniyere okoon kahniyan Ik'i taaralon wotkaliyee, haniyere shino kahni wottsmanoots taaralone bowoti.
HEB 7:21 Iyesusmó kahni b́wot Ik'o b́ taartsotsnee, manwere «Doonzo ‹Neehe dúre dúrosh kahni neene› ett taarre, bíasabiyo woneratse» ett b́ jango keewetsok'one.
HEB 7:22 Taarmanatse tuutson Iyesus taaron kindeets k'antsosh wusho wotere.
HEB 7:23 K'iratse tuutson kahni iko b́wonerawon b́finatse beyo b́falrawotse shints kahniwots bo taawo aye b́teshi,
HEB 7:24 Iyesusmó dúre dúrosh beyirwo b́ wottsotse b́ khnetiyo woneratse.
HEB 7:25 Mansh bo jangosh Ik'o k'onosh dúre dúrosh beyar beetwo wotar b́betwotse b́weeron Ik'o maants weetu jamwotsi b́ jamon kashiyosh falitwe.
HEB 7:26 Hank'o S'ayino, ik kiimo bíyatse aaltso, s'ayino, morretswotsitse gaaletso, dari aboniyere eents kahniwotsatse naashi k'aabo noosh geyife.
HEB 7:27 Bí kahni k'oshwotskok'o shino b́ took morrosh, ilowere ash ash morrosh aaw aawon wosho t'intso bísh geyiratse, b́ tooko wosh woshdek't b́ t'intsor han aaniy b́geyirawok'on ishbazree.
HEB 7:28 Nemo kahniy naash woshdek't b́ naashitswots maaw ashuwotsiye, nemoniyere ili waatso taaron keweetsonmó dúre dúrosh s'een wottso Ik'o naayi naashire.
HEB 8:1 Eshe bojangatse nokeweyiru keewwotsitse bog keewo haniye, darotse Ik' eeno jori k'ani aaromantse beyirwo hank'o kaheniyi naash k'aabo detsfone.
HEB 8:2 Bí b́ finit S'ayin beyok arik wotts k'ewoko dunkaniyotse, dunkaniyan b́ k'oons'eyiye ash kishon b́woterawon doonzo kishonee.
HEB 8:3 Kahni naasho ik ikon b́naashiye imonat woshon b́t'intsitwok'owe, mansh kahniyanwere b́t'intsitwo ik keewo detso bísh geyife.
HEB 8:4 Nemok'on Ik'osh imetso t'intsit kahniwots bofa'otse bí datsatsa wotink'ere kahniyo woterawnk'e b́teshi,
HEB 8:5 Kahniyanots bo finirwo dunkani darotse fa'aman ariyonat b́ s'ilal mec'ree, man b́wotwere Muse gofu bí agoor, Ik'o «Guri abaatse neesh b́ be'etsok'on jam keewo t'iwintson finowe» ett bísh b́ keewtsok'onee.
HEB 8:6 Andmó Iyesus dag taalotse manitso b́ wotts taaro beshts nat taaratse bogonat k'ants jangiyetswotsats need'iyetso b́ wottsotse bísh imets fino boge.
HEB 8:7 Shin kindeets taaro shapo deshawo wotarr b́datseyink'ere gitlo taareyo geyirawnk'ee b́teshi.
HEB 8:8 Ik'o bí ash ashaatse shapo b́beyo kitsfetst hank'o etfe, «Hamb, Israe'el ash ashuwotsnat Yihud ash ashuwotsnton Handron notaaret aawo weetwe» etfe Doonzoni.
HEB 8:9 Taaranwere Gbs'itse bokisho detsdek'at boon tkishoor bo nihotsnton t taaretsok'oyiyaliye, bo taanton bo taaretsats bo kup'erawotse taawere boon aatsni tk'ri etfe Doonzoni.
HEB 8:10 «Eshe, haniyhakon Israe'el dats ash ashonton T taaret taaro hank'owiye etfe Doonzoni, Taa tnemone bo tookots beezitwe, bo nibotsowere guut'etwe, Bo Ik'onowere wotitwe, Bowere tiashwotsi wotitune.
HEB 8:11 ‹Doonzo dande'e› err k'osh ashosh wotowa bí eshwsh daniyitwo konwor beeratsye, Muk'aatse tuur eenok b́borfetso jametso taan danetwe,
HEB 8:12 Bonandosh oorowe eteetwe, Bomorronowere haniyak boats taawratse.»
HEB 8:13 Haniyak «Handr taara» bí etor shints taarman nat woshre etee, mansh nat jamo b́ t'afit aawo t'iinwtsere.
HEB 9:1 Shin taarets, Ik' ik'iyi fini niwonat datsatsi Ik' Ik'iiyef beyoko detsfe b́teshi
HEB 9:2 Git k'aat'wotsi detsts dunkaniyu k'andek'rane b́teshi. C'eeshi gedokunat, woshi tusho bíyats b́beef t'arap'ez detsts shints maa kayu «S'ayinoki» eteefuni b teshi.
HEB 9:3 Gitl magarajiwoniyere jiik'o maantse gitsitsi kayu «S'aynat S'ayintsu» eteefuni.
HEB 9:4 Dunkani kay gitsitsts hanitse awntson dozets it'ano bíyats s'uwiyeyiru t'arap'ezonat, awntson futets taari taboto biitse fa'ebte b́tesh, taari tabotaniitse mano biitse detsts awntsi mosobiynu, atáát teshts Aron gumbu, nem tatswotsi bí'ats guut'ets gashets shútswots fa'ano boteshi.
HEB 9:5 Taabotatse fa'a morr t'afitwo bo bangon ipiru mangts Kirubeliwots fa'ano boteshi, ernmó jam keewanots jango and ik ikon keewo falratsonee.
HEB 9:6 Hank'on jam keewo k'an b́wtsiyakon kahniwots bo fino s'eentsosh dunkany shintsi kayuts uni aawo kinditune.
HEB 9:7 Gitl gitsitsi k'at'uts kinditwonmó kahniwotsats naashi k'aabo s'uziye, b́ kinditwere worwototse ik aaw s'uziye, bíye b́ took jangonat ash asho dáron b́fiints morrosh b́ t'intsit s'atso desh b́de'aawo kindratse.
HEB 9:8 Dunkani k'at' shintsu b́ befetsosh S'ayinat S'aynu maants daamet weerindo andoor k'esheerafa'a b́wottsok'owo S'ayin shayiro hank'one b́ kitsiri.
HEB 9:9 Hanwere and dúro artsoniyee, mank'oon t'iniru imonat woshon t'intsiru asho nibo S'ayintsosh falatsne,
HEB 9:10 Keewanots handrit aawo b́waafetsosh finats jints úratsi niwwotsiye, boowere móónat úshi jangosh k'osh k'osh mashdek'osh beezets niwwots s'uzsh k'aleknee.
HEB 9:11 Ernmó Krstos and beyiru sheeng keewwotssh kahniwotsatsi naashi k'aabo wotat be'ere, bí b́kindts dunkaniyu een wotat s'eenuniyee, goofhaan ash kishon finerawnat azeetsaniitsk wotkiyaliye,
HEB 9:12 S'aynat S'ayinuts iknoto b́ s'atso dek't aani iwisherawok'on b́ kindi bako, eeyishikonat máánzi s'atso dek't kindratse, mank'oon dúre dúrosh noon woritwo noosh b́ daatsiyi.
HEB 9:13 Eeyishwotsna, manz wur s'atsonat woshosh mis'ts miinzigelu tulo kiimts ashuwotsats fakewoor meets kimatse boon mayde b́ S'ayintsitka wotiyal,
HEB 9:14 Dúre dúri shayri weeron b́tooko kiimo bíatse aalts wosho woshdek't Ik'osh t'intstso Krstos s'atso beyat beyiru Ik'osh finosh no nibo k'irts finotse aawk'owe iki bogo b́ s'ayintsiti k'úna!
HEB 9:15 Ekeewots bos'eege Ik'o jangit dúre dúrosh b́ imts rstiyo bodek'etwok'o Krstos handr taari dagotse manitwo wotere, man b́wotwere ash ashuwotsi shin taari shirots wotde bofints morrotse kashiyosh b́k'irtsoshe.
HEB 9:16 Jeshu kasho b́ beewor jeshu kashirwo b́ k'iro dandek'o geyife,
HEB 9:17 Jeshuman arikon finats b́ jinet jeshu kashirman b́ k'irihakee, jeshu kashirwo kashon b́ befetsoshmó jeshuman fineratse.
HEB 9:18 Mank'o b́wottsotse shints taaronúwor dab s'atsalon finats jinatse.
HEB 9:19 Shin shin Muse b́ ímts nemotse fa'a tzaziwotsi ash jamosh keewre, maniyere hakon máánzonat eyishi s'atso aatsonton dek't nemi mas'aafonat ash jamono, hisop'i mit maaronat mereeri biri s'iron b́faki,
HEB 9:20 B́ fakwere «Ik'o itsh b́ azazts taaritsi s'atso haniye.» ettniye.
HEB 9:21 Mank'o dunkaniwotsnat, boon kis'kesheyiru k'ac' jamats s'atso fakeree.
HEB 9:22 Arikonoor Muse nemok'on muk' keewwotsiyere okoon jam keewo s'atsone b́ S'ayineti, s'atso b́kuud'erawonowere morratse S'ayino daatseratse.
HEB 9:23 Eshe darotsi keew hanotsi ariyets wotts jamanots hannk'o niwron s'ayino boosh geyitwe b́teshi, darotsik wotts keewwotswor botookon haniyere bogts woshon s'ayino boosh geyife.
HEB 9:24 Krstos arik «Ik' maa S'ayinun» ariyeek wottsunat ash kishon finets S'ayinu beyokuk kindratse, bí b́tookon and nojangosh Ik'o shinatse be'ewosh darots kindre.
HEB 9:25 Ayhudi kahniwotsats naashi k'aabo b́ tooki s'ats woterawo s'atso dek't worwot worwoton S'aynat S'ayintsuts b́kindfoni, Krstosmó b́ tooko ayoto woshok'o k'alde t'intsosh kindratse.
HEB 9:26 Mank'o b́wotink'ere datso bíazeewortson ayoto gond bek'o dek'osh bísh geyiyank'ee b́teshi, and dúri s'uwaatse morro k'aaúbazosh b́ tooko wosho woshdek't iknoto iwishirawok'on be'ere.
HEB 9:27 Ashosh iknoto k'iro beezk'rere, k'ironiyere okonowere bí ats angshetwe.
HEB 9:28 Mank'owere Krstos aywots morro k'aaúbazosh iknoto shukeere, aaninwere morro kurosh b́woterawo bín kotirwotsi kashiwosh gitlo be'etwe.
HEB 10:1 Nemo shinomaantsi weyiru sheeng keew ara (c'isha) b́ teshi bako b́tookon arikeewaliye b́teshi, mansh worwot worwoton jam aawo bo shukeet woshwotsi de'er Ik'ok t'iinet ashuwots s'een woshosh b́jamon falratse.
HEB 10:2 Nemo boon s'ayintsk'ro falituwe wotink'ere Ik'o mangiyosh t'iinet ashuwots jango, morrotse bos'ayintsotsnat morr deshawok'on bogitsotse boosh b́danetwotse wosh t'intso k'ayk'riyank'onee b́teshi.
HEB 10:3 Woshmanotsmó dúre dúr morro bín bogaawitwotsiye.
HEB 10:4 Minz wurwotsnat eyishuwots s'atso morro k'aaúbazo falratse.
HEB 10:5 Mansh Krstos datsumaanats b́ woor hank'o etre, «Woshonat imo geeratsne, Atsonmó taash k'anirnee,
HEB 10:6 Mis'et woshonat Morr t'afiyosh shukeet woshon Geneeúweratsne,
