HEB 10:7 Taa manoor, ‹Ik'o Izar Izewero! mas'aafotse t jangosh guut'etsok'on ni alo s'eentsosh waare› » ti eti.
HEB 10:8 Bíwere shin ekeewots nemok'on kúúh keweekno bowotiyalor «Woshonat imon, mis'et woshonat morri k'awntso oorowe etosh shukeyiru wosho geeratsne, manotsnowere gene'úweratsne» bí eti,
HEB 10:9 Aaninwere, «Hamb, taa n shuntso s'eentsosh waare» bíeti, mank'oon gitlo man naari wosho beyok b́shato shegrshosh shintsi naar wotts wosho k'aaúbazre.
HEB 10:10 Mannowere «n shuna» etiru keewok'on Iyesus Krstos meetson iknoto aaniy b́ iwishirawok'on wosho wotat b́ t'intsotse s'ayinronee.
HEB 10:11 Kahniyo ik ikon morro k'aaúbazo falraw woshmanotsi uni aawo t'intsfetst aaw aawo need'dek'tni b́finefoni.
HEB 10:12 Krstosmó jam aawosh wotit wosh ikman b́t'intsiyakon Ik'o niho k'aniaaromaants beewtsere.
HEB 10:13 Haniyakon bín shit'irwots bí ali shirots bowotefetsoshe b́kotiri,
HEB 10:14 Manb́wotwere S'ayintsmanotsnowere wosh ikatse tuutson dúre dúrosh s'eenwotsi b́woshtsotsnee.
HEB 10:15 S'ayin shayironwere keewan jango noosh gawitwe, shin shinonowere,
HEB 10:16 «Aawu manotsiyere il Bonton t taaret taaro haniye etfe doonzoni, T nemone it nibots beezitwe, bo tookotsowere guut'etuwe.»
HEB 10:17 Manats dabtnwere «Bo fints gond finonat morron haniyere hakon gawratse» etfe.
HEB 10:18 Mansha morr jamo oorowe etehakon morr s'ayintsosh t'intset wosho haniyere okoon t'intso geyiratse.
HEB 10:19 Eshnee, ti eshwotso! Iyesus s'atsatse tuutsona jamoniyere bogts S'ayints Ik' moots kindosh nonfaliyt agito daatsdek'rone,
HEB 10:20 Nokinditwere b́ magarajiyon, etonwere b́ meetsatse tuutson noosh b́ k'eshts handronat kashomaants jiishts weerone.
HEB 10:21 Ik'i mootse al detsts kahni eeno detsfone.
HEB 10:22 Mansh eshe nogitso gond gawoniyere b́ s'ayinetwok'o nonibats fakde'er, no atsonowere s'ayin aatson mashde'er, nib s'ayinonat arik wotts imnetiyo deshde'er Ik'ok t'iinone.
HEB 10:23 Jangiyets keewo noosh imtso amanek b́ wottsotse jangat nokeewirwo jangiyetsatse hake baka noerawon kup'shde deshde'one.
HEB 10:24 Shunoonat sheeng keewon k'ande'er nobetwok'o iko ikosh gawiwe,
HEB 10:25 jam aawo gonkeyaar no atsatsewo kup'shwoone bako, ik ikwots bok'alfok'o nokakwewo k'azk'ayonee, ikinwor, doonzo weyi aawo b́ karntsok'o gawde'e iki bogshde'er k'aluworee.
HEB 10:26 Ariko dan nodek'iyakon danfetsr morro nofiniyal haniyere okoon morrosh t'iinet wosho b́jamon aaliye.
HEB 10:27 And ooritwonmó shinomaantsi wotitwo shatits angshonat k'efirwotsi mitsit shatits taawoniye.
HEB 10:28 Muse gedts nemó titsetwats, git ash wee keez ashuwots bíats bogawitka wotiyal maac' k'ewalo b́k'iritwok'o wotowe.
HEB 10:29 Eshe, Ik'o naayi gac'tso, bín b́s'ayints taaron waats s'atso k'awntsalk woshtso, s'aati shayiro c'ashtso, aawk'o bog fayeek'úna bísh wotiti arefa itsha?
HEB 10:30 «Weer weersho tikee, taaye wotit k'awntso dashetwe» ettso koni b́wottsok'o danfone, mank'o, «Doonzo bí ashuwotsats angshitwe».
HEB 10:31 Beyat beyiru Ik'o kishats diho ayide'er shatitkee.
HEB 10:32 Shááno itsh b́shaniyakon ay gondo bek'aat bojangosh it k'amts manotsi bali aawwotsi gawwore.
HEB 10:33 K'atsoor ash shinatse c'asheertee, gondonowere bek'rte, k'atsoorowere man naari gondbek'o boats b́bodts ashuwotsnton tooh itwottsotse gondo bek'rte.
HEB 10:34 It tipetswotssh maac'o k'ewerte, k'antsonat uni aawosh beet gaalo itdetstsok'o itdantsosh it detstso itatse dek'eworowere k'amdek'at man genee'uwon dek'rtee.
HEB 10:35 Eshe een shilmatiyo bín itdaatsitwo bíyats it amantsman juuk'ayere.
HEB 10:36 Ik'i ettso s'eentsr Ik'o itsh imosh b́ taarts keewo daatsosh k'amar kordek'o itsh geyife.
HEB 10:37 Mansh eshe, hank'o ett guut'ere, «Weetuman muk' gizewoniyere okoon weetwe, ja'aratse,
HEB 10:38 Tik wottso kááw ashonmó amanon kasho daatsituwe, Shuutso maants bí aaniyalmó taa bíatse tuutson, Geneeúweratse.»
HEB 10:39 Noomó amanar kash datsituwots jirwots noona bako shuuts aanar t'afitwots jirwots noonaliye.
HEB 11:1 Amana etoni, jangat koteyiru keewo «Ee arikon wotitwe» err dek'ee, ááwosh be'eraw keewonowere b́ be'eyirwok'o woshde'er taawe.
HEB 11:2 Shin ashuwotsi udeyiye bo amantsatse tuutsone.
HEB 11:3 Datso bí azee Ik'on b́ wottsok'o t'iwintsdek'o nofalit amanone. Mansh be'eyiru keew jamo be'erawatse b́ finootsk'owo danfone.
HEB 11:4 Abeel k'aayeliyere bogts wosho Ik'osh b́ t'ints b́ amantsoshe, Ik'o Abeel imtso b́ dek'or Abeel b́ imnetiyon kááw b́ wotok'o gawere, Abeel b́ k'iriyaloru b́ imnetiyon andoor keewirwe.
HEB 11:5 Henok k'iro bi'ats b́borawok'o dambaan bín k'aaúdek'e b́ imnetiyoshe, Ik'o bín k'aaúb́dek'tsotse daatseratse, bín k'aaúdek'ewoniyere shinoor Ik'o b́gene'úshtsok'o bísh gawere.
HEB 11:6 Amanerawon Ik'i geneúsho faleratse, Ik'ok t'iinet asho Ik'o b́beyonat bín geyiru ashuwotsshowe k'awntso bimetwok'o amano bísh geyitwe.
HEB 11:7 Noh manoori ááwon be'eraw keewwotsatse atso korbodek'etuwok'o Ik'o b́ keewor Ik'o shatt b́ meyitsi ashuwotsi woriyosh markabo b́ dooz b́ amantsoshe, Noh imnetiyonowere datso morretsi bwoto dant datswats bí angshi, Nohuwere amanon daatset kááw woto b́ naati.
HEB 11:8 Abraham keer, bísh risti woshde'er b́ dek'et beyokok bí ametuwok'o bín s'eegeyor bí ametuwoko dab b́dariyalor amoosh bíazaze amanatniye.
HEB 11:9 Jangiyets keewo bínton naatetwotsi wottswots Yisak'nat Yak'obnton jangiyets datswatse ash datsi ash wotat gofootse b́bee imnetiyone.
HEB 11:10 Man b́k'alwere b need'oko kup' wottsu, Ik'o ay dúrosh gaw dek't bí agts kitu b́ kotirwotsnee.
HEB 11:11 Sarash jangits Ik'o amanek b́wottsok'o bdantsotse na'a shuwo bish beshtsunat Abraham ayidek't gawero b́wotyalor na'o bodaatsitwok'o ango bdaats imnetiyone.
HEB 11:12 Mansh Abraham k'irts ashok'o taawets ikatse daritsi k'eenok'onat aatsi gúúratsi shiyok'o taaweraw naaro b́datseyi.
HEB 11:13 Jametsanots boamantsok'one bok'iri, Ik'o boosh imosh b́ jangits keew jamo daatsratsne, ernmó wokoon s'iilt bo daatsdek'tsok'o woshdek't genee'uwon k'aaúbodek'i. Datsatsnowere ibonat ash datsi ashok'o bowotonowere t'iwints bodek'i.
HEB 11:14 Hank'o keewiru ashuwots bo took datso wottso kotiruwotskok'owa shanidek't bokitsiri.
HEB 11:15 Bítse bokeshts datsman gawrno wotink'ere b́maants aniyank'nee b́ teshi.
HEB 11:16 Andmó iki bogtso, darotse fa'a datso miraac'irunee, mansh Ik'o kito boosh b́ k'anitsotse «Noko Izar Izeweri» err bín bos'eegal bín jitsiratse.
HEB 11:17 Abrahami fadewor Yisahak'i woshok'o woshdek't b́ t'ints imnetiyone, bísh jangiyets aap'o dek'tso Abraham b́ na'a iks'uzo shukoshe b́teshi,
HEB 11:18 Beree Ik'o, «Yisak'n n naaro neesh s'eegetwe» ettniye b́teshi.
HEB 11:19 Ik'o k'irotse tuuzo b́ falituwok'o Abraham bí amantsosh arikon k'irotse b́ tuutsok'o woshdek't Yisahak'i aaniy daatsb́dek'i.
HEB 11:20 Yisak' shinomaants wotit keewo gawudek't Yak'obnat Esawn imnetiyone b́ deeri.
HEB 11:21 Yak'ob k'irosh b́ t'intsok'on Yosef nana'úwotsi ik ikon deert b́ gumbi c'uushats te'edek't Ik'osh b́sagad imnetiyone.
HEB 11:22 Yosef k'irob́t'intsok'on Isra'el ashuwots Gbs'itse bokeshetwok'o b́ keew b́ mak'tsonowere awuk'o bok'alitwok'o boosh tzaziyo bí'im amanatniye.
HEB 11:23 Muse b́ shweetsok'on b́ indunat b́ nihn azsheeng b́ woto bobek'tsosh Nugúso tzaziyo bosharawo keez shashosh boáats imnetiyone.
HEB 11:24 Musewor bí eeniyakon «Fer'on na'i na'a» err s'eegeyo b́k'az imnetiyone.
HEB 11:25 Mansha manorush morron daatset genee'oniyere Ik'i ashuwotsnton gondbek'o daatso b́ marat'i.
HEB 11:26 Shino maantsowere b́ daatsit k'awntso b́ bek'tsotse Gbs' galoniyere Krstos jangosh gac'eyo bog b́ wottsok'o gaw b́dek'i.
HEB 11:27 Nugúso fayonowere b́sharawo Gbs'itse b́ kesh amanone, ááwon bek'erawo Izar Izewernowere b́ bek'tsok'o wosht b́ weeratse b́ kúp'i.
HEB 11:28 K'aab na'o úd'osh azazets Ik'i melakiyo Israe'el dats ashuwots k'aab na'o b́ úd'rawok'owa ett Fazigonat s'ats faki nemo b́k'al imnetiyone.
HEB 11:29 Israe'el dats ashuwots dats shuuk'atse kimírwok'o aats k'ar birotse bokim bo amnanoshe, Gbs' ashuwotsmó mank'o k'alosh botuwor bo jametsuwots aats limniye bowtsi.
HEB 11:30 Israe'el ashuwots Iyariko shútsi kas'o imnetiyon shawat aawo boguurtsosh shútsi kas'uwots gahbowtsi.
HEB 11:31 Widetsu Ra'ab dats k'oroor amtswotsi jeenon b́ dek'tsosh azazerawwotsnton k'ironiyere b oor imnetiyone.
HEB 11:32 Eshe k'osho aawne tkeewiti? Gediwon jangemo, Barak' jangemo, Samsom jangemó, Yoftahekemó, Daawitko, Samu'el jangemó, nebiyiyiwots jango t keewrawok'o gizeyo taash bk'awneti,
HEB 11:33 Bo bo imnetiyon mengstwotsi da'arnee, kááwonowere k'eezrnee, boosh jangiyetsonowere daatsrne, ééshwots nonónowere bo is'i.
HEB 11:34 Tawi angonowere takrnee, shiki shashatsnowere keshernee, nef wototse kesht kup' wotomaants bo woneyi, kes'oonowere kup'wotsi woternee, kec'r da'af t'alati kes'i ashuwotsi bogishi,
HEB 11:35 Máátswots bo jag k'irtswotsi k'irotse botuure daats bodek'i. K'oshwotswere bogts k'irotse tuwo daatsosh gawt k'osh k'osh onó bobek'etwok'o k'alewor bo tipotse kesho geeratsne.
HEB 11:36 K'oshwotswere boats kashetswotsi wotat bojot'eyi, k'oshuwots bo tufo muk'on tpeyat tipi moots juweerne,
HEB 11:37 Shútson botogeyi, magaaziyon bo kap'eyi, shikon boúd'eyi, mereeronat eyishi gok'o tahdek't bo jawri, t'owwotsnat giishets ashuwotsi wotat bo shambi.
HEB 11:38 Worwotse, guratse, datsats gitsotse fa'a gop'onat oorotsa guurat bo beyi. Mank'owono datsu boosh wotiitk beyoko wotat daatseratsane.
HEB 11:39 Jamanotswere bo imntiyon boosh gawetso bowotiyaloru boosh jangiyetso daatsde'afa'ane.
HEB 11:40 Ik'o noosh k'ants keewo k'ani b́k'rtsotse, mansha bo nontoni bako boaal s'eenwotsi woto falatsne.
HEB 12:1 Daawnok'o noon gúúrts gaw jamanotsi no detstsotse no'ats kur wotts keew jamwotsi no'ats deshts morro k'a'úbayr no shinatse beyiru nohewo k'amde kup'ar woc'one.
HEB 12:2 Nowos'etwere no imnetiyo ned'itsonat s'eentstso Iyesus ats no ááwo gerdeniye, bíwere b́ shinatse need'wtsts geneúwatse tuutson jitatse k'irr gac'ewo eegok'oor b́ taawrawo jitatse gondbek'on k'iro k'amb́dek'i, Ik' be jooroke k'ano maants be b́wtsi.
HEB 12:3 Eshe taahr, maac'o it k'ut'rawok'o morretswots bín bo k'eefere k'amdek'tso Iyesusi s'ilde'ere.
HEB 12:4 It morronton mak'orewoke s'ats kud'efetsosh b́borfetso k'eferafa'tee.
HEB 12:5 Ik'o b́ nana'ikok'o woshdek't itango kup'shosh hank'o bí ettso batk'rerte, «T naayo! doonzo sezo ketik'aye, b́ hadoshowere maac'o k'ut'k'aye,
HEB 12:6 Doonzo b́ shuntsoniye b́ sezfoni, B́ nayik'owosh dekt b́s'iliruwono b́fayefoni.»
HEB 12:7 Ik'o b́ nanaúwotsk'o itn b́tawtsotse b́ sezo k'amoore, b́ niho bín b́ sezraw na'o kone?
HEB 12:8 Nana'a wotts jamwots bo daatsiru sezo it were daatso it k'azal dik'al itna boko nana'a itnaliye.
HEB 12:9 Haniyere okoon, noúnetsi sezf meetsi nihwots detsfone b́teshi, bonowere mangiye nomangifoni, bere kashon beyosh kashi weeron nih wottsosh iki bogshde azazewo aawk'oneya noosh geyiwo b́k'azeti!
HEB 12:10 Bosh sheengo araat b́ be'etsok'on muk' gizewush noon sezrne, bímo b́ S'ayino kayitwotsi nowotish sheengosh noon sezfe.
HEB 12:11 Sez jamo manorish shiyanitka bako geneúshitk areratse, ilomo man dandek'ts ashuwotssh jeenon s'eentso kááw fini shwo boosh daatsituwe.
HEB 12:12 Mansh it kish neftswotsnat itgubr maawtswotsi kup'ide'ere.
HEB 12:13 Doklirwo b́ kashitwok'owa bako b́ beyoke keer b́ tisherawok'o, it tufooshowere weerindi kááwo woshde'ere.
HEB 12:14 S'ayn woteraniye konworu doonzo bek'osh b́ falawotse, ash jamonton jeenon bewore, S'ayinon beyoshowere kup'owere,
HEB 12:15 Ititsere konshoru Ik' s'aato b́ shaprawok'o it atso korde'ere, mank'owere s'aam shuu iko shuwit s'ap'o ititse boc'r iti b́ kic'irawok'o, aywotsno b́ kimshrawok'o korde'ere.
HEB 12:16 Gusiyetso wee iknoti móósha ett b́ took k'aabo kemtso Esawkok'o shayri ash woterawo ititsere b́ daatserawok'o it atso korde'ere.
HEB 12:17 Esaw il s'aato aaniy dek'osh b́ geyor s'aatman bísh baziyetsok'o danfte, b́k'altso woniyosh kup'dek't eepfetst b́geyiyalor weero daatso falratse.
HEB 12:18 Kishon shuu'etwok wee mis'etuo Sin gurok borafa'ate, bamplomants, shatits t'alwots, eegurahi jongokowere,
HEB 12:19 Ezbedi k'arokowere wee keeweyiru aap'o b́ shishetwoko borafa'ate, aap'ets keewman shishts ashuwots «Eshe bodre haniyak k'osho noosh aap'ek'aye» et bok'onfetso bodrnee.
HEB 12:20 «Gizo dab gurman b́ t'awiyal Shútson togeyar k'irwee» Etiru tzaziyo boats b́mangtsosh bín kuro falratsne.
HEB 12:21 Manoke bek'ets keewman eenonat shatiik b́teshtsotse dab́ Muse woor «Taa shataat, k'ewere» bí et.
HEB 12:22 Itiyelee S'iyon guromants t'inwtsertee, bihe kashetso Ik'o kito wotts daritstsu Iyerusalemiye, genee'úwon kakwedek'tswotsok, ay kumon taawet mlakiwotsok t'inrte,
HEB 12:23 Bo shúútso darots guut'etswotsok, k'aab nana'a wotts amantsuwots ko'eetsok, kááw angshitu Izar izewerokonat s'ayin wotat daatsts shayirwotsok t'inrte.
HEB 12:24 Handr taareyosh dag taalotse manik wottso Iyesusnat Abeel s'atsoniyere k'antso keewiru fakets s'atsookowere t'inrte.
HEB 12:25 Keewirman de'atsone it erawok'o itatso korde'ere, Ekeewots Ik'o ashon datsatse boosh b́ keewre k'ewatsone ettswots b́shirotse kesho bomaawiyakon, bére noo darotse noosh keewirwo dek'onok'azal awuk'o kalrniya b́ kishotse kesho nofaliti!
HEB 12:26 Manoor bí aap'o datso shek'ere, «andmó datsu mec'ro b́woterawo aani dabr darono dabde'er shek'ituwe» eton keewure.
HEB 12:27 Han «Iknoto dabr,» etiru keewoniye b́ kitsiriyee shek'eraw keewwots kup'arr bobetuwok'o shek'eyirwots wee azeets keewwots bobeyoke botuwitok'oniye.
HEB 12:28 Eshe noo shek'eraw mengstu nonaatetwotse Ik'o udoonee, b́ gene'úwitwok'oon mangiyonat shatoon bísh finone.
HEB 12:29 No Ik'o Izar Izewer mitsit tawok'oyiye.
HEB 13:1 Jam aawo it ats atsewo eshwi shunon shunewere,
HEB 13:2 Ibo de'er ibiyo batk'ayere, mank'oon ibuwotsi dek't ibiyoke ik ik ashuwots bodananiyere melakiwotsi dek't ibiyirne.
HEB 13:3 Bonton tohar it tipetsok'o woshder tipetswotsi gawwere, it were bokok'o gondo it bek'irwok'o woshder gond bek'irwotsi gawwere.
HEB 13:4 De'ewo jamokere mangiyek wotowe, widetswotsnat gobetswotsats Ik'o b́ angshitwotse kenihonat máátsun amank woto shapiir bo de'ewo kimsh k'ayine.
HEB 13:5 Gizi shunatse wokoore, it detstso itsh boree, Ik'o «Taahe b́ jamon neen juweratse, b́ jamon neen k'ayaatse» etre.
HEB 13:6 Manshowere amande'er, Taan tep'etwo doonzoniye, sharaatse, Asho taan eeg k'alosheb́ faliti? No eteti.
HEB 13:7 Ik' aap'o shin shino itsh keewts itn jishirwotsi batk'ayere, bo beyonat bo fini shuwo gawr bo imneti jafro sha'owere.
HEB 13:8 Iyesus Krstos ootsowere haambetsowere dúredúrosh bíne, wonawoneratse.
HEB 13:9 Daneraw k'osh k'osh naari danosh kisho imk'ayere, nonibo máá nemwotsi kotosh b́ woterawon s'aatats b́kup'ink'ere sheenge, mishi nem han shoyts ashuwots eegor boosh k'alratse.
HEB 13:10 Noo wosh t'iintsef t'arap'ezo detsfone, b́ woteferor dunkaniwtse finef kahniwots wosh t'intseyiru t'ar'p'ezoke fa'a misho k'aaúde'er bomarawok'o baziyeke.
HEB 13:11 Manwere eegoshe ayhudiyi kahniwotsats naashi k'aabo morrosh oorowe eto datseetwo gizi s'atso de'er jam beyokoniyere bog S'aynts beyokuk b́ kinditi, gizi dunmanó gáloniyere úratsne b́ mis'eti.
HEB 13:12 Mank'owere Iyesus ash asho b́ took s'atson S'ayntsosh kiti fengeshoniyere úratse gondo bek'o b́dek'i.
HEB 13:13 Noowere gálotse keer b́ maants amone, b́ ketts ketonowere kaydek'tswotsi wotoone.
HEB 13:14 Noo haniyak weet kituni nokotiri bako kup'ar need'it kitu datsanatse deshatsone.
HEB 13:15 Haniyako Iyesusn udi wosho uniaawo Ik'osh t'intswonee, hanwere b́ shútsosh gawiru nooni k'indwotsn t'iinet udi woshoniye.
HEB 13:16 Sheeng keewo k'alonat it detsts keewo jamwotssh kayiyo batk'ayere, Ik'o geneúshitwoniye hank'o wotts woshoniye.
HEB 13:17 Itn jishirwotssh alewere, bo ali shirots wotoore, boon aatet keewo (halafinet) b́beyrwotse it kashi jangosh kup'at bofiiniri, it boosh it azazeyink'ere bo bofino genee'úwon finiyank'nee, mank'o wotob́k'azalmó bo fino shiyanone bofinti, manwere itsh k'auntsalko b́ wotiti.
HEB 13:18 Noosh Ik'o k'onwore, nib s'ayino nodetstsok'o arikee, jam weeron sheeng doyonon beyosh tewnirwone.
HEB 13:19 Dabnwor kup'arr Ik'o itk'onitwok'oye itn kup'idek'at tk'oniri itok tiaanitwok'oye.
HEB 13:20 Mererwotsi jintso nodoonz Iyesusi dúre dúri taareyi s'atson k'irotse tuuztso Ik'o Izar Izewer jeenika
HEB 13:21 B́ shuntso k'alosh it bodetwok'o sheeng keew jamon itn editwee, geneúshitwonowere Iyesus Krstos weeron noon woshwe. Iyesus Krstossh dúre dúron mango wotowe, amen.
HEB 13:22 Ti eshwotso, itsh t guut'ts wosho k'awun b́ wottsosh ti izts keewan k'amde'er itdek'etwok'owe ayidek'at itn tk'oniri.
HEB 13:23 No eshu T'imotiwos tipi mootse b́ keshtsok'o it danetwok'o shunfee, kááwon han maants b́ weetka wotiyal bínton it maants waar iti s'iiletwe.
HEB 13:24 Iti jishirwotsnat S'ayin jamwotssh t jamo t'intswere, It'aaliyani datson waat hanoke fa'a krstiyanwots jamo itsh t'iintsrnee.
HEB 13:25 S'aato it jametsnton wotowe. Amen!
JAM 1:1 Dats jamats bad'ts tatse git jirwotssh Ik'onat doonzo Iyesus Krstos guutso wottso Yak'oboke wosheets jamó, jeno itsh wotowe.
JAM 1:2 Ti eshuwotso! k'osh k'osh naari fadewo itats b́bodor geenúshit keewwotsi it daatstsok'o woshde'er taawwere.
JAM 1:3 It imnetiyo b́fadewo k'amo itsh daatsituwo b́wottsok'owo dandek'etute.
JAM 1:4 K'amonowere it kup'o ik jago itsh b́shaprawo s'eenonat itn bodtswotsi woshituwo wotowe.
JAM 1:5 Ititse dani teleefo bísh b́shapts asho fa'e wotiyal Ik'o k'onuwe, Ik'onwere bísh imetwe, bí jametsosh shiitso bí aa'awo tewudi doon imetwo Izar Izeweriye.
JAM 1:6 Ernmó asho eegonor gito b́gímberawo amande'er k'onuwe, git gimbiru asho jongon gifniyeyat giwwtsts aatsk'aroniye bíariye.
JAM 1:7 Mannaari asho doonzoke ik jago b́daatsituwok'o bísh ark'aye.
JAM 1:8 Han b́wotituwere git níbo detst b́weerindatse hake baka bíetiruwoshe.
JAM 1:9 B́ beewon dashan wotts eshuwo Ik'o damban bín b́ detsetwosh geneúwowe,
JAM 1:10 Ash gaalo bodi fuundok'o b́ ooshetuowotse b́ beewon dambaan wotts eshuwo Ik'o b́bewo dashan b́woshiyalor gene'úwowe,
JAM 1:11 Aawo b́ k'ees'onton b́keshor bodo shuuk'iniye b́k'riti, b́ fúndonuwere ooyniye b́wutsiti, bíazisheengonwere t'afniye b́wutsiti, mank'owere gaalets asho b́fiinon b́jaakfere t'afniye b́wutsiti.
JAM 1:12 Doonzo b́ taartsok'on bín shuntswotssh b́ imet kashi akililiyo b́ dek'etuwosh fadeyo k'amar kúp'it asho deereke.
JAM 1:13 Ik'o gond keewon noon b́ fadrawotse mank'o bíwere konnoru b́ fadrawotse asho b́ fadeyor «Ik'o taan fadre» etk'aye.
JAM 1:14 Ernmó asho ik ikon b́ fadeyir b́ took tewnon geetseyar bí ant'elcewore.
JAM 1:15 Haniyhakon tewunu bmaac'or morro shuwitwaniye. Morronu s'eenon bi eeniyakon k'iro shuwituwane.
JAM 1:16 Shuneets eshuwwotso! it ant'elcherawok'owa!
JAM 1:17 Sheengts imonat s'een wotts deer jamo Ik'okne, han b́weetuwe c'ishok'o wona wonewo deshaw shááni niho Ik'okne.
JAM 1:18 Ik'o bí azts jam shintswotsitse gawdek't ari aap'on noon shuure.
JAM 1:19 Shuneets eshuwotso! han batk'ayere, ash jamo k'ebosh káártso, noonkeewonat fayosh mango wotowe.
JAM 1:20 Ash fayo Ik'i kááwo daatsiratse.
JAM 1:21 Hansha kiimonat weerigondi ayonowere ok k'aúbayr Ik'o it nibots b́ toktsonat it kasho kashiyo falitu aap'man it tooko dashan detson de'ere.
JAM 1:22 Ik'i aap'tso finats jiitswere bako it tooko dashfetsr shish mec'ro shishfwotsi wotk'ayere.
JAM 1:23 Ik' aap'ts aap'o finats jiitsraw asho bín bíazeets shiitso mastayiton bek'iru ashok'oyiye,
JAM 1:24 Ashaan b́shiitso mastyiton b́s'iliyakon ametuwe, awuk'o b́wottsok'owo manoor batni b́k'riti.
JAM 1:25 Wotowa eree nas' kishit b́ nemo sheengshr s'iilr bín kup'ituwo bínowere shiir baterawo, finats jitsitu asho b́ finon deereke b́ wotiti.
JAM 1:26 Bí albero korde'aniyere Ik'o Ik'irwe eteet asho b́ tookoniye b́ dashiri, b́ ik'iyonwere k'awuntso deshatse.
JAM 1:27 Ik'o niho shinatse s'ayinonat kimaw hayimanotiyo, nihonat indo k'irts nanaúwotssh, aaninu bokenih k'irts máátsuwotssh bo kic'or boon tep'o, b́ tookonowere datsanatsi kimatse kordek'oniye.
JAM 2:1 Tieshuwotso! mangts doonzo Iyesus Krstosn amaniruwotsitna wotiyal iko ikoniyere bogfe eton asho bogabogshk'ayere.
JAM 2:2 Git ashuwots it kakuweyiru bewokok weetune, iko b́kishi jabots awntsi k'ubelo geddek'tsonat tah sheengo tah dek'tso gaaletska, k'osho kiimts tahidoro tahts tugretska,
JAM 2:3 Sheengiru tah tahdek'ts asho mangiyon «Sheeng beyokanats bede'e» it eteti. Tugretsonmó «Neyere manoke need'owe, wee ttufishiroots bede'e» it eteti,
JAM 2:4 Eshe, mank'oon it dagotse k'osh k'oshewonat bogabogshr angisho it angshituwok'o itsh be'eratsa?
JAM 2:5 Shuneets eshuwotso! k'ewere, Ik'o amanon galetswotsi bo wotitwok'onat bín shuntswotssho b́ jangits mengsto bo naatetwok'o datsanatsi tugretswotsi marat'de'atsa?
JAM 2:6 Itmó tugretswotsiye it gac'iri, itn dadaat angshi moo maants iti geetsirwots gaaletswotsiyoshna?
JAM 2:7 It bín it s'eegeyiru sheeng shúútso c'ashiruwots bonoshna?
JAM 2:8 «K'osh asho ntookok'o woshde'er shune» et S'ayin mas'aafotse guut'etso Ik'i mengestitsi nemo it s'eentsiyal sheenge it finiri.
JAM 2:9 Ash dago it boga bogshiyalmó morre it finiri, nemo it beshiruwotse iti k'oretute.
JAM 2:10 Asho tzaziwotsitsere iko gaahr oorts jamwotsi b́ s'eentsiyal dab jamwotsi b́ gaktsok'owe taaweti.
JAM 2:11 «Wido amk'aye» etts doonzo mank'o «Ud'k'aye» etre, mansh wido amo nk'azal dab n ud'iyal nemo gaakrne.
JAM 2:12 S'ayin kishit nemoke angsho dek'osh fa'a ashuwotskok'o keewwere, mank'owere k'aluwere.
JAM 2:13 Ik' angsho maarraw ashuwotssh mhreti woshratse, b́ wotefere mhretiyo angsho daa'ituwe.
JAM 2:14 T eshúwotso! asho imnetiyo detsfe bí etal, ando aani b́ imnetiyo sheeng finon kitso b́ k'azal eebi bísh b́ k'aliti? B́ imnetiyo bín kashiyosh falituwa?
JAM 2:15 Bo tahituwonat bo meetuwo deshaw eeshuwotsnat mishúwotsn bobeyal,
JAM 2:16 ititsere iko bo beyosh geyit keewo imaniyere «Jeenon ameree! itsh k'ec'ee! woorwere!» bí etal eebi boosh b́ k'aliti?
JAM 2:17 Mank'o sheeng fin deshaw imnetiyo k'irkee.
JAM 2:18 Ernmó «Nee imnetiyo detsfne, taawere sheeg fino detsfe» etetuwo b́ beyal, «N imnetiyo finalo taash kitsuwe, taawere t finon t imnetiyo kitsituwe» etetuwe.
JAM 2:19 Nee «Ik Ik'o fa'ee» etaat amanirune, sheenge, amanonere Fo'erawwotswor amanirune, shatonowere k'ewirune.
JAM 2:20 Nee dartsano! imnetiyo finalo k'awuntso b́ deshawok'o danosh geefiya?
JAM 2:21 Nonihi Abraham b́ naayi Yishak'i wosh t'intseyru t'arap'ezats Ik'osh wosho woshdek't b́ t'intsor kááw b́ wot b́ finonalneya?
JAM 2:22 Eshe imnetiyo finonton ikoke b́ teshtsok'onat imnetiyo finon s'een b́ wottsok'o bek'irute?
JAM 2:23 S'ayin Mas'aafotse «Abraham Ik'o bí amani, b́ imnetiyonwere kááw wotat bísh b́ taaweyi» ett aap'ets aap'o s'eenbwutsi, hank'on Ik' shun ash b́woti etiyi.
JAM 2:24 Eshe asho b́ kááwit imneti mec'ron b́woterawon finono dabde'er b́wotsok'o bek'etúnee.
JAM 2:25 Widetsu Ra'ab Isra'elitse woshetswotsi b mootse bdek'or k'osh weeron boametuwok'o bwoshor bi bfinonon kááweratsna?
JAM 2:26 Kashaatse k'aleets meetso k'irkee, mank'owere finatse k'aleets imnetiyo k'irkee.
JAM 3:1 Ti eshuwotso! noo danifuwotsi wottsuwots iki bogts angsho node'k'etwok'o itdantsotse ititse ayuwots danifuwotsi wotk'ayine.
JAM 3:2 No noúnets aayote nosheeliri, b́ noon keew keewon darrawo bí bí ats jamo kordek' falituwo ik jag bí atse daatseraw ashe.
JAM 3:3 Farsho noosh bí azazetwok'o b́ nonots lugamo nogedeti, mank'oon bíats jamó no shuntsok jiishituwone.
JAM 3:4 Markabo awuk'o een b́ wotiyaloru jong angon b́ jookewor, markab jokirwo bir múk'naún b́ shuntso maants b́ jiishiti.
JAM 3:5 Mank'owere alberu muk'na'a atsi kayu wotefetsat een een keewwotsn bit'iri, een gemo b́mis'fo taw muk'na'úne.
JAM 3:6 Alberunu tawok'oyiye. Alberu noatsi kaywotsitse daatseru gond datsuniye. Ats jamats aldetstsonat noats jamo bi awaashiti. Gahanemitse keshiru tawok'o nobee jamo bmitsiri.
JAM 3:7 Datsatsi s'otswotsnat kafuwots, datsatse getseyirwotsnat aats k'arotse sha'iru azeets jamwots ashon sezewo falitune, andoor sezeerne.
JAM 3:8 Wotowa bako albero sezo falituwo konuwor aaliye, úd'it marziyo bín s'eentsonat kashdek'o biitse deshaw gond keewniye.
JAM 3:9 Bín no nihi Ik'o noúdiri, mank'owere bín Ik'i aron azeets ashuwotsi noc'ashiri.
JAM 3:10 Noon ikotse údonat c'ashon keshirune, tieshuwotso! han b́ woto geyiratse.
JAM 3:11 Aats t'up' ikotse úshosh wotit shaaw aatsonat s'aam aatson t'up'osh falituwa?
JAM 3:12 Ti eshuwotso! belesi mito woyira eteets mit shúwo shuwosh falatse. Wee woyini bos'o Belesi shuwo shuwosh falatse? Mank'o s'aam aatsotse shaaw aatso keyatse.
JAM 3:13 It dagotsere dan teleefonat t'iwints detsts asho kone? Dani teleefonat b́tooko dashan detson b́fiintsfino b́sheng beyon kitsuwe.
JAM 3:14 Wotowabako s'aamts okooronat b́ took shuno it nibots fa'e wotiyal it'k'ayere, arikeewatsowere kootk'ayere.
JAM 3:15 Dani teleefan b́ daatseti, datsuwatse meetsatse, Dablosokna bako Ik'onaaliye.
JAM 3:16 Okooronat took shunon bobeyokoke dimbironat gond fin jamwots beetune.
JAM 3:17 Wotowaere Ik'oke daatset dani teleefo shin shino s'ayine, manats dabrnuwere jeenon s'eents, doo, maneyo, mhretiyo, sheeng shuwo bín s'eentso, bogabogshoonat gitalberetsi woto biitse deshawoniye.
JAM 3:18 Jeen be shunts ashuwots jeeno shoohr kááwi shuwo kakuwitune.
JAM 4:1 It dagotse fa'a kes'onat fayon awuke waake? It atsotse kaariru it meetsi tewunaatsnosha?
JAM 4:2 Ik keewo daatsosh tewunirute, ernmó daatsatste, asho úd'irute okoorirute eree daatsatste, fayeyirute, koyeyirute. Ik'o it k'onraawotsnowere it geyiru keewo daatsatste.
JAM 4:3 Ik'o it k'oniyaloru Ik' it k'onts mansh aaniyo daatso itk'azir it k'oniru keewo meets geneeúwats jiitsosh gond asaabiyon Ik'o it k'onirwooshe.
JAM 4:4 It widetswotso! datsu shuntso Ik'i t'alato b́wottsok'owo danatsteya? Eshe konwor datsunton shune geyiruwo b́tooko Ik'i t'alato b́woshoniye.
JAM 4:5 Ando S'ayin mas'aafotse «Ik'i okooro, bí no gitsots b́ k'eezts shayiro b́ s'uzsh no wotitwok'oye» bí ettso datsmec'reya?
JAM 4:6 B́ wotiyaloru s'ayin mas'fo «Ik'o bog taana etirwotsi k'efituwe, dash took detsirwotsshomó b́ s'aato imetwe» b́ ettsosh Ik' imet s'aato jamoniyere boge.
JAM 4:7 Mansh Ik'osh keewewere dablosnoweer k'efoore, bíwere itatsere okaan wos'etuwe.
JAM 4:8 Ik'ok t'inere, bíewere itok t'inetwe, it morretsuwotso! it kishuwotsi s'ayntsuwere, it hakebaka etiruwotso! it nibo s'ayintswere.
JAM 4:9 Kic'oore, shiyanowere, efere, it miis'o eepo maants, it gene'o shiyano maants wonewe.
JAM 4:10 Doonzo shinatse it tooko dashan deshere, bíwere dambaan itn tuuzitwe.
JAM 4:11 Eshuwotso, it atsatsewo oonek'ayere, ash oonitwo wee ashaats angshituwo neme b́ ooniri, nematse b́ angshiri, nemats n angshiyalomo dab angshtsi nwoti bako nemó s'eentsitk neenaliye.
JAM 4:12 Nem imetwonat angshituwo Ik' ikoniye, woriyosho t'afiyoshowere falituwoniye b́ s'uziye, eshe k'osh ashaats angshituwo kene neewo?
JAM 4:13 It «Hambets wee yaats hank'o wotts kitots amr manoke worwot iko beetwone, jaahrnwere oorshitwone» etiruwots itatso korde'ere.
JAM 4:14 Yaats wotituwo danatste, it beyo eebi? ikonoto be'eyar il t'afit daawnok'o itne.
JAM 4:15 Maniyeremó eto iti b́geyituwo «Doonzo bíere nobeetka wotiyal han wee ekeewi k'alituwone» etoniye itsh geyiti.
JAM 4:16 Itmó han it etfk'oon bognona etoone it it'iri, han naari it' jamoniye gonde.
JAM 4:17 Eshe sheeng keewo k'alo danfetsr k'alraaw asho k'al b́k'azo morre bíats b́wotiti.
JAM 5:1 Andoor it gaaletswotso! aab waa k'ewere, weerali gond bek'o it ats b́weetwotse kuhar efere.
JAM 5:2 It gaaljamo ok'wutsere. It tahonowere biliyon meewtsere.
JAM 5:3 It awntsonat it ambaron ajwutsere, bí aj ajonwere gawe itats b́wotiti, it meetsonowere tawok'owe b́meetiye, s'uwaatsi aaw hanotsitse ay gaalo ko'irte.
JAM 5:4 Hamb it tarootse k'es'roon jints fini ashuwots k'awuntso bik' itde'e bokuhi k'ááro b́shiyeyri, mááy ko'iruwots k'ááronowere dari kes'i jirwots doonzo waazats bodrere.
JAM 5:5 Datsatsi it beyo b́dowere it shuntsok' beerte. It tooko shukosh k'aniyets miinzok'o shopidek'rte.
JAM 5:6 Kááwo ats angshat úd'rte, bíwere itn k'eferatse.
JAM 5:7 Eshuwwotso! eshe haniyak doonzo b́waafetsosh k'amoon korere, goshtso b́ dats shintsonat ili awusho b́ daatsfetsosh k'amefetsr mangts k'awunts detstso b́ datsi shuwo kotfe.
JAM 5:8 Itwere mank'o k'amoore, doozo weyi aawo b́karntsotse it nibon kup'ore.
JAM 5:9 Eshúwotso! iti k'orerawok'o, it ats atseyo mumundk'ayere, Hamb eshe angshituwo fengeshatse need'wtsere.
JAM 5:10 Eshúwotso, doonzo shútson keewts nebiyatiyots gond bek'o k'amoon dek'on bo artsok'o danere.
JAM 5:11 Dabnu k'amoon kúp'ts manots «Derekne» etiruwone boosha, Iyob awuk'o b́ k'amtsok'o shishrte. doononwere il bísh b́ k'alts sheeng keewo bek'rte, mannowere doonzo maartsonat maac' nefetso b́ wottsok'o bek'rte.
JAM 5:12 Eshúwotso! b́jamon daron wotowa datson jam keewon keewonoru taark'ayere, it keewo ee eta wotiyal arikon ee eto wotowe, woteratse wotiyal arikon woteratse erere, mank'o woto b́ k'azalomó it ats angshetuwe.
JAM 5:13 Ititse bí ats kic' bodts asho b́ beyal Ik'o k'onuwe, geneúts asho b́ beyal Ik'o udefetsr dúwe.
JAM 5:14 Ititsere shodts asho b́ beyal Ik' maa eenashuwotsi bíyok s'eede'e, boowere shodts manats doonzo Iyesus shútson zeyito furr Ik'o k'onune.
JAM 5:15 Hank'o imnetiyats need'ts Ik' k'ono shodts man kashituwe, Doonzonu b́ shodotse bín kashituwe, b́ fints morro b́ beyalo bísh orowa etetuwe.
JAM 5:16 Mansh it kashituwok'o it morro it ats atsewosh kewewore, iko k'oshosh Ik'o k'onuwe, kááw ash Ik' k'ono ay k'awuntso daatsit ango detsfe,
JAM 5:17 Eliyas nonk'o ashe b́ teshi, wotowa bako awusho b́ búyawok'o kúp'shdek't b́ k'oni keez natonat worwoti badosh datsats eegoru awusho búyatse.
JAM 5:18 Aaninwere Ik'o b́ k'onre daro awusho b́ imi, datsunuwere aani shúwo b imi.
JAM 5:19 T eshúwotso! ititsere iko ari keewi weratseere b́ keshal k'osho ari weero maants bín bí aaniyal,
JAM 5:20 morretso b́ darts weeratse bí aaniyal, morretso kashu k'irotse b́kashituwok'onat ay morrosh orowa eto bísh b́ daatsituwok'o dande'e.
1PE 1:1 Iyesus Krstossh wosheets wottso P'et'rosoke, ib wotat P'ant'osn, Gelatiyon, K'ep'edok'iyon, Isiyon, Bitiniyon bad'aat beyirwotssh,
1PE 1:2 Ik'o niho bali b́dantsok'on marat'etswotssh, Iyesus Krstossh alewosh, b́ s'atson fakeyar s'ayonosh, S'ayin shayiron s'ayintseyat galertee, itsh s'aatonat jeenon ankatowe.
1PE 1:3 Iyesus Krstos k'irotse b́ tuwi jangon jamaaw beyosh wititwo jangiyetso noosh imtso, b́ mhreti ayon handr shuwewo noosh imtso, no doonz Iyesus Krstos nihi Ik'o údewe,
1PE 1:4 Bíwere t'afrawo, aawasherawonat gawereraw rstiyo darotse itsh k'anire.
1PE 1:5 Itwere s'uwaatsi aawots be'et kasho imneti weeron Ik' angon koteertee.
1PE 1:6 Dab ay naari fadewwots múk' aawwotssh iti boshiyaniyo ooreratse wotiyaloru amanat it kashtsosh gene'ore.
1PE 1:7 Fadeyan itats b́bodir it imnetiyo arik b́ wotok'o kitsoshe, t'afit awntsonwor dab tawone b́ fadefoni, awntsoniyere bogo k'awnts detsts it imnetiyonmo hank'o fadeyo bísh geyife, it imneti arik wottsanwere Iyesus Krstos b́ be'ewor údon, mangonat iti k'ees'iyeyo itsh daatsitwe.
1PE 1:8 Iyesus Krstosi be'atste wotiyaloru bín shunfte, dab andoor bín bek'o it k'azaloru bín amanirute, hank'oyi err falr keewerawnat mangts gene'on geneeúwirutee.
1PE 1:9 It amantsatse tuutso it kotirwo it kashu woro daatsitwte.
1PE 1:10 Kashi jangansh itsh wotit s'aato bek'on keewts nebiyatiyots aydek' geeyat p'ec'ar s'iilo woshrne.
1PE 1:11 Boyitse beyiru Krstos shayiro Mesihiyo ats bodet gond bek'o, gond beek'oniyere okoon b́ daatsit mango shini kitsre b́ teshi, boowere jaman awri gizeyonat aawk'on b́ wotitwok'o p'ec'at s'ilrne bo teshi,
1PE 1:12 Nebiyiyanots bofinir itsha bako botokosh b́ woterawok'o boosh be'ere b́ teshi, bo finwere darotse wosheets S'ayin shayiri weeron dooshishiyo itsh keewts ashuwots itsh bokeewtso bek'shoone, keewanowere melakiwotswor dab bek'osh tewnroone bo teshi.
1PE 1:13 Mansh eshe it nibo káátsde'er finosh k'ande'ere, Iyesus Krstos b́ be'et aawots it daatsit s'aatosh s'een wotts jángiyo deshere.
1PE 1:14 Aleyiru nanaúwotsi wotarr bali dáron it detsts gond tewni jafrats sha'ak'ayere,
1PE 1:15 ernmó itn s'eegts Ik'o S'ayin b́ wottsok'o itwere it be jamon S'ayin wotoore,
1PE 1:16 «Taa S'ayin t wottsok'o itwere S'ayin wotoore» ett guut'ere.
1PE 1:17 Konshoru b́ boga bogshrawo ik ikosh b́ finok'o angishitu Ik'o «Nonihi» etaat it s'eegirwo b́ wottsotse datsanatse ib wotat itbeyirwotse bín shatoon beewere,.
1PE 1:18 It it nihwotsatse it naatts woteraw beyatse itn kéwe t'afit ambaron wee awntson b́woterawok'o danfte.
1PE 1:19 Itn aani kéwédek'e eeg eeg kim deshaw wee ik shap deshaw mereer wottso mangts Krstos s'atsone.
1PE 1:20 Bíwere b́ dane datsan b́ azeraftsere shinon b́ wotor ando s'uwaatsi dúranatsere itsh be'ere.
1PE 1:21 It imnetiyonat it jangitwon Ik'ats b́ wotitwok'o Iyesus weeron bín k'irotse tiztsonat bísh mang imts Ik'on amanitute.
1PE 1:22 Amantsuwotssh kááwon s'eents shuno it detsetwok'o aroosh alewosh it kashu kup'shdek'rte, mansh eshe it nibi s'eenon it ats atsewo ayide shunewere.
1PE 1:23 Gitlo it shuuwe beyar beetwo dúre dúron ned'itu Ik'o aap'on t'afraw shokona bako tafitwonaliye.
1PE 1:24 Mas'aafo b́ etirwok'on; «Meets tahats jamo totsok'owiye, B́ mang jamonwere boditsi fundok'owiye, Totsonwere shuuk'etwe, fundonwere ooshetwe,
1PE 1:25 Doonzo aap'tsonmó Dúre dúrosh kúp'ar beetwe.» Itsh nabets dooshishiy keewonwere haniye.
1PE 2:1 Eshe gond jámo, dirsh jamo, ats dáro, okooro, konnari óóno wokiwere,
1PE 2:2 And shuwets na'auots ez gooro bo tewnfok'o itwere kashon eenfere it amish s'ayin wotts shayiri dano tewnwere.
1PE 2:3 Tewnosh it falitwere «Doonzo tewd doo b́ wottsok'o shashwerte wotiyale.»
1PE 2:4 Mansh beyar beetk shúts wottso doonzo Iyesus maants t'inere, shútsanwere ashuwots gac'at bok'ztso, Ik'oknomó bín b́ marat'etsonat mangits k'awnts detstsoniye.
1PE 2:5 Doonzo Iyesus maants it t'iinet beyar beet shútsok'o Shayiri moo wotarr agewoshe, hank'on Iyesus Krstos weeron geneúshit shayiri wosho Ik'osh t'intsosh S'ayin Kahniyotsi wotitute.
1PE 2:6 S'ayin mas'aafotse «Hambe! marat'etsonat mang wotts Tungúshatse shútsuwotsi kaatsde detset shuuts kup' S'iyonits beezitwe, bín amanitwo b́jamon jitseratse» etts aap'o guut'eyatniye b́ fa'oni.
1PE 2:7 Eshe it amanirwotssh shútsan mangkee, amanerawwotsshomó «Gmbi agirwots gac'at bojuuts shútso tungúshatse shutswotsi kaatsde detset shúts kúp'o b́ woti.»
1PE 2:8 Ando aani «Ashuwotsi gandit shútso, hambe! ashuwotssh t'ug wotar dikit shúts s'aloni» etfe. Bowere bí aap'tso amano bok'aztsosh dihitúne, shinonowere hansh beezekne.
1PE 2:9 Itmó t'alwotsere adits shááno maants iti s'eegts Ik'oko adits fino it nabitwok'o marat'ets shuwetswots, nugúso Kahniwots, Ik'o b́ tookosh woshb́dek'ts S'ayin ash itne.
1PE 2:10 It bal Ik' ashuwotsiliye itteshi, andomó Ik' ashuwotsi woterte, yoots máác' k'ewo daatsatste b́ teshi, andomó máác' k'ewo daatsrte.
1PE 2:11 T eshwotso! datsanatsere ibwotsnat ash datsi ashuwotsi it wottsotse kashonton kaareyiru meetsi tewnotse it wokitwok'o oona itsha etirwe.
1PE 2:12 Daneraka «Gond finirwotsiye» err itn bo oniyaloru dab Ik'o noon s'ilosh b́ weet aawots Ik' ash woterawwots it sheeng fino be'er Ik'o bo uditwok'o bo dagotse it beyor sheeng doyo it detsetwok'owa.
1PE 2:13 Doonzo Iyesus Krstossha err ashaatsere naashts jamwotssh alewere, dambaan bogt naash b́wottsotse naashi naashosh alewere.
1PE 2:14 Dats k'eezirwotssho alewere, bo gond finirwotsi sezosh, sheeng finirwotsi udosh naashi naashoke wosheekne.
1PE 2:15 Sheengo finar dartswots bodari aap'otse s'k bo etetwok'o it k'alo Ik'i shune.
1PE 2:16 Ik' guutswotskok'o wotar s'ayinon beewere bako it s'ayin beyo gondo bín ipoosh woshk'ayere.
1PE 2:17 Ash jamo mangiwere, amants eshwotsi shunere, Ik'o sharere, nugúso mangiwere.
1PE 2:18 Guutswotso itwere it doonz doonzosh mangiyon keewewere, it kewetwerere shengwotsnat doowwots s'uznsh b́ woterawo gondwotsshor keewewere.
1PE 2:19 Asho s'aato b́daatsit, weeralon gondbek'o bíyats b́ bodor Ik'osha err b́ k'amitkawotiyale.
1PE 2:20 Gondo finar sezewo de'er it k'amiyal eegi úde it datsiti? Ernmó sheengo finar it eree gondo itbek'oor it k'amiyal Ik'oke údo daatsitute.
1PE 2:21 It s'egewwor manshe, b́ jafrats it sháitwok'o Krstos itsh gondo bek'osh ariyetso wotere.
1PE 2:22 Bíwere eegoru morro fineratse, b́ noonotsnowere kooto keyatse.
1PE 2:23 C'asheworowere aanidek't c'ayatse, gondo b́bek'orowere kááwon angshitwo Izar Izewersh b́ tooko oona! ett b́ imi bako sheeferatse.
1PE 2:24 Morratse k'iron k'alewok'o k'alewon k'aleyar kááwon nobetwok'o bí b́ tookon b́ meetson no morro jitatse kur b́ dek'i, b́ gaawon kashwtserte.
1PE 2:25 It t'afts mereerwotskok'o it dandefra it teshi, andomó it kashu jinirwonat kotirwok k'az aanertee.
1PE 3:1 Mank'o it máátswotso! it kenih kenihosh alewere, hank'on ik ikwots Ik' keewtso amanerak bowotiyaloru dab bo máátswots ik noono bo keewawo bo doy mec'ron geetsewosh falitune.
1PE 3:2 Geetsewosh bofalitwere s'ayin wottsonat ash mangitk wotts it beyo bo bek'ore.
1PE 3:3 It azsheengo took wozewon, awnts gedon, k'awnts shaawon kéwets tah tahon úratse be'eyiru baatson wotk'aye.
1PE 3:4 Ernmó it azsheengo Ik' shinatse b́ k'awntso ayidek't mangtsonat t'afraw s'ilalon, maac' nefonat s'k etts shayiron baatstso, nibotse ááshat beyiru gitsitsi atson wotowe.
1PE 3:5 Yoots dúron bo Ik'o jangat bokeewo bíats juuk'rts, S'ayin máátswots bo baatso hank'one b́ teshi, bo kenih kenihwosh bo alefere b́ teshi.
1PE 3:6 Bo alewwere Sara Abrahamsh «T doonzo!» etaat bísh bi alefi naare, itwere sheeng wotts jamo it k'aliyal eegoru itn shatit keewo iti tek'iyo b́ k'azal b nanaúwots itne.
1PE 3:7 It kenihwotso! it máátswotsnton t'iwintson ik wotar beewere,, itiyere bogo maawk bowottsotse itnton kashon beyi s'aato bo naatetwotse boon mangiwere, hank'onowere it Ik' k'onosh t'ug wotit keewo beeratse.
1PE 3:8 Eshe it únets it ats atsatseyo ikwotar beewere,, k'osh ash kic'o it kic'ok'o woshde'er taawwere, eshwi shunon shunewere, maac' k'ewetswotsnat took dashan detstswotsi wotoore.
1PE 3:9 Deerwere bako gondi shegro gondon, c'ashi shegro c'ashon anik'ayere, it its'eege han itk'alishe. Han k'alrnwere deero naatetute,
1PE 3:10 S'ayin Mas'aafo b́ etirwok'o; «B́bewotse gene'úo geyirwonat sheeng aawwotsi bek'osh geyirwo, Bí albero gond keewo b́ keewawok'o, b́ noono weeri gondo b́ keewawok'o baziwe.
1PE 3:11 Gondatse wokowe, sheeng keewo finowe, Jeenono geyowe, b́jafratsowere sha'owe
1PE 3:12 Doonzo ááwwots kááwwots maantse bo s'iliri, b́ waazwotswere bo k'ontso k'eboosh k'eshekne, gond fonirwotsatsomó Doonzo b́shits aak'on shet'etwe.»
1PE 3:13 Sheeng keewo k'alosh it kúp'iyal gondo itats betsitwo kone?
1PE 3:14 Sheeng keewo finar it eree gond bek'o itats b́ bodalmó deero daatsitute, boon shatk'ayere, kic'ono kic' k'ayere.
1PE 3:15 Doonzo Krstosi it níbon mangiwere, it kashosh doonzo woshde'er, itokere fa'a it jangiyetsmansh itn aatiru jamwotssh aaniyosh jam aawo k'andek'tswotsi wotoore.
1PE 3:16 It aanitwonmo nooni nefonat mangiyon wotowe, Krstosk it wottsosh it detsts sheeng doyats gond keewiru ashuwots bo gond keewon bo jitsitwok'o maac' s'ayino deshere.
1PE 3:17 Ik' shunotso b́ wotiyal it gond fino finar gondo itbek'oniyere sheeng keewo finar gondo it bek'o k'anefe.
1PE 3:18 Krstos b́ tookon Ik'o maants iti t'intsosh bí kááw wotefetst kááw woterawwotssh morratse tuutson aani iwisherawok'on iknoto gondo bek't k'irre, bí meetson k'irre, shayironomó beyar beetke b́ woshi.
1PE 3:19 Shayir mannowere tipi mootse beyiru kashuwotsok amt dooshishiyo b́ nabi.
1PE 3:20 Tipi mootse beyiru shayr shayirwots yoots Noh dúr markabo b́ dozor Ik'o boon k'amoon b́ kotfere aleratsone ettswotsiye. Markabmanits kindt aatsotse kashtswots botaawo shmt ash wotts múk' ashuwots s'uziye.
1PE 3:21 Atsanwere and itn kashitu gupon ariyetsoniye, gupanu atsatsi kiimo bazosh b́ woterawo s'ayin maac'o daatsosh Ik'o maants t'iinet k'ononiye, itn b́ kashitwere Iyesus Krstos k'irotse b́ tuutsi weerone,
1PE 3:22 Bí daro maants amt Ik'o k'anokee, melakiwotsnat alirwots, angwotswor, bísh keewernee.
1PE 4:1 Krstos b́meetson gond bek'o b́ datstsosh itwere kes'i taho taahadek'ts ashok'o hasabiyanats k'up'ar k'ande'ere, b́meetson gond bek'o dek'ts asho morro fino need'ik'rere.
1PE 4:2 Haniyakon eshe oorts datsatsi it beyon meetsi gond tewno s'eentson b́ woterawo Ik'i shuntsok'on beewere.
1PE 4:3 Ik' ash woterawwots bo k'alfok'o shiraatse jintsi woton, gusiyon, máshon, werali gáálon, weralo úyide'er duubonat wic'ik wotts dozets ik'uwotsi ik'iyon it beshits dúro bodfe.
1PE 4:4 Andomó keewann weralo bonton ik woton beshiyo it k'aztsosh bo adiri, bo c'ashiri.
1PE 4:5 Ernmó kashon fa'úwotsnat k'irtswotsats angshosh k'andek'tso shinatse aatetúne.
1PE 4:6 Eshé hank'on boowere ash jamikok'o bomeetson bok'iritwok'o boats angshere, ernmó boshayron Ik'ok'o beyar beetwotsi wotar bobetwok'o doo shishiyo k'irtswotssh nabere.
1PE 4:7 Eshe jam keewi s'uwo bodre, kup'arr Ik' k'ono it falitwok'o mangdek'ts nibo deshere, it angok'owere beewere,.
1PE 4:8 Shuno morri ayo b́ aatsitwotse jamoniyere bogo it ats atseyo kúp'shde'er shunewere.
1PE 4:9 Múmúderaniyere it ats atseyon ibo ibiwere.
1PE 4:10 K'osh k'osh naari Ik'i s'aatwotsi sheengsh k'eezfetsr ititse ik iko bísh imets s'aaton k'oshosh finowe.
1PE 4:11 Danirwo Ik' aap'o b́ danirwok'on daniwe, finirwonu Ik'o bísh b́ imet angon finowe, hank'on Ik'o Iyesus Krstos weeron jam keewon mangitwe, mangonat angon dúre dúrosh bísh wotowe, amen.
1PE 4:12 T mashotso! tawok'o fadit gond bek'otse it daatsewo daneraw ib wotts keewo itats b́ bodtsok'o woshde'er adk'ayere,
1PE 4:13 Maniyere dab Krstos mangon b́ be'ewor ayde'er it geneútiwok'o b́ gond bek'otse kaydek'tswotsi it wottsok'o gene'owere.
1PE 4:14 Krstos shúútsi jangosh it c'asheyal mang wotts Shayiro etonwere Ik' Shayiro itats b́ oot'etwotse derek itne.
1PE 4:15 Ititsere konworu gondo b́ bek'or kash úd'tsok'o, úmp'etsok'o, gond fintsok'o, ash keewots s'eegerawo kindirwok'o wotk'aye.
1PE 4:16 Krstiyani b́ wottsatse tuutson gondbek'o bíyats bodetwonmó krstiyaniyat b́ s'egetsosh Ik'o mangiwa bako jitsk'aye.
1PE 4:17 Man eegoshe? Angsho b́ tuwit aawo bodre, angshonú b́tuwit Ik' ashuwotsatsne, eshe angsho b́ tuwit noyitsna wotiyal Ik' doo shishiyosh aleraw ashuwots bo s'uwo aawk'owe b́ wotitik'úna?
1PE 4:18 S'ayin mas'aafotse b́ etirwok'o, «Kááwonúwor dab kasho b́ falit k'ic'ona wotiyal Ik' Ik'irawotsnat morrets ashuwots aawk'owe bowotiti?»
1PE 4:19 Mansh Ik' shunok'on gond bek'iru ashuwots bokeew jamo azts amanetsosh adaro imr sheeng keewo k'alosh shuutsan etk'ayne.
1PE 5:1 Eshe taa bonton tohaat Ik' meyitsi eenash wottso, Krstos gond bek'osh gaw wottso, ando shino maantsish be'et mango kayitk wottso, it dagotse beyiru Ik' máá eenashwotsi izitwe.
1PE 5:2 Adaro itsh imets Ik' gizi s'eeno jinere, gizi s'eenmanowere it jinet angnon b́ woterawo Ik'o b́ getsok'on, shunon wotowe, ambarosh k'awnton b́ woterawo finosh it detsts shunon wotowe.
1PE 5:3 Mank'o it naashi shirotse beyirwotsi fiic'de'er kéwon b́ woterawo Ik' giz s'enwotssh sheeng ariyo kitson wotowe.
1PE 5:4 Hank'o it k'aliyal jints eeno b́ be'ewor awaasheraw mangi akliliyo dek'etute.
1PE 5:5 Ando! it jawetswotso! eenashúwotssh alewere, it jamets maac' nefo tahok'o tahade'er iko ikosh finowe, «Ik'o bog taana etirwotsi k'efitwe botoko dashan detsetwotsshomó s'aato imetwe» ett guut'ere.
1PE 5:6 Eshe Ik'o b́ etts aawon itn dambaan b́ tuzish Ik' kishi kúp'o shirots it tooko dashan deshere.
1PE 5:7 Bí itsh b́ shiyanirwotse iti kic'iru shiyan jamo bíyats juuk'rore.
1PE 5:8 It detstson beewere,, k'ande'ere! it balangaro diyablos b́ k'ot'etwo geefetst guundiru ééshok'o it gúúratse b́ ananiri.
1PE 5:9 Dats jamatse fa'a it eshúwots han naari gond bek'o bo dek'irwok'o dande'er it amantsats kúp'ar imnetyon bín k'efoore.
1PE 5:10 Muk' gizewosh gondo it bek'iyakon Krstosn dúre dúri mango maants iti s'eegtso s'aat jami Ik'o bí b́ tookon iti s'eenwotsi woshitwe, iti tep'etwe, iti kup'itwe, iti need'itwe.
1PE 5:11 Dúre dúrosh b́ borfetso ango bísh wotowe! amen.
1PE 5:12 Amanets eshwe etaat t gawirwo Silas weeron woshan k'awnon itsh guut're, itsh t guut'uwere itsh t izirwan ari Ik' s'aato b́ wotok'o itsh gawoosha etaatniye, mansh Ik' s'aatanotsatse kúp'ar need'ore.
1PE 5:13 Itkok'o marat'dek'etsu Babilonitse fa'a Ik'i moow jamo itsh t'intsirwane, t naa'yi Mrk'oswere jamo itsh t'intsirwe.
1PE 5:14 Krstiyaniwots shunon it ats atseyo jobeyon jamo aatewere. Krstosk wotts it únetssh jeeno wotowe.
2PE 1:1 Iyesus Krstossh guutsonat woshef wottso Sim'on P'et'rosoke, Noko Izar Izewernat no ato Iyesus Krstosoke fa'a kááw imnetiyok'o mangts imnetiyo daatstswots itsh,
2PE 1:2 Ik'onat nodoonz Iyesusi danon s'aatonat jeenon itsh ayowe.
2PE 1:3 B́mangonat b́dowon noon s'eegtso bín nodantsatse tuutson b́ Ik'i angon kashonat Ik'o aroosh geyitu jamo noosh imre.
2PE 1:4 B́ mangonat b́ dowonn mangts k'awntso detstsonat ayidek't een wotts no jangiru aap'wotsi daatsdek'rone, janigiyets aap'anotsatse tuutson gond tewnatse datsanatse fa'a t'afotse k'ay keer Ik'i doyo kaydek'irwotsi it wotishee.
2PE 1:5 Manatse tuutson keewanots itsh bodabeetwok'o kup'ore, imnetiyatse doo woto, doo wotaatse dano,
2PE 1:6 danatse b́took keewdek'o, b́ took kordek'atse k'amoon kup'dek'o, k'amoon kup'dek'ats Ik' aro,
2PE 1:7 sheeng beeyats eshu eshwi shunewo, eshu eshuwi shuneeyatse shuno dabwere.
2PE 1:8 Keewanots ayaarr itsh bobere itdetsal nodoonz Iyesus Krstosi danosh woteraw shuu deshawwotsi itwoterawok'o iti kotetúne.
2PE 1:9 Keewanotsi deshawonmó wokts keewo bek'ofalaw aaw dooge, beshts b́morratsnowere b́s'ayintsok'o batk'rere.
2PE 1:10 Eshe ti eshwotso! its'eegeyonat itmarat'etsok'o arikon b́woto kitsosh baltsoniyere iki bogo kup'ore, man itk'aliyal b́ jamon gandeyar dihratste.
2PE 1:11 Mank'oon dúre dúrik wotts nodoonznat no aton Iyesus Krstos mengstots kindo s'eenon itsh imetwe.
2PE 1:12 Keewanotsi danfte wotiyalor, it detsts arikeewon itkúp'yalor hanots jango úni aawo itsh gawiyo fal k'ayaatse.
2PE 1:13 Dunkaniyok'o wotts tiatsanitse t befetsosh úni aawo itsh gawiyo kááw araatniye taash b́be'eyiri.
2PE 1:14 No doonz Iyesus Krstos taash b́ kiitstsok'on datsanatse káári k'iron tk'aletwok'o danfee.
2PE 1:15 And taa t kup'ir kááron itatse tk'aleyakon dab keewanotsi úni aawo gawdek'o it falitwok'owe.
2PE 1:16 Nodoonz Iyesus Krstos kúp'onat gitlo aanar b́weyi jango itsh nokeewor, notookon, eeno b́woto no ááwon bek'aat gawirwotsi bako ash weri gondon k'aniyets tururi jafro shoydek'atniyaaliye.
2PE 1:17 «Tmaac' k'eeztso tshunts na'o haniye» etiru k'ááro mangts Ik'oke bísh b́woor, Ik'o nihoke mangonat een woton dek're.
2PE 1:18 S'ayin guro abaatse bínton noteshor darotse waats k'ááran no notokon shishrone.
2PE 1:19 Jaman nebiyiwots bo keewtso arik b́ wottsok'oniye noosh bogshdek't bo kitsiri, mansh t'alwi beyoke fa'a c'eshosh sheengshde'er it kotfok'o nebiyiwots keewtsono sheengshde'er koto itn geyiyitwe, manowere it k'alit maargoyo b́ gatsfetsosh, datsgatsi mozofu it nibots b́ be'efetsoniye.
2PE 1:20 Jamoniyere shino t'iwintso itsh geytwo S'ayin mas'aafotse fa'o kon naari bek'on keewetso konwor b tookon b́ gawirwok'o bitsosh b́ falawok'oniye.
2PE 1:21 Kon naari bek'o b́jamon ash shunon waratse, ernmó bek'o shayiron jisheyiru ashuwots Ik'oke dek'tinye bokeewi.
2PE 2:1 Yoots dúron ash ashuwots dagotse kootets nebíyiwots bo teshtsok'o, it dagotsno shinomaants kootets danirwots beetúne, boowere t'af dowet kooti dano ááshon jamok b́ bad'itwok'owe bo woshiri, boon aaniy kewdek'ts doonzo danatse err káárts t'afo botokats bodoweti.
2PE 2:2 Mank'oon aywots boko wic'its weeri jafrats sha'itunee, bok'alts k'alatse tuutson ariweerindo b́ c'asheeti,
2PE 2:3 Kootets daniyirwanots gizosh bo k'awntirwatse tuutson botookon bo tarikiyo keewfetsr iti meetune. Aydúroniyere shintson angsho boosh k'anwtsere, arikon t'afonwere bonee b́ kotiri!
2PE 2:4 Melakiwotswor dab morro bofinor Ik'o boosh maac'o b́k'ewerawon t'alu dashan ayiwokts gop'otse tipeyarr angshosh koteyarr boteshtwok'o gahanemits boon juwb́k'ri,
2PE 2:5 Mank'o kááw naab́fo Nohi k'osh shawat ashuwotsnton kashit, Ik' Ik'iraw ashuwotsi boteshts datswatse t'afit atso b́ dowiyor maac'o k'ewat manoori datsjamo maarratse,
2PE 2:6 Dabnworu Ik' Ik'iraw jamwots bí angsho boats b́ ariyetwok'o Sedomnat Gomor kitwots tulo bowotefetsosh mic'r bot'afitwok'o boats bí angshi,
2PE 2:7 K'uurwots bofiniru wic'its finatse tuutson kic'efetst teshtso kááwo Lot'nomó b́ kashiyi,
2PE 2:8 Kááw ash manwere bo dagotse b́ beyor aaw aawon b́ bek'tsonat b́ shishts nemal keewon b́ kashu b kic'efere b́ teshi.
2PE 2:9 Eshe jaman hank'o b́ wotiyakon doonzo bín ik'iyon beyiru ashuwotssh fadeyotse b́ oritwok'o, morretswotsno awúk'o b́ seziitwok'onat angshi aawosh aawk'o korde'er b́ ja'ituwok'o danfee etee.
2PE 2:10 Bítsnor kim wotts bo meets shunok'o sha'irwotsnat Ik' alo gac'irwotsi angshosh korde'er b́ k'aniti. Kootets danirwanots ááw shúk'etsonat bog noona etirwotsi bo wottsotse darotse alirwotsi bo c'ashor sharaatsne.
2PE 2:11 Melakiwots boyere kúp'wotsnat angetswotsn bowotiyaloru dab doonzo shinatse boon c'ayr nooni beshoon s'eents s'aamiyo shinomaants boats t'intsratsne.
2PE 2:12 Kootets danirwanotsmó t'iwnintsosh bofalaaw keewoniye bo c'ashiri, bo kambon detsewoonat úd'ewosh shuwetswotsk'o, azeyon boosh b́ shiyetsok'onat t'iwitsndek' falaaw gizwotskok'one, gizwots bo t'afitwok'o boowere b́ jamone t'afitune.
2PE 2:13 Weeralo bo fintsotse bo k'awntso dek'etúne, boosh bo gene'o aaw sháánatse máshar weeralo gáálir, weralo gálonowere itnton bomor dáshitk wotts meets finon wic'itsonat jiitsitwotsi wotitune.
2PE 2:14 Morro finatse bo atso korde'aw gusiyi ááwo detsfne, bodetsts mor fini shunotse awror shashwo keyatsne, bo amantsatse kup'ar ned'eraw ashuwotsiye boant'elciri, gizoshe bok'awntiri. C'ashek ashne.
2PE 2:15 Bo kááw weero k'azk'rat t'afwtserne, gondo finar daatset gizo shuntso Bi'or naay Bel'am weerindo shoydek't sheelk'rernee.
2PE 2:16 Bel'amiyere b́ morratse tuutson fayere, noonkeewo falraw daazu ash noon keew keewon keewat bek'etso geyi fino k'eferaniye.
2PE 2:17 Ashaanots aats deshaw aats t'úp'ok'one, egurahon jokeyiru dawnotsk'one, nic' etts t'aluwo bonee b́ kotiri.
2PE 2:18 Darotse beyiru ashuwots dagotse k'az fart boweyiyako ayo ja'arafa'a ashuwotsi k'awnts deshaw míshí aap'o keewon meets tewnonat gusiyon dáshde aani morro maants bojishti.
2PE 2:19 «S'ayino keshetute» err itsh bo jangiyiti. Asho b́ da'eyor bín da'atsosh guutso wotaarr b́ kéwetwotse bo botookon morrosh guutsne.
2PE 2:20 No doonzonat noon kashitso Iyesus Krstosi danon datsatsi kiimotse k'az bo keshiyakon aanar kim mann detseyar bo da'eyal shintsoniye bogo iltso ayideniye gondo boosh b́ wotiti,
2PE 2:21 kááw weerindo bodaniyakon boosh imets S'ayin tzaziyo shuutso maants bo anoniyere kááwi weerindo dananiyere bo ooro k'anefe b́ teshi boosha.
2PE 2:22 «B́ c'ooshtso móósh kano b́ c'oosho maants aani aanefe.» Mank'owere «Gúritso b́ mashiyakon aanar tok'ots b́ p'úp'refoni» etiru arik wotts jewro boats bodre.
2PE 3:1 T mashotso! itsh t guut'irwan gitl woshoniye, git woshúwotsi itsh t guut' keewanotsi gawde'er kááw asaabiyo it detsetwok'o itn kup'shosh etaatniye.
2PE 3:2 Hniyere shin S'ayin nebiywots bo keewts keewonat it wosheetsots weeron it datstso no doonz wottsonat noon woriits tzaziyo gaw itdek'etwok'o geefe.
2PE 3:3 Jamoniyere shino han t'iwintsde'ere, s'uwaatsi aawwotsitse aatsnifetsr bo gond tewni jafrats sha'it k'aldirwots weetune,
2PE 3:4 Bowere «Doonzo Iyesus weetwe ett jangiyere eterosha b́ teshi? Beree, abee? Yoots nihwots bo k'irts dúron b́ tuutso jam keewo azeetso b́ teshtsok'one b́ beyiri» bo eteti.
2PE 3:5 Ashaanots ay dúroniyere shino daro Ik' aap'on bí azetsok'o datsunwere bdooze aatsonat aatsatse b́ wottsok'o danfetst danatsone bo eteti.
2PE 3:6 Manoori teshts datsunwere aatson k'oot'eyatniye b́ t'afi.
2PE 3:7 And beyiru daronat datsonmó Ik' ash woterawwots bo t'afit angshi aawotsi tawosh koteyarniye bo tesheti.
2PE 3:8 T mashotso! itmó doonzokere ik aawo kum aawok'o, kum aawo ik aawok'o b́ wottsok'o ik keewan batk'ayere.
2PE 3:9 Ik ik ashuwots boosh bí artsok'o doonzo keewt b́ jangits keewo s'eenosh ja'aratse, ernmó jam asho naandrone etosh b́ bodetwok'onat asho konwor b́ t'afawok'o b́ geetsotsne itsh b́ k'amiri.
2PE 3:10 Doonzo aawonmó danerawon úmp'etsok'o weetwe, manots aawots darwots k'áári eenon beshitúne, darotsi azeets jamo tawon mic'r t'afitwe. Datsunat biyatse finets keew jamo mis'etwe,
2PE 3:11 Eshe jam keewanots hank'on bot'afitkawotiyal, bere, it S'ayin beyon Ik'o arefetsr beyo aawk'oneya itsh geyiyo b́ k'azeti?
2PE 3:12 Eshe Ik' weet aawo mirac'on kotirwotsnat káári b́ weetwok'o k'alirwotsi wotoore, manoor daro tawon mic'r t'afitwe, azeetswots taw k'ees'on woc'wtsitúne,
2PE 3:13 Ernmó noosh b́ jangitsok'on kááwo b́ beetwoko handr daronat handr datsatsne no kotiri.
2PE 3:14 Mansh t mashotso! jaman b́ wotit aawo kotoka itfa'oni wotiyala, doonzo ik jago it atse gond keewo wee k'efetwo deshawwotsi wotar jeenon iti b́ daatsitwok'o kúp'ar beewere,,
2PE 3:15 No doonz b́ k'amts k'amo itsh kasho b́ wottsok'o dande'ere, shunetso no eshu P'awlos bísh imets daniteelfok'on itsh b́ guut'tso haniye.
2PE 3:16 Bí han jangosh b́ wosh jamwotsitsere hank'on guut't, b́ woshwotsitsnoru ik ik keewwots t'iwintsosh falerawwots fa'ane. Dano boosh shaptswotsnat hake baka etiru k'oshwots S'ayin mas'afwotsi bo k'uurirwok'o keewanotsno bo k'uuriri, manowere bo k'alit bo t'afoshe.
2PE 3:17 Itmó t mashotso! haniyere shin shino dan itdek'tsotse weeri gondetswots dáróón geetseyar, it need'ts kúp' manatse it dihirawok'o it atso korde'ere,
2PE 3:18 dab maniyere no doonznat no ato Krstos Iyesus s'aatonat bín danon dambaan dambaan erere, bísh ando dúre dúroshowere mango wotowe! Amen.
1JO 1:1 Shin teshts kashi aap'i jango itsh guut'irwonee, kashi aap'anuwere no shishtsonat no aawon nobek'tso, nos'iiltsonat nokishonowere noshu'utsoniye.
1JO 1:2 Kashanwere be'ere noowere bín bek'rone, no b́ jangosh gawitwone. Nihoke teshtsonat noosh be'ets dúre dúri kasho itsh keewitwone.
1JO 1:3 Noonton ik woto itdetseetwek'o nobek'tsok'onat noshishtson itsh keewirwone. Ik nowotitwere nihonat b́ naay Iyesus Krstosntoniye.
1JO 1:4 Nogeneeúwo s'een b́wototiwok'o han itsh guut'irwone.
1JO 1:5 Bíyokee noshishtsonat itsh nokewit wosho «Ik'o shááne, t'aluwonwere b́jamon bíyoke aaliye» etiruwoniye.
1JO 1:6 Mansh «Ik'onton ik woto detsfone» erfetsr t'aluwotse nobeetka wotiyal koote nokotiri, no aap'onat nofino arikaliye etee.
1JO 1:7 Wotowa eree bí sháánotse b́ beyirwok'o noowere sháánotse nobeyink'e no atsatsewo ik wotosh faliyank'one. Dab b́ naay Iyesus Krstos s'atsonwor morr jamotse noon s'aytsitwee.
1JO 1:8 Morro deshatsone no'etal notooke no ant'elciri, aronwere noytse aaliye.
1JO 1:9 No morro Ik'osh kish nokewitka wotiyal bí kááwonat amanek b́wottsosh nomorr jamo noosh orowa eteetwe nogond fin jamatsno noon s'ayintsitwe.
1JO 1:10 Morro fineratsone no'etetkawotiyal Ik'one kotetsiye nowoshiri, bí aap'onwere noyitse aali etee.
1JO 2:1 T nana'otso! han itsh tguut'ir morro itfinerawok'owa etaatniye. Wotowa eree konunoru b́ wotiyal asho morro b́finiyal nihokere noosh ned'itwo detsfone, bíwere kááwo Iyesus Krstosiye.
1JO 2:2 Bí nomorro t'afibazetwe, nomorr mec'rosh b́woterawon dats jami morro t'afibazetwo bíne.
1JO 2:3 Ik'i tzaziya no s'eentsiri wotiyal bín dank nowottsok'o manne nokitsiti.
1JO 2:4 «Ik'o danfee» et fetst b́ tzaziyotsi s'eentsrawo fa'e wotiyal kootetskee, arikeewonwere b́gitsotse aaliye.
1JO 2:5 Ernmó Ik'i aap'osh aleyiru jamo Ik'osh b́ detsts shuno arikee, arikon bín beyirwotsi nowottsok'owo b́ danet manne,
1JO 2:6 Ik'ontoniye tbeyiri etiru asho Krstos beyiruwok'o beyo bísh geyife.
1JO 2:7 T shuntswotso! itsh t guut'iru tzaziyan shin shinon it detsts yotstsuniye bako handriyaliye, yoots tzaziyanwere it shihsts aap'oniye.
1JO 2:8 Wotowa eree Krstosnat itoke ar wotat be'etso handr tzaziyoniye itsh tguut'iri, t'aluwo k'aaú b́bazere ari shááno and sháánirwe.
1JO 2:9 Sháánatse beyiruwe etfetst bí'eshuwi shit'irwo andoor t'aluwotse b́ fa'oni.
1JO 2:10 Bí eshwi shuniru jamo sháánatse b́beyiri, bíyoknowere ashosh t'ug wotit keewo daatseratse.
1JO 2:11 Bí eshuwi shit'irwonmó t'aluwotsene b́beyiri, t'aluwotsnowere bíananiri, t'aluwonwere bíaawo dek b́k'rtsotse bíamirwoko dande'atse.
1JO 2:12 T nana'úwotso! it morro Iyesus shúútson itsh orowe etetsotsne itsh t guut'iri.
1JO 2:13 Nih nihuwotso! shintson beyirwo itdantsotsene itsh guut'irwe. Jawetswotsnat baaruwotso! shed'ano it da'atsotsne itsh t guut'iri.
1JO 2:14 Nana'úwotso! Niho itdantsotsene itsh t guut'iriye, nihuwotso, shin shino teshtso it dantsotsne itsh tguut'iye. Jawetsonat baaruwotso! kup'uwotsi it wottswotsnat Ik'i aap'o it nibotse b́beyrwotse, shed'anonowere itda'atsotse itsh guut're.
1JO 2:15 Datsani wotowa datsank wotts keew jamo shunk'ayere. Datsani shunetwo Ik'o niho shuno bíatsotse aaliye.
1JO 2:16 Datsuatse beyru jamo meets tewuno, ááw mirac'o, b́ beewon it'o datsatsika bako Ik'o nihokikaliye.
1JO 2:17 Datsannat b́ tewunonowere beshitke. Ernmó Ik' shuntsok'o k'alituwo dúre dúroshe b́ beeti.
1JO 2:18 T nana'otso! hań s'uwaatsi sa'atoniye, «Krstosi k'efitwo weetwe» eteere shishrte, hamb, dab́ andoor Krstosi k'efiru aywots tuurnee, manatse tuutson s'uwaatsi sa'at b́woto manne nodaniye.
1JO 2:19 Bo noyitsne bokeshi. Wotowa eree yotsor nojirnaliye, nojirno wotink'ere noonton kup'arniye bobeyank'oni. Ernmó boúnetswor nojir wotbok'azo b́danetwok'o noyitse galeyat k'azkeshrnee.
1JO 2:20 Itnmó S'ayin shayiron Krstos fuutk'rere. Mansh it jamets ún keewo danfte.
1JO 2:21 Itsh t guut'ir ariko itdartsoshaliye, itiyere aro danfte, arotsnowere kooto b́datserawok'o danfte.
1JO 2:22 Eshe Iyesus Krstosi b́ wottsok'osh haalirwoniyere okoon kone kotetsoni? Bí Krstosi k'efirwoniye, Nihonat naayo noowere haalitwe.
1JO 2:23 Naayo halitwonu nihonowere de'atse, na'on amantso nihono amanere.
1JO 2:24 Shin shintson it shishts keewman it nibotse s'ap'de'er beewe, itmó shin shintson it shishtsman it nibotse s'ap'de'er b́ betka wotiyal na'onat nihonton ik woto detsetute.
1JO 2:25 Manwere Krstos shinomaants noosh jangit b́imetso dúre dúr kashoniye.
1JO 2:26 Itn dariyiru ashuwotsatse tuutsone han t guut'i,
1JO 2:27 Krstosoke itdek'ts shayiri S'ayno ititse b́ beyrwosh k'oshodanitwo itsh geyiratse, bíwere jam keewo itsh danituwe, itsh b́ danitwonu ara bako kootaliye mansh shayiri S'ayno itn b́ danitsok'on Krstoston wotde'er beewere,.
1JO 2:28 Eshe t nana'otso! bí b́be'ewor nosharaniyere aawo shu'úde'er bín nobek'etwok'onat bí b́weet aawots b́ shinatse nojitserawok'o bíń beewere,,
1JO 2:29 Bíwere kááwo b́wotok'o it daniyakon, kááw finiru jamo Ik'oke shuwek b́ wottsok'o dande'ere.
1JO 3:1 Ik' nana'uwotsi erŕ nos'eegeetwok'o niho awuk'o shuno noosh b́imtsok'o aab́ s'iilere! arikon noowere Ik' nana'a noone, datsan Ik'o b́dartsosh nonowere danatse.
1JO 3:2 T shuntswotso! and no Ik' nana'a noone, shinomaantsish eeg nowotitwok'o daneerafa'ee, ernmó Krstos b́be'et aawots bí aro arikon eeg bíarok'o nobek'etwotse bínowere noaritwok'ó danfone.
1JO 3:3 Krstosn man b́ wotitwok'o jangiru jamo Krstos s'ayn b́ wottsok'o bíwere b́ tooko s'ayn woshituwe.
1JO 3:4 Morra eto Ik' nemo gaak b́ wottsotse morr finit jamo Ik' nemo gáákre.
1JO 3:5 Ashuwots morro t'afiyosh Krstos b́be'etsok'onat bíwere morro b́ deshawok'o danfte.
1JO 3:6 Eshe Krstosnton beet ash jamo morro fineratse. Morr finitu asho Krstosi be'atse, bínowere danatse.
1JO 3:7 T nana'uwotso! konworu itn bí ant'elcerawok'owa, Krstos kááwo b́ wottsok'o kááwts fino k'alitu jamo kááwe.
1JO 3:8 Diyablos shintson dek'tut morro b́ finirwosh morr finiru ash jamo Diyablos jiire. Ik' na'o b́ be'e diyablos fino gakoshee.
1JO 3:9 Ik'i doyo b́gitsotse b́beyirwotsnat Ik'atse b́shuwetsotse Ik'i na'a wottso morro fineratse, finoshowere falratse.
1JO 3:10 Ik' nana'onat Diyablos nana'on galde danet hanne, Kááw finerawonat bí eshuwi shunaw jamonúwots Ik' nana'analiye.
1JO 3:11 Shin shintson it k'ebts wosho «No atsatsewo shunewone» etirwoniye.
1JO 3:12 Shed'ani jir teshtsonat bíeshuwi úd'tso K'ayelkok'o woto geyiratse, bí bíeshuwi eegishe b́ úd'i? B́ fino gond b́ teshtsotsnat bí eshu fino kááw b́ teshtsotsne.
1JO 3:13 Ti eshuwotso! datsatsi ashuwots iti boshit'al mansh adk'ayere.
1JO 3:14 Noo no eshuwotsi noshunirwotse k'iromaantse kashomaants k'az nokimtsok'o danfone. Shun deshaw asho k'iri c'ishotse b́beyri.
1JO 3:15 Bíeshuwi shit'iru jamo kash úd'kee, kash úd'tsonmó dúredúri kasho b́daatsrawok'o danfte.
1JO 3:16 Shuno eeg b́wottsok'o nodanet Iyesus Krstos b́ kasho noosh b́imtsoshe, noowere nokasho no eshuwotssh beshide imo noosh geyife.
1JO 3:17 Datsanatse gaalo deshfetsr kic'iru asho be'efetsr maac' k'eweraw asho «Ik'o shunfee» eto awuk'o k'alrniya b́faliti?
1JO 3:18 T nana'otso! No shuno arikonat finon be'etka bako noonon mec'ron keewon wotk'aye.
1JO 3:19 Mannowere arkeewtswotsi nowottsok'onat Ik'ishinats t'inosh shatalon aaw shuk'on t'inosh nofalitwok'o danfone.
1JO 3:20 Nonibo noats bíangshiyalor Ik'o noniboniyere danbe, bíye jamkeewo danfee.
1JO 3:21 T shuntswotso! No nibo noats angshratse wotiyal Ik'i shinatse ááw shuuk'o detsetwonee.
1JO 3:22 Ik'i tzazi jamo s'eentsr bín gene'úshit keewo nofinitwotse nok'onitu jamo bíyoke daatsitwone.
1JO 3:23 Ik'o azaztsonu b́ naay Iyesus Krstos shútson amanar Krstos noon bíazaztsok'on noatsatsewo noshunetwok'owe.
1JO 3:24 Ik'o azaztso k'alitu jamwots Ik'ona bobeti, Ik'onwere boyitse b́beeti, Ik'o noyitse b́beyirwok'o nodanet noosh b́ imts S'ayin shayirone.
1JO 4:1 T shuntswotso! datsatse kotetsk wotts nebiyiwots botutsotse shayr jamwotsi aman k'ayere, maniyere shayirwots Ik'okik bowotonat wotbok'azo fads'iilere.
1JO 4:2 Ik' Shayiro b́ woto galde'e it danet hanne Iyesus Krstos meetson b́ be'etsok'o amants shayir jamo Ik'i shayire,
1JO 4:3 Iyesus Krstos ash wotat meetso tahadek't b́be'etsok'o amaneraw shayir jamo Ik'oki shayiraliye, shayiraanu weetwe etefere itshishtso Krstosi k'efiru shayironiye, bíwere andoru dab́ datsuatse fa'ee.
1JO 4:4 Nana'otso! It Ik'k itne, ititse beyru shayiro datsanatse fa'a shayironiyere bogfe. Eshe kotets nebiyotsi da'artee.
1JO 4:5 Kootets nebiyots datsatsikne, bokeewirwonu datsanatsi keewoniye. Datsanwere bokeewo k'ebetwane.
1JO 4:6 No Ik'ik noone, Ik' dants jamo no keewo k'ebetwe, Ik'ik woteraw jamonmó no keewo k'ewatse. Ari shayronat kooti shayiron nodanet hanne.
1JO 4:7 Shunetswotsó! shuno Ik'okik b́wottsotse no atsatsewo shunewone, shuniru jamo Ik'i na'ee, Ik'onowere danfee.
1JO 4:8 Ik'o shun b́wottsotse ash shunaw jamo Ik'o danatse.
1JO 4:9 Ik'o b́naayn kasho nodaatsitwok'o b́ naay ik s'uzo datsanats woshere, mannowere Ik'i shuno nodagotse be'ere.
1JO 4:10 Shuna eto hank'oyiye, no Ik'o noshuntsosh b́ woterawo bí noon b́ shuntsonat nomorro b́ t'afitwok'o b́ naayi b́woshtsoshee.
1JO 4:11 Shunetswotsó! Ik'o hank'o noon b́shuniyakon no noatsatsewo shunewo noon geyife.
1JO 4:12 Ik' bek'ts asho konwor aaliye. Noo noatsatsewo noshuneyink'ere Ik'o noyitse beyank'ee, b́ shunonwere noyitse s'een wotiyank'ee.
1JO 4:13 Ik'o b́ shayiro nooshowere b́'imtsotse no bín bíwere noyitse b́ beyirwok'owo danfone.
1JO 4:14 Niho datsani b́ kashitwok'o woshdek't naayo b́wooshtsok'o bek'rone, manowere gawitwone.
1JO 4:15 Iyesus Ik'o naayi b́ wottsok'o amanitu ashotsne Ik'o b́beeti, bíwere Ik'ootse b́beeti.
1JO 4:16 Mann Ik'o noosh b́detsts shuno danfone, manowere amanerone. Ik'o shune, shunon beyirwo Ik'one b́beyiri, Ik'onwere b́ gitsotse b́beyiri.
1JO 4:17 Noo datsanatse nobeyir ari Krstos b́beyirwok'o b́wottsotse noshuno s'een b́wotink'ere angshi aawots shatalon b́shinaatse aaw shuk'on t'inosh falyank'onee.
1JO 4:18 S'een shuno shato kishde'erni juubk'rti bako shunotse shato aaliye, shato sezonton deshk b́wottsotse shatiru asho b́shuno s'een woteratse.
1JO 4:19 Ik'o shin shintson nonb́shuntsotse noowere shunetwonee.
1JO 4:20 Ik'o shunfee etfetst bíeshuwi shit'irwo kotetsiye, b́ bek'tso bí'eshuwi shunatse wotiyal b́ be'aaw Ik'o shuno falratse.
1JO 4:21 Eshe Krstos noosh b́'imts tzaziyo Ik' shuntso bíeshuno shune erkee.
1JO 5:1 Iyesus Mesihiyo b́ wottsok'o amants jamwots Ik' nana'anee, nihono shunetu jamo naayo noowere shunfee.
1JO 5:2 Ik' nana'úwotsi noshuntsok'o nodanetiye, Ik'o shunr b́ tzaziyo no s'entsoree.
1JO 5:3 Ik' shuna eto b́ tzaziyotsi s'entsee. B́ tzaziyotsu mangnaliye.
1JO 5:4 Ik' nana'a wotts jamo datsu da'itwe, datsu no da'itwere imnetiyone.
1JO 5:5 Iyesus Ik'o naayi b́ wottsok'o amantsoni bako kone datsu da'itwoni?
1JO 5:6 Aatsots b́ gupetsok'o kitsit aatsonat b́ k'iro kitsru s'atsi weeron waatso Iyesus Krstosiye. Bí b́waa aats mec'ron b́ woterawo aatsonat s'atsone. Hanwere ar b́ wottsotse, keewanwere ar b́wottsok'owo S'ayin shayiron gawitwe.
1JO 5:7 Keez gawwots fa'ane,
1JO 5:8 Bowere Shayirona, aatsonat s'atsone, keezanotswere bogawon ikne.
1JO 5:9 Ashuwots bo gawts gawo dek'etwonee, ernmó Ik'o gawts gawonmó jamoniyere bogfe. Ik'o b́ gawtsonwere b́ naay jangosh b́ gawtsoniyee haniye.
1JO 5:10 Ik'o naayn amantsonmó gawan b́ gitsotse fa'ee, Ik' amanerawonmó Ik'o b́ naay jangosh b́'imts gawo aman b́ k'aztsatse tuutson Ik'o kootetsi woshre.
1JO 5:11 B́ gawonwere Ik'o dúre dúri kasho noosh b́ imtsok'onat kashmanwere b́ naayitse b́ beyirwok'o gawirwoniyee.
1JO 5:12 Ik'o naayi detstso kasho detsfe. Ik'o naayi deshawonmó kasho deshatse.
1JO 5:13 It Ik'o naay shútson amants jamwots dúre dúri kasho it detstsok'o it danishe han itsh guut're.
1JO 5:14 Kon naari keewonor b́ wotiyal b́ shuntsok'on nok'onitkawotiyal noosh b́ shishetwok'o amanitwone.
1JO 5:15 Noo k'onts jamo b́ shishetwok'o danfonewotiyal, bíyokere nok'onts jamo andon nodek'etwok'o danfone.
1JO 5:16 Konworu wotowa, ash iko bí eshu k'irosh bín betsaw morro b́ finefe b́bek'al bísh Ik'o k'onwe, ashman morro k'irosh bín betsatse wotiyal Ik'o kasho bísh imetwe. Ernmó k'irosh betsit morro fa'ee. Man naari morrosh Ik'o k'onuwe eraatse taa.
1JO 5:17 Gond fin jamo morre. Wotowa eree k'irosh betsraw morro fa'ee.
1JO 5:18 Ik' na'o Iyesus Krstos bín b́ kotirwosh Ik' na'a wotts jamo morro b́ finerawok'o danfone, Shed'anonwere bíats boratse.
1JO 5:19 Noo Ik'k nowottsok'o danfone. Datsunmó jamon shed'ani ali shirotse b́ fa'oni.
1JO 5:20 Ik' na'o b́ wattsok'onat ari Ik'o nodanetwok'o t'iwitsts nibo noosh b́'imtsok'o danfone, b́ naay Iyesus Krstos weeron bínton ari Ik'onton ikwoto detsfone. Iyesus Krstos ari Izar Izeweru dúre dúri kashonu bíne.
1JO 5:21 T nana'otso! dozets ik'wotsatse it atso korde'ere.
2JO 1:1 Tiyoke eenashoke, marat'ets moogenunat b nana'otsnsh, Tí s'uzi b́woteftsere ar dants jamwotswere iti shunfne.
2JO 1:2 Aranwere no dagotse fa'onat shino maantsisho dúre dúron noonton beetwoniye.
2JO 1:3 Ik'o nihonat b́ naay Iyesus Krstotsoke s'aatona, mihretiyona, jenonwere, aronat shunon noonton wotowe.
2JO 1:4 N nana'uwotsitse ik ikuwotsi niho noon bí azaztsok'on arikeewon kup'at boere t datstsotse ayidek'at gene'owere.
2JO 1:5 Moo genee, andoor oona neesha, neesh t guut'irwan tzazi handr ark'aye, and t guut'irwan «No ats atsewo shunewone» etts shintson dek't nowooke teshts tzaziyoniye.
2JO 1:6 Ari shuna eto Ik' tzaziyo fina etee. Tzaziymanwere shintson it shishtsok'on «Shunon beewere,» ettsoniye.
2JO 1:7 Iyesus ash wotat meetson b́ be'etsok'o amanerawwots ash sheeliyru aywots datsanatse tuurne. Mank'o ashaan ant'elcirwonat Krstosi k'efirwoniye.
2JO 1:8 Itmó it k'awntso s'eenon dek'osh kup'ore, it fintso b́ t'afrawok'o korde'ere.
2JO 1:9 Krstos danits danaats s'ap'de'er beerawo bíatsnowere wokar ametuwonton Ik'o aaliye, Krstos danits danaats s'ap'de beet ashontonmó Nihonat Nayon bíntoniye bofa'oni.
2JO 1:10 Dan han b́deshawo konwor itok b́wetitkawotiyal it meyits kindshk'ayere, dab́ jamonor bín aatk'ayere.
2JO 1:11 Bín jam aatit asho bínton gond fino kaytsoni b́wotiti.
2JO 1:12 Itsh guut'osh t geyirwo ay keewo detsfe, wotowa eree jamo dabdayon wosho geeratse, Maniyere itok borr noonon itn keewiye tgeyiriye, manwere noshunewo s'een b́ wotituwok'o geeyatniye.
2JO 1:13 N mish marat'etsu nana'uwots neesh jamo woshernee.
3JO 1:1 Arikon t shuntso, shunetso Gayiyossh, Tiyoke eenashoke,
3JO 1:2 T shuntsono! n be jamo neesh b́ kááwitwok'o, jeenono nwotitwok'o, jam weeron neesh b́sheengetwok'owe Ik'o tk'oniri.
3JO 1:3 Arosh ni amanetsok'onat aron n beeyirwok'on krstiyani wotts eshu ik ikwots waat bokeewor aydek'atniye t geneúwi.
3JO 1:4 T nana'wots arikon ananefetst bobeyrwok'o shishoniye bogo taan geneúshit keewo aaliye.
3JO 1:5 T shuntsono! neesh dab ib bowotiyalor eshu eshuwotssh amanek fine nfiniri.
3JO 1:6 Bowere boosh shunon nfints fino Ik'i maa shinatse kishdek't keewrnee, andoor Ik'o genee'ushitwok'on bowerindosh boon ntep'al sheenge.
3JO 1:7 Krstossh finosh bokeshor amanerawwotsoke eegor tep'o dek'keyatsnee.
3JO 1:8 Ari fin finrwotsnton finirwotsi nowotitwok'o hanotsk'o ashuwotsnton fino noon geyife.
3JO 1:9 Haniyere shinon Ik' moosh wosho guut're b́teshi, ernmo Ik' maa jish geyirwo Diyotrefis ti ettso de'atse.
3JO 1:10 Eshe itok twoor bí noon c'ashfetst, ketifetst b́ k'alts gond fin jamo keewitwe, man bísh bodob́k'aye bí b́ tookish eshu eshuwotsi de'ake. K'oshwotswere bo de'awok'owe b́bazifoni. Ik'i mootsnowere boon b́gishefoni.
3JO 1:11 T shuntsono! sheengo arowe bako gondo ark'aye. Sheeng finiru jamo Ik'ikee. Gond finirwonmó Ik'o be'atse.
3JO 1:12 Dimet'ros jangosh ash jamo sheengkewon bísh gawirunee. Arunuwere b tookon bísh gawitwanee. Noowere gawitwone, nogawonwere ar b́ wotok'o danfnee.
3JO 1:13 Neesh guut'osh t geetso ay keewo detsfe b́ teshi, wotowa eree worek'atats neesh guut'o geeratse.
3JO 1:14 Karnon neen bek'oshe jangirwe, manoor noonon keewetwone.
3JO 1:15 Jeeno neesh wotowe. Hanoki n tooh tohuwots neesh jamo t'intsirune. Neewere no tohuwotssh jamo ik ikon t'intsuwe.
JUD 1:1 Iyesus Krstos guutso Yak'ob eshwi wottso Yuhudoke, S'eegetswotssh, Nihon Ik'on shuneetswotssh, Iyesus Krstosn kotets jametswotssh.
JUD 1:2 Maac' k'ewo, jeenonat shunon itsh ayowe.
JUD 1:3 Shuneetswotso! Ik wotdek'at nokashts kashi jango itsh guut'o ayidek'at geeyatniye tteshi, andmo aaniy iwisho b́ geyrawook'on Ik'o bí ashuwotssh iknoton b́ imts imnetiyi jangosh kup'de'er it kaaritwok'o itsh guut'o ayidek't geyiko taash b́woti.
JUD 1:4 Boats angshetwok'o ay duroniyere shino bojangosh guut'etswots mut'at itits kindrnee, bohe Izar Izewerko s'aato gusiyi beyon wonitwots Ik'o Ik'irawwotsiye, no doonz b́ s'uzi wottso Iyesus Krstosnor haalitune.
JUD 1:5 Jaman shin shino iknoton it dankawotiyalor doonzo Gbs' datsatse kisht b́ kashitsok'oonat amanerawwotsnowere il b́ t'afitsok'o itsh gawiyo, shunfee.
JUD 1:6 Boon naashiyetsatse beshat bobeyoko fakshk'rts melakiwotsi aab s'iilere, Ik'o boon angshi eeno aawotssh b́borfetso dúre dúri tipoon, nic' etts t'aluwots kotdek't beezree.
JUD 1:7 Mank'oon Sedom, Gemoornat bo gúúratsi kitwotswere gusiyetswotsi bowoti, niwalonowere gobo boami. Mansh bo dúre dúri taawon sezeyirwotsi ariyetswotsi woternee.
JUD 1:8 Mank'owere ashaanots bo gúmon jisheyat bomeetso bokimshiri, naashwotsshoor aleraknee, darotse mang detstswotsnowere boc'ashiri.
JUD 1:9 Melakiwotsitsi naasho Mika'elwor dab Muse duuni jangosh Diyablosnton b́ mooshor «Ik'o neen fayowe» eta b́ eti bako c'asho c'ayatse.
JUD 1:10 Ashaanotsmó t'iwitsdek'oosh bo falaaw keew jamo boc'ashiri, gaw dek'falaw dini s'otswotskok'o bo azeewon bodants keewo fa'e wotiyalor dab bíne bot'afiti.
JUD 1:11 K'aayen werindon boamtsotse, gizosha ett Bele'ami dáriits weeron bo dihitsotse, K'oree Ik'o b́ k'eftsok'o boowere k'efat bo t'aftsosh indowe boosha!
JUD 1:12 Ashaanots bo jitserawo gusiyon ikwotar moonat úshoke bodatsewor itsh t'uge bowotititi, bo boshiyaniriye botookk mec'eroshee, jongon gifiniyeyiru, awsh deshaw dawnok'one, shuu daatseef shashotse dab shuu biyatse daatseraw, b́ s'ap'ootse wat'ere gitoto shuuk'ts mitok'one.
JUD 1:13 Bo, fayiru aats k'ari fuundok'o boon jitsits fini úmbo kishirune, nyic' etts t'aluwo dúre dúrosh boon b́ kotirwotsnat hake bako jawriru k'eenwotskok'one.
JUD 1:14 Adamatse tuut shawatl gubratse shuwetso Henok bek'on b́keewor hank'o etre, «Eshe doonzo ay tats kum b́ wosh nana'a S'ayinwotsnton wotde jametsats angshosh weetwe.
JUD 1:15 Doonzo bín Ik'iraw ashmanots bofints gond keewatse tuutson sezitwe, Arikon doonzo bín Ik'iraw morrets hanotsi bíyats bokeewts gond keew jamwotsatse tuutson bo atsats angshitwe.»
JUD 1:16 Ashaanots jam aawo mumudefetst ik keewonor genee'úweraknee, botook gond tewni jafrats sha'irwotsiye, bonono míshi keewon s'eenke, botook keewo geeyat asho weeralo bo dáshiri.
JUD 1:17 Shuneetswotso! Itiyere! Nodoonź Iyesus Krstos woshetswots haniyere shin bokeewts keewo gawde'ere.
JUD 1:18 Bo «Dúri s'uwatse Ik'i hasabiyatse wokat bo took gond tewno shuuts sha'iru c'aashetswots weetune» itsh etrne boteshi.
JUD 1:19 Boye ash dago gaakirwotsiye, meetsi tewni jafrats sha'irwotsiye, S'ayin shayronowere deshawotsiye.
JUD 1:20 T mashotso! jamoniyere bogo s'ayin wotts it imnetiyon it tooko agosh kup'ore, S'ayin shayiri angonowere Ik'o k'onwere.
JUD 1:21 Nodoonz Iyesus Krstoswor b́mac' nefon dúre dúri kasho itsh b́ betsitwok'o korde'er it tooko Ik'i shunoots korde'ere.
JUD 1:22 Git nibetsdetswotssh ashuwotssh maac'o k'ewore,
JUD 1:23 Ik ikwotsi taawotse kishde'er kashiwere, k'oshwotssh shatoon maac'o k'ewore, b́woteferor morron kiimts bo atso t'awits tahman b́ oorerawo shid'ere.
JUD 1:24 It dihrawok'o woshitwonat eeg eeg deshawwotsi woshr geneúwon b́mangi shinats t'intsosh falitwosh,
JUD 1:25 B́ s'uz noosh no ato wottso Izar Izewersh, nodoonz Iyesus Krstos weeron shintson tuur, dúre dúrosh mangonat, baatson, kup'oonat alonwere wotowe! amen.
REV 1:1 Bek'an karn gizewotse wotit keewo Ik'o b́ guutswotssh kitsosh Iyesus Krstossh b́ imtsoniye, Iyesus Krstoswere melakiyo woshat b́ guutso Yohanissh bek'an b́ kitsi.
REV 1:2 Yohaniswere Ik' aap'onat Iyesus Krstos bísh b́ danitso, mank'o b́ bek'ts keew jamo gawere.
REV 1:3 Jaman b́s'eenet aawo karn b́ wottsotse bek'i aap'an nababirwo deereke! mank'o bek'i aap'man shishirwotsnat beek'anits guut'etso s'eentsitwots derekne.
REV 1:4 Yohanisoke Isiyotse fa'a shawat Ik' moowwotssh. Fa'oke, teshtsoknat weetu Ik'oke, b́ naashi jori shinatse fa'a shawat shayirwotsoke, mank'o k'irotse tuwon k'aab wottsoke datsatsi nugúswotsi keewirwo, amanets gawo wottsoke, noon shuntsonat b́ s'atson nomorotse noon nas' kishtso Iyesus Krstos s'aatoonat jeenon itsh wotowe.
REV 1:6 Iyesus Krstos nihi Ik'osh kahniwotsi wotar no finish Mengst noon woshtsosh, Iyesus Krstossh mangonat angon dúre dúrosh b́ borfetso wotowe! amen.
REV 1:7 Eshe daawnon weetwe, bín koshtswotsworu bo oreraniyere jametswots bín bek'etune, datsatsi ash naar jamo b́ jangosh eepetúne, keewanúwere aree, amen.
REV 1:8 Fa'o, teshtso, weetwonwere, jam falts Ik'o doonzo «Alfonat Omegon, taane!» etfe.
REV 1:9 Iyesus Krstosn wotat gond bek'onat b́ menegsto, mank'o b́ k'amo itnton kaytso taa it eshú Yohanis Ik' aap'onat Iyesus gawi jangosh tipeyat Fet'moyi eteyiru aatso bin guurdek'ts datswatse tteshi,
REV 1:10 Doonzo aawots Shayirotse t befere gaati k'aarok'o een k'ááro t shuuts weeron hank'o bí eree t shishi,
REV 1:11 «N bek'irwo mas'aafats guud'de'er shawat Ik' moowwots maants etonwere Efeson maants, Semrnes maants, T'ergamon maants, Tyat'ros maants, Serdes maants, Filadelfiyo maants, Lodok'iyo maantswere woshowe.»
REV 1:12 Kon taash keewtsok'o danosh t shuutso maants wongr tieti, wongr tiettsok'onowere shawat c'eesho kuriru awntson doozetswotsi t bek'i,
REV 1:13 C'eeshi bewoki talotsnowere ash na'a artso tbek'i, bíwere b́ tufok b́ borfetso geenz taho tahdek't, b́ gerats awntsi edo eddek'ke b́ teshi.
REV 1:14 B́ tookonat b́ took s'iron shetsonat sufiyok'o nas'a b́ teshi, bí ááwwotswere taw at'ok'one bo teshi,
REV 1:15 b́ tufuwotswere taw k'ak'otse wos'wutsts k'aazok'o arkno bo teshi, b́ k'aaronúwere een aats fuundi k'aarok'owiye b́ teshi,
REV 1:16 B́ k'ani kishon shawat k'eenwotsi detsdek'tni b́ teshi, git weeron shash wotts shiki gorado b́ nonotse b́ keshfere b́ teshi, b́ shiits jami sháánonwere aaw taali aaw sháánok'oyiye b́ teshi.
REV 1:17 Bín t bek'tsok'on k'irts ashok'o wotat b́ tufi shirots dih tuutsi, bímó b́ k'ani kisho tiyats gedt hank'o b́'eti, «Shatk'aye, shintsonat s'uwaatstson taane,
REV 1:18 Taa beyar beetk taane, k'iratniye tteshi, ernmó hambe dúre dúrosh beyar beetk taane, k'ironat Si'oli k'eshit k'ulfiwotsi detsfe.
REV 1:19 Eshe nbek'tso and fa'onat shuutsomaand wetwon guud'e.
REV 1:20 T k'ani kishatse nbek'iru shawat k'enwotsnat shawat awntson dozets c'eesho biyats gedetwots ááshts keewo haniye, shawat k'eenwots shawat Ik' moowwots atsi, Ik'i melakiwotsiye, shawat c'eesh boats gedetswotsu shawat Ik' moowwtsiye.»
REV 2:1 Efesonits Ik' maa melakiyosh, «Shawat k'eenwotsi b́ k'ani kishots detsdek'tso, shawat c'eesh kurefwots dagotse ananiruwo,
REV 2:2 n fino, kúp'at nfiintsok'o, n k'amo danfee, gondwotsnomó k'amo n maawtsok'o, woshetswotsi bowoterawo ‹wosheetsots noone› etirwotsi maramarat kootetsi bowoto n daatstsok'o danfee.
REV 2:3 K'amoon nkup'tsok'ont t shútsosh n taahraniyere gondo n bek'tsok'ono danfee,
REV 2:4 Ernmó ik keewo niyatsere t shit'tso detsfe, bíwere n shun shintso k'azk'rerne,
REV 2:5 awuk'o een beyoke n dihitsok'o gawde'e! naandre eree! shin finat nteshtsok'o andoru mank'o finowe, jaman k'alo n k'azalomó niyok weetwe, naandere eto n k'azal, n c'eeshi beyoko b́ beyoke k'a'úbazetwe.
REV 2:6 Ernmó neen t udit ik keewo fa'e, taa t shit'iru Nik'olawiyots fino neewere shit'rne.
REV 2:7 «Shayiro Ik' mooshwwotssh bí etirwo waaz detstso k'ewe! Da'a dek'etwo Ik' Genetotse fa'a kash mitatse b́ meetwok'o woshitwe.» etfe err guud'e.
REV 2:8 Semrnes Ik' maa melakiyosh, «Shintsonat s'watsts wottso, k'irt teshtsonat beyat beyirwo,
REV 2:9 n gond bek'onat n tugron danfee, wotowa eree gaaletsk neene, ayhudi bowoterawo ayhudi noone etiru, Shed'ani mabari wottswots, n shúútso bo t'afitsok'o danfee,
REV 2:10 shino maants niyats bodet gondbek'osh shatk'aye, eshe it fadetwok'o ititsere ik ikuwotsi Diyablos tipi moots gedetwe, tats aawosh gond bek'o daatsitute, n k'irfetsosh amanetso wotowe, kash akliliyo neesh imetwe.
REV 2:11 «Shayiro Ik' moowwotssh b́ etirwo waaz detstso shiye! Da'adek'etwo gitl k'irosh eegor woteratse.» etfe err guud'e.
REV 2:12 P'ergamon Ik' maa melakiyosh, «Git weeron shash detsts shiki gorad detsdek'tso,
REV 2:13 nee Shed'ani naashi jori beyoke n beyirwok'o danfee, wotowa eree t shútso kúp'idek'at detsrne, taash amanets gaw wottso Antip'asi Shed'ani beyirwoke it kitotse úd'ewor dab tiyatse ndetsts imnetiyo haleratsne.
REV 2:14 Ernmó niatse tshit'ts múk' keewwotsi detsfe, manúwere Bel'am dants dano detsdek'ts ik ik ashuwots it dagotse fa'ane, Bela'mhan Isra'el ash ashuwots woteraw ik'uwotssh shukeets móó máár widetsi fino finar bodihitwok'o Balak'i iztsoniye.
REV 2:15 Mank'owere Nik'olots jírwots dano detsts ashuwotswere ititse fa'ane,
REV 2:16 Mansh naandre eree, man nk'azal káári niyok waar tnoni shikonowere boon kaaritwe.
REV 2:17 «Shayro Ik'i moowwotssh bíetirwo waaz detstso shiye! da'adek'etwosh ááshts mano bísh imetuwe, handr shúútso bítse guut'ets shúts nas'unowere bísh imetwe, deek'etwoniyere okoon k'osho konwor man danatse.» etfe err guud'e.
REV 2:18 Tiyat'ron Ik' moowtsi melakiyosh, «Taw lalu arts ááwwotsi detstso taw k'ak'on wos'ts k'áázok'o arts tufuwotsi detsts Ik' na'o,
REV 2:19 n finonat nshunon, n imnetiyonat n finon, k'amoon n kúp'onowere danfee, ili n fino shintsoniyere b́ bogtsok'o danfee.
REV 2:20 Ernmó niyatse tshit'ts keew iko detsfe, manwere ‹Nebiyi taane› etiru máátsu Elzabeli s'ik etaat k'azk'rerne, biwere t guutswots bo gusiyitwok'onat woteraw ik'uwotssh wosheets misho bo meetwok'o daniyon sheelirane.
REV 2:21 Naandre bi etetwok'o bish gizewo imre b́ teshi bimó b widatsere naandre err aano geratsane.
REV 2:22 Mansh kúúni es'ats bin dikitwe, binton bofints gond finatse aanar naandrone eto bok'azal binton wido finiru jamwotsats een kúúno dowetwe,
REV 2:23 b nanaúwotsno k'iron fayitwe, Ik' maa jamwotswere ash hasabiyonat tewnon p'ec'ar danetwo taa twottsok'o danetúne, it ik ikoshowere it finok'o imetwe.
REV 2:24 «Tiyat'rosn fa'a danan de'aniyere oorts jamwotssh, mank'owere ik ikwots Shed'ani ayidek't ááshts keewe bo etirwi shuutso sha'eraniye oortswotssh k'osh kuro itats kuriratse,
REV 2:25 b́ wotefere taa twafetsosh it detstso kup'shde'er deshde'ere.
REV 2:26 Da'adek'etwosh t fino finefetsr b́ s'uwaats b́borfetso kup'itwosh ay ash naaratse bí alituwok'o woshitwe,
REV 2:27 Bri gúmbonowere boon keewitwe, shali k'ac'ok'owere boon k'ic'de'er k'arintsitwe, alanwere taa t nihoke tdek'tsi naarok'oyiye,
REV 2:28 Dats gatsi k'enonowere bísh imetwe.
REV 2:29 «Shayiro Ik' moowwotssh bíetirwo waaz detstso shiye!» etfe err guud'e.
REV 3:1 Serdesitsi Ik' mootsi melakiyosh, «Shawat Ik' shayrwotsnat shawat k'eenwotsi detsdek'tso, n fino danfee, shúútsosh kashetsknene, ernmó k'irwtserne.
